1b1(mdo sde): nA ma hA nA~M swA/ ba skye du/ 
1b2(mdo sde): snying du/ 'angags pa
1b3(mdo sde): nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba theg chen po'i mdo/ sa
2a1(mdo sde): // dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di
2a2(mdo sde): skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri kha la ti ka na// 
2a3(mdo sde): gnas thub pa'i dang srong rnams kyi gnas na/ nyan thos chen po bgrang ba
2a4(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig go/ 'di lta ste
2b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dpag tu med/ grangs med pa'i byang chub
2b2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi dam
2b3(mdo sde): tshig lung bstan pa'i mthar/ byin ma thag tu/ yang de'i che na/ nub/ phyogs na/ brgya byin thogs
2b4(mdo sde): pa'i nor bu rin po che brgya phrag stong du mas bskor cing mdun du bdar ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che snang ste/ yang
2b5(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ gzugs su snang ba thams
3a1(mdo sde): / cad ma lus mi snang bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par gang lha dang / mi
3a2(mdo sde): rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / gang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / gang sa dang / me dang / chu dang / rlung rnams
3a3(mdo sde): kyi gzugs su snang ba'i 'byung ba chen po ji snyed pa'i 'byung ba chen po snang ba de dag thams cad ma lus par
3a4(mdo sde): spangs par gyur cing / nor bu rin po che snang ngo // lhag ma dag kyang mtha' yas mu med pa/ brjod du med pa/ nam
3a5(mdo sde): mkha' bzhin du snang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyang shin tu lham me/ ldan ne/ lhang nger gyur to// gang yang sems can der 'dus
3a6(mdo sde): pa de dag kyang / bdag kyang mi mthong // gcig la gcig kyang mi mthong ngo // de dag la 'byung ba chen po'i gzugasu snang ba thams cad
3b1(mdo sde): 'gags nas/ yang mig tu snang bar ma gyur to// bdag bdag gi lus kyi gzugs dang / mtshan dang / dbyibs dang / reg pa yang mi dmigs par gyur
3b2(mdo sde): te/ gang dang gang gis brtags pa de dang de dag stong par mthong ngo // nyi ma dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor kyang mi mthong // skar ma'i gzugs dang / sa'i khams// 
3b3(mdo sde): chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi kha mas kyang mig lam du snang bar ma gyur to// sgra dag kyang rna ba'i bu gar grag par ma gyur to// dri
3b4(mdo sde): dag kyang snal bro bar mgyur to// sems da/ nga sems las byung ba la yang nga dang / bdag gir/ bya ba dang / skye mched drug gi 'du shes
3b5(mdo sde): 'byung bar gyur to// yang 'byung ba chen po dag kyang mi dmigs par gyur te/ phyogs gang dang / gang tu brtags pa de dang de'i phyogs thams cad du de bzhin/ 
3b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sku'i mtshan dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / gzugs su mthong bar gyur to// rgyang ma nas brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin po ches bskor
3b7(mdo sde): ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che snang ba las/ gnan cung zad kyang mi snang bar gyur to// gang de na byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting
4a1(mdo sde): 'dzin thob pa/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa srid pa tha ma pa de dag gis ltas de mthong nas/ 'jigs par mi byed/ sngangs par mi byed/ sbags par mi
4a2(mdo sde): byed de/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang ldan par rtogs pas/ de'i phyir de dag 'jigs par mi byed/ sngangs par
4a3(mdo sde): mi byed/ skrag par mi byed do// gang lhag ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos dag dang / lha dag dang / klu dag dang / gnod sbyin dag dang / dri za dag dang / 
4a4(mdo sde): lha ma yin dag dang / nam mkha' lding dag dang / mi'am ci dag dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / bsnyen srul po dang / 
4a5(mdo sde): lus srul po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa 'du/ sa pa de dag thams cad 'jigs par gyur/ sngangs paragyur/ skyo bar gyur nas/ tshul rol dang / 
4a6(mdo sde): rel la rmongs shing / sems 'khrugs nas/ de dag gcig la gcig kyang mi mthong / don 'di ji zhig/ 'di ji lta bu zhig/ 'di ji'i rang bzhin zhes 'dri ba
4a7(mdo sde): yang gang yang mi snang ngo // yang de'i tshe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshangs pa'i gzer bu zhes bya bas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs
4a8(mdo sde): su thal mo sbyar ba btud de gsol ba/ chos kun gyi ni rang bzhin la// gang zag gang dag ma 'tshal ba// gzugs phung la ni gnas gyur nas// dbang po drug la
4b1(mdo sde): rmongs par gyur// phung po gcig ni mi mthong shing // gzugs kyi phung la rtog bgyid de// 'di la gang zag kha cig ni// sangs rgyas chos la the tsom 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis
4b2(mdo sde): 'di dag la// chos kyi de bzhin mtshan nyid gsungs// de dag tshu rol pha rol la// bzod pa nam mkha'i mtshan 'tshal to// 'di na mnyam bzhag dpa' ba ste// brjod du med pa'i gnas lags
4b3(mdo sde): so// rin chen chen po yid bzhin nor// spyi bo la ni mchis par gda'// nor bu rin chen brgya byin thogs// gang gis rgyang thag nas mthong ba// sems can de dag skal ba che// dpal
4b4(mdo sde): 'gro shin tu pha rol mchi// ston pa lta bar mchis pa rnams// de dag thams cad shes rab che// da ring 'dir da ni zab mo'i gtam// mchi bar 'gyur ba gdon mi 'tshal// 
4b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan gang dag 'dir dbyin pa'i// sems cand ga la dbugs dbyung mdzod// sems can yongs su smin pa'i phyir// 'di ni dpa' bo'i spyod yul lo// 
4b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te// gang na kun gzhi thos 'gyur zhing // shes rab kyis ni sems can gnas// de ni ting 'dzin spyod yul lo// de ni
4b7(mdo sde): nam mkha'i snying po yi// byang chub sems dpa' spyod yul te// snang ba med cing spros med pa'i// ting nge 'dzin ni de yis bstan// lta ba gnyis la gang chags
4b8(mdo sde): pa/ byi phyir zhing ni rmongs par 'gyur// rtag dang chad la chags pa ni// pha rol tshu rol shin tu rmongs// lta ba gnyis po 'di dag las// rab tu grol bar su 'dod pa/ 
5a1(mdo sde): brjod du med par bsgom par gyis// de ni myur dus 'thob 'gyur// kye grogs po dag/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las
5a2(mdo sde): thog ma pa la de nyid brjod du yod pa'i 'du shes kyi tshul gyis// dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug brjod par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ ci nas kyang 'byung ba chen po rnams kyi rang
5a3(mdo sde): bzhin skye zhing 'jig pa shes par byas nas// de'i 'og tu gzod chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i ngo bo nyid mi skye ba/ mi 'gag pa/ mi dmigs pa/ cung zad kyang med pa'i 'du byed
5a4(mdo sde): thams cad bsgom par bya ste/ ci nas kyang rtag pa dang / chad pa spangs par 'gyur ba dang / mi 'jigs mi sngangs/ skrag par mi 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad la tshegs
5a5(mdo sde): par dmigs pa'i sems su ma gyur par byas na/ de myur/ du pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs shing / byin/ chad kyang chad pa dang / rtag par mi gnas par 'gyur ro zhes
5a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal nas/ 'khor der lkugs pa thams cad kyang sngon gzugs kyi snang ba ji ltar mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / rdzogs pa dang / shes pa de bzhin du 'khor
5a7(mdo sde): der mthong bar gyur pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
5a8(mdo sde): dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ri rab dang mtshungs pa/ ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ brtson 'grus rlung dang
5b1(mdo sde): mtshungs pa/ bzod pa rdo rje dang mtshungs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyi mchog lta bu/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i gnas su 'gro ba rnams kyi ded dpon lta bu/ dge
5b2(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi ni gtar lta bu/ sdug bsngal ba thams cad kyi ni bum pa bzang po lta bu/ mun par bcug pa rnams kyi ni nyi ma lta bu/ lam sbyor ba rnams kyi ni zla ba lta bu/ 
5b3(mdo sde): 'jigs pa rnams kyi ni ri rab lta bu/ nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis yongs su gdungs pa rnams kyini sman bcud kyi khu bdam pa ltabu/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chad de lhung ba rnams kyi ni kha ba
5b4(mdo sde): lta bu/ phreng bas 'tshob rnams kyi ni me tog lta bu/ sde/ ma bskyed pa rnams kyi ni ma long lta bu/ ngo tsha bad/ nga 'jam pa yongs su spangs pa rnams kyi ni ges lta bu
5b5(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba rnams kyi ni zam pa lta bu pha rol tu 'gro ba rnams kyi ni gru lta bu/ mthe ris su 'gro ba rnams kyi ni skas lta bu/ tshig ngan pa dang skur pas
5b6(mdo sde): nyen pa rnams kyi ni gdugs lta bu/ pas kyi rgol ba rnams kyi ni seng ge lta bu char pa rnams kyi ni chu lta bu/ bdud kyi dgra rnams kyi ni go cha lta bu bslab pa
5b7(mdo sde): 'khrul pa rnams kyi ni mag 'byed pa lta bu/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 'bru thams cad kyi ni sa lta bu/ nad pa rnams kyi ni sman pa lta bu/ bkres pa rnams kyi ni 'bru lta bu/ skom pa rnam
5b8(mdo sde): kyi ni zla ba'i nor bu lta bu/ ngal ba rnams kyi ni mal lta bu/ ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni nyi ma'i nor bu lta bu/ byang chub kyi lam du zhugs pa rnams kyi ni shing
6a1(mdo sde): rta lta bu/ sred mo tshal na rtse ba rnams kyi ni rdzing bu lta bu/ byang chub kyi phyogs la brtson pa rnams kyi phreng ba lta bu tshur 'ong ste/ rigs kyi bud pa ram/ 
6a2(mdo sde): tu phyin pa rnams kyi ni 'bras bu lta bu/ rigs kyi bu de sa bcu dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni nor bu yid bzhin lta bu/ rigs kyi bu de dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa rnams kyin/ 
6a3(mdo sde): kun tu 'tshe ba'i shing dang 'dra ba gcod pa'i phyir/ lta ba ngan pa'i sbyor ba thams cakyi ni mtshon lta bu/ 'dzem pa'i phyir bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi ni
6a4(mdo sde): rdo rje lta bubadud rnams kyis ni mi zlogs pa / thabs can rnams kyi tshes grangs/ ye she sa kyi ni 'byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi ni gnas
6a5(mdo sde): rang rgyal ba nam kyi ni phreng ba dang mtshungs pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyi ni gros dang mtshungs pa/ lhan/ mas kyi ni mig lta bu/ mi rnams kyi ni lam lta bu/ 
6a6(mdo sde): byol song du gyur pa rnams kyi ni skyabs/ yi dgas rnams kyi ni rten/ sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi ni mgon/ sbyin gnas kyi sems can rnams kyi ni sdod tu gyur pa byung
6a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ni shing rta lta bu/ rigs kyi bu de dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dzad kyini rlon
6a8(mdo sde): bo lta bu chos kyi grong khyer gyi sgo srungs yin te/ rigs kyi bu de sangs rgyas chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi kyis ni brgyan thams cad rdzogs pa'i sangs
6b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi ye shes dang ni ldan/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par/ sems can thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dam pa thams cad kyis mchod par bya ba yin gyis/ da khyed
6b2(mdo sde): 'di ltar lhags pa thams cad kyis bsu bar gyis shig/ mchod pa dang / bkur bsti thams cad kyis de la ci nus par/ rin po che'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 
6b3(mdo sde): bdan sna tshogs dang / me tog dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / thug pa dang / lha'i gos dang / rgyan dang / snod sna tshogs kyis bkur bstir gyis shig/ rim
6b4(mdo sde): gre gyis shig/ sti stang du gyis shig/ mchod par gyis shig/ lam gyi byi dor gyis shig/ brgyan par gyis shig/ bstod pa sna tshogs kyis
6b5(mdo sde): bstod pa sna tshogs bstod par gyis shig/ khyed thams cad kyang de lta bu'i yon tan thob pa dang / snod du gyur par ring po mi thegs par 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor
6b6(mdo sde): lhags pa ma lus pa thams cad kun stan las langs nasabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nam mkha'i snying po phyogs gang logs na snang ba'i
6b7(mdo sde): phyogs de logs su mngon du phyogs nas thal mo sbyar te/ snying ni rab tu dga' bzhin ni rab tu dga' mig kyang rab tu dang bas lta zhing 'dug par gyur pa dang / 'khor de na byang chub
6b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos chen po dang / lha'i dbang po dang / klu'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / dri za'i dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po
7a1(mdo sde): dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang / mi 'am ci'i dbang po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dang / drang srong lnga mngon par shes pa de dag thams cad 'di
7a2(mdo sde): snyam du sems par gyur te/ bdag cag gis rigs kyi bu 'di la tshogs kyi mchog ji lta bu zhig gis bkur bstir bya snyam mo// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
7a3(mdo sde): nam mkha'i snying pos mi mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad ma lus par rin po che bdun las byas shing / ri dang 'brog dang / ri skam dang / phug dang / grog po dang / g.yangs
7a4(mdo sde): dang / rtswa dang / rtsig pa dang / bong ba dang / gseg ma dang / dring ba la sogs pa med la// la dag mthil ltar mnyam par sprul to// des dpal dri zan
7a5(mdo sde): skad du brjod pa'i klu'i dbyangs dang shing thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas te/ dri zhim pa dang / mdab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bur ldan par sprul to// 
7a6(mdo sde): shing rlon dang / rtswa dang / skam shing dang / 'dab ma sa la gnas pa thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las bya ba sprul to// mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad na yang / 
7a7(mdo sde): nad ni rab tu med/ sems can dmyal ba dang byol mod/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal ba thams cad kyang rab tu zhi/ sems can dag gis kyang zas dang / skom dang / gos/ 
7a8(mdo sde): dang / chos gos dang / rgyan dag thob par gyur to// nga'i tshe gang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur
7b1(mdo sde): te/ bzang ba / mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa'i mdangs das pa rdzogs pa dang ni ldan yan lag thams cad ni yongs su rdzogs rdul med pa rab rib dang
7b2(mdo sde): bral ba'i snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyis ni mdzes par byas/ nyon mongs pa rnams dang ni bral/ sems ni rab tu ni/ dge ba thams cad la ni sems mos/ dkon mchog
7b3(mdo sde): gsum yi ni sems rab tu dang bar gyur nas/ 'khor der lpags pa'i sems can de re re'i lag pa gnyis ka na yang nor bu rin po che thogs par mngon par sprul nas/ nor bu
7b4(mdo sde): rin po che de re re las kyang so so'i tshul gyi 'od zer gyi snang ba byung bar gyur te/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi/ dmas 'di thams cad ma lus par snang ba chen po des khyab par
7b5(mdo sde): gyur to// nor bu rin po ched de las kyang sil snyan sna gas byung bar gyur to// nor bu rin po che sna chogs kyi char yang mngon par 'bab par gyur to// gos bzang
7b6(mdo sde): bzang po sna tshogs kyi char dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyi char dang / me tog sna tshogs kyi char dang / dri sna tshogs kyi char dang / phreng ba sna tshogs kyis char dang / gdugs sna tshogs
7b7(mdo sde): kyi char dang / snod sna tshogs kyi char dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi char yang bab par gyur to// lha rdzas kyi gos dang / chos gos dang / gser gyi skud pa dang / mu tig
7b8(mdo sde): gis mo do dang / me tog pad+ma dang / ud pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pun da ri ka dang / u ra gas ra dang / tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / shing ta ma la'i 'dab ma dang / can dan
8a1(mdo sde): sbrul gyi mgo lta bu'i phye mas lam mer bkram par mngon par gyur to// lam de'i g.yas g.yon gnyi ga brgya byin gyi khang pa rnam par rgyal
8a2(mdo sde): dang 'dra ba rin po che'i khang pa yang mngon par sprul te/ khang pa de na 'dod pa'i dbang po'i btsun mo gtso mo dang / slas dang / 'dra ma dag yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i sil snyan sgrogs shing / 
8a3(mdo sde): rtse dga' yongs su spyod pa de 'dra ba dag der sprul to// bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i spyi bo'i steng / nam mkha' la lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che las byas pa'i tshangs pa chen po'i gdugs
8a4(mdo sde): lta bu dpag tshad brgya tsam la rin po che'i dra ba'i skud pa da dang / mu tig gi sa mo des brgyan pa mngon par sprul te/ rgyan de las kyang lha las 'das pa'i sil snyan yan
8a5(mdo sde): lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i dbyangs kyi sgra byung ngo // rtswa dang / shing dang / mdab ma dang / me tog dang / 'brasabu la sogs pa gang ci yang rung ste/ sa la gnas pa
8a6(mdo sde): de dag thams cad las kyang lha las 'das pa'i yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i sil snyan las bstod pa'i sgra 'byung ba grag ste/ sgra de gang gi rna bar thos pa'i sems can de dag bla na med pa
8a7(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i tshegs chen po
8a8(mdo sde): de mthong ste/ shin tu ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos thob nas/ de dag 'di snyam du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar skyes bu dam pa de'i stan ji lta bur bsham snyam mo// de nas
8b1(mdo sde): dede'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rin po che las byas pa'i me tog pad+ma sdong bu ni dngul/ lo ma ni gser/ snying po ni rin po che a sma gar ba/ ze ba ni nor bu rin po che tshangs pa'i 'od
8b2(mdo sde): zer las byas pa/ zheng du rgyang grags gcig tsam yod pa/ me tog pad+ma'i za ba'i stan rnam pa brgya phrag sbyong du mus yongs su bskor cing mdun du bad ba'i pad ma byung nas/ pad+ma'i stan de la byang
8b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// nam mkhri'i snying po skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug par snang ngo // de'i spyi bo la yang nor bu rin po che 'dug par snang ngo // de bzhin du byang chub
8b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// nam mkha'i snying po de'i g.yog byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' bar 'gro dba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa// brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin
8b5(mdo sde): po ches brgyan pa brgya stong phrag mang po rnam sa kyang rang rang gi pad+ma'i ze ba'i stan la 'khod par snang /  // de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'
8b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams// gang
8b7(mdo sde): dag sngon du 'ongs pa ni// gus dang ldan pas phyag byas te/ phyi nas stan la 'dug byed na// skyes bu dam pa 'di 'ongs nas// tshogs chen dag kyang bstan gyur na/ 
8b8(mdo sde): ston la phyag kyang ma 'tshal bar// stan la 'dug pa lta bur snang // sman gyis rgyal pos smras pa// skyes bu dam pa 'di nyid ni// sangs rgyas chos la rab gnas mthong // 
9a1(mdo sde): rtog pa kun la mi gnas pas// sems can du ni mi mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' byams pas smras pa/ yang dag mtha' la gnas pa'i phyir/ 
9a2(mdo sde): da ltar sems can mi mthong na// tshegs chen de ni ci phyir bstan// the tsom gyur pa bshad par gsol// sman gyi rgyal pos smras pa/ kun tu rtog pa'i spyod yul can// byis pas don dam
9a3(mdo sde): mi shes te/ sems can smin par bya ba'i phyir// 'di ni dpa' bo'i thabs yin no// don dam gyis ni sdug bsngal ba// de dag rab tu dgrol ba'i phyir// mkhas pa kun rdzob bdan pa
9a4(mdo sde): yis// 'di 'dra ba'i tshogs bstan to// de nas bcomang ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po la leg so zhes bya ba byin te// leg so lag
9a5(mdo sde): so// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ so// so'i skye bo byis pa lta bu'i sems can thams cad ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang // rgyun tu zhugs pa
9a6(mdo sde): gcig gi spyod yul dang / sbyor ba dang / rnam par grol ba mi shes so// yongs su brtag pa bzung nas/ gal te sems can thams cad rgyun tu zhugs par gyur na yang de dag gis lan cig phyir
9a7(mdo sde): bong ba cig gi spyod yul dang / sbyor ba dang / rnam par grol ba mi shes te/ de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyis kyang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ongs pa rnams kyis kyang / dgra
9a8(mdo sde): bdang / dgra bcom pa rnams kyis kyang / rang sangs rgyas kyi mi shes te/ gal te sems can thams cad pas rudang 'dra ba'i rang sangs rgyas su gyu kyang / de dag thams cad kyis// byang chub
9b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa/ gcig gi spyod yul dang / rnam par grol ba dang / don dam pa la brtag pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i sbyor ba mi shes so// yongasu
9b2(mdo sde): brtag pa bzung na/ gal te sems can thams cad mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur kyang // de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' so sor rig pa thob pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin
9b3(mdo sde): thob pa gcig gi spyod yul dang / mos pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa la brtag pa'i byin gyis brlabs mi shes so// rigs kyi bu byang chub semasapa seM pa chen po nam mkha'i snying po 'di yang / mi skye
9b4(mdo sde): pa'i chos la bzod pa thob// so sor rig pa thob/ dpa' dpar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas// bskal pa dadapag tu med pa 'das te/ ji ltar da ltar tshogs chen po
9b5(mdo sde): 'dus pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nya la bdag shes nas/ ji ltar 'dir sems can kha cig tshogs chen po 'dir 'ong zhing lta ba'i phyir/ 'dod chags
9b6(mdo sde): dang bral ba'i sa la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar rigs kyi bu de 'di nyid du mi snang bar gyur nas/ nub phyogs nas 'dir 'od nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / thun
9b7(mdo sde): mongs ma yin pa mtha' yas pa'i nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin kyang bstan/ sems can thams cad kyang skyo bar byas nas/ de'i 'og tu sem
9b8(mdo sde): can dpag tu med pa yong su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ kun rdzob kyi bden pas sgrub pa'i tshogs chen po yang bstan/ ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs chen po yang bstan pa bzhin no// gal/ 
10a1(mdo sde): te rigs kyi bu de don dam pa'i bden pa mi skye ba'i tshogs ston du zin na/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rmongs par 'gyur/ bskrad par 'gyur ro// 
10a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'as brgyad la gnas pa'i bar du yang bslad par 'gyur bas 'di'i spyod yul dang / sbyor ba'i mtshan ma bstan par mi nus te/ de ltar chos zab mo'i yon tan la gnaso// 
10a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de ni thabs shes pa la mkhas so// sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho thams cad la gnas so// the tsom med de// ye shes gzhan la ragra ma lus pa la mkhas so// 
10a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyi mchog rgyal dpo la 'os pa dang 'dra'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub da sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po de ni sems can thams cad ma
10a5(mdo sde): ris dang thar par skye bar ston pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad las yongs/ su thar bar byed pa'o// lus kyi dug 'byung ba chen po
10a6(mdo sde): nad gso bar byed pa'o// sems can gang dag lta ba ngan pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'i 'khor ba'i 'brog bslad nas/ mtho ris dang thar par gnas pa'i thabs mi shes pa de dag kyang gal
10a7(mdo sde): te byang chub sems dpa' rnam ma kha'i snying po'i ming brjod par byed phyag 'tshal byed/ dri 'bul/ a ka dri'i 'dug pas bdug par byed na/ rigs kyi bu de ni de dag
10a8(mdo sde): gi bsam pa dang / bgal nyal ba dang / de dag gi nyin mongs pa dang ldan pa'i lta ba sems dang 'brel ba ci 'dra ba dang / sngon gyi dge'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ci 'dra ba la yang rtog cing / sems
10b1(mdo sde): sbyang ba ji lta bur bya ba'i rigs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba sangs rgyas la bskyed pa 'am/ chos la bskyed pa 'am/ dge 'dun la bskyed pa'am/ bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po sbyin pa'i
10b2(mdo sde): rang bzhin nam/ tshul khrims kyi rang bzhin nam/ bsgom pa'i rang bzhin yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad rmi lam na'ang rung / sad pa'i tshe yang rung ste/ de bzhin du thabs mkhas pas
10b3(mdo sde): mngon sum du lam drang po'i thabs kyis ston te/ thabs des lta ba ngan par byed pa smon lam ngan pa'i bsam pa dang / skyabs ngan pa dang / ngan par 'jug pa'i sems las myur du thar par
10b4(mdo sde): byed do// ci nas kyang de'i lus dang / ngag dang /  yid kyi sbyor ba drang por 'gyur ba dang / smon lam drang po dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen drang po dang sten par
10b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / myur du dri mi zhim pa dang / nyon mongs pa da nga / sdig pa'i lta ba yongs su thar par 'gyur ba dang / de dag gi ngan song du 'gro ba'i sdig pa'i las thams cad
10b6(mdo sde): smon lam gyi dbang dang / legs par spyad pa'i las kyis myur du byang bar 'gyur ba dang / de dag myur du bdag gi sems la dbang thob par 'gyur ba dang / zab mo'i bzod pa la gnas par
10b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i thabs ston to// gang yang sems can lus la nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba dang / gang yang sems g.yengs pa dang / gang dag gi mig gi bar chad byas pa dang / 
10b8(mdo sde): lce bcings pa dang / gang dag la yan lag gang yang rung ba zhig nyams par gyur na/ gal te de dag gis nad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / nad med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir snying thag pa
11a1(mdo sde): s+yA/  chub sem ma na pa mamams mas pa / nga / ma
11a2(mdo sde): nas/ skyes bungs pa rnams pa'i byung po la brag 'tshal na/ gAs ni dag ga mi laman bram po'i gzugs kyis mdu mdun du du/ gam/ bcu tsun gyi gzugs pas/ 
11a3(mdo sde): gyi gzugs sam/ dngas can gyi gzugs sam/ rgyal rigs kyi gzugs sam/ blon po'i gzugs sam/ dpa'i bab gzugs sam/ sman pa'i gzugs sam/ pa'i
11a4(mdo sde): gzugs sam/ ma'i gzugs sas/ khye'u'i gzugs sam/ bu mo'i gzugs kyis mi la mnan pa'i dmadun du 'dug ste/ de na zhi ba bya'i byed/ sran dang / 
11a5(mdo sde): byang du gyur pa thams cad de bzhin du ston te/ nad pa'i sbyor bag/ cig gis nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// bzhin du gang zhal ta dang / longs spyod 'dod pa dang / gang
11a6(mdo sde): khaten dang / thos par 'dod pa dang / gang dben par 'dod pa dang / gang bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed pa dang / shes rab 'dod pa dang / gang yang grags par 'dod pa
11a7(mdo sde): dang / gang bzo sbyong bar 'dod pa dang / gang dbang phyug 'dod pa dang / gang gzugs 'dod pa dang / gang ner 'dod pa dang / gang dam pa 'dod pa dang / gang rigs
11a8(mdo sde): 'dod pa dang / gang bu 'dod pa dang / gang g.yog 'dod pa dang / gang yon tan 'dod pa dang / gang sbyin pa 'dod pa dang / gang tshul khrims 'dod pa nas/ gang shes rab
11b1(mdo sde): ba du 'du dang / gcag ma pa 'du dang / ga ma ca pa nga thun par 'a dang / gang sdig pa sa cad las ya byab rnyed pa dang // 
11b2(mdo sde): sbyin pa sa gzhig par 'dod pa nas/ shes rab la gnas pa'i bar du med padang / tshe rang bar 'dod pa dang nye bar byung ba dang / sangs su spyod 'dang
11b3(mdo sde): mi 'bral bar 'dod pa dang / sems can ser sna can rnams gtong ba la gnas par 'dod pa dang / ngang tshul ngan padag tshul khrims la gnog par 'dod pa dang / 
11b4(mdo sde): lo can dag brtson 'grus la gnog par 'dod pa na de dgra la rigs kyi bu 'di ni thabs ston par byed/ do// gang snying rje chen po dang ma bral zhing / bdag sa
11b5(mdo sde): lazhing / sems can thams cad la btang snyoms su byed la bdag gi thabs gang / gis sems can 'di dag bla na med pa yang dag pa'i byang
11b6(mdo sde): chub la sems gzhag pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la dgod pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi nas snying rje chen po'i bar la dgod par bya snyam du sems dpa' des byang chub
11b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la phyag bya'o// dgon pa 'am/ dbye 'am/ bla gab med pa las a ka ru dang / ta ka ru dang / kA la a nu sa
11b8(mdo sde): ris 'dug par bya'o// zil ma sbyar te phyogs mtshams kun tu yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas/ sngags kyi tshig 'di 'azlas par byag// / 
12a1(mdo sde): su r+m+ma gsu mi sha/ ku NI/ ra/ ra/ nA ra/ du NI/ mu zur/ reg nga/ man
12a2(mdo sde): / seM ma bungs//  // sa cha ma sril la ma rnangs sus rung /  zung / drAb+hUM/ rlu sa twA/ nam / 
12a3(mdo sde): ra a sho ka/ ga ti swA hA// sngags 'di lan du mar bzlas te nyal bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ni de la mi'i gzugs
12a4(mdo sde): sam// ri dgas kyi gzugs sam/ bya'i gzugadas sam/ bdag nyid du ston pa 'am/ de'i bsodanams kyi skal pa ji lta bu de 'dra ba'i gzugs sam/ tshig
12a5(mdo sde): gis de la tshul gcig pa de 'dra ba'i thabs ston par byed de/ thabs gcig po des sems can khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag yongs su smin par byed nus so// gang theg
12a6(mdo sde): pa la mi gnas pa dang / gang nyan thos kyi theg pa la gnas pa dang / gang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la gnas pa'i sems can dag des thang cig yud tsam dang ldan pa'i shes rab dang / thabs
12a7(mdo sde): cung zad kyis kyang / bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po la phyir mi ldog par gzhog pa nas/ ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa sna tshogs dang / sa bcu la gzhog pa'i bar
12a8(mdo sde): du nus te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// nam mkha'i snying po de ni thabs dang / ye shes dang / snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no// 
12b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu nam mkha'i tshad ni la las gzung nus kyi/ rigs kyi bude'i thabs dang / ye shes dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed
12b2(mdo sde): pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i tshad gzung bar ni mi nus te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nam mkha'i snying po de ni yon tan
12b3(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu sems can gang g.yo med pa/ sgyu med pa/ yang dag pa'i nan tan dang ldan pa lta ba drang po dang ldan pa/ gzhan
12b4(mdo sde): mi smod pa/ bdag mi sdod pa/ phrag dog dang / sar dasna spangs pa/ tshul 'chos pa med pa/ bsam dpa lhag pa dang ldan pa de dag la ni/ rigs kyi bu 'di snying brtsa
12b5(mdo sde): bar byed de/ thabs dang / ye shes dang / brtson 'grusadang / brtul ba'i thabs kyang ston cing / sems can de thabs dang / ye shes dang / brtson 'grus dang / brtul ba
12b6(mdo sde): des de 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su thar pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems skye bar byed de// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang byang chub tu sngo bar byed do// bla na
12b7(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// mthu dang brtson 'grus dang / brtul ba chen po des pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ spro ba dang / 
12b8(mdo sde): brtul ba chen por 'gyur/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
13a1(mdo sde): nam mkha'i snying po de ni yon tan gyi chos dang / brtul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa'o// de
13a2(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'di ci'i slad du yan lag gi dam pa mgo bo la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'chang
13a3(mdo sde): zhing / de shin tu lham ma/ lhang nger gda' la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la de ltar ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
13a4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po 'di ni snying rje che na po dang ldan pa/ sems can la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa/ sdug bsngal chen po las thar par byed pa ste/ 
13a5(mdo sde): sems can gang dag ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung ba ngan song du 'gro ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sprug par byed pa/ 'jig/ par byed pa'i sems can de dag la rigs kyi bu 'di ni sman du gyur pa'o// 
13a6(mdo sde): ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag dang / lta ba ngan pa'i sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams la ni 'di nyi ma dang mtshungs pa'o// ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'chags su 'jug pa'o// de dag gi snying la the tsom yod pa/ 
13a7(mdo sde): 'dral bar byed pa'o// gang dag snying gi snod chag par gyur pa// ltung ba'i dngos por gyur pa/ pas pham pa'i sems can dge ba'i chos thams cad zhig par gyur pa/ ngan song du 'gro
13a8(mdo sde): ba/ mgon med pa/ rten med pa/ mkhas pa thams cad kyis spangs pa la ni/ rigs kyi bu 'di khar ba dang mtshungs la/ lam ston pa'o// sdig pa thams cad dang / dri
13b1(mdo sde): mi rnam pa thams cad ston par byed pa 'khru bar byed pa'o// 'gro ba ngan pa'i lam las zlog par byed pa'o// shing rta dang mtshungs pa'o// mtho ris dang thar pa la 'jog par
13b2(mdo sde): byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ni sems can gang dag sems shin tu 'dod par 'jug pa dang / gang dag shin tu khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / gnod 'chab pa dang / ser
13b3(mdo sde): snas sems 'khrugs par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag shin tu gti mug gi mun par song ba dang / rgyu med par sba ba dang / 'jig rten pha rol gyis mi 'jigs par lta ba dang / gang
13b4(mdo sde): dag nor sogs pas chog mi shes pa dang / gang dag ming nga/ de ba'i chos bcu'i bar du rtag tu shin tu ldan pa'i sem sa can de dag gi ngan song gi sgo gcod par byed pa nas/ shing rta dang / 
13b5(mdo sde): mtshungs pa'i bar du yin te/ sems can rnams mtho ris dang thar pa la gzhog par byed pa'o// de bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
13b6(mdo sde): rgyas rnams ma gtogs par/ rigs kyi bu 'didi lnga dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mchod par bya ba yin no// byang chub semapa dang 'byams pas gsol babacom ldan 'das
13b7(mdo sde): ltung ba'i rtsa ba gang dang ldan na sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba sdug par bgyid cing / ngan song du mchi bar 'gyur ba dang / ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur zhing
13b8(mdo sde): dang mo' bde pa thams cad las pas pam bde la rigs kyi bu 'di mthongs dang thar pa'i bdebs tshim par bgyid pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa bde dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
14a1(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba ni lnga ste/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba de dang ldan na/ rgyal rigs rgyal thabs
14a2(mdo sde): spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sprug par 'gyur/ ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur// lha dang mi'i bde ba thams cad las pas pham par 'gyur// ngan
14a3(mdo sde): song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// lnga gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ mchod rten gyi rdzas 'phrog par byed/ dge 'dun gyi 'am/ phyogs
14a4(mdo sde): bzhi'i dge 'dun la phul ba 'phrog par byed dam/ 'phrog/ tu 'jug par byed pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba dang po'o// / gang yang chos spong bar byed de/ nyan thos kyi 'byung
14a5(mdo sde): bar bshad pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'byung bar ba shad pa'am/ theg pa chen po'i 'byung bar bshad pa spong bar byed/ 'gog par byed/ sbed par byed pa 'din
14a6(mdo sde): ltung ba'i rtsa ba gnyis pa'o// gang yang nga'i phyir mgo dang kha spu bregs nas/ gos ngur smrig bgros pa bslab pa 'dzin kyang rung / bslab pa mi 'dzin kyang rung / tshul khrims dang / 
14a7(mdo sde): ldan yang rung / tshul khrims dang mi ldan yang rung ste/ de'i gos ngur smrig 'phrog cing khyim par byed dam/ lus la chad pas gcod par byed dam/ btson ra 'jug par
14a8(mdo sde): byed/ srog dang dbral bar byed pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba gsum pa'o// gang yang rgyal rigs kyi ched du bsams te/ ma'i srog gcod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi
14b1(mdo sde): nyan thos dgra bcom pa'i srog gcod par byed/ dge 'dun 'dus pa dbye bar byed/ ched du bsams nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ 
14b2(mdo sde): ya ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin par byed na mtshams med pa'i las 'di lnga las las gang yang rung ba zhig 'thung bar byed pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba bzhi pa'o// gang yang rgyal rigs
14b3(mdo sde): rgyu med par smra bar gyur/ 'jig rten pha rol la btang snyoms su byed/ mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu blangs shing 'jug par byed/ gzhan yang sems can mang po dag mi dge ba'i las
14b4(mdo sde): kyi lam bcu la 'doms par byed/ gzhog par byed/ ga nas par byed pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba lnga pa ste/ rigs kyi bu gang yang rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur
14b5(mdo sde): ba la ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'di lnga las/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba gang yang rung ba zhig byung na/ rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de/ sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de
14b6(mdo sde): thams cad sprugs par 'gyur ro// ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i bde ba thams cad las pas pham par 'gyur/ ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems
14b7(mdo sde): dpa' nam mkha'i snying po ni de 'dra ba'i yul mtha' 'khob kyi nang du skye zhing 'byung bar ston te/ la lar ni dge sbyong gi gzugs dang / cha lugs dang / spyod lam la lar ni bram ze'i gzugs
14b8(mdo sde): dang / cha lug dang spyod lam ston to// gang dang gang gis bdag gi skye ba 'byung bar ston pa/ de dang de dag tu rgyal rigs de 'dra ba dag la chos 'chad par byed de/ sngon ma byung ba sngan chad
15a1(mdo sde): ma byung ba thams cad mkhyen pas bshad pa/ zam mo zab pa'i mdo sde dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / sa dag 'chad par byed/ ston par byed
15a2(mdo sde): de'i phyir rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de sngon gyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las la ngo tsha bar byed/ smod par byed/ 'chags par byed/ gtong bar byed/ spong
15a3(mdo sde): bar byed cing / de sbyin pa dang / 'dul ba dang / sdom pa dang / brtul ba'i sprob chen po la gnas shing / mtho ris la rten par 'gyur ro// byams pa blon po'i ltung
15a4(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba yang lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ gang yang blon po mchod rten gyi rdzas 'phrog par byed dam/ phyogs bzhi dge 'dun gyi rdzas 'phrog par byed pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba
15a5(mdo sde): dang po'o// gang yang grong 'byed par byed/ gnos 'byed pa dang / grong khyer 'byed pa dang / yul 'phye dpar byed pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba'i rtsa ba gnyis pa'o// gang
15a6(mdo sde): yang blon po chos spong bar byed de/ nyan thos kyi 'byung ba bshad pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'byung ba bshad pa 'am/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'byung bar bshad pa spong bar
15a7(mdo sde): byed/ 'gog par byed pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba gsum pa'o// gang yang blon po bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir/ rab tu byung ba la gtse bar byed na/ bslab pa 'dzin kyang rung / bslab pa mi
15a8(mdo sde): 'dzin kyang rung / tshul khrims dang ldan yang rung / tshul khrims dang mi ldan yang rung ste/ de dag gi gos ngur smrig 'phrog par byed/ khyim par byed dam/ lus la chad pas gcod/ 
15b1(mdo sde): dam/ brtson rar 'jug par byed dam/ srog gcod par byed pa de ni blon po'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba bzhi pa'o// gang yang blon pos mtshams med pa lnga las mtshams med pa gang yang rung / 
15b2(mdo sde): bi'i las byed cing / sogs pa 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba lnga pa ste/ rigs kyi bu blon po gang ltung ba'i rtsa ba lnga po 'di dag las ltung ba'i rtsa ba gang yang rung ba zhig byung na/ rlon
15b3(mdo sde): pod sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa thams cad sprug par 'gyur/ ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur/ lha dang mi'i bde ba thams cad las phas pham par 'gyur/ sems can dmyan
15b4(mdo sde): ba la rten par 'gyur te/ de dag gi don gyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po de lta bu'i yul mtha' 'khob gzhan du gnas shing skye ba 'byung bar
15b5(mdo sde): yang ston te/ la lar ni dge sbyong gi gzugs dang / cha lugs dang / spyod lam gyis sems can rnam/ sa la chos 'chang/ la lar ni bu mo'i bar gyi gzugs
15b6(mdo sde): kyis chos 'chad de/ gang dang gang dag tu skye ba 'byung bar ston pa de dang de dag tu yang blon po de 'dra ba dag la chos 'chad de/ sngon ma byung ba sngan cad ma byung ba/ thams cad
15b7(mdo sde): mkhyen pas bshad pa/ zab mo zab pa'i mdo sde dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / sa dag 'chad par byed/ ston par byed de/ de'i phyir blon po de sngon byas
15b8(mdo sde): pa'i mi dge ba'i sdig pa'i las la tsha bar byed/ smod par byedalas kyi sgrib pa de yang 'chags par byed/ gtong bar byed/ spong bar byed de/ de sbyin pa dang
16a1(mdo sde): dul ba dang / sdom pa la brtul ba'i nan tan gyi gnas shing / mtho ris la rten par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu nyan thos rnams kyi ltung ba'i rtsa ba ni/ 
16a2(mdo sde): lnga pa'o// lnga gang zhe na/ srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'dzem zhing khrag 'byin par/ 
16a3(mdo sde): byed par byed pa ste de lnga'o// gang nga'i nyan thos ltung ba'i rtsa ba de lnga las ltung ba'i rtsa ba gang yang rung ba zhig byung na// rtag tu ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du/ de dag gi don gyi phyir/ 
16a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' namakha'i snying po de lta bu'i yul gzhi ngan dag tu skye ba 'byung bar ston cing / la lar ni dge sbyong gi gzugs dang / cha lugs dang / spyod lam gyis 'chad
16a5(mdo sde): de/ snga ma bzhin gyi bar du mtho ris la rten par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu las theg ma pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba ni brgyad de/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis
16a6(mdo sde): 'khrul par gyur pa'i theg pa chen po la gnas pa'i las thog ma bdag ni/ sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa thams cad sdug par 'gyur/ ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur zhing / lha dang / mi dang / theg pa chen po'i bde/ 
16a7(mdo sde): ba las pas pham par 'gyur/ ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing 'khor ba na yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ sems can gang dag sngon ngan pa
16a8(mdo sde): spyad pa'i rgyus ston slongs pa/ rnyog pa lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir skyes nas/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa las dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten te gnas te/ theg pa chen po
16b1(mdo sde): shin tu zab pa 'di nyan cing / rigs kyi bu de dag blo chung ngu zin gyis kyang // bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de dag gi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' las
16b2(mdo sde): thog ma pa de shin tu zab pa stong pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde 'di nyan par byed/ lung sbyin par byed/ klog par byed de/ de dag ji ltar thos pa dang / de dag ji ltar kun chub pa bzhin du/ seMn gzhan sngon
16b3(mdo sde): gyi blo dang 'dra ba dag gi 'dun du don dang bcas/ yig 'bru dang bcas pas rgya cher dran par byed/ ston par byed pa dang / dka' ba ma byas pa'i byis pa lta bu'i so so'i skye bo de dag thos nas/ 'jigs
16b4(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ sngangs par 'gyur/ skrag par 'gyur te/ skrag dpas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa la sems smon par 'gyur ba de
16b5(mdo sde): ni/ byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa bad nga po ste/ rigs kyi bu ltung ba'i rtsa ba de dge ba'i rtsa sngon bskyed pa thams cad sprugs par 'gyur/ ltung ba'i dngos por
16b6(mdo sde): 'gyur/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i bde ba las pas pham par 'gyur/ de'i byang chub kyi sems bslus shing ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de bas na 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho mching rnam chen po khang
16b7(mdo sde): kyis gzhol ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpas sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba thog mar shes par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa/ 
16b8(mdo sde): ji lta ba bzhin du rim gyis chos bshad par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' namakha'i snying po yang de dag gi phyir de lta bu'i yul gzhan dag tu skye zhing 'byung bar ston te/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' la
17a1(mdo sde): thog ma pa de lta bu'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'byung bar gyur la// ngan song gis 'jigs skrag nas/ de dag gal te byang chub sems dpa' namakha'i snying po'i ming thos nas/ ltung ba de dag bshags
17a2(mdo sde): pa'i phyir mthong bar 'dod na/ des tho rangs kyi thun la/ a ka ru laM/ ta ka raH/ bdug pas bdugs nas thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming nas brjod par bya'o// de'i skal pa
17a3(mdo sde): ji lta ba bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu des sems can de mthong nas/ de ltar 'di lta bu'i gzugs su ston te/ la la'i mdun du ni tha mal bar 'dug ste chos 'chad do// la la'i mdun du ni bram ze'i gzugs
17a4(mdo sde): kyis/ la la'i mdun du ni bu mo'i gzugs kyi bar du 'dug ste// byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa de'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba/ ji ltar byung ba de dag 'chag su 'jug go// bla na med pa thag pa chen
17a5(mdo sde): po'i spyod pa zab pa/ thabs mkhas pa yang de la ston par bya/ da do// ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod pa dang / gzungs dang / sa 'i bar du yang 'jog par byed de// de'i phyir ngan song thams cad
17a6(mdo sde): las yongs su thar cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la rdo rje bzhin du mthu che zhing / brtul ba brtan par 'gyur/ 
17a7(mdo sde): myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// gal te des bdag nyid mdun du mngon sum du ma bstan na/ byang chub sems dpa
17a8(mdo sde): des skya reng 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe langs te/ skya rang la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ 'di skad du brjod par bya'o// skya reng skya reng thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa skya reng khyod 'dzam bu'i gling
17b1(mdo sde): 'dir shar ma thag tu/ bdag la thugs rjes dgab par mdzod cig/ nam mkha'i snying po thugs rje chen po la bdag gi tshig gis gsungs te/ ci nas kyang de bdag gi rmi lam du ston cing / de'i
17b2(mdo sde): slad du bdag ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'chags par 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i theg pa chen po las thabs dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi mig chen po thob par 'gyur bar mdzod cig ces bya ste/ des de'i tshe ma la/ 
17b3(mdo sde): du gnyid log par bya'o// skya reng shar ma thag tu yang byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa ltung ba byung ba ba de'i rmi lam du ston par byed de/ ye shes kyi
17b4(mdo sde): thabs chen pos de'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba yang 'chags su 'jug go// thabs dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyang ston par byed de/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa de de nyid du byang
17b5(mdo sde): chub kyi sems mi brjid pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ ra 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po la yang shin tun/ nas par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang myur du yong
17b6(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa dag la la zhig la khyod kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod mi nus/ khyod blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
17b7(mdo sde): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabar ma nus kyis/ khyod myur du nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sems skyed cig dang / de'i phyir khyod myur du gathong ba las 'byu
17b8(mdo sde): 'gyur tshogs/ ji ltar sngar ba shad pa'i bir du dand ces pa ni/ don byang chub sems dpa' las thogs pa'i srung ba la gnyis pa'o// gan yang byang chub rims dpa' las thog pa 'as/ 
18a1(mdo sde): la zhig la/ kye khyod kyi so sor thar pa'i 'dul ba dang / tshul khrims dang legs par spyad pas ci zhig bya/ khyod myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
18a2(mdo sde): sems skyed cig/ theg pa chen po lhogs shig dang / de'i phyir nyon mongs pa'i rkyen gyis khyod kyi lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis mi dge ba'i las gang cung zad kyang bsgrubs pa de dag de'i phyir dag
18a3(mdo sde): cing rnam par smin par 'gyur ba med do zhes/ ji ltar sngar bshad pa bzhin gyis bar du de skad zer na/ da ni byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba gsum pa'o// gzhan yang rigs
18a4(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa la la zhig la/ ri dgas kyi bu khyod kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam spongs shi dag/ mnyan cig/ ma klogs shig/ gzhan lam ston cig/ rigs
18a5(mdo sde): kyi bu khyod kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam sba bar gyis shig/ khyod ni de'i phyir 'bras bu chen po 'thob par mi 'gyur ro// khyod ni de'i phyir nyon mongs pa rnams mthar 'byin par byed kyang mi
18a6(mdo sde): nus kyis/ khyod theg pa chen po'i gtam la dad par gyis shig/ theg pa chen po nyon cig/ khyod theg pa chen po lhogs shig/ gzhan la ston cig dang / de'i phyir khyod ngan 'gro dang / ngan song gi lam thams
18a7(mdo sde): cad du 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes de skad smras nas/ gal te de de'i tshig bzhin du byed cing / lta ba'i
18a8(mdo sde): rnam pa de lta bu len par byed na/ gnyi ga yang ltung ba'i rtsa bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba bzhi pa'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa
18b1(mdo sde): dag lce gnyis par 'gyur te/ gzhan du sems la gzhan du ston cing / theg pa chen po 'di yang sgra grags pa dang / tshig su bcad pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti'i phyir 'dod par byed/ kha ton byed/ 'dzin
18b2(mdo sde): par byed/ klog par byed/ 'chad par byed/ pha rol la yang thos pa tsam ston par byed cing / bdag ni theg pa chen po pa yin gyi/ gzhan ni ma yin no zhes de skad zer zhing / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti'i phyir
18b3(mdo sde): gzhan la phrag dog du byed la/ pha rol gang las nye bar spyod pa dang / yongs su spyod pa thob par 'gyur ba la/ de'i rkyen gyis de dag 'khrug par 'gyur/ de dag gi mi bsngags pa brjod par byed/ smod
18b4(mdo sde): par byed/ brnyas par byed/ ngan du brjod par byed/ bdag stod par byed cing / de dag phrag dog gi rgyus bdag mi las bla ma'i chos dang ldan par 'chad par byed de/ de'i phyir dngos po des
18b5(mdo sde): ltung bar 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i bde ba las pas pham par/ gyur nas/ de'i phyir yang theg pa chen po las lci ba chen/ po'i ltung ba byung bar gyur te/ de'i phyir ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur
18b6(mdo sde): ro// dper na skyes bu la la zhig rin po che'i gling du 'gro 'dod de/ rgya mtsho 'ching rnams chen por gru las song ba las/ rgya mtsho 'ching rnams chen por gru nyid zhig par gyur pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems
18b7(mdo sde): dpa' las thog ma pa yang theg pa chen po'i rgya 'tsho 'ching rnams rgal bar 'dod pa las/ phrag dog gi phyir brdzun smras nas/ de'i rkyen gyis de dag dang pa'i grwa zhig cing / shes rab kyi srog dang bral ba
18b8(mdo sde): 'thob par 'gyur ro// de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa phrag dog gi phyir brdzun du sbas pa'i rkyen gyis ltung ba lci ba chen po 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa'i
19a1(mdo sde): ltung ba'i rtsa lnga pa'o// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ las thog ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa 'am/ rab tu byung ba dag zab pa stong pa nyid dang ldan
19a2(mdo sde): pa'i mdo sde gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / sa sargyan pa'i skyes bu rig pa chen po dang ldan pa/ tshegs chung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul gyi theg pa chen po'i
19a3(mdo sde): mdo sde de klog par byed/ 'don par byed/ kha ton byed/ klags nas gzhan la rgya cher ston par byed de/ bdag gis chos 'di dag rang gi blos rtogs nas/ nga snying rje ba'i phyir de ltar khyed
19a4(mdo sde): la ston gyis/ khyed kyis ci nas kyang chos zab mo 'di la ma dngon sum du 'gyur ba de ltar sgoms shig dang / da ltar dgyi nga bzhin du khyod kyang ye shes mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes smra zhing / chos
19a5(mdo sde): 'di lta bu zab mo zab pa dag mngon par ni ma byas kyi/ blags pa tsam gyis bstan to zhes ni mi zer bar rnyed pa dang / bsku ra bsti'i phyir bdag 'tshong bar byed de/ de'i rkyen kyis dus gsum gyi
19a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang / 'phags pa'i gang zag gi spyan sngar nyes pa dang / bcas
19a7(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ ltung ba lci ba byung bar 'gyur/ lha dang mi rnams thag pa chen pos bslus par 'gyur te/ de ni de'i nyan thos kyi theg par mi 'gyur na/ theg pa chen po lta ci smos/ theg pa chen po la
19a8(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i rtogs pa'i khyad par lta ci smos/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta ci smos// 'di lta ste dper na/ skye bu zhig 'brog dgon pa chen por song ba las/ bkres pa dang / 
19b1(mdo sde): sgom pas nyen cing ngal bar gyur nas/ de 'bras bu chen po dang ldan pa'i shing gi drung du zas kyi phyir 'dug nas/ nges shing 'bras bu chen po dang ldan pa/ dri dang ldan pa d+mo te/ dug gi shing rom dpral
19b2(mdo sde): 'dzegs nas dug gi 'bras bu za'o// zos nas 'chi ba'i dus byed de/ gang zag de yang dpeng dang 'dra bar brjod do// de bas na mir sbed pa shin tu dkon pa rnyed nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen
19b3(mdo sde): la gnas te/ theg pa chen po la 'jug par 'dod pa la rnyed pa dang / bkur bsti dang grags pa'i phyir bdag stong / gzhan smod pa byed pas ltung balci ba de 'dra ba byung bar gyur nas/ ltung
19b4(mdo sde): rtsa ba de'i phyir shes pa thams cad kyis shin tu srad cing / ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ gang zag de 'dra ba ni rgyal ra dgas dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs
19b5(mdo sde): thams cad kyis mi bsten par bya'o// gang de sten par byed pa ni shes pa thams cad kyi 'das pa dang bcas pa yin te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa'i ltung
19b6(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba drug pa'o// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ rgyal rigs rnams kyi mdun du 'don pa'i phyag dar ba 'am/ blon po'i phyag dar ba 'am/ dpa' bo'i phyag dar ba
19b7(mdo sde): 'am/ sman pa'i phyag dar ba blun pa/ mkhas pas bsnyems pa/ nor che ba longs spyod che ba dag 'byung ste/ de dag sbyin pa'i bsod nams kyi dngos po rnam pa mang po dag byed par snang ste/ de dag gtong
19b8(mdo sde): bas rgyags shing dregs nas/ snyams pa dang rgyags pas rgyal rigs dag kyang 'byed par byed/ dge sbyong dag kyang rgyal rigs dang 'byed par byed cing / de dag rgyal rigs la gnas nas// dge sbyong
20a1(mdo sde): / dag kyang chad pas gcod par byed de/ nor gyi chad pas 'phrogs par byed pas/ gnod pa de'i phyir dge slong de dag gis gang zag gi yang rung / dge 'dun gyis yang rung khyogs/ 
20a2(mdo sde): bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi yang rung / mchod rten gyi yang rung ste/ phrogs nas de dag la skyes su 'bul bar byed/ phyag dar pa de dag kyang rgyal rigs la 'bul bar byed de/ de gnyi ga ltung ba'i rtsa
20a3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni ltung ba'i rtsa ba bdun pa'o// gzhan yang rgyal rigs kyi phyag dar ba de dag dge sbyong dang bcas te/ nyes par 'gyur/ chos de lta bu dag kyang chos ma yin par 'dog/ 
20a4(mdo sde): chos ma yin pa ni chos su 'degs te/ chos spangs/ ma do sde dang 'dul ba'i bslab pa mi lta/ ston pa nag po dang nga/ ston pa chen po la mi lta/ byams pa dang / snying rje chen
20a5(mdo sde): po dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab pa dang / tha/ bas kyi bslab pa dang / gang yA mdo sde gzhan dag las pa slab pa bshad pa de yang spangs nas/ dge sbyong dag gtse ba'i
20a6(mdo sde): phyir/ de 'dra ba'i chos dang mi ldan pa'i bya bar bya ba 'chal bar byed de/ bya bar bya ba de dag gis dge slong dag gtse bar 'gyur/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la sbyong ba'i yid la byed pa gtong bar
20a7(mdo sde): 'gyur/ bsam gtan pa de dag gnod sems mang bar 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir dge slong dag gi nyon mongs pa ma zhi ba zhi bar mi byed/ srab mor mi 'gyur te/ de'i tshe dge slong dag bsam pa
20a8(mdo sde): nyams par 'gyur/ tshul khrims nyams par 'gyur/ spyod pa nyams pa dang / lta ba nyams par 'gyur te/ de'i phyir lhod par 'gyur/ phal cher lhod par 'gyur/ tshul khrim
20b1(mdo sde): nyams par 'gyur/ dge sbyong ma yin na dge slong du yi dam 'cha'/ tshangs par spyod pa ma yin na tshangs par spyod par yi dam 'cha' zhing / bong bu dang mtshungs pa dang / chos shin tu bsal bar
20b2(mdo sde): 'chad par 'gyur te/ de dag la rgyal rigs 'khor dang bcas pas shin tu bkur sti bas pa dang / rim gro byas pa dang / mchod pa byas par 'gyur/ de dag gis dge slong spong ba la brtson pa rnams kyi
20b3(mdo sde): mi bsngags pa khyim pa la brjod pa dang / rgyal rigs 'khor dang bcas pa de yang dge slong spong ba la brtson pade dag la ni snang zhing 'phya bar 'gyur ro// gang de na dge slong sbyong ba la brtson pa rnams
20b4(mdo sde): kyi phan pa dang / longs spyod du bya ba de kha ton la brtson pa dge slong la 'bul bar byed pas/ de gnyig ltung ba'i bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong bsam gtan pa ni
20b5(mdo sde): zhing dam pa yin gyi/ kha ton pa dang zhal ta la gnas pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir te/ dge slong bsam gtan pa dag ni ti/  nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dang sa ngag la snod du gyur
20b6(mdo sde): pa/ sbyin gnas dam pa/ snod dam par gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi snang bar byed pa/ lam ston par byed pa/ las kyi zhing dang / nyon mongs pa'i zhing las sems can rnams sgrol bar byed pa/ mya ngan
20b7(mdo sde): las 'da' bar 'gro ba'i lam la gzhog par byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ni tshegs ma byung ba/ 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa rnams kyi ltung ba'i rtsa ba brgyad pa ste/ ltung
20b8(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa thams cad sprug par 'gyur/ ngan song du 'gro ba 'gyur/ ltung ba'i dngos por 'gyur/ lha dang mi'i bde ba thams
21a1(mdo sde): cad las pas pham par 'gyur/ byang chub sems kyis bslus par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de 'dra bdag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' nam ma pa'i snying po ni/ de lta bu
21a2(mdo sde): dag gi yul du skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ la lar ni dge sbyong gi gzugs dang / cha lugs dang / spyod lam gyis la lar ni bram ze'i gzugs dang / cha lugs dang / spyod lam nas/ byol song
21a3(mdo sde): gi mtshan ma dang / spyod lam gyi bar du gzugs sna tshogs ston te/ rgya cher ji ltar dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin las 'byung ba bzhin klag par bya ste/ de dang de dag tu sems can de dang de dag
21a4(mdo sde): la ji ltar 'thun pa bzhin du chos 'chad par byed de/ sngon ma byung ba sngan chad ma byung ba thams cad mkhyen pas bshad pa nga'i mdo sde dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod pa dang / sa 'chad te/ 
21a5(mdo sde): de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa thabs mi shes pa ltung ba byung ba dag ngo tsha bar byed/ ltung ba des 'ardzi/ gas par byed/ sngangs par byed/ sbags par byed/ ltung
21a6(mdo sde): ba de dag 'chags par byed/ gtong bar byed/ spong bar byed do// gal te sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming thos nas/ mthong bar 'dod cing / ngan song du ltung bas
21a7(mdo sde): 'jigs te/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba bshags par 'dod na/ gal te de dag byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos phyag 'tshal zhing / de'i ming nas brjod nas/ rigs kyi bu de dag gi skal ba ji lta ba
21a8(mdo sde): bzhin du/ sems can de'i 'dun du thamal pa'i tshul du 'dug pa 'am/ bram ze'i gzugs nas/ bu mo'i gzugs kyi bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa de'i mdun du 'dug ste/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba
21b1(mdo sde): de'i ltar byung ba 'chags su 'dug go// de'i thabs mkhas pa zab mo dang / bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po la spyod pa yang ston sa dang sa dag tu yang ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa la gzhog par
21b2(mdo sde): byed de/ rim gyis lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyis gnog par byed do// de nas de dag ngan song gi 'jigs pa chen po las shin tu thar par byed de/ tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir
21b3(mdo sde): mi ldog pa'i sa la gzhog par byed do// de ltar de klog dang mtshungs pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa la mthu che zhing brtul bar 'gyur ro// de bas na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
21b4(mdo sde): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// gal te de dag la mngon sum du bdag ston par mi byed na/ gang de la gsol bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' las
21b5(mdo sde): thog ma pa nyes pa dang bcas pas tho rangs kyi thun la langs te/ kha shar phyogs su bstan te 'dug la/ lha'i bu skya reng la gsol ba gdab par bya ba 'di skad du brjed do// skya rang skya reng
21b6(mdo sde): thugs rje chen po can/ skal ba chen po can khyod 'dzam bu'i gling du shar ma thag tu/ bdag la thugs rjes dgab par mdzod cig/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po thugs rje chen po can la
21b7(mdo sde): bdag gi tshig gis sbron te/ bdag gi rmi lam du yang de ston par 'gyur zhing / bdag gis thabs des ltung ba bshags par 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i theg pa chen po la thabs dang ye shes thob par/ 
21b8(mdo sde): mdzod cig ces smras nas/ des de'i tshe mal du gnyid log par bya ste/ skya reng 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du shar ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems
22a1(mdo sde): dpa' las dang po pa de'i rmi lam na/ tha mal par mdun tu 'dug ste/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba de yang 'chags su 'jug/ ye shes dang thabs chen pos thabs dang ye shes la/ 
22a2(mdo sde): mkhas pa gang dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa de nyid du byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba dang / theg pa chen po la shin tu ma rtan por gnas
22a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang / de myur du pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
22a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thabs dang / shes rab kyang de la ston to// bas na rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po 'di ni shin tu dpa' ba las byung ba'i
22a5(mdo sde): yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yan lag gi dam pa mgo bo la 'dug par snang ngo // de lta bra na byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab
22a6(mdo sde): pa dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sems can gang / byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po'i ming thos sam/ gzugs 'drir 'jug gam/ de la mchod pa byed dam/ rim gro byed/ sti stang byed/ bkur bsti
22a7(mdo sde): byed/ mchod pa byed cing / me tog dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnam pa du ma dag gis bkur bsti byed/ phyag 'tshal bar byed/ bdag gi srog kyang de la
22a8(mdo sde): 'bul bar byed na/ sems can de dag ni sems mes dus byed par mi 'gyur/ chus ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin/ dug gi 'chi bar mi byed de/ de dag tshe zad pa ma gtogs par mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa
22b1(mdo sde): / sus kyang de dag gi srog 'phrog par mi nus/ dus ma yin par mi 'chi/ nad du tsun du mi 'gyur/ bkres pa dang / skom pas dus byed par mi 'gyur/ rgyal po'i chad pas chod par mi 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i dus la 'as/ 
22b2(mdo sde): kyi bar du ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ de dag mig gis gzugs mi mthong / rna bas sgra mi thos/ sbrus dri ma chor/ lces ro mi myong / lus kyis reg mi shes shing / da dung du dbugs
22b3(mdo sde): phra mo 'thung ba dang / 'jug par byed/ dadung du de'i lus la rje dang / drod dang / rnam par shes pa 'jug par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ de dag la byang chub sems dpa' rnam ma pa'i snying po thamal par ston par byed de/ se
22b4(mdo sde): can gang sngon bram ze la gus par gyur pa de dag gi rnam par shes pa wa ni/ rigs kyi bu de bram ze'i gzugs su ston to// gang 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la gus pa de dag la ni/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi bar du
22b5(mdo sde): ston pa nas/ gang mthu bo che la gus pa dang / gang dbang phyug che/ na po la gus pa dang / brgya byin la gus pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba la gus pa dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gnas srung po dang / 
22b6(mdo sde): 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / ngal bso bo la gus pa dang / gang dag lha dang / ri dang / shing dang / chu mig dang / mtshe'u dang / lta dka sna tshogs la gus pa'i bar du/ gang dang gang gi skyabasu song ba'i
22b7(mdo sde): sems can de dag la/ de lta de ltar sems can de dag gi mdun du bstan nas/ gang gi bsam pa ji 'dra ba bzhin du de'i gzugs kyis 'di skad ces smra'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dag la/ gang dag she
22b8(mdo sde): rab kyis mthong ba/ 'khor ba'i srid pa sgrol ba'i phyir/ 'khor ba na ni de kun shes/ sems can de dag gis chos 'di dag rnam par shes pas shes par byas nas/ mtho ris la rten par 'gyur ro// 
23a1(mdo sde): sems can gang dag sangs rgyas la mngon par dang pa de dag gi mdun du 'dug ste/ ras sa rgyas kyi gzugs bstan nas 'di skad ces smra'o// sangs rgyas ye shes bden pa yis// 
23a2(mdo sde): srid pa'i rgya mtsho gang sgrol ba// ye shes de la myur du reg/ sdug bsngal kun las grol bar 'gyur// de'i tshe sems can de dag sangs rgyas yid la byed pa'i sgras dga' zhing rangs nas 'chi ba'i dus
23a3(mdo sde): byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnyog pa med pa/ yongs su dag pa/ gang nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa 'tsho ba gzhes pa chos kyang ston pa der skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du chos dang
23a4(mdo sde): dge 'dun la klag par bya'o// de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa 'a nam mkha'i snying po ni yon tan gyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab dang ldan no// gang yang ting nge 'dzin rnam pa sna tshogs pa sems kyi
23a5(mdo sde): shin tu dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ des tho rangs kyi thun la byang chub/ sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal te/ mchod/ pa ci nus kyis bya'o// sems can thams cad la byams pa'i
23a6(mdo sde): sems nye bar gzhag ste/ 'di skad ces brjod do// dgongs shig dgongs shig/ nam mkha'i snying po thugs rje chen po brnyes pa/ bdag la dran par dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor stsol cig/ 'di lta ste/ u mu
23a7(mdo sde): rAn khe/ pagak+Sha ni le/ sa mu dra a ba ta re nan ya na ya/ mahA kA ru Ni ka/ a nu ba dzan+d+ha sni ti/ a g+na dzam bas+thi ti/ badz+raHm+b+ha s+thi ti/ ko Sha s+thi ti/ a nub ma s+thi ti/ bud+yA ko Ta sI ta swAhA/ 
23a8(mdo sde): de la dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa sbyin par byed do// gang yang sangs rgyas kyi bka' lung can gyis bshad pa yang gyi/ gtsug lag sa tshogs thog par 'dod na/ des khrus bya te/ 
23b1(mdo sde): skya reng 'thung ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la phyag bya'o// mchod pa ci nus kyis bya'o// sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems su bya'o// 'di skad kyang brjod par bya'o// dgongs
23b2(mdo sde): shig dgongs shig/ mkhas pa chen po sems can thams cad kyi nang na bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ rigs kyi bu nam mkha'i snying po gang zag gi mchog/ dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor bdag la
23b3(mdo sde): stsol cig/ 'di lta ste/ a ni la dza/ bi shran+d+ha sha dzA bi ya ba na dza/ bi pa kri su me/ ba ta la dzA si/ s+than sha ra be/ shAsta kar ne/ hu ma hu ma/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka swA hA// gang rgya mtsho 'ching rnam chen
23b4(mdo sde): por 'jug 'dod pa dang / gang khung du 'jug 'dod pa dang / gang bcud dam pa spyod 'dod par gyur pa dang / gang btson ra ba cug pa dang / gang mdza' ba dang bral ba dang / gang mi mdza' ba dang
23b5(mdo sde): phrad pa dang / gang dag mes 'jigs pa dang / chu dang / mtsho/ na dang / dug dang / byang stem dang / stag dang / seng ge dang / dug drag po dang / rkun po dang / g.yon can gyis
23b6(mdo sde): 'jigs par bgyid pa dang / gang dam du bcings pa dang / gang chad pas bcad pa dang / gang gsad pa la thug pa dang / gang nad kyis btab pa dang / nad kyis 'jigs pa dang / gang dag chos gos
23b7(mdo sde): dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / na ba'i rkyen gyi sman dang / yo byad kyis phongs pa de dag gal te byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming nas brjod cing / mchod pa ci nus kyis
23b8(mdo sde): byed la/ sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems kyis gzhog cing / 'di skad du yang smra ste/ dgongs shig dgongs shig/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ grags pa chen po nam mkha'i snying po 'gro
24a1(mdo sde): pa'idon brked pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag la gzigs shig/ bdag 'di la bu las rab tu par ba mdzod cig/ skal pa stsol cig/ mthu chen po bdag ni sdug bsngag
24a2(mdo sde): gyis nyams thag go// shin tu dbul lo// bdag ni khyod la gnas nas/ zhi ba dang bde ba 'di dang tshe rabs gzhan du thob par 'gyur ro nas spras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mdza'i snying
24a3(mdo sde): po gzugs tha mal pa nas/ bu mo'i gzugs kyi bar gyi sems can de dag gi mdun du 'dug ste/ dbugs 'byin par byed do// gang dag ci las 'jigs pa de dag de dag de las rab tu
24a4(mdo sde): thar bar byed do// nga dang dul pa sna med pa ma gang dgas byang khrel ba'i ga de dag la de la de ltar bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// 
24a5(mdo sde): rgyal po'i bu la la zhig gnas chen po'i dbang bskur ba thob pa/ ra sems pa de gal te byang chub sems dpa' nam/ mkha'i snying po'i ming brjod cing phyag 'tshal la/ mchod pa dang
24a6(mdo sde): rim gro byed pa la sogs te/ bram ze'i gnas chen po dang / khyim bdag gi gnas chen po dang / gzo'i gnas chen po dang / thos pa'i gnas chen po dang / sgom pa'i gnas chen po dang / gang
24a7(mdo sde): mos pa'i gnas chen po'i bar du 'dod pa de dag gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming thos nas phyag 'tshal bar byed/ khrus byas te gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ tho rangs kyi thun la/ 
24a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la skyabs su song nas/ gsol pa gdab pa 'di skad du brjod par byed de/ nam mkha'i snying po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa bdag la skal pa stsol cig/ sa
24b1(mdo sde): ba dang / sems pa thams cad dang / bsam pa yid bzhin rab tu rdzogs par mdzod cig/ gang sems shing gang gsol pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod kyis mdzod cig ces brjod na/ de nas byang chub/ 
24b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos lha'i rna ba'i khams rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas skad de thos nas/ sems can de dag la bdag ci rigs par ston te/ de dag la de ltar thabs kyang ston to// 
24b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po de ni de lta bu'i thabs kyi yon tan gyi chos dang ldan no// blo rgya mtsho mching rnam chen po dang ldan no// rigs kyi bu rgya mtsho mching rnam
24b4(mdo sde): chen po'i thigs pa ni la la zhig gis tshad ni gzung bar nus kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po thabs dang ye shes la mkhas pa dang / thabs kyis
24b5(mdo sde): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i tshad ni gzung mi nus so// rigs kyi bu phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' mtha' yas mu med pa thas cad kyi tshad ni la las bzung nus kyi/ byang chub sems
24b6(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ rnam pa sna tshogs su sprul par byed pa ni tshad gzung mi nus te/ la lar ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i
24b7(mdo sde): phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su sprul par byed do// la lar ni bram ze'i gzugs su byed cing / sems can ji lta bus 'dul ba de lta bu'i gzugs kyi bar du sprul par byed de/ de byol song du gtog
24b8(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi nang duni gyil song gi gzugs su sprul par byed do// sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi nang du ni sems can dpral ba ba'i gzugs su sprul bar byed pa nas/ ga shin rje'i 'jig rten pa
25a1(mdo sde): rnams la ga shin rje'i 'jig rten gyi gzugs kyi bar du sprul par byed do// kha cig la ni mngon sum du sprul pa sprul par byed/ kha cig la ni rmi lam du sprul par byed/ kha cig/ 
25a2(mdo sde): la ni sdug pa'i las sdug pa'i phyir/ ngan song las bsgral ba'i phyir/ mtho ris la dgod pa'i phyir/ sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ 'chi 'pho ba'i dus kyi tshe/ rnam par shes pa tham
25a3(mdo sde): rgyu ba'i tshe/ gzugs sna tshogs su sprul par byed de/ de dag de la thog mar skyabs su song zhing mthong ste/ bde ba thob nas mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gnas pa'i bde ba thob pa'i bar du
25a4(mdo sde): 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir sus kyang de'i sprul pa thams cad kyi tshad gzung bar mi nus so// de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po 'di ni thabs dang / 
25a5(mdo sde): ye shes kyi yon tan gyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan/ no// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan chen po dang ldan no// de bas na rigs kyi bu de'i yan lag gi mchog mgo
25a6(mdo sde): bo la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'dug par snang ngo // de nas de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la ngo mtshar thob/ rmad du byung ba
25a7(mdo sde): thob/ bla ma la bkur bsti dang / sti stang du bya ba thob par gyur nas/ thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la mchod pa dang / bkur sti sna
25a8(mdo sde): tshogs kyis bkur stir byed/ me tog dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / thug pa dang / mA mer dang / bdug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / chos gos dang / rgyan dang / gos dang / bstod
25b1(mdo sde): pa dang / gru dang / sil snyan dag gis mchod pa byed do// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po des kyang / de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la phul lo// phul nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
25b2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa/ rnyog pa lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sems can ma rig pa'i mun pa chen pos rmongs pa rnams la/ sangs rgyas
25b3(mdo sde): kyi don ji ltar bgyi bar nus/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu nam mkha' ni ma bcings ma grol ba/ nyon ma mongs pa/ ma rmongs pa rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o// nam
25b4(mdo sde): mkha' la rlung gi rkyen gyis na/ 'thul ba'i rdul gyis dkrigs shing yongs su ma dag pa'i mtshan du snang ste/ chus ni ni de bar byed/ dri ma med cing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// gang na
25b5(mdo sde): skar ma dang / gza' dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba'i bye brag mi ma don na ni/ skad cig dang thang cig dang / yud tsam dang / nyin mo dang / mtshan mo dang / dus dang lo rnams kyi bgrang
25b6(mdo sde): ba yang mi mngon no// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi dbang du song ba'i sems ni rang bzhin gyis dang ba/ yongs su dag pa yin mod kyi/ sems can rnams kyi blo
25b7(mdo sde): bur du byung ba'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis/ sems nye bar nyon mongs par byas te/ de dag gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen po chu dang mtshungs pas chos 'chad par mdzad do// sems
25b8(mdo sde): nyon mongs par gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems yongs su sbyong bar mdzad pas yongs su dag pa dang / de dag gi sems dri ma med par 'gyur te/ de'i phyir sems can de dag
26a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma shar nas/ ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis tshim par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon sum du 'gyur te/ 
26a2(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi nas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du gnas par 'gyur
26a3(mdo sde): ro// sems can thams cad la snying rje ba la shin tu gnas par 'gyur ro// de dag las kyang 'jig rten du dgra bcom pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // 
26a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jigarten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten
26a5(mdo sde): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ nam mkha'i mig la gnas/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so// ci mig gi rnam par shes pa la
26a6(mdo sde): gnas sam/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so// ci mig gis kun tu reg pa la gnas sam/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so// gang yang nang du mig gis kun tu reg pa'i rkyen gyis
26a7(mdo sde): tshor ba gsum 'byung ba de la nam mkha' gnas sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus la brjod par bya'o// rigs kyi
26a8(mdo sde): bu de ji snyam du sems/ nam mkha'i yid la gnas pa nas/ yid kyis kun tu reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gsum 'byung ba de la/ nam mkha' gnas sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma
26b1(mdo sde): lags so// rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ sems can nam mkha' la gnas sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems
26b2(mdo sde): nam mkha' sems can la gnas sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
26b3(mdo sde): po nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gcig la gcig mi rten to// gcig la gcig spyod yul ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni
26b4(mdo sde): rtog pa ma mchis pa stong pa nyid de/ sgro ma gtags pa ya dang dag pa'i mtha' de bzhin nyid du rtogs par bgyi'o// brtse dam ldan 'das nam mkha' ni 'di lta ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid tha
26b5(mdo sde): mi dad pa/ mi rtog pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ mi g.yo ba/ gsob lags te/ myu gu ma mchis pa/ sa bon/ ma mchis pa/ 'bras bu ma mchis pa/ rnam par smin pa ma
26b6(mdo sde): mchis pa/ yi ge ma mchis pa/ rlom sems ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ chos thams cad la de ltar rtogs na/ 
26b7(mdo sde): mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ bya ba rA dza/ man ta krA ya dzin dza ya/ dza na ni/ ma mu ni ha ra/ An ya pha la/ gu na ga b+ha/ 
26b8(mdo sde): ni ya ma bi na ya/ pu pa ya/ sha ta sha pa/ shA ma sha na/ ta thA ga ma/ sha mang gu/ ma du shi sha/ sha mdze ta nA ya/ kle shan+ta/ sang sho sha ne swAhA/ 
27a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mig las rtul bar byed pa/ seng ge'i 'gros kyi phyir bsgyings pa'i gzugs
27a2(mdo sde): 'dis/ sems can dag 'chi ba'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa'i tha ma la/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib dang / chos kyi sgrib pa sprug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par gtong nus so// 
27a3(mdo sde): khyod ni 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med par 'gro ba dang / sems can rnams snying rje'i dbang gis grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong mdab dang / ljongs dang / pho brang 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang / 
27a4(mdo sde): du/ gzugs dang / cha lugs dang / spyod lam sna tshogs kyis theg pa chen po'i mdo sde sna tshogs 'chad pa dang / sem ngas can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / rgyal rigs kyi phyag dar
27a5(mdo sde): pa nas/ dge sbyong gi phyag dar pa'i bar du sdig pa'i chos las spang / ba dang / thams cad dge ba'i chos la gzhag par nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ lha dang mi'i skye dgu
27a6(mdo sde): dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag gis ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa sna tshogs thob par gyur to// gzhan dag kyang sa bcu la ye shes skyes par gyur to// srog chags khri ni mi skye
27a7(mdo sde): ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// sems can dag gi gang dag rtsod 'gyur ba de dag gi ni gzhi yi rtsa ba spongs// myur du mthong bar 'gyur ba dag gi ni// rtsa ba bzhi po thams cad 'gyur
27a8(mdo sde): bar gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de gad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong de dag dang / 'khor de thams cad dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams
27b1(mdo sde): dga' ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// 
27b2(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya badz+ra man Da nA ma d+hA ra Ni ma hA yAn sU tA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rdo rje'i snying po'i gzungs shes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
27b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gangs kyi ri dang nye ba sna tshogs kyi grong gi rtsa'i skyil po na/ dge
27b4(mdo sde): slong stong du tshang ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gci dag tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod snyom rdzas kyi zas phyis len pa spangs te/ rtsi'i skyil por skyil mo
27b5(mdo sde): krung bcas nas/ sku drang por bsrang ste/ dran pa mngon dug/ zhag nas bzhugs so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'a// ngas chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa zhes bya ba'i
27b6(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar ga la bzhugs pa'i sku ma mthong ngo // de nas
27b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu sum khri nyis stong bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo // de nas lha rnam
27b8(mdo sde): kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'di snyam du/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na bzhugs snyam sems pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rtsa'i skyil po'i nang na ting nge 'dzin
28a1(mdo sde): la snyoms par zhugs pa de dag gis mthong ngo // mthong nas bcom ldan 'das gal bder dang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sman sngar cang mi smra bar skyil/ 
28a2(mdo sde): mo krung bcas te 'khod do// gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang cang mi smra bar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar de nyid du skyil mo krung bcas te 'khong ngo // de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan
28a3(mdo sde): 'das kyis 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad de/ ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon pas mdzad pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
28a4(mdo sde): khams na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag theg pa lag sar du yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa la yang da dag par zhugs nas/ ring du lon pa'am/ phyir mi ldog
28a5(mdo sde): pa'am/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa yang rung ste/ rdza/ snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad sna tshogs kyi grong ga la ba dang / rtsa'i skyil po ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / sangs
28a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyis mthus mi gang tsam gyi bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// de nas de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ sems can thams cad kyi sems mgu bar byed pa zhes bya
28a7(mdo sde): pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ 'khor de dag thams cad sems rab tu dga' ba dang / sems
28a8(mdo sde): mgu ba dang / sems rangs pa dang / sems shin tu tshim pa skyes so// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pas chos thams cad rab tu zhing zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
28b1(mdo sde): so// byang chub sems dpa' byams pa ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ 'khor de dag thams cad kyi dbang po rnams rab tu zhi bar gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin
28b2(mdo sde): po che tog ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' drug khri nyis stong dang lhan cig tu/ sna tshogs kyi grong ga la ba dang / rtsa'i skyil po ga la ba der song ste phyin ma thag tu/ bdag nyid steng gi nam
28b3(mdo sde): mkha' bar snang la 'dug pa snyam du shes te/ de steng gi nam mkha' de nyid la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rin po che tog bkod pa chen po zhes
28b4(mdo sde): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' rin po che te gting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas bar snang thams cad me tog ud pa la dang / 
28b5(mdo sde): pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar pos kun tu khre bas nas/ nyi ma dang / zla ba rnams kyi 'od kyang mi snang bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags
