77a8(mdo sde): nas kyang lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag du ma gar byed cing klu len te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong ste lhags nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i gdugs kyi sprin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi sprin dang / ba dan gyi sprin dag dang
77b1(mdo sde): cing mngon par dang te/ mngon par rab tu dang to// dang cing mngon par dang te/ mngon par rab tu dang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la mgo zas phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 
77b2(mdo sde): lha'i bu mo de dag thams cad kyang bud med kyi skyon dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag go/ yang de'i tshe phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag na/ dge slong gnas pa de dag kyang 'khor
77b3(mdo sde): de nyid du 'dus par gyur te tshogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe tshe rlung gi rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di lta ste/ rlung gi rgyal
77b4(mdo sde): po chen po rnam par 'thor rlung zhes bya ba dang / rlung gi rgyal nga po chen po rnam par 'thor rlung chen po zhes bya ba dang / rlung gi rgyal po chen po shugs dri ma med pa zhes bya ba dang / rlung gi rgyal po
77b5(mdo sde): chen po rjes su cher chags shes bya ba me tog dang / s+pho/ sa thams cad dang / lhan cig ldan zhing / bra com ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das
77b6(mdo sde): kyi seng ge'i sgra'i chos snang ba'i sgo zhu bar byed do// sprin gyi rgyal po chen po 'bum phrag du ma yang glu dang rol me'i sgra sna tshogs sgrogs shing / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs te/ bcom ldan 'das/ 
77b7(mdo sde): ga la ba der dong nas lhags te/ seng ge'i sgra'i chos kyi snang ba'i sgo zhu bar byed do// yang de'i tshe seng ge dpa' bo la sogs pa ngang pa'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag la ngang pa'i rgyal po re re
77b8(mdo sde): yang 'khor dang pa 'bum phrag du ma dag dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la ngang pa'i skad dpe med pa dag gis bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bro
78a1(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// ngang pa'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ ting nge 'dzin thadadapa
78a2(mdo sde): dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/ yang de'i tshe rma bya'i rgyal po legs mthong la sogs pa// rma bya'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa la rma bya'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor rma bya 'bum phrag grangs med pa
78a3(mdo sde): dag dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ lhags nas/ rma bya'i sgra skad snyan pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
78a4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// rma bya'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems da dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ ting nge 'dzin tha dad bdag la rnam
78a5(mdo sde): par rtsa ba sha stag go/ yang de'i tshe khu byug gi rgyal po sde laso/ gas pa/ khu byug gi rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa la khu byug gi rgyal po re ra yang 'khor khu byug 'bum phrag
78a6(mdo sde): grangs med pa dag dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong sde lhags nas/ khu byug gi skad snyan pas bcom ldan 'das la bstod de/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// khu byug gi rgyal po de dag thams
78a7(mdo sde): cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/ yang de'i tshe ka la bing ka'i rgyal po pad+ma'i mdab ma 'dra ba'i mig la sogs pa ka la bing ka'i rgyal po
78a8(mdo sde): 'bum phrag grangs med pa la/ ka la bing ka'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor ka la bing ka 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag/ ka la bing ka'i sgra skad snyan pas 'byin cing / bcom ldan 'das ga la bder dong ste/ 
78b1(mdo sde): lhags nas/ sangs rgyas kyi stong pa yang dag pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la bstod nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// ka la bing ka'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems
78b2(mdo sde): dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/ yang de'i tshe shang shang te'u yi rgyal po rgyal ba la sogs pa/ shang shang te'u yi rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa la/ shang shang
78b3(mdo sde): te'u yi rgyal po re re yang 'khor shang shang te'u 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i sgra skad snyan pas
78b4(mdo sde): bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag/ 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// shang shang te'u yi rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa'
78b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad padag la rnam par rtse ba// stag go/ yang de'i tshe bya'i rigs 'dres pa la sog/ sa pa tha dad pa grangs med pa la byi
78b6(mdo sde): rigs 'dres pa re re la bya'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med yod de/ bya'i rgyal po ra ra yang 'khor bya 'bum phrag grangs med pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la der dong ste lhags nas/ so so bya
78b7(mdo sde): skad kyi rol mo'i sgra depe med pa'i gdangs kyi sangs rgyas kyi yang dag pa'i stong pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
78b8(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// bya'i rigs 'dres pa de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go// yang
79a1(mdo sde): de'i tshe seng ge'i rgyal po chen po che pad+ma la la sogs pa/ seng ge'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med pa la seng ge'i rgyal po re re yang 'khor seng ge 'bum phrag grangs med pa dang / 
79a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ seng ge'i sgra skad kyi rol mo'i sgra snyan pas/ bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa dag gis bstod nas/ bcom ldan
79a3(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// seng ge'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa
79a4(mdo sde): dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/ yang de'i tshe spos da kyi glang po'i rgyal po ri ka'i nang bun lta bu zhes bya ba la sogs dpa spos kyi glang po'i rgyal po 'bum phrag grangs med
79a5(mdo sde): pa la spos kyi glang po'i rgyal po rer yang 'khor spos kyi glang po' bum phrag grangs med pa dag dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
79a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa dag gis bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// spos
79a7(mdo sde): kyi glang po de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/ yang de'i tshe sbrul dang / stag dang / ri dgas rigs tha dad pa
79a8(mdo sde): 'dres pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// sbrul dang / stag dang / ri dgas
79b1(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la mngon du phyogs pa dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go/ 
79b2(mdo sde): yang de'i tshe shra sbrang dang / sbrang bu mchu rings dang / sbrang ma dang / bi shu ka dang / nya dang / ru sbal dang / chu srin byis pa gsod dang / se sar dang / 'ug pa dang / sdig pa dang / srin
79b3(mdo sde): gyi med grangs med pa'i yang grangs med pa dag dang / sdig sbrul tha dad pa 'dres pa gnas pa thams cad dang / phag dang / khyi dang / wa dang / gzhan yang srog chags phra mo rnams bcom ldan 'das ga
79b4(mdo sde): la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dedag pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod dade/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
79b5(mdo sde): nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe sbrul dang / myur du gdugs pa dang / sbrul gzi gu dang / sbrul mi bzad pa/ 'i gdugs pa'i rigs 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag/ bcom
79b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu
79b7(mdo sde): 'khod do// yang de'i tshe lhun po dang / lhun po chen po dang / btang bzung dang / btang bzung chen po dang / 'khor yug dang / 'khor yug chen po dag dang / ri gzhan dag gi lha rnams rang rang gi khang par
79b8(mdo sde): zhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa dag gis mngon par bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
80a1(mdo sde): / phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// lha de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dang padag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go// yang
80a2(mdo sde): de'i tshe sman dang / nags kyi lha thams cad rang rang gi khang par zhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag pa dag gis bstod
80a3(mdo sde): de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// lha de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa
80a4(mdo sde): dag la rnam par rtse ba sha stag go// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dang da' sprin chen snying po'i 'khor rnams dang / byang chub sem/ sa dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das
80a5(mdo sde): kyis skad cig gcig la bskal pa brgya mtsho dpag tu med pa/ gra ngas med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa me dpa/ gzhal du med pa tshad med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang
80a6(mdo sde): brjod du med pa la 'jug par mdzad pa de ni ji ltar shes par rung / bcom ldan 'das rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bskal pa bye ba phrag ni ji snyed/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas
80a7(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa can dag tu ni/ thabs rnam pa sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i tshul gyi mtshams sbyor ba'i 'jig rten gyi spyod pa rnams dang / ye shes dang / gzigs pa dang / khams dang / rgyu dang / dmigs/ 
80a8(mdo sde): pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / gdags pa dang / rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba dag gis/ sems can rgya mtsho ji snyed cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
80b1(mdo sde): tu yongs su smin par mdzad cig gu snyam mo// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba sangs rgyas kyis gnang ste/ mi 'jigs pa thob pas/ byang chub
80b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sems kyi yongasu rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin chen snying po la 'di skad ces smras so// sprin chen snying po sprin
80b3(mdo sde): chen po'i mdo las/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dga' ldan gyi gnas su skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen
80b4(mdo sde): po'i mdo las/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dga' ldan gyi// gnas na bzhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi// stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// 
80b5(mdo sde): sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gsheg sa pa rnams kyi dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'chi 'pho rnam pa ra gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i
80b6(mdo sde): chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen chen po'i mdo la// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi lhums su skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs
80b7(mdo sde): la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi lhum su cha phra bar snang ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs
80b8(mdo sde): kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lum bi ni'i bskyed mos tshal du phyogs su gzigs pa/ 
81a1(mdo sde): rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
81a2(mdo sde): lum bi ni'i bskyed mos tshal du gsung brjod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin
81a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyi lum po ni'i bskyed mos tshal nas/ grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas su gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang
81a4(mdo sde): sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ da de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dbang phyug chen po rim/ gro byed du 'ong ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi
81a5(mdo sde): stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin ga shegs pa rnams kyi stobs kyis rnam par gzhag pa'i
81a6(mdo sde): byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byis pa'i rtse mo rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rab
81a7(mdo sde): kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yi ge slob pa'i gra gang du gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin
81a8(mdo sde): gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yig dang / bstan bcos dang / lag rtsis dang / 
81b1(mdo sde): brtsi ba dang / shod dgod pa bslab pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos sdang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin rnom po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
81b2(mdo sde): kyi shAkya'i bu mos 'tshem dam bcas pa thob par bya ba'i bslab pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo
81b3(mdo sde): la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi btsun mo'i 'khor na bzhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin
81b4(mdo sde): po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bskyed dmos tshal gyi sar gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi/ rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod
81b5(mdo sde): do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rgan po dang / nad pa dang / shi ba dang / rab tu byung ba la gzigs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i
81b6(mdo sde): byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sbyin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir grong khyer chen po ser 'i
81b7(mdo sde): gnas nas mngon par 'byung ba rnam par gnag pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i tshes snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying ba sprin chen po'i mdol/ de bzhin gshes
81b8(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi na bar 'dur smrig pazhes pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba chos snang ba sgo yod do// smin chen sring po sprin chen po'i mdol de nin/ 
82a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyi dka' ba spyod cing bzhugs pa rnam par gnag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin rjes
82a2(mdo sde): mdo la// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dka' ba spyod pa las bzhengs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i
82a3(mdo sde): mdol// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi khrus mdzad pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo
82a4(mdo sde): la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhal zas la longs spyod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod de// sprin chen snying po
82a5(mdo sde): sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i phyi na gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i
82a6(mdo sde): sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stongs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chom
82a7(mdo sde): snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bdud 'gugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod
82a8(mdo sde): sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bdud 'dul ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin
82b1(mdo sde): chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin
82b2(mdo sde): chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin
82b3(mdo sde): chen snying po sprin chen po'i 'dol/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lan gsum du bzlas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos
82b4(mdo sde): snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ma'i 'od dang / klog gi 'od dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / nor
82b5(mdo sde): bu'i 'od dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'ji garten gyi 'od rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin
82b6(mdo sde): chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rgyal po'i bka' rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying
82b7(mdo sde): po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs bzhi rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin
82b8(mdo sde): chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi leng ba dang / 'phye bo dang / lkug pa dang / 'on pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos
83a1(mdo sde): snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sman chen po'i mdol de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi sa/ 
83a2(mdo sde): dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol// de bzhin
83a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyi mi khom pa rnam pa sna tshogs su skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po
83a4(mdo sde): mdol/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgra yod do// sprin
83a5(mdo sde): chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par gnag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes
83a6(mdo sde): bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod pa dang / kun tu rgyu ba dang / gcer bu la sogs pa mu stegs byed pa
83a7(mdo sde): rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdolade bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dug brgyad cu
83a8(mdo sde): bzhi kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod de/ sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'brog
83b1(mdo sde): mgun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
83b2(mdo sde): sor me'i 'phreng ba'i nang kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs
83b3(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi gnod sbyin 'brog nas kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin
83b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyi klu'i rgyal po seg ma med kun tu 'khrug dpa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bzhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po
83b5(mdo sde): sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mu ge kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ches snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin
83b6(mdo sde): chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chom rkun kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gnag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgra yod do// sprin chen snying
83b7(mdo sde): po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mi ngas kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin
83b8(mdo sde): chen po'i mdol/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi klu'i gnas dag tu bye ma rab tu 'bar bkun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos sdang ba'i sgo yod do// sman
84a1(mdo sde): chen snying po sprin chen po'i ma la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi klu'i gnas dag tu nam mkha' lding kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs
84a2(mdo sde): la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod de// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dge 'dun gyi dbyen kun tu 'brug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi
84a3(mdo sde): kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi brag 'phen pa dang / 'jog pa kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par
84a4(mdo sde): gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen dpe'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi glang po che nor
84a5(mdo sde): skyong gyis 'jug pa kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen skyeng po srin po'i mdo la/ de bzhin
84a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyi bram ze'i bu mo slu byed kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol/ de
84a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi kun tu rgyu ma mdzes mas sgro btags nas/ kun tu rgyu kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i tshes snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen
84a8(mdo sde): snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi shAkya gsod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po
84b1(mdo sde): mdol/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi nyan thos rnams kyi las su bya ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen
84b2(mdo sde): po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rang gi lus la lus su bya ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo
84b3(mdo sde): la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi theg pa gsum rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol/ 
84b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'jig pa rnam par gzhag pa'i dbyin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba nga'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshe
84b5(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi lta bar gyur pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi du kyi stong / la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
84b6(mdo sde): kyi sgro btags pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lasu bsgo ba
84b7(mdo sde): rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi blang ba dang dor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin
84b8(mdo sde): gyis rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'degs pa dang 'jog pa rnam par gzhag pa'i
85a1(mdo sde): byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'dus byas rnam par gnas
85a2(mdo sde): pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dngos gzhi rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi
85a3(mdo sde): stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gnas rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos
85a4(mdo sde): snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo nga la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dngos po rnam par ga dazhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos
85a5(mdo sde): snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gnyi ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ches snang ba'i sgo
85a6(mdo sde): yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ches snang ba'i sgo yod do// 
85a7(mdo sde): sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dmigs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying
85a8(mdo sde): po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtha' rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen pos/ 
85b1(mdo sde): mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lus rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
85b2(mdo sde): rnams kyi 'khor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
85b3(mdo sde): kyi brjod du med pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi kun nas nyon
85b4(mdo sde): mongs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor da ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
85b5(mdo sde): kyi chags pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor/ ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sgra na po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
85b6(mdo sde): rlom sems rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yod pa
85b7(mdo sde): rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ming rnam par gzhag pa'i
85b8(mdo sde): byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bdag tu rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs
86a1(mdo sde): kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rgyu dang rkyen gyi rnam
86a2(mdo sde): par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'dres pa rnam par gzhag pa'i
86a3(mdo sde): byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdol/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yi ge rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi
86a4(mdo sde): rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi nga rgyal med pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin
86a5(mdo sde): gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// sprin chen snying po sprin chen po'i mdo la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa
86a6(mdo sde): rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo yod do// de la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos snang ba'i sgo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang ga'i
86a7(mdo sde): klung gi bye ma snyed yod do// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer chags pa med pa 'jigs pa med pa'i rigs shes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi 'khor grangs med pa dag kyang byung ste/ des phyogs bcu'i
86a8(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rab byams zad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas te/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por byas nas sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog tu gyur pa bstan te/ sems can gyi khams
86b1(mdo sde): mtha' yas pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yengasu smin par byas nas/ phyir log ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lan grangs med par bskor bar byas nas/ byang chub sems/ 
86b2(mdo sde): dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lus la phog par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos mi 'jigs pa thob nas/ stan las langs te/ bla gos
86b3(mdo sde): phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
86b4(mdo sde): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dag da' ldan gyi gnas su skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlab das kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang
86b5(mdo sde): dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bka/ da pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir ba sdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan
86b6(mdo sde): gyi gnas na bzhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom
86b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'chi 'pho rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa
86b8(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi lhums su skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi
87a1(mdo sde): rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis
87a2(mdo sde): 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi lhum su cha phra bar snang ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na
87a3(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis lum bi ni'i bskyed mos tshal du sku bltam pa rnam par
87a4(mdo sde): gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang churab sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir
87a5(mdo sde): bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis lum bi ni'i bskyed mos tshal du gom pa 'dor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang
87a6(mdo sde): dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lum bi ni'i bskyed mos tshal du phyogs su gzigs
87a7(mdo sde): pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir
87a8(mdo sde): bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lum bi ni'i bskyed mos tshal du gsung brjod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa
87b1(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lum bi ni'i skye mo tshal nas/ grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas su
87b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis la
87b3(mdo sde): 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang phyug rin po che rim gro bgyid du mchi ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag blan
87b4(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis stobs kyis rnam par gzhag pa'i byin rlabs
87b5(mdo sde): rlabs kyis stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dang pa'i gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/ bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol
87b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis byis pa'i rtsad mo rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom
87b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yi ge slob pa'i grwa gang du gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dang 'gang
87b8(mdo sde): dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yi ge dang bstan bcos dang / lagacis
88a1(mdo sde): dang / bcib dang / shod dgod pas bslab 'a rnam par gnag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag blan med pa yang dag par
88a2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya'i bu mos 'tsham/ dam bcas pa thob par bgyi ba'i bslab pa rnam par/ 
88a3(mdo sde): gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom
88a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis btsun mo'i 'khor na bzhugs pa rnam par gzhagapa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang bya chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
88a5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'di rabasdu bar gsolabacom ldan 'das kyi sa grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas nas/ skyed mos
88a6(mdo sde): 'tshal gyi sar gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan
88a7(mdo sde): 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgan po dang nad pa dang / shi ba dang / rab tu byung ba gzigs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi
88a8(mdo sde): stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan
88b1(mdo sde): kyis rab tu 'byung bar mngon par phyogs te/ grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas nasamangon par 'byung ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas
88b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis na bza' ngur smrig
88b3(mdo sde): bzhes pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir
88b4(mdo sde): bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' thub spyod cing bzhugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang
88b5(mdo sde): dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dgra bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' thub spyod pa las bzhengs pa
88b6(mdo sde): rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir
88b7(mdo sde): bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khrus mdzad pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
88b8(mdo sde): byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsolabacom ldan 'das kyi zhal zas la longs spyod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs
89a1(mdo sde): kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor
89a2(mdo sde): 'dir bsdu bar gsolabacom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag
89a3(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa
89a4(mdo sde): rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor
89a5(mdo sde): 'dir bsdu bar gsolabacom ldan 'das kyis/ bdud 'gugs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stong sa la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa'
89a6(mdo sde): gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud 'dul ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin
89a7(mdo sde): gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ 
89a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
89b1(mdo sde): chub du yod pa de/ bam ldan das kyis 'khob deng bsdub nas bcom ldan nas kyi tsham kyi ngas pa pa tshul rnam nan
89b2(mdo sde): kyi sgribs la myong bsabyang chub sems dpa' ga dag rdzan med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chung du bag bdag/ mam ldan 'as kyi 'khor dze brdzur
89b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan das kyis lanasasum du brdzas te/ rjem kyi' ba yinas pa 'dunabyas su pan pa nam par nanan pa'i bya ci rnams kyi gabs la gyur ba
89b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag ldan med pa sa ga 'a jigs pa'i byang chub da bdedag sam nu das kyis 'ad grub mabacomaldan pa
89b5(mdo sde): kyis thugs kyi 'od dang / gag dadang ba dang / nyi ma'i 'ad dadu/ no du'i 'a dang /  nga / ngas pa dang / 'dzi rten
89b6(mdo sde): kheng rnam par gnas pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la spong bas/ byang chub sems dpa' dang dag ldan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rngu bshed bded/ bcom ldan das kyis
89b7(mdo sde): 'khor ding bsdu bar gsal bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal ba'i bka' rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stongs la sbyongangos byang chub sems dpa' dang dag than mod
89b8(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'kho 'dir bslu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs pa ni rnam par banag pa'i byang gyi rabs kyi stobs la
90a1(mdo sde): bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom
90a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis long ba dang / 'phye bo dang / sdug pa dang / 'on pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag
90a3(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsolabacom ldan 'das kyis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas
90a4(mdo sde): dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba rnam par gzhag pa 'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
90a5(mdo sde): tu bkod pa de dgabacom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs
90a6(mdo sde): pa can dag tu mi khom pa rnam pa sna tshogs su skye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
90a7(mdo sde): bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsal bcom ldan 'das dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang
90a8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bsod nams bgyi
90b1(mdo sde): ba'i dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog pa byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan
90b2(mdo sde): 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyod pa dang / kun tu rgyu ba dang / gcer bu pa la sogs pa mu stegs can rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi
90b3(mdo sde): spobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom
90b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis dug brgya rtsa bzhi kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
90b5(mdo sde): byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khora'adir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrog ma kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis rlabs
90b6(mdo sde): kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom
90b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das sor mo'i phreng ba kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod
90b8(mdo sde): pade dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin 'brog gnas kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ 
91a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir sdu bar gsol/ 
91a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par
91a3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mu ge kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis
91a4(mdo sde): rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dang / de' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub/ tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
91a5(mdo sde): 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chom rkun kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa'
91a6(mdo sde): gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mi ngas kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag
91a7(mdo sde): pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar
91a8(mdo sde): gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag gi klu'i gnas dag tu bye ma rab tu 'bar ba kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin
91b1(mdo sde): gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang lags pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis
91b2(mdo sde): 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i gnas dag tu na mkha' lding kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na
91b3(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi dbyen kun tu 'khrug pa rnam
91b4(mdo sde): par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dang gang dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir
91b5(mdo sde): bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis brag 'phrin pa dang / 'jog pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi/ sa rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems
91b6(mdo sde): dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis glang po che nor gyis 'jug kun tu 'khrug pa
91b7(mdo sde): rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir
91b8(mdo sde): bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bram ze'i bu mo slu byed kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang
92a1(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kun du rgyu ma mdzes mas sgo btags / 
92a2(mdo sde): kun tu rgyu kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa dadag/ bcom ldan
92a3(mdo sde): 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya gsod pa kun tu 'khrug pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang
92a4(mdo sde): ngag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa/ de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol / bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos rnams kyi las su bya ba rnam
92a5(mdo sde): par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bsabyang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag parardzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis
92a6(mdo sde): 'khor bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rang gi lus la las su bya ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa
92a7(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bgrod pa ni gcig pu rabs te/ gnyis sam gsum
92a8(mdo sde): ma mchis la/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad na yang / bkod pa ni gcig pu rabs te/ gnyis dang gsum du ma mchis pa 'di ni chos nyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das
92b1(mdo sde): kyi phyogs bcu'i bajig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pacan dag tu theg pa gsum rnam par gnag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag thun med pa yang dag par
92b2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa ded/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdub gsapa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni 'jig pas mchis pa lags te/ 'jig
92b3(mdo sde): brnam par dag pa lags so// de tso'i slang dun ni/ 'dig pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slang du ste/ 'jig pa'i rang bzhin las 'jig pa ma mchis pa gzhan sa lags kyi/ 'dzis
92b4(mdo sde): pa'i rang tshan nyid/ 'dzin pa ma mchis palanas te/ 'jig pa'i rang bzhin rgyal/ 'jig pa dam mchis pa shes pa des ches thams cad 'jig pa ma mchim pa
92b5(mdo sde): lags nabacom ldan 'das kyis 'jig pa na par gnag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
92b6(mdo sde): byang chub tu bkod pa de du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/ lta bar gyur pa rnam par dag pa lags
92b7(mdo sde): so/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ lte bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ lta bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin las stong pa nyid gzhan ma lags kyi/ 
92b8(mdo sde): bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin nyid stong pa nyid lags te/ lta bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid shes pa des/ chos thams cad stong pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lta bar
93a1(mdo sde): gyur pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag
93a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni sgro btags pa ma mchis pa ste/ sgro btags pa'i rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i
93a3(mdo sde): slad du zhe na/ sgro btags pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du sde/ sgro btags pa'i rang bzhin las/ sgro btags pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ spro
93a4(mdo sde): btags pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ sgro btags pa ma ma dachis pa lags te/ sgro btags pa'i rang bzhin gyi sa/ sgro btags pa ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams
93a5(mdo sde): cad sgro gtags pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sgro btags pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin/ gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas byang chub sems
93a6(mdo sde): dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa gang lags pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos
93a7(mdo sde): thams cad ni las su bsgo ba mchis pa ste/ las su bsgo ba rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du na/ las su bsgo ba'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i
93a8(mdo sde): slad du ste/ las su bsgo ba'i rang bzhin las/ las su bsgo ba ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi las su bskor ba'i rang bzhin nyid/ las su bskor ba ma mchis
93b1(mdo sde): pa lags te/ las su brko ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ las su bsgo ba ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad las su bsgo ba ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis las su brko// 
93b2(mdo sde): ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir
93b3(mdo sde): bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni blang ba dang / dor ba ma mchis pa ste/ blang ba dang dor ba rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du
93b4(mdo sde): zhe na/ blang ba dang dor ba'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma la dgas pa'i slad du ste/ blang ba dang dor ba'i rang bzhin las blang ba dang dor ba ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi
93b5(mdo sde): blang ba dang dor ba'i rang bzhin nyid/ blang ba dang der ba ma ma chis pa lags te/ blang ba dang dor ba'i rang bzhin gyis blang ba dang dor ba ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams
93b6(mdo sde): cad blang ba dang dor ba ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis blang ba dang dor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang
93b7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni 'deg pa dang / 'jog pa ma mchis pa ste/ 'deg
93b8(mdo sde): pa dang / 'jog pa rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'deg pa dang 'jog pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ 'degs pa dang / 'jog pa'i rang bzhin las 'dag
94a1(mdo sde): pa dang / 'jog pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ 'deg pa dang 'jog pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ 'deg pa dang / 'jog pa ma mchis pa lags te/ 'deg
94a2(mdo sde): pa dang 'jog pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ 'deg pa dang / 'jog pa ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad 'deg pa dang / 'jog pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
94a3(mdo sde): 'deg pa dang / 'jog pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ 
94a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni 'dus ma byas pa/ ste/ 'dus byas rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du ne
94a5(mdo sde): na/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin las 'dus ma byas gzhan ma lags kyi/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin nyid 'dus ma
94a6(mdo sde): byas lags te/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin gyis/ 'dus ma byas shes pa des/ chos thams cad 'dus ma byas pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus byas rnam par gzhag pa'i byin
94a7(mdo sde): gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu ba/ 
94a8(mdo sde): gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni dngos gzhi ma mchis pa lags te/ dngos gzhi rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dngos gzhi'i rang bzhin la sa
94b1(mdo sde): gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ dngos gzhi'i rang bzhin las/ dngos gzhi ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyis/ dngos gzhi'i rang bzhin nyid/ dngos gzhi'i ma mchis pa lags te/ 
94b2(mdo sde): dngos gzhi'i rang bzhin gyis/ dngos gzhi ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad dngos gzhi ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dngos gzhi rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi
94b3(mdo sde): rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom
94b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gnas ma mchis pa lags te/ gnas rnam par dag pa lags so// / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gnas kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma
94b5(mdo sde): lags pa'i slad du ste/ gnas kyi rang bzhin las gnas ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ gnas kyi rang bzhin nyid gnas ma mchis pa lags te/ gnas kyi rang
94b6(mdo sde): bzhin gyis/ gnas ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad gnas ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas
94b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams
94b8(mdo sde): cad ni dngos po ma mchis pa lags te/ dngos po rnam par dag pa lags so// de'i ci'i slad du zhe na/ dngos po'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ dngos por
95a1(mdo sde): rang bzhin las dngos po ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid/ dngos po ma mchis pa lags te/ dngos po'i rang bzhin gyis/ dngos po
95a2(mdo sde): ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos po rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa'
95a3(mdo sde): gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gnyis su mchis pa lags te/ 
95a4(mdo sde): gnyis rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gnyis kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ gnyis kyi rang bzhin las gnyis su ma mchis pa
95a5(mdo sde): gzhan ma lags kyi/ gnyis kyi rang bzhin nyid/ gnyis su ma mchis pa lags te/ gnyis kyi rang bzhin gyis/ gnyis su ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams
95a6(mdo sde): cad gnyis su ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnyis rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par
95a7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa lags te/ mtshan nyid rnam
95a8(mdo sde): par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin las mtshan nyid ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags
95b1(mdo sde): kyi/ mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa lags te/ mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad mtshan nyid ma mchis
95b2(mdo sde): pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod
95b3(mdo sde): pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni dmigs pa ma mchis pa lags te/ dmigs pa rnam par
95b4(mdo sde): dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ dmigs dpa'i rang bzhin la sa gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ da dmigs pa'i rang bzhin las dmigs pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma
95b5(mdo sde): lags kyi/ dmigs pa'i rang bzhin nyid dmigs pa ma mchis pa lags te/ dmigs pa'i rang bzhin gyis dmigs pa ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams cad
95b6(mdo sde): dmigs pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dmigs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag
95b7(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni dbu ma'i lam lags te/ mtha' rnam par
95b8(mdo sde): dag pa lagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mtha'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ mtha'i rang bzhin las/ dbu ma'i lam gzhan ma lags kyi/ mtha'i rang bzhin
96a1(mdo sde): nyid dbu ma'i lam lags te/ mtha'i rang bzhin gyis dbu ma'i lam shes pa des/ chos thams cad dbu ma'i lam lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
96a2(mdo sde): mtha' rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu
96a3(mdo sde): bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni lus ma mchis pa lags te/ lus rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ lus kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i
96a4(mdo sde): slad du ste/ lus kyi rang bzhin las/ lus ma mchis pa nyi dang gzhan ma lags kyi lus kyi rang bzhin nyid/ lus ma mchis pa lags te/ lus kyi rang bzhin gyis
96a5(mdo sde): lus ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad lus ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lus rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang
96a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das chos thams
96a7(mdo sde): cad ni 'khor ba ma mchis pa lags te/ 'khor ba rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'khor ba'i rang bzhin las/ gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ 'khor
96a8(mdo sde): ba'i rang bzhin las 'khor ba ma mchis pa lags kyi/ 'khor ba'i rang bzhin nyid/ 'khor ba ma mchis pa lags te/ 'khor ba'i rang bzhin gyis 'khor ba ma mchis pa shes pa des// chos
96b1(mdo sde): thams cad 'khor ba ma mchis pa lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag
96b2(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa ma mchis pa lags te
96b3(mdo sde): brjod du med pa rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ brjod du med pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ brjod du med pa'i rang bzhin las/ brjod du med pa
96b4(mdo sde): ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi brjod du med pa'i rang de bzhin nyid brjod du med pa ma mchi pa lags te/ brjod du med po'i rang bzhin gyis/ brjod du med pa ma mchis
96b5(mdo sde): pa shes pa des chos thams cad brjod du med pa ma mchis pa lag sa na bcom ldan 'das kyis brjod du med pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub
96b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni kun nas nyon
96b7(mdo sde): mongs pa ma mchis pa lags te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du
96b8(mdo sde): ste/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin las/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa
97a1(mdo sde): lags te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa ma
97a2(mdo sde): pab lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
97a3(mdo sde): byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni chags pa ma mchis pa lags te/ chags pa rnam par dag
97a4(mdo sde): ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chags pa de'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ gas pa'i rang bzhin las/ chags pa ma mchis pa gzhan
97a5(mdo sde): ma lags kyi/ chags pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ chags pa ma mchis pa lags te/ chags pa'i rang ba zhin gyis chags pa ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams
97a6(mdo sde): cad chags pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chags pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag
97a7(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni rlom sems ma mchis pa lags te/ rlom sems
97a8(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rlom sems kyi rang bzhin las gnan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ rlom sems kyi rang bzhin las/ rlom sems ma mchis pa
97b1(mdo sde): gzhan ma lags kyi/ rlom sems kyi rang bzhin nyid/ rlom sems ma mchis pa lags te/ rlom sems kyi rang bzhin gyis/ rlom sems ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad rlom
97b2(mdo sde): sems ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rlom sems rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
97b3(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni yod pa ma mchis pa lags te/ yod pa rnam par dag pa
97b4(mdo sde): lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yod pa'i rang de bzhin las/ gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ yo dad pa'i rang bzhin las yod pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ yod
97b5(mdo sde): pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ yod pa ma mchis pa lags te/ yodapa'i rang bzhin gyis yod pa ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad yod pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan
97b6(mdo sde): 'das kyis yod pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das
97b7(mdo sde): kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni ming ma mchis pa lags te/ ming rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming gi rang bzhin las
97b8(mdo sde): gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ ming gi rang bzhin las ming ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ ming gi rang bzhin nyid/ ming ma mchis pa lags te/ ming gi rang bzhin gyis ming ma mchis pa
98a1(mdo sde): shes pa des/ chos thams cad ming ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ming rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub
98a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni bdag
98a3(mdo sde): ma mchis pa lags te/ bdag rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bdag gi rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ bdag gi rang bzhin las/ 
98a4(mdo sde): bdag ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin gzhan ma lags kyi/ bdag gi rang bzhin nyid bdag ma mchis pa lags te/ bdag gi rang bzhin gyis/ bdag ma mchis pa shes pa des/ 
98a5(mdo sde): chos thams cad bdag ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom lda na 'das kyis bdag rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na
98a6(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba ma mchis pa lags
98a7(mdo sde): te/ rgyu dang rgyan gyi bya ba rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba'i rang bzhin las/ rgyu dang rkyen
98a8(mdo sde): gyi bya ba ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba'i rang bzhin nyid/ rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba ma mchis pa lags te/ rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba ma mchi/ 
98b1(mdo sde): pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyu dang rkyen gyi bya ba rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub
98b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni 'dres pa
98b3(mdo sde): ma mchis pa lags te/ 'dres pa rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'dres pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ 'dres pa'i rang bzhin las/ 'dres pa ma
98b4(mdo sde): mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ 'dres pa'i rang bzhin nyid 'a dris pa ma mchis pa lags te/ 'dres pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ 'dres pa ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos
98b5(mdo sde): thams cad 'dres pa ma mchis lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dres pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi sku bas la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na
98b6(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das
98b7(mdo sde): kyis chos thams cad ni yi ge ma mchis pa lags te/ yi ge rnam par dag pa lags so// da ci'i slad du zhe na/ yi ge'i rang bzhin las/ gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ yi ge
98b8(mdo sde): rang bzhin las/ yi ge ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi/ yi ge'i rang bzhin nyid/ yi ge ma mchis pa lags te/ yi ge'i rang bzhin gyis/ yi ge ma mchis pa shes pa des/ chos
99a1(mdo sde): thams cad yi ge ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi yi ge rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa'
99a2(mdo sde): gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni nga rgyal
99a3(mdo sde): med pa ma mchis pa lags te/ nga rgyal med pa rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ nga rgyal med pa'i rang bzhin las/ gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ nga rgyal med
99a4(mdo sde): pa'i rang bzhin las/ nga rgyal med pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi nga rgyal med pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ nga rgyal dam mchis pa lags te/ nga rgyal med pa'i rang bzhin gyis
99a5(mdo sde): nga rgyal med pa ma mchis pa shes pa des chos thams/ cad nga rgyal med pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nga rgyal med pa rnam par gzhag pa'i byin
99a6(mdo sde): gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar
99a7(mdo sde): gsol/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa ma lags te/ yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par dag pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ yul bas
99a8(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin las/ gzhan ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin las/ yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa ma mchis pa gzhan ma lags kyi// yul
99b1(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ yul bsam gyis khyab pa lags te/ yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa ma mchis pa shes pa des// chos
99b2(mdo sde): thams cad yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa ma mchis pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag tu yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam
99b3(mdo sde): par gzhag pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor
99b4(mdo sde): 'dir bsdu ba gsol/ de bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi sgor da 'jug pa grangs med pa dag la phan tshun gnye na por gyur pa 'dres pa'i tshul dag gis 'jug par bya'o// 
99b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khamasakun nas nyon mongs pa can dag tu thabs rnam pa sna tsheg sa la mkhas pa'i tshul gyis mtshams sbyor ba'i 'jig rten
99b6(mdo sde): gyi spyod pa rnams dang / ye shes dang / gzigs pa dang / khams dang / rgyu dang / dmigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / gdags pa dang / rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi
99b7(mdo sde): rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor bas sems can rgya mtsho ji snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu smin par mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang lags pa de dag/ bcom
99b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dir bsdu bar gsol/ de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud de phyogs bcu'i byang chub
100a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi mthong bar 'dod pa mkhyen nas/ bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag bsdu bar bya ba'i
100a2(mdo sde): phyir/ zhabs gnyis kyi mthil nas 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs
100a3(mdo sde): med pa snyed phyung ngo // de bzhin du zhabs kyi sor mo'i tshigs re re dngade bzhin du rje ngar gnyis dang / de bzhin du pus mo'i lha nga gnyis dang / de bzhin/ 
100a4(mdo sde): du brla gnyis dang / de bzhin du sta zur dang / de ba bzhin du rtsi ba logs gnyis dang / de bzhin du lte ba khung dang / de bzhin du phrag pa gnyis dang / de bzhin du dpung
100a5(mdo sde): mgo gnyis dang / de bzhin du dpung pa gnyis dang / de/ bzhin du lag mthil gnyis dang / de bzhin du phyag sor/ gyi tshigs re re dang / de bzhin du gtsug tor dang / de
100a6(mdo sde): bzhin du mdzod spu dang / de bzhin du dbu'i sgra nyag ma re re dang / de bzhin du mtshan re re dang / de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po re re dang / de bzhin du spu'i khung bu re re nas/ 'od zer
100a7(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed phyung ste/ shar phyogs su 'bros so// 
100a8(mdo sde): de las 'od zer gcig gis kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho snang ba chen/ 
100b1(mdo sde): pos khyab par gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang 'od zer gcig gis khyab pa de gnyis kyis khyab par mi byed do// shar phyogs ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lho dang / nub
100b2(mdo sde): dang / byang dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi mtshams dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi mtshams dang / de bzhin du
100b3(mdo sde): steng dang / 'og gi phyogasu yang 'od zer rgya mtsho de dag thams cad 'phros so// de las 'od zer gcig gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab
100b4(mdo sde): kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jigarten gyi khams rgya mtsho snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur te/ gang gcig gis khyab pa de gnyis kyis khyab par mi byed do// 
100b5(mdo sde): yang de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'od zer de dag gis snang bar byas pa gang yin pa de dgalas/ 'jig rten gyi khams re re nas byang chub
100b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lhags so// byang chub sems
100b7(mdo sde): dpa' re re'i 'khor kyang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ga'i klung lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lhags na// 'khor
100b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lta ci smos// 'khor byang chub sems dpa'
101a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra ra kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ga khrag khrigazungs med pa sbed su'i sdos/ 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing ba'i
101a2(mdo sde): rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum gyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams
101a3(mdo sde): steng gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams nyi shu rtsa lnga'i rdul
101a4(mdo sde): phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos 'khor 'jig rten dgyi khams bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci
101a5(mdo sde): smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi rdul phra/ rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gang ga'i klung brgya'i bye ma snyed lta ci smos 'khor gang gA'i klung
101a6(mdo sde): lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gang ga'i klung nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bye ma snyed lta ci smos 'khor gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed lta ci smos 'khor gang ga'i klung lnga'i bye ma
101a7(mdo sde): snyed lta ci smos 'khor gang ga'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed lta ci smos 'khor gang ga'i klung gi bye ma'i bzhi cha snyed lta ci smos 'khor gang gi'i klung gi bye ma'i brgyad
101a8(mdo sde): cha snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gang ga'i klung gi bye ma'i bcu drug cha snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor gang ga'i klung gi bya ma'i cha nyi shu snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag brgya lta ci smos 'khor bya
101b1(mdo sde): ba brag lnga bcu lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga lnga ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag bcu lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag lnga lta ci smos/ 'khor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
101b2(mdo sde): chen po bya ba gcig lta ci smos te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re
101b3(mdo sde): res kyang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa brjod pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyi tshar gyis chags pa med cing
101b4(mdo sde): sgrib pa med la ma 'dres pa'i nam mkha' khyab par phab nas / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re res
101b5(mdo sde): kyang nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin ye shes kyi tshogs rgyu mtsho grangs med pa brjod pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyis/ de bzhin gshegs
101b6(mdo sde): pa la gtor cing mngon par gtor to// gtor cing mngon par gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan grangs med par bskor ba byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// shar
101b7(mdo sde): phyogs ji lta ba de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs su yang de dang 'dra'o// shar lho'i mtshams su yang de dang 'dra'o// lho nub kyi mtshams su yang de dang 'dra'o// nub byang
101b8(mdo sde): gi mtshams su yang de dang 'dra'o// byang shar gyi mtshams su yang de dang 'dra'o// stang du yang de dang 'dra'o// 'og gi phyogs su yang de 'dra ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang dag 'od
102a1(mdo sde): zer de dag gis snang bar byas pa de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye
102a2(mdo sde): ma snyed kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lhags so// byang chub sems dpa' re re yang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ga'i klung
102a3(mdo sde): lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bya ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyis bskor na/ 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khwa khrig brjod du
102a4(mdo sde): med pa snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams pa rgya'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci
102a5(mdo sde): smos 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams nyi shu rtsa lnga'i/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos// 'khor
102a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed lta ci smos/ 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi rdul snyed lta ci smos 'khor gang ga'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed kyi bar du lta ci smos
102a7(mdo sde): 'khor bye ba phrag brgya lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga lta ci smos 'khor bye ba phrag bcu lta ci smos/ 'khor bye ba phrag lnga lta ci smos 'khor
102a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ba gcig lta ci smos te/ byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa brjod pa stong gsum
102b1(mdo sde): kyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyi char gyis chags pa med kyang / sgrib pa med la/ ma 'dres pa'i rnam mkha' khyab par 'banas bcom ldan 'das ga la 'de dong ste lhags nas/ bya chub
102b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' re res kyanganor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin sa rgya mtsho grangs med pa brjod pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs
102b3(mdo sde): pa la gtor cing mngon par gtor to// gtor cing mngon par gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan grangs med par bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs
102b4(mdo sde): gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe phyogs bcu ga dan gyi phyogs che re rer 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho/ ga dga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag phye
102b5(mdo sde): ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la sa 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i rdul phra rab kyi rdu la re re la byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi
102b6(mdo sde): khams rgya mtsho'i gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed gnas par gyur te/ 'on kyang sems can su la yang gnod pa 'am sgrib pa med do// 
102b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rnams dang / gling rnams dang / lhun po dang / lhun po chen po dang / btang zung dang / btang bzung chen po dang / gangs dang / gangs
102b8(mdo sde): chen po dang / khor yug dang / khor lug chen po rnams dang / rgya mtsho dang / rgya mtsho chen po rnams dang / lha'i gnas rnams dang / klung dang / mtsho bran dang / mtshe'u
103a1(mdo sde): rnams dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang rnams la yang gnod pa 'am
103a2(mdo sde): sgrib pa med do// sngon ji lta ba de bzhin du phyis kyang bya ba la 'jug par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang / bsam pa ji lta ba dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba de bzhin du/ 
103a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du zhugs par mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i 'khor dang / byang
103a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' kha gcig 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom da ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun na sa nyon mongs pa can dag tu thabs rnam pa sna tshogs la mkhas
