103a5(mdo sde): pa'i tshul gyis mtshams sbyor ba'i 'jig rten gyi spyod pa rnams da/ nga/ ye shes dang / gzigs pa dang / khams dang / rgyu dang / dmigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang
103a6(mdo sde): gdags pa dang / rnam par gzhag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs la sbyor ba dag gis sems can gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par mdzad pa dag ci thams cad
103a7(mdo sde): 'khor 'dir 'dus sam/ 'on te gzhan yang dag par ma 'dus pa dag kyang yod dam/ zhi gu snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi
103a8(mdo sde): sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la bka' stsal pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dper na/ nyan thos chen po
103b1(mdo sde): rgya mtsho rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa la rnam par rtse ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig
103b2(mdo sde): grangs med pa snyed yod par gyur la/ nyan thos chen po de dag re res kyang / se gol gtogs pa re rel sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i
103b3(mdo sde): bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed bskyed de/ nyan thos chen po re res kyang / sems bskyed pa re res gom pa 'dor ba rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten
103b4(mdo sde): gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed song la / gom pa re re bor bas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang
103b5(mdo sde): ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phragabye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'da' bar byed do// 'jig rten gyi khams
103b6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho gang du nyan thos chen po gcig 'gro ba der gnyis mi 'gro ba de lta bu'i tshul gyis bskal pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul
103b7(mdo sde): 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed du 'gro bar byed de/ shar phyogs ji lta ba de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams dang / de bzhin
103b8(mdo sde): du lho nub kyi mtshams dang / de bzhin du nub byang gi mtshams dang / de bzhin du byang shar gyi mtshams phyogs su song zhing / nyan thos chen po gcig gang du song ba der/ gnyis mi 'gro
104a1(mdo sde): la/ de nas si la lazhig gis/ 'jig rten gyi 'ams rgya mtshod dag thams cad grong khye gcig tu byas la/ phrad pa'i rtse gro thun pa rdzu
104a2(mdo sde): bskor te/ lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyur cing / rdo dang gseg ma dang / gyo mo med par byas nas/ byams bkang ste/ byung bur byas la/ de nas mi des bye ma'i phreng
104a3(mdo sde): khyer de nas/ bya ma 'bru re ra nas blangs la/ grong khyer de'i nang gi bye ma'i 'bru ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi char gsas te/ brtse ba'i thabs 'dis bye ma'i 'bru de dag thams cad char gsas la/ de nas mi de
104a4(mdo sde): bye ma'i 'bru char gses pa de dag thams cad shar phyogs su khyer te/ bye ma'i 'bru char gsas pa de dag ji snyed pa dede snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'das shing / bye ma'i
104a5(mdo sde): 'bru char gsas pa gcig bor te/ brtsi ba'i thabs 'dis bye ma'i 'bru char gsas pa de dag thams cad bor te/ shar phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du lho dang / de bzhin du
104a6(mdo sde): nub dang / de bzhin du byang dang / de bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams dang / de bzhin du lho nub kyi mtshams dang de bzhin du nub byang gi mtshams dang / de bzhin du byang
104a7(mdo sde): shar gyi mtshams su bor la/ de nas mi des 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang dag tu bye ma'i 'bru char gsas pa de dag bor ba dang / gang dag tu ma bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag thams
104a8(mdo sde): cad grong khyer gcig tu byas la/ srid pa'i rtse mor thug par rabs kun nas bskor te/ lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyur cing / rdo dang gseg ma dang / gyo mo med
104b1(mdo sde): par byas nas/ byems bkang ste byung bur byas la/ nga'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'dir 'dus pa 'di dag ni bye ma'i grong khyer de las bye ma'i 'brugacig tsam du zad do// rbe
104b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'dir ma 'dus pa ni/ grong khyer de'i nang gi bye ma lhag ma ji snyed pa tsam mo// de'i lhag ma'i bye ma snyed kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
104b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyang ming 'thun la/ rus gcig pa sha stag yin na/ ming tha dad pa dang / rus tha dad pa lta ci smos/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i
104b4(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i kha dog yongs su grub pa mtha' yas pa la sgrub pa'i gzungs theb pa da dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa du mar sangs rgyas
104b5(mdo sde): 'byung ba ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas/ nyon mongs pa can yongs su sbyong ba dang / sems can gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa yong su smin par byed pa'i khyu
104b6(mdo sde): mchog tu gyur pa dang ldan pa sha stag go// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi nang nas/ kha cig gi sems can
104b7(mdo sde): yongs su smin par byed pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa mthong na ci ma rung snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khor de'i nang du bsdu ba dang / de dag
104b8(mdo sde): gi sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa bstan pa'i phyir/ se gol gyi sgra mdzad do// de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang dag nas/ byang chub sems
105a1(mdo sde): dpa' de dag 'khor der 'dus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag gi mdab kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang yin pa de dag gi ches pha rol 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mcho gang
105a2(mdo sde): ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa skyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rnams 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ gtso
105a3(mdo sde): rab tu g.yo// kun tu rab tu g.yo/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ chem chem rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu cham chem/ 'khrug rab tu 'khrug/ kun
105a4(mdo sde): tu rab tu 'khrug/ bur 'ur/ rab tu bur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshon 'jig rten gyi khams re re na/ shar phyogs dma' na
105a5(mdo sde): nub phyogs mtho/ nub phyogs dma' na shar phyon/ sa mtho/ lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho/ byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/ byang shar mtshams
105a6(mdo sde): kyi phyogs dma' na/ lho nub mtshams kyi phyogs mtho/ lho nub mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na/ byang shar mtshams kyi phyogs mtho/ shar lho mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na/ 
105a7(mdo sde): nub byang mtshams kyi phyogs mtho/ nub byang mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na/ shar lho mtshams kyi phyogs mtho/ mtha' dma' na dbus mtho/ dbus dma' na mtha' mtho ste
105a8(mdo sde): shar phyogs ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lho phyogs kyang de dang 'dra'o// nub phyogs kyang de dang 'dra'o// byang phyogs kyang de dang 'dra'o// shar lce'i mtshams dang / lho nub kyi mtsha/ 
105b1(mdo sde): dang / nub byang gi mtshams dang / byang shar gyi mtshams kyang de dang 'dra'o// sted dang pog gi phyogs kyang de dang 'dro'o// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mche 'jig rten gyi khams grangs/ 
105b2(mdo sde): nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khor der 'dus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dag gi mdab kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchotsho gang yin pa de dag gi pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol 'jig rten gyi
105b3(mdo sde): khams rgya mtsho gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'dul
105b4(mdo sde): g.yo rab tu ga yo/ kun tu rab tu gso/ sngagapa tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu lde// che mches/ rab tu dechemaches/ kun tu rab tu che mchim/ 'jug rab tu 'jug/ 
105b5(mdo sde): kun tu rab tu 'khrug/ phur zung / rab tu bung zung / kun tu rab tu bur bur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'angag rten gyi khams re re yang shar phyogs dma'an nus
105b6(mdo sde): phyogs mtho/ nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho/ lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho/ byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/ byang shar mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na/ 
105b7(mdo sde): nub mtshams kyi phyogs mtho/ lho nub mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na/ byang shar mtshams kyi phyogs mtho/ shar lho mtshams kyi phyogs dma' na/ nu
105b8(mdo sde): mtshams kyi phyogs mtho/ nub byang mtshams kyi phyogs dam na/ shar lho mtshams kyi phyogs mtho/ mtha' dma' na dbus mtho/ dngus dma' na mtha' mtho bar gyur to// yang rdo rje
106a1(mdo sde): / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi kun nas phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag
106a2(mdo sde): khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re re nas/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i rdul phra
106a3(mdo sde): rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gnas par gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi stegs bu rin po ches spras pas ni bskor/ rin
106a4(mdo sde): po che'i tshang tsong gis ni mdzes par byas/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ni bsgreng / dril dbu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i bla ri ni bresatsan+dan sbrul gyi snying pos
106a5(mdo sde): ni byugs nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i dra bas ni bkab/ rin po che 'thon kha chen po ni mig mangs ris su bris/ nor bu rin po che'i dra ba'i phyogs re re nas kyang mu tig rgyan phreng kha
106a6(mdo sde): dog sna tshogs pa/ kha dog du ma dang ldan pa/ 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag 'phyang ngo // rin po che'i rgyan 'phreng kha dog sna tshogs pa/ kha dog du ma dang ldan
106a7(mdo sde): ba 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med grangs med pa dag 'phyang ngo // dar gyi lnga ldi kha'o/ sna tshogs pa kha dog du ma dang ldan pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med grangs med pa dag 'phyang ngo // ras
106a8(mdo sde): kyi lnga ldi kha dog sna tshogs la kha dog dum dang ldan pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med grangs med pa dag 'phyang ngo // dar gyi chun kor kha dog sna tshogs pa
106b1(mdo sde): kha dog du ma dang ldan pa/ 'bum phrag bye ga khrag khrig grangs med pa dag 'byung ngo // dril bu ga yer ka'i drag kha dog sna tshogs pa/ kha dog dum dang ldan pa 'bum phrag byeg khrag khrig dpag tu med grangs
106b2(mdo sde): med pa dag 'phyang ngo // rin po che'i rgyan 'phreng dang / mu tig gi rgyan 'phrang de dag la/ rlung gis phog na yang lha'i sgra yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ste/ rin po che'i rgyan 'phrang dang / mu tig gi
106b3(mdo sde): rgyan 'phreng rlung gis phog pa de dag las lha'i sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba de lta bu ni sil snyan gyi yan lag dpe med pa 'bum phrag bye ba rdung ba'i slob dpon gyis brdungs pa las kyang / de lta
106b4(mdo sde): bu'i sgra snyan par mi 'byung ngo // dril bu g.yer ka'i 'phra dang ba rlung gis phog pa de dag las lha yul ba'i sgra yid/ du 'ong zhing zab pa 'byung ba de lta bu ni/ gser gyi snod 'dzam
106b5(mdo sde): bu'i gling gi tshad tsam brdungs pa las kyang de lta bu'i sgra zad cing yid du 'ong ba mi 'byung ngo // mig ma sa ris re re la yang rin po che'i shing ljon pa re re yod de// rin
106b6(mdo sde): bo che'i stegs bus ni bskor/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rin po che'i phreng bas ni mdzes par byas/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan ni bsgreng / rin po
106b7(mdo sde): che'i rgyan phreng gi rgyan dpag tu med grangs pas ni brgyan mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pas kyang brgyan to// ras kyi lnga ldi'i rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pa
106b8(mdo sde): dang me tog gi lda ldi'i rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pa dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pas kyang brgyan to// rin po che'i shing ljon pa re ra'i drung na yang rin po
107a1(mdo sde): seng ge'i khri 'phang dag tshad lnga brgya pa yod de/ rin po che'i stegs bus ni bskor/ nor bu dang mu tig dang / rin po che'i 'phreng bas ni mdzes par byas/ 
107a2(mdo sde): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ni sgreng / dril bu g.yar ka'i dra ba'i bla res ni bras tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying pos ni byugs/ me tog man da ra ba dang / mnad rab chen po
107a3(mdo sde): dang / man 'dzu sha ka dang / man 'dzu sha ka chen po dang / mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / 'khor lo dang / 'khor lo chen po dang / sna ma dang / bar shika/ 
107a4(mdo sde): dang / ta ru ni dang / bal li dang / go tar ni dang / rab tu dri zhim pa dang / da ni ska ri dang / lha'i sna ma dang / ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po
107a5(mdo sde): dang / me tog chen po rnams ni bkram/ nor bu rin po che chen po kla ga gi sgron ma'i rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pa dang / nor bu rin po che gnyi zla'i sgron ma'i rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan
107a6(mdo sde): dpag tu med grangs med pa dang / nor bu rin po che snang ba thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dpag tu med grangs med pa dang / nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i rgyan 'brang gi rgyan dpag tu med grangs
107a7(mdo sde): med pa dang / nor bu rin po che za can gyi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che seng ge'i ze ba can gyi rgyan 'brang gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che sang ga rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan 'brang gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin
107a8(mdo sde): po che brgya byin thogs pa'i rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che lha thams cad kyi 'od rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i 'od kyi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po cha pad+ma ral gyi rgyan 'phreng / 
107b1(mdo sde): gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che chu 'dag gi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Ya'i rgyan 'breng gi rgyan dang / nor bu rin po tshe an+da snyil gyi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// nor bu
107b2(mdo sde): rin po che rje'i snying po'i rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// nor bu rin po tshe dpal gyi snying po'i rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// nor bu rin po che mdzes bkod kyi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan
107b3(mdo sde): gyis kyang brgyan to// mu tig dkar po'i rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan gyis rgyan to// mu tig mthon ka'i rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// mu tig ser po'i rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// mu
107b4(mdo sde): tig dmar po'i rgyan 'breng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// mu tig gsar mdog gi rgyan 'phreng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan to// / mu tig nam mkha' 'dog gi rgyan 'breng gi rgyan gyis kyang brgyan
107b5(mdo sde): to// mu tig gi 'bru'i nges re re dang / rin po che'i bru'i ngos re re nas kyang / sems kyi skad cig rere la 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa
107b6(mdo sde): dang / mtshungs pa med pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / tshad med pa dag byung ngo // de la 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni bsod nams kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan
107b7(mdo sde): pa brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mche'i sprin kha cig las ni/ ye shes kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtshor
107b8(mdo sde): sprin kha cig las ni pha rol tu phyin pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni sa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i
108a1(mdo sde): khyad par bstan pa brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni gzungs tha dad pa/ rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa
108a2(mdo sde): dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni rnam par thar pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni// so
108a3(mdo sde): so yang dag par rig pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni/ mngon par shes pa tha dad pa
108a4(mdo sde): rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa dag byu/ dang ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni sgo da lam tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod
108a5(mdo sde): pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa tha dad pa'i rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer
108a6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni/ dbugs 'byin pa 'thob pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni byang chub
108a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa
108a8(mdo sde): tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa dag byung ngo // 'od zer rgya mtsho'i sprin kha cig las ni sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa tha dad pargya
108b1(mdo sde): congs med pa'i byang bar bstan pa rjod pa dag byung // 'od per rnamatsho blan pacig las ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams la 'dug pa za brgya ma cho grangs med pa'i byud par bstan
108b2(mdo sde): brjod pa dag byungango // 'od ba rnam ma smin lacig las ni brgal pa la 'jug pa pa dang pargyam che grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa gabyung / yang dro'i che shar byegs
108b3(mdo sde): kyi 'dzig rten gyi khams rgyar mo gang yin pa de dag 'dul/ rab tu 'phrul/ kun du rab tu 'gul/ gso rab tug so// kun tu rabatug so// ldeg rab tu ldeg/ 
108b4(mdo sde): turab tu/ ma/ rab sa/  ba kyi mchis/ 'brug/ rab tu lan+d+ha kun tu tu 'jun/ thab / @
108b5(mdo sde): zung kun tu rabatur gyur ro// de nas 'dzig na gyi khams rgya mtshod dag las/ 'jig rten gyi khams re nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dzig
108b6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lpags so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
108b7(mdo sde): re re'i 'khor yang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mcho gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed lhags so// byang
108b8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' re res kyang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa brjod pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyi char gyis chags pa med cing sgrib pa med/ 
109a1(mdo sde): lam 'dres pa'i nam mkha' khyab par byas nas bcom ldan 'das gal der dong ste lhags na/ byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang / lha'i nor bu rin
109a2(mdo sde): po che'i rgyal po'i sprin ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i brjod pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyis/ chags pa med cing sgrib pa med la ma 'dres pa'i na mkha' khyab par byas te/ de bzhin
109a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa la gtor cing mngon par gtor la/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// gtor cing mngon par gtor la/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
109a4(mdo sde): bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan grangs med par bskor ba byas nas/ rang rang gi smon lam las byung ba'i seng ge'i dri da la 'khod do// shar phyogs ji lta ba de bzhin du lho dang
109a5(mdo sde): nub dang / byang dang / shar lce'i mtshams dang / lho nub kyi mtshams dang / nub byang gi mtshams dang / byangashar gyi mtshams dang / steng dang / reg gi phyogs
109a6(mdo sde): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang yin pa de dag kyang 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yo rab tu g.yo/ kun tu rab tu g.yo/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun
109a7(mdo sde): tu rab tu ldeg/ chemachem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chemachem/ 'khrug rab tu 'khrug/ kun tu rab tu 'khrug/ bur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur bung ngo // 
109a8(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams de dag re re nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed
109b1(mdo sde): lhags so// byang chub sems dpa' re re'i 'khor yang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mcho ga ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma skyed kyi rdul phrarab kyi rdum/ 
109b2(mdo sde): 'bum drag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med bsnyed lhags so// byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sprin rnam pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa brjod pa/ stong
109b3(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad ci kyi char gyis chags pa med cing sgrib pa med la/ ma 'dres pa'i nam mkha' khyab par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ lhags nas/ 
109b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' re ras kyang nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i sgra na so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa brjod pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i tshad tsam gyis
109b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la gtor cing / mngon par gtor la/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// gtor cing mdza na bar gtor la/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas/ 
109b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan grangs med par bskor ba byas nas/ rang rang gi smon lam las 'byung ba'i seng ge'i khri la 'khod do// yang de'i tshe bcom
109b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor dang / mdzod spu dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po re re dang / sru'i khung bu re re nas 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ga'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab
109b8(mdo sde): kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul lha shin tu nyung gi de bas ches mang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dag byung ste/ de dag thams cad
110a1(mdo sde): kyang lus 'jam bu chu bo'i gser gyi mdog can gzi brjid nyi ma 'bum phrag phra'i bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pabs lhag pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i tingang / 
110a2(mdo sde): 'dzin la rnam par rtse ba sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog yongs su grub pa mtha' yas pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs thob pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs
110a3(mdo sde): rgyas mi bzhugs pa dag tu sangs rgyas 'byung ba ston pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can yongs su sbyong ba/ pad+ma'i stan la 'khod pa sha stag go// pad+ma re re yang rin po che
110a4(mdo sde): thams cad kyis smras pa/ sdong bu rnam pas tshogs pa/ nor bu rin po che'i ze ba can gas dar gyi mdab ma bkod pa shin tu rgyas pa'i gzugs can 'dzam bu chu
110a5(mdo sde): bo'i gser gyi snying po dang ldan pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'ja ra sna tshogs kyis/ phyogs thams cad kyi sprin sna nga bar byed pa/ kun nas 'od zer bkod pa/ sangs
110a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi yul mtha' yas pa'i gsung brjod pa'i 'od zer/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rin po che'i phreng ba rab tu 'gyed pas mdzes par byas shing / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bad
110a7(mdo sde): bsgreng ba sha sdug go// de nas byang chub sems dang 'de dag gis 'od zer rgya mtsho 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa btang nas pad+ma dag las babs te/ 
110a8(mdo sde): gdugs kyi sprin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi smin dang / bdan gyi sprin dang / me tog gi sprin dang / sbos kyi sprin dang / rin ma cha'i sprin dang / rol mo'i sprin dang / rgyan gyi smin dang
110b1(mdo sde): seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i sprin dang / lha'i sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs kyi sgra'i sprin chags pa med cing bsgrib pa med la ma 'dres pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i
110b2(mdo sde): tshad tsam gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la gtor cing mngon par gtor la/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// gtor cing mngon par gtor la/ mngon par rab tu gtor
110b3(mdo sde): nas lan grangs med par bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan grangs med par bskor ba byas te/ rang rang gi pad+ma'i stan la
110b4(mdo sde): 'khod do// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag de bzhin gshe gas pa'i sku'i nang du chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho da'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag nas byung ba de dag thams cad kyang / 
110b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rje/ gas pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas pa sha sta/ ga go// de nas 'khor de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ de bani/ 
110b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sku'i nang du chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ bdag cag gis mthong na ci ma rung snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
110b7(mdo sde): de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ gtsug tor nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nang du chud pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'khri'od cing gras med pa
110b8(mdo sde): dag byung ste/ des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad snang ba chen pos khyad par byas nas/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por byas so// 
111a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyang bstan te/ sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa/ yongs su smin pa par byas nas yang phyir log ste/ 
111a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las/ lan grangs med par bskor bar byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lus la phog par gyur to// / 
111a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lus la 'od zer des phog ma thag tu yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu dang / btsug tor dang / mtshan dang
111a4(mdo sde): dpe byad bzang po re re dang / spu'i khung bu re re la 'jig rten gyi dmas rgya mtsho gang gi'i klung lnga bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi
111a5(mdo sde): rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul lta shin tu nyung gi/ de bas ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams
111a6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho dag na mes 'jig pa dang / chus 'jig pa dang / rlung gis 'jig pa dag mthong ste/ dper na 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba
111a7(mdo sde): khrag khrig grangs med pa kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho srid pi'i rtse mor thugs par rabs bskor te/ rdo dang gseg ma dang / gyo mo med cing lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur nas/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul
111a8(mdo sde): gyis gang ba la/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang gang tu mes 'jig pa dang / chus 'jig pa dang / rlung gis 'jig par mthong ba de dag ni/ ra ba de'i nang gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig lta bur baH/ 
111b1(mdo sde): ma sem sanin rdza sas su so las thab bayin no// 'dzi shin nas rgyamatshal lazhin na pa'i TIg gi srin sa las grub pa yinano// 'dzin rten gyi la
111b2(mdo sde): chol man/ ni ga pa tshwa'i smon pa las grub pa 'is no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgyamatshal lan no rin pa che snang bathams cad 'jam pa la
111b3(mdo sde): rdu dzin/ 'a na khams na na pa med rgyal ba las zu na/ 'jig gyi khams rgyam tshal man/ 
111b4(mdo sde): na sa grub pa san/ na gyi khams rgya mchelas ni/ napache po'i b.las rtsug pa pan//

111b6(mdo sde): /  mas rgya tshalam na/ na na pa ma sa kyi dulas chub ba sten/ dzim rten gyi ngas rgya la na/

112a1(mdo sde): khams rgya mtshol la ni/ nor bu rin po tshe chu 'dag las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu
112a2(mdo sde): rin po che las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Ya las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni
112a3(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che an da snyil las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po las grub pa yin no// 'jig
112a4(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni/ nor bu rin po che rjeHsnying po las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten pa mas rgya mtshol la ni/ nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po
112a5(mdo sde): las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni/ nor bu rin po che mdzes bkod las rmu/ ba pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni
112a6(mdo sde): mu tig dkar po las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni/ mu tig gser mdog las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni
112a7(mdo sde): mu tig nam mkha' mdog las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol lnga ni/ ner bu rin po che bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las
112a8(mdo sde): grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshal lani/ nor bu rin po che ye shes kyi tshogs rgyam mo grangs med pa'i byad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub payin no// 'jig
112b1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni/ nor bu rin po che pha rol tu phyin pa rgyamatsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni/ nor bu'i dpo
112b2(mdo sde): ches rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa
112b3(mdo sde): brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 
112b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par ba dastan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig
112b5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni nor bu rin po che mngon pa/ ra shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjodapa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
112b6(mdo sde): mtshe la la ni/ nor bu rin po che smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni// nor
112b7(mdo sde): bu rin po che brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che dbugs
112b8(mdo sde): 'byin 'thob pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni/ nor bu rin po che byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pargya
113a1(mdo sde): mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshal la nI/ nor bu rin po che bzhin gshegs pa
113a2(mdo sde): la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni/ nor bu rin po po che sems can gyi bsam pa dang / 
113a3(mdo sde): spyod pal 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni/ nor bu rin po che 'jig rten gyi khams 'jug pa rgya
113a4(mdo sde): grangs med pa'i khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni/ nor bu darin bu rin po che bskul ba la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i
113a5(mdo sde): khyad par bstan pa brjod pa las grub pa yin no// 'chi/ rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la ni/ 'jig rten gyi mas kyi rdul phra mo re re la zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa
113a6(mdo sde): shing thams cad kyi sbrul snyed du sna tshogs su gnas pa dag snang ngo // zhing re ren yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag snang bar gyur te/ zhing thams cad kyi
113a7(mdo sde): rdul snyed kyi 'deg du gnas pa dag snang ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang da/ 
113a8(mdo sde): gis byang chub tu sems skyed du bcug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa slob tu bcug pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang sdang bar gyur to// sangs rgyas bcom
113b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das de dag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ byang chub tu sems skyed du bcug pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang yin pa de dag kyang snang ngo // de bzhin du
113b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa phyi mi'i mthar thug pa'i bar du bstan kyang / sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de dag gi mtha' bstan par mi nus so// sangs
113b3(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das re re la yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag snang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
113b4(mdo sde): pa rgya mtsho rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa gang yin pa de dag kyang thos/ so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa yang snang ngo // de dag gi byang chub
113b5(mdo sde): sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dag kyang snang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byang chub kyi spyod pargya mtsho rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa gang yin pa de dag kyang
113b6(mdo sde): thos so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dag kyang snang ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re re'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
113b7(mdo sde): kyi dkyil 'khor dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag kyang snang ngo // de dag gi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa de dag kyang snang zhing thos so// 
113b8(mdo sde): de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yang bskal pa rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar du
114a1(mdo sde): bstan kyang mthar phyin par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sru dang ye shes chags pa med pa bsres pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
114a2(mdo sde): 'khor de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpag ga chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ mos par byed cing 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / 'don tu
114a3(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang / mar me dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
114a4(mdo sde): dang / ba dan la sogs pas mchod pa de dag gi bas da nams ji snyed cig 'phel bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam dmo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
114a5(mdo sde): de dag gi sems kyis yongasu rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen na sa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang ga'i klung lnga
114a6(mdo sde): bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul lta shin tu nyung gi/ de bas ches mang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
114a7(mdo sde): rgya mtsho dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa lnga las byung ba/ bskal pa dpag tu med grangs med pa'i bar du bskyed pa yang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpas tha na dud
114a8(mdo sde): 'gre'i skye gnas su gyur pa la zan chang gcig tsam yongs su btang bas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa lnga las byung ba de zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro// 'jam
114b1(mdo sde): dpal dper na/ zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes bco lnga'i nam phyed kyi dus na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis 'di ltar mtho ba dang mtshungs pa med pa dang / che bas skar ma'i 'khor thams cad zil gyis gnon te/ lham
114b2(mdo sde): me lhan ne/ lhang nger 'dug go// 'jam dpal de bzhin du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba mtho ba dang mtshungs pa med pa dang / ches
114b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa lnga las byung ba rnams zil gyis gnon te/ lham me ldan ne/ lhang nger 'dug go// 'jam
114b4(mdo sde): dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la las/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtog/ sa pa'i sems can thams cad dbyug pas bsnun tam// mtshon
114b5(mdo sde): gyis btab ste/ bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas 'jam dpal byang chub sems dang / 'a gzhan zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' la gnod sems dang
114b6(mdo sde): tha ba dang / khro ba'i sems bskyed de/ brnyas pa'i sems kyang bskyed na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa mang po 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang
114b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' la gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / khro ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / bsnyas pa'i sems bskyed pas ni/ chos kyis phongs par gyur pa'i las byas
114b8(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/ chos ma yin pa yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// chos ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi gdung gcod par byed pa yin no// sangs rgyas rnams ma
115a1(mdo sde): thung na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i ngas rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab 'bral ba rnams dang / 
115a2(mdo sde): dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams dang / bdud kyi ris rnams kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang // 
115a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyong thams cad kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// zla ba dang nyi ma thams cad kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba dang / stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba rnams
115a4(mdo sde): kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// mi'i 'jig rten yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na// de dag thams cad ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang phrad pa las
115a5(mdo sde): 'byung la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ byang chub sems dpa' las 'byung ba'i phyir ro// de bas na sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod par 'dod pas ni/ 
115a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa byas na/ sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'
115a7(mdo sde): rnams la bskur bsti byas na/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bkur bsti byas par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
115a8(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed la/ lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang / lha'i na bza' phul te/ sbyin pa de lta bu bskal pa rgya mtsho gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi
115b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul snyed kyi bar du dul la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan nig gis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' la dmigs pa gang yang rung bzhig gis/ byang chub tu sems bskyed
115b2(mdo sde): de/ bdug pa las dmigs pa 'am/ mar me las dmigs pa 'am/ me togs las dmigs pa'am/ spos las dmigs pa 'am/ gzhan gang yang rung ba zhig las dmigs
115b3(mdo sde): te/ byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ 'di ni de bas ches grangs med par bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur na/ gzhan skyed du 'jug pa gang yin pa dag lta ci smos te/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams
115b4(mdo sde): ches grangs med par skyed par 'gyur ro// snga ma des ni bso danams mngon par 'du byed pa 'di'i brgya'i char yang mi ma da/ stong gi char yang mi bod/ 'bum gyi char yang mi
115b5(mdo sde): bod/ bye ba'i char mi bod/ bye ba brgya'i char yang mi bod/ bye ba stong gi char yang mi bod/ bye ba 'bum gyi charayang mi bod de/ depe dang rgyur yang mi zod do// 'jam
115b6(mdo sde): dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la las/ sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig ni stong pa nyid la mos par gyur na/ 'di ni dbas ches
115b7(mdo sde): grangs med par bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur na/ gzhan mos paskyed du 'jug pa gang yin pa dag lta ci smos te/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches grangs med pa skyed par 'gyur ro// 
115b8(mdo sde): bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa snga ma de ni bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa 'di ni brgya'i char yang mi phod/ stong gi char yang mi phod/ 'bum gyi char yang mi phod/ bye ba'i char/ 
116a1(mdo sde): yang mi bod/ bye ba brgya'i char yang mi bod/ bye ba stong gi char yang mi bod/ bye ba 'bus kyi char yang mi bod/ depe dang rgyur yang mi bzod do// 
116a2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la las byang chub sems dpa'i zan bcad dam/ khros te tha na byang chub sems dpa' glang po cher skyes pa de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sangs rgyas la bskyed pa gcig bcad
116a3(mdo sde): la 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis ni/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / don gyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir
116a4(mdo sde): 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi zan bcad de/ khros nas lhung bzed dang / chos gos med
116a5(mdo sde): par byas la/ sems can thams cad long bar byas na/ mi dge ba'i las 'di ni snga ma'i mi dge ba de'i brgya'i char ya nga mi 'od pa nas/ dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod do// 
116a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / 
116a7(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mi ma yin pa rnams dang / phyogs tha dad pa
116a8(mdo sde): nas/ lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho grangs med/ tshad med pa rnams yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 
116b1(mdo sde): mdo'o rgyal po sgron chen po le'u re re la/ chos snang bab sgo stong phrag gang ga'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed la dag par 'du bsnang ba'i dkyil 'gros dpal kyi zlog gas gsal bar byas pa'i
116b2(mdo sde): ye'u chen po'i tshigs mtha' yas pa gang ga'i klung gi byem sbed las/ dga' ldan na gnas pa la sogs pa/ 'jig rten grangs med pa dang 'thun par 'jug pa'i stobs la sbyor ba'i mthulas
116b3(mdo sde): byung bas dbang byed cing / phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 'dus pa'i dga' sngon chen po la rtse ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ sum cu bdun
116b4(mdo sde): pa rdzogs s+ho/ rgyag gyi mkhan po su ren dra be d+hi dang chu chen gyimodab ben+de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa/ 
116b5(mdo sde): / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yAb mo ki ni namam hA yAn sutra/ bod skad du/ 'phags paspyan ris gzigs shes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs
116b6(mdo sde): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod phung po'i ril
116b7(mdo sde): dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
116b8(mdo sde): blo gros rnam par dag pa la bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go// blo gros rnam par
117a1(mdo sde): dag pa ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa dang / bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / phan pa'i dngos po yongs su dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs
117a2(mdo sde): su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ byams pa yongs su dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ snying rje yongasu dag pas/ 
117a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa dga' ba yongs su dag pa dang / btang snyems yongs su dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo
117a4(mdo sde): gros rnam par dag pa/ rnam par grol ba yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes yongs su dgadapas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros
117a5(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa/ stobs yongs su dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa/ mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa dang
117a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa/ de ltar
117a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag pa la su zhig me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / byug pa rnams
117a8(mdo sde): kyis sti stang du byed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/ de'i mtha' ni theg pa gsum las/ theg pa gang yang rung bas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa ma gtogs
117b1(mdo sde): par bsod nams kyi phung po de phyi ma'i mtha' yang zad par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis tshad med/ 
117b2(mdo sde): pa de bzhin gshegs pa la yon bul ba yang tshad med do// mtha' yas so// bsam gyis mi khyab bo// mtshungs pa med do// dpag tu med do// grangs med
117b3(mdo sde): do// dpag gis mi lang ngo // brjod du med do// blo gros rnam par dag pa su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes pa la sti stang byed pa dang / 
117b4(mdo sde): mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang / phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring
117b5(mdo sde): srel yungs 'bru tsam la sti stang byed pa dang / bla mar byedapa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang / yang dag par sems nye bar gzhag ste/ 
117b6(mdo sde): byang chub tu gzhol ba'i sems bskyed pas phyag 'tshal ba dang / phyag byed pa dang / sti stang byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang
117b7(mdo sde): gsol ba dang / bsngags pa dang / skor bar byed pa des phan yon lnga yongs su bzung bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rtogs pa dang ldan
117b8(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang / ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / myur du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / mthong nas kyang dad pa skyed par 'gyur ba/ 
118a1(mdo sde): ste/ phan yon lnga po de dag yongs su bzang bar 'gyur ro// 
118a2(mdo sde): / phan yon ma/ de dag yongs su bzung ba dem bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur te/ bzhig she na/ de bzhan
118a3(mdo sde): pa'i bstan pa 'dzin pa dang / de yang ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub pa dang / bsgrubs nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'draH dang nye bar 'gyur ba dang / myur du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
118a4(mdo sde): par skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag ni/ bre gros rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpa' tshes bani dang ldan na bdud dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis ma dzang
118a5(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ bzhi gang she na/ rigs mtho zhing rigadas che ba dang / btsas ma thag tu sangs rgyas bcomaldan 'das rnams yid la byed pa dang / phyi ma'i dus na dpa
118a6(mdo sde): pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang / rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba ste/ blo gros rnam
118a7(mdo sde): par dag pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan
118a8(mdo sde): 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/ byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas 'jig rten mgon gyi mchod
118a9(mdo sde): rten la// su zhig skor ba byed pa ni// tshe rabs dag ni thams cad du// byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ dran dang ldan zhing blo gros ldan/ bsod nams ldan
118b1(mdo sde): shing 'jigs med 'gyur// mchod rten nor ba byas nas ni// tshe bas dag ni thams cad du// lha dang b+hu dang gnod sbyin dang // srin po rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur/ 
118b2(mdo sde): ngas ni gang dag bstan pa li// mi khom brgyad po de dag slong // sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab mdzes pa// mnyes par byed 'di dal ba gcig/ mdog ldan gzugs ni phun sum tshogs// mtshan
118b3(mdo sde): gyis legs par brgyan pa dang // mthu dang stobs dang ldan par 'gyur// lo lo can du mi 'gyur// de na phrug cing neng cher 'gyur// bsod rnams ldan zhing rdzil
118b4(mdo sde): med// 'jig rten smon ma mnyes byas nas/ yang dang yang du sti stang byed// bdag med steng ba'i chos thos na// de ni chos la rmongs mi 'gyur// myur
118b5(mdo sde): du dad pa thob 'gyur zhing / chos don ji bzhi na mkhas par 'gyur// tshong dpon khyim dang rgyas pa dang // phyug po rnams su skye bar 'gyur// dpa'
118b6(mdo sde): zhing sbyin pa'i bdag por 'gyur// gtong ba btang zhing ser sna med// 'dzam bu'i gling na gang yang rung // khyad par can gyi rigs mdzes pa// der ni brtan pa de skye ste// dpa' ba
118b7(mdo sde): dag ni rnam par spangs// mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni// skye ba thams cad kun tu yang // dbang cher grangs pa'i khyim bdag dang // dpal dang gzi brjid gzi ldan 'gyur// bram ze
118b8(mdo sde): sAswa la che 'dra dang // tshul khrims ldan zhing mang thos dang // rgyal rigs sA la che 'dra dang // phrug cing nor chen ldan par 'gyur// ris bskor rgya mtshe tshun cad kyi// sa kun la ni gang sngon
119a1(mdo sde): / pa// gling bzhi dag gi dbang phyug bla// rgyal po chos dang ldan par 'gyur// 'khor los sgyur ba rdzu 'phrul che// rin chen bdun dang ldan par 'gyur// rgyal srid
119a2(mdo sde): gnas nas sangs rgyas la// yang dang yang du sti stang byed// 'di nas shi 'phos mtho ris su// song nas sangs rgyas bstan la dang // lhun po'i zom gyi dbang phyug po// lha yi dbang po brgya byin
119a3(mdo sde): 'gyur// lha dbang shin tu 'thab bral dang // de bzhin du ni dga' ldan dang // lha dbang shin tu 'phrul pa dang // dbang sgyur 'jigs pa med par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni/ 
119a4(mdo sde): de ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du// tshangs pa'i dbang phyug mkhas 'gyur zhing // lha rnams bye bas mchod par 'gyu dar// 'jig rten mgon gyi mchod rten la// mi gang skor ba
119a5(mdo sde): byed pa yis// bsngags pa bskal pa bye bar yang // brjod/ pas zad par bya mi nus// su zhig byang chub sems bskyed na sa// ston pa'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal ba// de ni bskal pa bye bar
119a6(mdo sde): yang // nams kyang long zhing 'theng mi 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon gyi mchod rten la// mngon tu skor ba byed pa ni// bung ba sngon po mdzes 'dra yi// rnam par dag pa'i mig 'thob 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba
119a7(mdo sde): byas na ni// de ni nges par rtag tu yang // 'thun pa'i don kun thos 'gyur zhing // don min rnams ni spangs par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni// mthu dang stobs dang ldan par 'gyur// de ni ye
119a8(mdo sde): lo med 'gyur zhing // rtag tu bag yod ldan par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni// brtson 'grus brtan zhing mthu brtan la// brtan zhing rnam par gnon brtan dang // de ni myur du ma tha
119b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur// me dang dug dang mtshon gyis de// nams kyang 'chi dus byed mi 'gyur// mkhas pa tshe ni rdzogs rdzogs su// zad par byas nas 'chings byed// mchod rten bskor ba byas nani// pho brang 'khor
119b2(mdo sde): dang yul 'khor dang // grong rdal rnams su longs spyod dang // gzugs kyis khyad par 'phags par 'gyur// byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// de ni 'dod pa mi sten cing // lus kyang gtsang la gos
119b3(mdo sde): gtsang zhing // gtsang ma'i chos la gnas par 'gyur// blo gros rnam par dag pa// byang chub sems dpa'i thag pa la yang dag par zhugs pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten mthong
119b4(mdo sde): nas dad pa bskyed de// pus mo gnyi ga'i lha ngas la btsug/ sa nas phyag 'tshal zhing phyag byed de// de bzhin ga/ shegs pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi sku
119b5(mdo sde): legs par brgyan pa de/ ci 'dra bar bdag gi lus kyang de dang 'dra ba zur cig ces de la mos pa skyed na// blo gros rnam par dag pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po de'i mtha' brjod
119b6(mdo sde): par mi nus te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas pa'i phyir ro// bsod nams kyi phung po de ni rgyal po nyid dam/ brgya byin nyid dam/ tshangs pa nyid dam
119b7(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas nyid dam/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bla na med pas kyang zad par bya bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ rigs
119b8(mdo sde): kyi bu des bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bzung ba'i phyir te/ blo gros rnam par dag pa 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
120a1(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/ grong khyer ram/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ grong du 'jug kyang rung / 'chags kyang rung / 
120a2(mdo sde): 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / chos sten kyang rung / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za
120a3(mdo sde): 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa sems can gyi grangs su ma gtogs pa shing ngam/ ri 'am/ 
120a4(mdo sde): khung bu 'am/ bu ga 'am/ bya skyibs kyang rung ste/ de// bzhin gshegs pa ga la bde log su 'dud pa dang / rab tu 'dud pa dang / kun tu 'dud pa mi byed pa de gang yang
120a5(mdo sde): med de/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba tham sa cad dang ldan pa la byed pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu de dag phreng ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grol rdal lam/ yul
120a6(mdo sde): 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor na rgyu ba la/ sems can rnams 'dud/ rab tu 'dud/ kun tu 'dud par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka'
120a7(mdo sde): stsal to// 'jig rten sangs rgyas ji ltar 'gyur zhes mos bskyed de/ sangs rgyas mchod rten la ni pus mo gnyi 'jug dang // su zhig byang chub gzhol nas phyogs rnams kun 'gro ba// de 'gro che na 'jig
120a8(mdo sde): rten gsum po 'dud pa byed// mi rnams gtso bo rang 'byung gang du 'gro byed pa/ de logs su ni rtsa dang shing dang sdong lcags dang / sman dang shing lo rnams dang 'bras bu mdab ma dang // yid 'ong dri
120b1(mdo sde): ldan me tog rnams ni 'dud par 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la pus mo btsug pa ni// de la mi'i dbang po kun kyang 'dud par 'gyur// gnod sbyin dbang dang klu dang lha'i
120b2(mdo sde): rgyal po dang // tshangs pa'i dbang po thams cad rkang par gtugs par byed// bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la pus gtsugs phyag byas na/ dpa' zhing stobs dang ldan pa'i 'khor los
120b3(mdo sde): sgyu bar 'gyur// gser gyi mdog ldan mtshan rnams kyis ni ge char 'gyur// mthu che bla mar bya zhing thub par dka' bar 'gyur// de yi yul na sems can gang dag gnas gyur pa// de dag
120b4(mdo sde): thams cad byams pa'i sems dang dga' bar 'gyur/ de la sems can gang yang sdig pa mi skyed de// skye dpo tshogs chen dga' zhing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur// bcom ldan
120b5(mdo sde): mchod rten dag la pus btsugs phyag 'tshal ba// de la se mas can kun gyi rgyal po rab tu 'dud// lha dang klu dang mid nga lto 'phye chen po 'dud// bskal pa mtha' yas rnams su dbus
120b6(mdo sde): byin thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod rten dag la pus gtsugs phyag 'tshal ba/ gang tshe rgyal ba dam pa byung bar gyur pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ba 'jog
120b7(mdo sde): 'dren pa gzhal yas rnams la mchod pa byed par 'gyur// 'jig rten sangs rgyas gyur ces mos pa bskyed nas ni// bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la pus gtsugs phyag 'tshal ba// 
120b8(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya grangs zad 'gyur na// de ni ring por mi thogs byang chub mtshungs med 'thob// gang zhig sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la// bskal pa bye ba gzhas
121a1(mdo sde): mam ston byed pa pas// ga nag tu sum pacad bskal pa 'di lan// mchod rten phyag 'tshal demi bsod na pa sa chem mang // sangs rgyas
121a2(mdo sde): dam pa sbyin gnas mtshungs pa med gyur pa/ spyod pa dam baspyad napa khyad par brnyes gyur pa// mi yi khyu mchog de la 'din mchod byas na// rnam par smin padas pa mtshungs
121a3(mdo sde): med rang bzhin 'gyur/ byang chub tu ni sems bsngo ste/ me tog 'phreng ba byas nas su// mchod rten dag la su 'bul ba// de ni rnams kyang ngongs mi 'gyur/ 
121a4(mdo sde): mi yi nang nas shi 'phos nas// sum cu rtsa gsum 'gro dbar gyur// der ni rin pa sna tshogs kyi// gzhal med khang pa thob par 'gyur// mchod rten 'breng ba 'dir
121a5(mdo sde): puldan// khang bzangs ngag dang khang brtsegs palha yi bu mos bsten pa rnams/ sum cu gsum du spyod par 'gyur// yan lag brgyad ldan rgyas ganganang/ 
121a6(mdo sde): gser gyi khyim bdal gyur pa/ bai DUR+Ya dang shes dag gi/ lha mi rdzing bu tho bar 'gyur// de ni lha yi dga' spyad nas// mkhas pa che chad rdzogs par 'gyur// lha mi 'jig rten
121a7(mdo sde): shi 'phos nas// mi nang mongs spyod ldan par 'gyur// dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis// mkhas pa dag yod gyur nas ni// de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes byas te// rkang
121a8(mdo sde): mchog la mchod pa byed// mchod rten 'phreng ba 'bul byed pa// de ni 'dod chags mi 'phrogs zhing // zhe sdang gis kyang 'bregs mi 'gyur// de ni rnams kyang rmongs mi 'gyur// rkang gnyis
121b1(mdo sde): mchog la mchod byas na// de ni tshe rabs thams cad du// chags pa med cing zhe sdang med// brkam pa med cing dbang po bsdams// mchod rten 'phreng ba 'bul byed pa// tshe rabs bye ba
121b2(mdo sde): stong rnams dang // khrag khrig dag ni brgya bgrangs pa// kun tu bkur sti byas par 'gyur// mchod rten 'phreng ba 'bul byed pa// de ni 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur// brgya byin lha yi dbang
121b3(mdo sde): phyug 'gyur// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten tshangs par 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon pa skyob pa la// dar gyi dbul ba phul byas na// lha yi ngag dang mi rnams kyi// don rnams thams cad grub par 'gyur// dma'
121b4(mdo sde): ba'i rigs ni rnam spangs te// der ni de skye 'gyur ma yin// phyug cing nor chen ldan pa dang // 'jig rten dbang phyug de'/ gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs la mchod byas na// gzugs dang don dang / 
121b5(mdo sde): longs spyod dang // kha dog dang ni 'byor pa dang // kun tu grags dang ldan par 'gyur// de ni tshe rabs dran 'gyur zhing // 'dod chags kyis kyang 'phrogs mi 'gyur// 'dod pa rnams kyi skyon shes
121b6(mdo sde): shing // tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod byas na// gzugs rnams dang ni sgra dag dang // ro rnams kyis kyang mi tshugs shing // sdig pa'i las ni byed mi 'gyur// rnam
121b7(mdo sde): par 'dren pa mchod byed na// de ni spos dang me tog gis// nams kyang 'phongs par mi 'gyur zhing // dran ldan shes rab ldan par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs la su mchod pa// de yi nor gyi phung po/ 
121b8(mdo sde): la// rgyal po dang ni chom rkun dang // me dang chus kyang rag mi 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po'i mchod rten la// dar gyi dbul ba su 'bul ba// de ni skam dang mya ngan dang // nad du can du gzhar mi
122a1(mdo sde): 'gyur// 'jig rten sgron ma mchod byed pa// tshe rabs dag ni thams cad du// mya ngan med cing gnod med dang // 'khor los sgyur ba 'byor cen 'gyur// 'dren la mchod pa
122a2(mdo sde): byas na ni// rkang pa lag pa mnyen 'gyur zhing // yan lag rnam par dag 'gyur la// gzugs dang kha dog ldan par 'gyur// sdig pa'i las ni rnam spangs te// byang chub spyad pa spyod par byed// 
122a3(mdo sde): gang dag 'jig rten rab dkon pa// rkang gnyis mchog rnams mthong bar 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba stong rnams dang // khrag khrig dag ni brgya bgrangs par// mchod cing bde la shes rab/ 
122a4(mdo sde): ldan// byang chub dam pa 'tshang yang rgya// 'jig rte// na mgon po skyob pa la// 'phreng ba'i khang pa byas na/  ni// de ni g.yog 'khor mi phyed cing // rgyal po 'byor pa chen po
122a5(mdo sde): 'gyur// 'phags pa rnams kyis gang spangs pa// sdig pa 'i las ni spong bar byed// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bshad ba yi// dge ba'i las la sten par byed// lha 'am 'on/ 
122a6(mdo sde): te klu rnams sam// 'jig rten dag na gang mkhas pa// de dag dga' zhing mgu ba dang // sti stang byas shing bsngags par 'gyur// brtan pa de ni gar skyes par// bsod nams gzi brjid
122a7(mdo sde): shin tu brjid// yul 'khor dag dang grong khyer dag/ rigs dang sti stang byed par 'gyur// sangs rgyas gzhan gyis mi thub pa// rkang gnyis mchog la su mchod pa/ de dag mthu stobs che ba dang / 
122a8(mdo sde): g.yog 'khor chen pos mdzes par 'gyur/ byang chub tu ni sems bsngos to// 'phreng ba'i gtsug lag khang byas na// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gang bsngags pag// 'byung ba dag
122b1(mdo sde): na gas tham sa rgyags//  kyi /  khye na na nga// ma ma
122b2(mdo sde): na gyim su ba byed// donan dang ldan 'argya shing // de rgya chub rgyad brtsod// thegras chen pasas 'di dus// ma su btang byas na /  na mams su mi 'jur
122b3(mdo sde): / do nga tu chu / deg 'du 'ab// sa na mad/ ban sa
122b4(mdo sde): 'gyur/  sngo du ga 'ju sa/ gr-ib med la the na / zag dag dang ning rgyal gyis/ nams kyang de la gnod mi 'gyur// gang na byang chub
122b5(mdo sde): zhugs pa// de dag drug dag med cing des/ bzod pa'i pha rol phyin par 'gyur// banapa 'an/ cing yon tan ldan/ gang dag byang chub mngon thug
122b6(mdo sde): 'dag rten ca don chen// de dag 'a byu bshin tu gas// srad pa med pa'i sbyin gnas 'gyur// ma 'di dag nangam kyis sa// bzung ba byang dadag pa drus
122b7(mdo sde): de dag rnams kyi yon na mtha'// tshigagis bdun par mnu so// sems can dag ni thams cad kyi/ dus gsum sems ni shes pa zhus// de dag rnams kyi yon tanam pa/ 
122b8(mdo sde): tshig gis bstan par mi nus so// rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po dag/ sgra ni bya ba stong gshegs pa'i// sgra yis zad par bya bar nus// de dag yon tan zad mi nus// sa rnams tham/ 
123a1(mdo sde): cad sder thugs pa// rab tu phra rdul shes pa nus// sangs rgyas sras po de dag gi/ yon tan mtha ni brjod mi nus// nu klung thams
123a2(mdo sde): cad rab 'bab pa// rgyun las bzlog ste 'gro yang srid// sangs rgyas sras po de dag gi/ yon tan mtha' brjod de lta min// sems can dag ni thams cad kyi// sngon gyi lus
123a3(mdo sde): rnamasa'i rtsed pa// bgrang bar bye nying dpag par nus// de dag yon tan dad mi 'gyur// sngon gyi lus rnams thams cad la// sku 'bring 'i snyed yod pa rnams// bgrang bar bya zhing dang // 
123a4(mdo sde): par nus// de dag yon tan zad mi 'gyur// 'gro da lnga por 'khor ba yi// sems can kun gyi sku rnams ni// / bgrang bar bya zhing dpag par nus// de dag yon tan zad mi 'grus
123a5(mdo sde): sa 'di'i snyed thams cad ga// chu yi phung par gnas gyur kyang // / de ni bgrang zhing dpag par nus// de dag yon tan gyi dmi nus// mar me mdza nas bzung nas ni// ma
123a6(mdo sde): 'ongs bskal ba ji snyed pa// de yi bar du shing ljon rnams// ji snyed ma 'ongs 'byung 'gyur ba// de dag 'bras bu me tog rnams// de dag zad par shes par nus// bskal pa byed
123a7(mdo sde): stong rnams dang // khrag khrig dag ni brgya bgrangs par// brtson bzhig gis de dag gi/ bsngags 'bring yid du 'ong brjod kyang // sangs rgyas sras po de dag gi/ yon tan mtha' ni brjod ma
123a8(mdo sde): nus// sangs rgyas sras po de dag la// mi gang mi dga' byed pa de// lha dang mi ni spangs nas su// de dag dmyal ba spyod yul 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni// mi
123b1(mdo sde): gang la la gnod byed pa// mig med pa 'am long ba dang // sdug bsngal dpung gnyen med par 'gyur// shi 'phos nas ni mnar med 'gro/ de ni 'bar zhing 'jigs skrag 'gyur// lus
123b2(mdo sde): ni chen por gyur nas kyang // sdug bsngal tshor ba myong bar 'gyur// tshe rabs de dang de dag tu// de lus dpag tshad tsam 'gyur te// de dag phrum ltar zlum gyur la// 
123b3(mdo sde): kun nas yongs su bza' bar 'gyur// de tshe lus la mgo bo ni// lnga stong yod par 'byung 'gyur zhing // mgo bo de dag re re la'ang // lce ni lnga brgya tham pa yod// gcig la'ang thong shol brgyad
123b4(mdo sde): dag gis// lce ni rab tu rmo bar 'gyur// sdig pa'i las ni/ rnam smin gyis// mi bzad chen por gshegs par 'gyur// mnar med de nas shi 'phos nas// de ni tsha dang
123b5(mdo sde): rab tsha bar// blo gros ngan pa tshor ba myong // de sngon nyes byas 'bras bu yin// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni// ma bsdams gang zhig gnod byed pa// de la dud 'gre'i skye gnas
123b6(mdo sde): dang // dmyal ba'i sa na dkon ma yin// tshe rabs bye ba stong rnams dang // khrag khrig dag ni brgya bgrangs par// sdug bsngal tshor ba myong 'gyur zhing // des ni bzang po rnams mi
123b7(mdo sde): mthong // sangs rgyas sras po skye ba rnams la// gnod pa dag ni byas gyur na// a la ga rta 'jigs pa yis// shin tu gdug pa'i sbrul tu skye// de ni bkres dang skom pas nyen// sdig
123b8(mdo sde): pa'i las rnams byed par 'gyur// de ni zas kyang mi snyed de// nams kyang 'drangs par za mi myong // shi 'phos shin rje'i 'jig rten du// de ni rtag par gtun du rdung // dge slong dag la
124a1(mdo sde): gnod byas pas// nams kyang skabs ni rnyed mi 'gyur// de nas shi 'phos dus byas te// mi yi lus ni thob gyur na// blo ngan de ni dbus long 'gyur// gnod
124a2(mdo sde): sems ldan zhing sdom pa med// de ni nyes par spras byas te// 'phags pa rnams la skur btab pas// mi yi nang nas shi 'phos nas// ngan song dag tu myur du 'gro// byang chub sems dpa' rnam
124a3(mdo sde): la ni// ma bsdams gang zhig gnod byed pa// bskal pa bye ba stong dag tu// nams kyang sangs rgyas mthong mi 'gyur// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi sras rnams la// gang zhig chos bzhin
124a4(mdo sde): srung byed pa// des ni ngan 'gro kun spangs te// myur du bzang 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// phyug cing nor chen/  ldan pa dang // stobs dang ldan zhing 'jigs pa med// 
124a5(mdo sde): dran dang ldan zhing shes rab ldan// bde zhi tsha khrel ltas ldan// gang du 'jig rten rnams kyi sgra na// yongs su mya ngan 'das gyur pa// sangs rgyas mchod rten
124a6(mdo sde): mthong nas ni// yang dang yang du sti stang byed// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gsungs pa yi// 'di 'dri'i chos 'di thos gyur nas// sangs rgyas sras po rnams la ni// su zhag phyi phyir dang mi byed// gang
124a7(mdo sde): gis sangs rgyas stong rnams dang // brgya dang bye ba bgrang dag la// bskal pa gang ga'i bye ma snyed// de snyed bskal par bskur ba bas// 'jig rten mgon gyis gsungs pa yi// dam
124a8(mdo sde): chos 'jig tshe gang zhig gis// nyin dang mtshan du 'dzin byed pa// de ni bsod nams khyad par 'phags// chos 'jig dus na chos 'dzin pa// sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang // sangs rgyas mi
124b1(mdo sde): shes rab gnas pa// ngal des ni mchod pa byas// dam pa'i ches ni 'jig pa'i tshe// ston pa'i bstan bsrung byed pa// bskal pa byed pa stong rnams su// de ni nams kyang chud mi 'gyur// 
124b2(mdo sde): lus kyis bde ba myong 'gyur zhing // de ni nad kyis btab mi 'gyur// de ni yid du mi 'ong bas// nams kyang 'phrogs par mi 'gyuraro// ston pa'i bstan pa srung byas na// bzod pa phun sum
124b3(mdo sde): tshegs pa dang // des dang gsal dang gnyen pa dang // sems can rnams la byams sems 'gyur// 'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas// bde dang dga' 'thob mdzod ni mang por
124b4(mdo sde): 'gyur// sngon gyi rim gro bya ba 'thob 'gyur zhing // mi khom da brgyad po ma lus zad par spong // 'jig tshe rgyal ba ma tshig gi chos bzung bas// dper na na mkha' skar mas
124b5(mdo sde): yongs gang ltar// rtag tu mtshan gyis go char byas pa dang // / rab tu tshig snyan yid 'ong dbyangs ldan 'gyur// 'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas// gang na yid
124b6(mdo sde): bde med cing rab sdug pa// rigs dman de ni de yis spangs par 'gyur// phyug cing shin tu bde la longs spyod ldan// 'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas// mthu dang stobs dang
124b7(mdo sde): ldan zhing brtson 'grus ldan// mi dmanas rnams kun tu rnam par rgyu// sangs rgyas brgya stong dag la bsnyen bkur byed// 'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas// mchog tu rab mdzes gzugs
124b8(mdo sde): ldan shes rab ldan// mi yi 'jig rten mchog tu bsnyen bkur 'gyur// rgyal po mkhas pa 'dzang ba rnams kyis bsngags// 'jig tshe rgyal mchog gi ches bzung bas// mchog tu gzugs
125a1(mdo sde): mdzes bstan sdug pa dang // skyes pa bud med lnga rnams dga' ba dang / bde zhing mkhas la bsngags shing shes rab ldan// ston pa stobs bcu mnga' ba skum/ 
125a2(mdo sde): lhas// gang gi mdun du mdo 'di rab bshad pa// mi de'i lag tu mdo sde 'di 'dra 'di// phyi ma'i dus kyi tshen thob par 'gyur// gang zhig ston pa mi mchog gzugs byed pa// ras 'dri cig/ 
125a3(mdo sde): ngos 'dri 'am gser las byas// de mi chos kyi khyad par gang yin pa// de dag ma lus rab tu bstan gyis nyon// de ni blta min mong bar gzhar mi 'gyur// srung por mi 'gyur
125a4(mdo sde): yan lag mi sdug min// de ni gzugs dang ldan zhing dog ldan// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis ge char dgyur// lus ni rnam par dag cing khyad par 'thob// spobs
125a5(mdo sde): pa 'thob cing sgra snyan yid du 'ong // shes bzhin ldan zhing jig rten kun gyi gtso// de mthong sems can bde zhing dag 'a bar 'gyur// sdig byed mi 'gyur zhe sdang med sems ldan// 
125a6(mdo sde): g.yo med mi rku rgyal po 'khrug mi byed// mthu dang ldan zhing dbang cher grags par 'gyur// byams la gnas shing mi dman sems dang ldan// 'dren pa'i sku gzugs sku rab mdzes byas na// de ni
125a7(mdo sde): mchog 'gyur skye bo mang mchod 'om// rdo ldan phyug cing che nyid rgya cher ldan// dbang ldan 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur// 'dren pa'i sku gzugs rab tu mdzes byas na// lham
125a8(mdo sde): dbang po dbang phyug dbang thob pa// lhun po'i zom na dbang thob brgya byin 'gyur// bdag po lhun po'i zom na rgyal srid ston// de ni drin dang blo gros mi ldan min// don rtogs mos
125b1(mdo sde): shes rab tshang bar 'gyur/ 'jig rten kun na dbugs byin thob 'gyur te// 'di ni ye shes ldan zhing dmyal ba spangs// sems can snying po mtshungs med mchod byas nas// dun
125b2(mdo sde): 'gro'i skye gnas gshin rje'i yul mi 'gro/ ngan 'gro gsum po des ni nam spangs te// bdag der phyis mi skye bar shes par 'gyur// 'dren pa'i sku gzugs rab tu mdzes byas na// dbang
125b3(mdo sde): ldan dbang phyug nyid kyi lhar 'gyur te// mi dman dga' ba'i sems kyis sangs rgyas mchod// rgyal ba'am mchog gi bstan la dad par 'gyur// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dbang thob changs
125b4(mdo sde): par 'gyur// yid 'ong shin tu mdzes pa'i spos dang can// 'dzam bu'i gling gser 'od byed dga' 'gyur ba'i/ gzhal med khang mchod blta sdug thob par 'gyur// de ni
125b5(mdo sde): ded dpon stobs bcu ldan pa'o// sems can snying rba mtshungs 'dra med pa 'thob// kha dog mtha' yas 'jigarten kun na gsal// gser steng rin chen bai DUR+Ya dang
125b6(mdo sde): mtshungs// su zhig dga' ba'i yid kyi me tog blangs// dang skyes 'jig rten mgon la tshar du gtor// de ni mi'i 'jig rten bsod nams ldan// rgyal srid gnas nas rgyal ba
125b7(mdo sde): mchog bkur 'gyur// mya ngan skam shing tha ba drir ldan lus// yan lag legs gnas mtshungs med 'thob par 'gyur// skye bo mang pos blta ba'i 'os yin te// dmyal bdag
125b8(mdo sde): rtsa 'dod pa spong bar 'gyur// spyad pa rnam par spyod tshe 'dod pa la/ ngan skyugs khung ltar smad par shes par 'gyur// tshangs spyod dge ba khyad par 'phags la spyod// 
126a1(mdo sde): dga' ba'i sems kyis rtag tu spyod par 'gyur// bskal pa mtha' yas mang du de kha nas/ rab mangs su dpal bsung ni 'byung bar 'gyur// demi
126a2(mdo sde): lus ni gser gyi mdog 'dra zhing // tsartan lta bur dri ni ma ngad kyang 'byung // spyad pa rnam par spyod tshe khro ba dang // tha 'dri sgron gti mug gnod mi byed// dman pa med pa'i sems kyis dbugs
126a3(mdo sde): byin rnyed// bag yod lha yi nang na rgyal po 'thob// gang tshe rgyal ba mya ngan 'das pa na/ de ni gus pas de dag chos kyang 'dzin// mi dman dga' ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin// 
126a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i ring bsrel mchod// rgyal ba mchog gi bstan pa 'jig dus tshe// rab tu dag da'abs ston pa'i chos tshul 'dzin// des ni chos mchog mdzes pa
126a5(mdo sde): de spyad pas// gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed gzhar mi'/ gyur// gal te sems can thams cad sangs rgyas shing / nyon mongs med pa gsar mdog stobs bcur gyur// de dag
126a6(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du// rgyal ba mchog la mchod pa'i bsngags brjod nus// 'jig rten kun tu sdig pa'i las spangs te// dga' ba'i sems kyis mchog gis las byas
126a7(mdo sde): shing // rlabs chen spyod tshe don ni legs byas nas// 'jig rten mthu chen rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// gang gis spos chu yungs 'bru tsam blangs te// bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la
126a8(mdo sde): 'dug byed pa/ de yi phan yon 'arjod kyis sems dang shing // rdul dang dri ma srengs la mnyan par gyis// de ni bsod nams ldan zhing phyogs kun nu// nad med dgyur cing blo brtan pagayod la/ 
126b1(mdo sde): spyad pa rnam par spyod tshe mya ngan 'dul// skye bo mang po dga' zhing yid du 'ong // rgyal po thob nas rgyal ba mchog bkur 'gyur// mthu chen rab mkhas 'khor los sgyur te// gser gyi mdog ldan mtshan gyi
126b2(mdo sde): go cha can// 'jig rten kun na yid 'ong dri ldan 'thob// de la yid mi bde dang sdug bsngal med// spyad pa spyod che longs spyod nyams mi 'gyur// phyug cing nor ldan mdzod ni rab tu mang // 
126b3(mdo sde): mya ngan med 'gyur 'jig rten kun tu rgyu// skye bo mang po ljags tre de la 'dri// rgyal ba mchog gi bstan pa khyad 'phags ches// tshig rab brjod cing the tsom sel bar byed// chos gos
126b4(mdo sde): yid bde slar yang smra bar byed// sdig pa'i las med blo rgya me dang ldan// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i chos mchogade khyad 'phags pa// dga' bar 'gyur la rtag tu mkhas
126b5(mdo sde): byas te// mig kyang sbyong zhing mun pa sel bar byed// 'dod chags mi che zhe sdang che ma yin// mi yi 'jig rten gti mug che ma yin// de ni tshangs spyad dag pa mchog 'di spyod// mi yi don
126b6(mdo sde): ni dpag tu med pa byed// bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la spos bdugs na// de la gnod par sems pa su yang med// de ni nams kyang longs spyod nyams mi 'gyur// blta bar 'os shing
126b7(mdo sde): nor chan ldan pa 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya rnams su// sems ni rnam dag sdig pa rnam dag cing // zhi zhing rab zhi zhi dul ldan gyur nas// mi dman sems kyi byang chub mtshungs med
126b8(mdo sde): 'thob// sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya mtha' yas// mya ngan med bde zhi ba mchog bkod cing // 'khor lo mtshungs med 'jig rten kun bskor nas// phyi nas nyon mongs rdul med mya ngan 'das/ 
127a1(mdo sde): su zhig dga' mgu sems kyis gos kyis ni// bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la mchod byed pa// de ni gos mdzes bye ba stong rnams dang // khrag khrig
127a2(mdo sde): brgya bgrangs mtha' yas rtag tu rnyed// bcom ldan mchod rten gos kyis rikris byas na// de ni btsas ma thag tu gos mchog 'thob// lha yi khyad 'phags dang gos rab bzang rnyed// 
127a3(mdo sde): btsas ma thag tu de lus shin tu bde// gang zhig gos kyis bcom ldan mchod rten dang // 'dren pa mtshungs med rnams la mchod byed pa// de 'dir mtshungs pa med pa'i lus 'thob ste// sum cu
127a4(mdo sde): rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi me tog rgyas/ bcom lnga na mchod rten gos kyis dkris byas na// lag mthil nas ni mu tig phreng mdzes pa// sna tshogs dag dang seng ge
127a5(mdo sde): phreng ba dang / gser skud rab mdzes bskal pa ma tha' yas 'byung // bcom ldan mchod rten gos kyis dkris byas na// lha 'am klu 'am mi 'am lto 'phye che// su yang de
127a6(mdo sde): la ma dang skyed mi byed// rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa mchog 'di spyod// bcom ldan mchod rten gos kyis dkris byas na// stong gi 'jig rten khams kun zil gnon te// 'dzam gling gser gyis
127a7(mdo sde): gsar ni zil mnan bzhin// skye dgu'i don ni dpag tu med pa byed// gal te rin chen rab mchog sna bdun gyis// stong gi zhing kun rab tu bkang ba yi// de 'dra'i dpal 'di zad par bya nus kyi rgyal ba'i mchod
127a8(mdo sde): rten gos gcig phul ba min// nor bu rin chen zla ba'i 'od rnams kyis// bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong zhing bkang ba// de 'dra'i dpal 'di zad par bya nus kyi// rgyal ba'i mchod rten gos gcig
127b1(mdo sde): phul bu min// 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes mos bskyed de/ bcom ldan mchod rten pa dan phul byas na// de ni skye bo mang po'i mchod 'os 'gyur// byang chub mchog spyod dam pazhi
127b2(mdo sde): ba spyod// bcom ldan mchod rten pa dan phul byas na// dag cing mchog gi lus ni 'thob 'gyur te/ dper na gser ltar shin tu dkar 'gyur zhing // lha yis bsngags la mchod cing bla mar
127b3(mdo sde): byed// de yis lus ni gser gyi mdog 'drar 'gyur// ras kyi gos dang la ba bzang rab dang // du gu la dang ka shi pa rnams dang // shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyang rnyed par 'gyur// 'dzam bu'i gling na rigs
127b4(mdo sde): mchog dam pa gang // phyug cing che nyid bdag dbang nor mang ba// de dag tu ni rtag tu de skye ste// dman zhing mchog tu dbul pa rnam par spangs// de la sems can su yang phrag dog med/ 
127b5(mdo sde): sems can gnod par sems pa gzhan mi 'byung // gzhan gyi sdig pa'i las la de smod de// rtag tu bag yod tshul khrims rnam dag 'gyur// 'dzin pa med cing ser sna med par 'ong // gtong
127b6(mdo sde): ba rab btang mya ngan med pa 'thob// de ni srog phyir gzhan la sbyin mi byed// phongs pa med byed rtag tu bag yod 'gyur// sangs rgyas stobs bcu ded dpon mthong nas ni// dga' ba'i sems
127b7(mdo sde): kyis gdugs dang ba dan dang // mar me rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod// byang chub spyod mchog 'di ni rtag par spyod// mi yi 'jig rten bla mar bsnyen bkur byed// lha nang lha
127b8(mdo sde): yi dag dang mi yi gtso// yid 'ong spos mdzes blta na sdug pa dang // nor bu shel 'dra sna tshogs ldan pa 'thob// ri rab rtse mor lha nang rab tu gsal// lha kun sleb mar gyur nas mngon
128a1(mdo sde): du 'dud// chos kyis de dag yid bde skyed par byed// de la dad mchog gzha' gsang thob par 'gyur// de nas shi 'phos mi yi 'jig rten du// rgyal po dam pa stom/ 
128a2(mdo sde): ldan 'khor los sgyur// de la sems can su yang sdig mi skye// skye bo mang po dga' zhing yid 'ong 'gyur// rdul bsal sems can mchog la rgyal mtshan phul// ring por mi thogs nor
128a3(mdo sde): mang rnyed par 'gyur// shes rab mtha' yas mdzod ni mang ldan 'ong // sems cung mi 'gyur dman pa'i sems mi 'gyur// longs spyod rnyed nas bged cing bdag kyang spyod// de ni 'jigs med
128a4(mdo sde): yid mi bde ba med// rgyal po dga' nas grong dang yul 'khoradabaged// de la sems can su yang sdig mi skyed// gtso dbo khyad par 'phags pa mdzod mang shing // khyim bdag rin chen
128a5(mdo sde): sna tshogs lus brgyan 'gyur// rgyal po'i bu 'am de ba zhin blon por 'ong // rgyal por gyur na stobs ldan rdzib med// brnyas pa'i rigs dman thams cad yongasu spong / 
128a6(mdo sde): longs spyod khyad 'phags rigs mchog rnyed nas ni// rtag tu bag yod sems ni zhum mi 'gyur// 'dod pa rnams ni ngan skyugs khung ltar spong // khyad 'phags gzugs dang mtshan rnams
128a7(mdo sde): rab tu 'thob// khyad 'phags rigs dang de bzhin dbang phyug nyid// de yi g.yog 'khor rtag tu mi phyed 'gyur// skye bo mang pos mdun du bdar bar 'ong // de ni gzhan la gnod pa'i sems mi skyed// sems
128a8(mdo sde): ni rab dang rtag tu bag yod ldan// de la me dang dug dang mtshon mi tshugs// skye bo tshogs chen gyis ni blta bar 'gyur// rab tu dga' zhing thub pa'i chos la spyod// shes bzhin ldan nas yid bde
128b1(mdo sde): skyed par byed// 'dzin pa med cing chags med sems dang ldan// chags med gyur nas de la mi 'thun med// de yi lus gtsang kun nas nyon mongs med// rnam dag sems ldan de ni bden par
128b2(mdo sde): smra// 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams la yid bde skyed// sems can rnams kyi skyabs dang dpung gnyen 'gyur// de ni bdag don rgya chen byas nas su// gzhan yang sangs rgyas ye shes rdzogs la
128b3(mdo sde): 'god// shing dbang shing mchog dam pa'i drung song nas// mtshungs med mchog ni byang chub 'tshang yang rgya// sangs rgyas mchod rten mar me gcig phul na// 'di nas bzung ste srid pa rtse mo'i bar// 
128b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas zhing ni 'dzam gling gser gyis gang // de 'dra'i dpal de zad par bya mi nus// bcom ldan mchod rten mar dme phul byas na// de yi lus ni mdog ngan yong mi 'gyur// gzug
128b5(mdo sde): mchog sra zhing lag pa gzu ba 'dra// snang ba thob nas 'jig rten kun tu rgyu// gal te rgyal ba dam par byung rgyu ran// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang nye bar 'gyur// nye dur
128b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ram yang na bur yang 'gyur// de ni ye shes phung po myur du 'thob/ gal te khrag khrig brgya stong sangs rgyas zhing // yungs 'bru dag gis byur bur gang gyur pa// bgrang ba dang ni
128b7(mdo sde): gzhal zhing brjod par nus// bde gshegs mar me gcig phul de lta min// sangs rgyas dam pa mtshungs med sbyin pa'i gnas// spyod pa mchog spyad khyad par brnyes gyur pa/ mi mchog da la/ 
128b8(mdo sde): mchod pa 'dir byas pa// rnam par smin pa dbang gzhal yas 'gyur// gal te mi mjed 'jig rten khams 'di kun// nor bu rin chen bai DUR+Yas gang ba// zad par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod/ 
129a1(mdo sde): rten la// mar me gcig phul dpal de zad mi 'gyur// kar sha ba nes mi mjed 'jig rten khams// 'og nas srid pa'i rtse mo bar gang pa// zad
129a2(mdo sde): par bya nus sangs mchod rten la// mar me gcig phul dpal de zad mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing stong de dag tsan+dan gyis// 'og nas srid pa'i rtse mo bar gang pa// zad par bya nus
129a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mchod rten la// mar me gcig phul dpal de zad mi 'gyur// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten yod pa'i lha ras kyi// gos kyi sangs rgyas zhing stong gang gyur pa/ zad par bya nus sangs rgyas
129a4(mdo sde): mchod rten la// mar me gcig phul dpal de zad mi 'a dgyur// klu dang lha min mi dang lto 'phye che/ dalha yi lha rdzas nor bu rin chen mang/ zad par bya nus sangs
129a5(mdo sde): rgyas mchod rten la// mar me gcig pul dpal de zad mi 'gyur// lha yi 'jig rten yod pa'i lha yi spos// de dag mi mjed 'di kun gang gyur pa// zad par bya nus sangs rgyas
129a6(mdo sde): mchod rten la// mar me gcig phul dpal de zad mi 'gyur// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams tshad ni shes par nus// nam mkha'i khams 'di'i tshad kyang shes par nus// sangs
129a7(mdo sde): rgyas mchod rten mar me gcig phul ba'i// de 'dri'i dpal de zad par bya mi nus// sangs rgyas dam pa mi mchog bzhud pa'i tshe// 'dren pa mtshungs pa med la dad byas te/ 
129a8(mdo sde): ston pa'i sku la gnyi zer mi 'bab par// me tog ma li ka gdugs bcom ldan phul// des ni las mdzes dam pa gus byas pas// lha dbang brgya byin du ni lan 'bum 'gyur// 'jig
129b1(mdo sde): rten kun tu tshangs pa'i bdag por gyur// rgyal ba'i mchod rten la ni 'bum phul nas// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po stobs ldan gyur// stong phrag bcu la dbang bar nga gyur te// nor chen
129b2(mdo sde): rab tu mdzod mang tshong dpon gyur// khyim bdag blo ldan bsod nams ldan par gyur// bde gshegs mi mchog bye ba nyi shu dag/ ngas ni mnyes byas gzims chan bza' yis// 
129b3(mdo sde): mi mchog dag la bla mar sti stang byas// de dag gtsug lag khang la spos kyis bkus// nga yi kha dog ngan pa kun med gyur// ngas ni tsha dang grang dang ngal ba spangs// sangs
