129b4(mdo sde): rgyas spyan sngar dman med sems gyur cing / de dag mchod pa dam pa mchog gis mchod// rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i gdugs mdzes lta sdug pa// su zhig
129b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan mchod rten 'bul byed pa// de 'dir lu sa ni mtshungs pa med 'gyur te// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis go char 'gyur// gang gis rgyal ba'i
129b6(mdo sde): sku ni rab 'bar zhing // khyad par 'phags pa'i gzugs dang sems 'dra dang // 'dzam gling gser ltar rab mdzes blta na sdug/ mtshan gyis me tog rgyas pas mngon tu gang // 
129b7(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa 'thob cing dbang cher grags// byang chub spyod mchog dam pa zhi ba spyod// de ni nams kyang longs spyod 'grib mi 'gyur// lhas kyang sti stang bya zhing mchod par 'ong // brtan
129b8(mdo sde): pa 'dod pa'i longs spyod gzhar mi dka'// tshul khrims rnam dag rab mkhas tshangs par spyod// yi dam bcas nas nags dang nags mdab song // mngon shes 'thob cing khyad par 'thob
130a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la gdugs 'bul ba// ji lta bur yang byang chub sems mi 'dor// byams la gnas shing mi dman sems su
130a2(mdo sde): 'gyur// de yi shes pa nams kyang nyams pa med// ro me'i sgra yis mchog mchod byas na// mya ngan med cing dbang ldan rgyal por 'ong // mi yi 'jig rten yid 'ong sgra ldan 'gyur// 
130a3(mdo sde): sgra yan lag tshang zhing dag par 'ong // bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na// shes bzhin ldan zhing mig ni dag par 'gyur// rna ba rnam par dag cing sems kyang dga'// sna
130a4(mdo sde): yi dbang po mchog dang ldan par 'gyur// de yi lce ni ra mdzes blta na sdug/ thog mar rab mnyen mdzes da shing sgra yid 'ong // dper na lha yi rin b+hu ru 'dra// swa skad
130a5(mdo sde): yan lag bye ba dpag med 'byin// bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo sgra byas na// nams kyang sbrul du mi 'gyur/ lce med min// zhar ba sgur po la yo can mi 'gyur// lus ni byang
130a6(mdo sde): bar 'phags shing shin tu mdzes// bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na// lha 'am klu 'am mi 'am lto 'phye che// su yang de la ma dang skye mi 'gyur// dbugs phyin thob nas 'jig
130a7(mdo sde): rten kun tu rgyu// bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo sgra byas na// de ni ma ning za mar gzhar mi 'gyur// nams kyang mdze dang sha bkra mi 'byung zhing // bsngags par nges pa'i lus ni thob par 'gyur
130a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na// lce ring 'gyur zhing lus kyang che bar 'gyur/ gser gyi gzugs ltar kha dog 'bar bar 'ong // ting 'dzin brtan zhing shin tu rtogs par 'gyur/ 
130b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan mchod rten rol me'i sgra byas na// lha nang bdag por 'gyur zhing dbang phyug 'gyur// mi yi 'jig rten skyes na dga' bar 'ong // brtson 'grus ldan zhing bag yod 'bar bar 'gyur// bcom
130b2(mdo sde): ldan mchod rten rol me'i sgra byas na// de la su yang yid mi bde mi skyed// de la su yang tshig rtsub smra ba med// bra ma thams cad spangs shing yang dag smra// bsod nams 'dod pa su zhig
130b3(mdo sde): phyag thogs te// bcom ldan mchod rten gus par 'phyag byed pa// de ni smad cing mi gtsang lus mi 'gyur// ba spu khung nas tsan+dan dri ngad 'byung // bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags/ 
130b4(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du// yan lag ma swa/ du khyad 'phags lus 'thob cing // mdzes lam datshan gyis go char byas par 'gyur// bcom ldan mya ngan 'das
130b5(mdo sde): pa'i mchod rten phyags// lha yi tsan+dan khyad 'phags rab mdzes pa'i// gzhal med khang mchog yid 'ong dri lba na 'thob// de ni de la gzhar yang sred mi skyed// bcom ldan mya
130b6(mdo sde): ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags// yid 'ong dri ldan mchog tu blta sdug pa'i// lha yi bu mo bye ba stong 'thob cing // de ni de la nams kyang mi skyed// bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i
130b7(mdo sde): mchod rten phyags// bskyed mos tshal mchog yod pa'i rdzing bu ni// yan lag brgyad ldan chu gtsang mdze gyur pa// me tog ud pa la las ni rgyas pa 'thob// bcom ldan mya ngan
130b8(mdo sde): 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags// de yi g.yog 'khor rtag tu 'thun 'gyur zhing // mi dman sems can lha yi sgra yang thos// lha mo rnams kyi grung dbyangs snyan sgra thob// bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i
131a1(mdo sde): mchod rten phyags// 'jig rten kun du skyes tshe bdag nyid kyis// 'di nas shi 'phos ngan 'gror mi 'gro zhing // mi yi 'jig rten sangs rgyas mthong bar
131a2(mdo sde): shes// bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags// de ni lha la snyan pa'i gtam byas te// sangs rgyas ye shes rdzogs la lha bkod nas// shi bi'i dus byas 'dzam bu'i
131a3(mdo sde): gling du skye// bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags// btsas ma thag tu bskal pa mtha' yas dran// sngon gyi sangs rgyas gtso rnams bkur ba dang // de dag mtshan dang yon tan ches
131a4(mdo sde): kyang dran// 'jig rten sangs rgyas ji ltar 'gyur zhes te// mos dpa bskyed nas mchod rten rtswa skyes sel// de yi phan yon de dag dngas bshad kyis// tha ba dri sol dang ba'i sems kyis nyon// mthu
131a5(mdo sde): chen skyes bu dam pa khyad 'phags pa// rgyal ba dam pa ma 'ongs du/ sa na mthong // de dag mchod pa dam pa mchog gis mchod / de ni gzha' gsang dad pa de ba 'thob// sangs rgyas stobs
131a6(mdo sde): bcu ded dpon des mthong nas// 'dren pa mtshungs pa med pa mchod pa byed// mtshan gyis go char byas pa'i sangs rgyas su// 'gyur zhes thugs dgyes de dag lung yang ston// grong khyer yangs pa
131a7(mdo sde): nyams dga' mchog gnas shing // nga ni chos ston gang gis mthong gyur pa// de dag phyi dus rab tu 'jigs pa'i tshe// rgyal mchog mya ngan 'das pa'i chos 'dzin 'gyur// mchod rten rtsa skyes sel bar
131a8(mdo sde): byed pa ni// rgyal bdas pa mi thul mthong 'dod pa'i// rgyu dang sa bon 'gyur ba 'di yin no// 'dod dang dmyal dang dud 'gro skye gnas spong / byang chub sems dpa' gang gis mdo mchog 'di
131b1(mdo sde): phyi ma rab 'jig dus na 'dzin byed pa// de ni 'jig rten sangs rgyas lha yi lha// bsod nams khyad 'phags mtshungs med zhing du 'gyur// 'di bshad tshe na gang dag 'dir mchod dang // tshul 'di bshad pa gang dag
131b2(mdo sde): thos pa dang // gang dag mdo mchog 'di ni 'dir bzung ba// de dag phyi ma'i dus na 'dir 'di 'dzin// gang dag phyin cad mdo mchog 'di 'dzin pa// de dag rtag tung dang 'thun pa'i sras// 
131b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bye bas de dag bsngags brjod kyang // de dag bsngags pa mthar ni byin mi 'gyur// gang dag phyi dus rgyal ba'i chos 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya mtha' yas/ 
131b4(mdo sde): bskal pa bye bar bzhugs te de dag gi/ bsngags pa pa rjod kyang mtha' mar phyin mi nus// dri nim yid 'ong spos kyi cho ga bzhin// sangs rgyas mchod rten la ni mu
131b5(mdo sde): skud pa// de ni 'thob rnyed 'jig rten kun tu rgyu// de nis 'dir snying por blangs par 'gyur// rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug bul byas na// bcom ldan 'das
131b6(mdo sde): kyis bstan pa 'jig 'gyur tshe// 'dzam bu'i gling du skye bar mi 'gyur zhing // da ni de tshe mtho ris bdag por 'gyur// rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na// dri mi zhim dang mi gtsang spad pa
131b7(mdo sde): rnams// rtag tu spong shing tshul khrims phung por gnas// de ni rtag tu tshangs spyod mchog 'dir spyod// rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na// 'di nas shi 'phos mtho ris lha dbang
131b8(mdo sde): 'gyur// ring por mi thogs don stong rnams la rtog/ lha rnams la ni rgya chen don kyang byed// rgyal ba'i mchod rten skyes byug phul byas na// gang gi chen mi'i 'jig rten na// ne sdang
132a1(mdo sde): med sems 'jas zhing mnyen gyur ba// de mi den 'jam bu'i gling du gnas// rgyal ba'i mchod rten thos drug phul byas na// khyad 'phags tshig ldan spa bya/ 
132a2(mdo sde): yid 'ong 'gyur// skye bo mang po yid 'ong dga' zhing bkur// de yi kha bzhin rtag tu gsal bar 'gyur// rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na// de ni ngan songs rnams ma
132a3(mdo sde): lus spong // de bzhin gshegs dang nye bar thob par 'gyur// dad pa thob cing rtag tu bde la dga'// rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na// rgyal po stobs ldan 'khor los sgyur bar
132a4(mdo sde): 'gyur// blon po tshong dpon khyim bdag bsod nams ldan// chos rje 'od mdzad sangs rgyas su yang 'gyur// dga' sems kyis mgu ba'i shugs bskyed de// bcom ldan mchod
132a5(mdo sde): rten nor bu'i dra ba 'bul// de ni rgyal po mtshan gyi go cha can// mthu che bla ma 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur// blta 'os mtshan gyi go cha ldan gyur nas// gzhal med khang / 
132a6(mdo sde): chen rab mdzes blta sdug pa// kha dog sna tshogs dpag med ldan pa dang // rin chen khang bzangs che 'os dag pa 'thob// rgyal po'i pho brang khyad par 'phags gyur pa// skyes pa bud med dag
132a7(mdo sde): gis gang ba dang // mnyam zhing legs byas rab mdzes blta sdug pa// dra bas sna tshogs bde byed bde 'jug 'thob// rgyal mtshan bdan gsal bas mdzes byas shing // gdugs bres
132a8(mdo sde): shin tu mdzes la blta sdug dang // mu tig dra baphreng ba de 'dra ba'i// rgyal srid yon tan khyad 'phags gzhan yang 'thob// de yi yul na gzhan nor 'jig byed pa// tshe ma kun nas
132b1(mdo sde): ldan g.yo can gnas mi 'gyur// sems can rgya chen blo mchog ldan pa dang // phan byed byams sems ldan pa de ni gnas// shi 'phos bag yod de ni lhar 'gro ste// dkar nag gang yin
132b2(mdo sde): bdag cag ji ltar gnas// 'di nas shi 'phos ji ltar mir skye zhes// blo ldan de ni mtho ris 'di gnas 'gyur// sangs rgyas sbyin gnas myur du mthong 'gyur te// mthong nas mchod cing
132b3(mdo sde): mtshungs med sti stang byed// sangs rgyas mthong nas byang chub mos skyed cing // rdul bral rnams la phyir zhing sti stang byed// ye shes mtha' yas ldan dang mthu chen 'gyur// khyad par sa
132b4(mdo sde): gnas 'phags pa'i sems can 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das/ del dad pa'i sems bskyed nas// 'di 'dra'i dpal 'di/ phyir zhing myong bar 'gyur// nga yi bya ba 'di ni brjod par bya// 
132b5(mdo sde): ngas brjod 'di la the tsom ma skyed cig/ sangs rgyas bka' spangs mnar med 'gror 'gyur zhing // phyin cad sdug bsngal nyon mongs gyur ta re// 'jig rten sgron ma mtshungs med
132b6(mdo sde): bsod nams zhing // de yi mchod rten brgya su sel ba// bag yod gyur nas de ni bdud rgya 'dral// dus rnams kun tu ngan song sa yang spong // rtag tu sangs rgyas rdul bral sti stang byed// 
132b7(mdo sde): rtag tu stobs ldan 'khor los sgyur// mi yi 'jig rten skyes na bsod nams ldan// rgyal po kun gyis mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur// lha nang lha yi dbang po mchod gnas 'gyur// der/ 
132b8(mdo sde): ni myur du lha yi tshe yang 'thob// dpal ldan gser gyi gzhal med khang pa rnyed// lha yi bde ba mtshungs med dbang phyug nyid// gzugs dang sgra dang dri rab ro mchog dang // reg bya dpal/ 
133a1(mdo sde): ldan lha yi 'jig rten mthog// mthu chen zhing blta ba'i 'os su 'gyur// lha mi rnams la 'dod pa'i sred mi skyed// bcom ldan 'das mchod rten brgyabs pa/ 
133a2(mdo sde): byas na// 'di nas shi 'phos mi 'jig rten 'gro/ yan lag legs gnas khyad par 'gro bar 'gyur// nam yang bstan bcos mi nyung mang po 'theb// bcom ldan 'das mchod rten brgya bas la
133a3(mdo sde): byas na// de ni mi khom brgyad po kun spong zhing // de ni dal 'gyur de bzhin khyad par 'phags// de ni sangs rgyas mtshungs med mchod pa byed// bcom ldan mchod rten brgya bsal byas na// bag yod blo gres brtan
133a4(mdo sde): la dpa' bar 'gyur// 'dod pa'i yon tan dag la dga' mi skyed // mi dman sems kyis mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur// bcom da ldan mched rten brgyabs la byas na// de ni nams kyang byang chub sems
133a5(mdo sde): mi 'dor// tshul khrims skyon med shin tu bsdams par 'gyur// rnam dag 'dod chags bral ba'i chos kyang mthob// bcom ldan mchod rten brgya bsal byas na// de yi mdag ngan dus rnams kun tu
133a6(mdo sde): spong // 'chal ba'i shes rab ma lus rnam par sbeng // shes rab rgya chen gyur nas spyod la gnas// bcom ldan mchod rten brgya bsal byas na// kha zas gtsang ma dag kyang rnyed 'gyur la// khyad 'phags
133a7(mdo sde): kha ton ldan zhing blta sdug la// reg dang ldan zhing rab mdzes gos rnams 'thob// dad pa'i shugs bskyed bcom ldan mchod rten la// me tog skam pa nyal nyil phyags byas na// 'dod pa smad bsdug
133a8(mdo sde): bsngal byed pa sbed// stobs bcu mang nid da dpon mnyes par byed// mchod rten me teg rjes pa su 'phyag ga// da ni mdzes shing nam da gsus su 'gyur// skye bo mang pos mchod 'os palta rnaMs
133b1(mdo sde): 'gyur// de la rgyal po gnod par sems mi 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod rten dag la snga rabs mis// me tog phul ba skam po phyags byas na// ngan song sa yi las ngan thams cad gcod// byang chub sems
133b2(mdo sde): dpa' tshul khrims phung por gnas// mchod rten me tog rnyis pa su 'phyag pa// bag yod mya ngan rnams dang skyon rnams spong // nad rnams du ma ma lus rnam par spong // bskal pa mtha'
133b3(mdo sde): yas rnams su dbugs phyin thob// mchod rten me tog rnyis pa su 'phyag pa// sbyin gnas mtshungs med sangs rgyas thob par 'ong// mtshungs med thob cing lha mis mchod 'os 'gyur// rnam dag
133b4(mdo sde): lus ldan rgyan gyis brgyan par 'gyur// lha yi me tog rab mdzes man da ra// mtshungs med pa ta la yang su 'bul nga dang // mchod rten me tog nyal nyil su 'phyag pa// de dag rnam
133b5(mdo sde): smin 'dra ste mchog tu 'gyur// mchod rten me tog rnyis pa/ su 'phyag pa// de lus dug gis mi tshugs mtshon mi tshugs// me 'bar 'od 'phro phung po ches mi tshugs// nor gyi phung
133b6(mdo sde): po rkun pos brku mi 'gyur// mgu zhing rab tu dga' ba'i shugs bskyed de// bcom ldan mchod rten me tog skam phyags na// de yi bsod nams bzung bar gang gyur pa// grangs sam cha yang
133b7(mdo sde): brjed par sla ma yin// mchod rten me tog rnyis pa su 'phyag pa// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis go char 'gyur// mi yi 'jig rten na ni rtag tu dga'// mthu dang ldan zhing yid 'ong sgra skad
133b8(mdo sde): 'byung // mchod rten me tog rnyis pa su 'phyag pa// chos mchog rab mdzes yang dag spyod byed cing // de lus rnam par dag pa chen por 'ong // ring por mi thogs 'jig rten sangs
134a1(mdo sde): rgyas 'gyur// 'jig rten pangs rgyas 'gyur bya mos bskyed de/ ston pa'i mchod rkyen tha la gyur bya 'jal pa// 'jig rten gan tham nga 'i bya/ 
134a2(mdo sde): mangs shing bstan sdug par 'gyur// de 'dang rgyal srid thob nas lha klu mi// lto 'byi che dang 'jig rten thams cad 'dud// steng gi 'jig rten khams kun rgyas par 'gyur// dbang phyug nyid du dbang theb
134a3(mdo sde): rgyal srid ston// de yi yul na sems can gang gnas pa// de kun sangs rgyas ye shes rdzogs la 'god// de ni ngan songs yang rnam par spong // de dag rnams kyi don mchog das pa byed/ 
134a4(mdo sde): bsod nams blo gros dran ldan mchod 'os 'gyur// dbugan+de thob nas 'jig rten kun tu rgyu// de yi g.yega' khor yid 'ong sgra skad ldan// bsam pa ji bzhin de dag
134a5(mdo sde): dga' ba skyed// sems can rnams la mi lhod ni tshig ston// de la su yang dbang phyug med mi byed// skye bo tshogs chen dag gis blta 'os 'gyur// de yi g.yog kyang sgra dbyangs
134a6(mdo sde): yan lag dag/ sangs rgyas mchod rten thal sbyar phyag 'tshal ba// sbyin dang snyan par smra dang don skyed dang // don 'thun pa dang skye bo mang la byed// spyos shing brgyad kyang khro ba'i dngos mi skyed// 
134a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mchod rten thal sbyar phyag 'tshal ba// mtho ris 'jig rten gnas shing lha dbang 'gyur// mir gyur na yang mi yi rgyal por 'ong // de ni gzhar yang yongs su nyams mi 'gyur// sangs
134a8(mdo sde): rgyas mchod rten thal sbyar phyag 'tshal ba// de ni gzhar yang ngan song phyis mi ltung // 'jig rten 'dir de rtag tu 'dod pa spong // nor can nang na phyug cing mdzod mang 'gyur// yon tan ldan la/ 
134b1(mdo sde): tshig gcig su smra ba/ de ni mi rigs sngags la gzhar mi spyod// mi yi 'jig rten gnas min spyod mi 'gyur// de la sems can mi ngoms dga' bar 'gyur// yid 'ongs dbyangs ldan po zang / 
134b2(mdo sde): 'khor gshegs shing // 'jig rten mgon po sgo gtan bzhugs pa'i tshe// su zhig shugs bskyed me tog blangs te gter// de ni brgyan nas rgyal ba dam pa mthong // rang gi khyim du stabs
134b3(mdo sde): bcu bsnyen bkur byed// de yi bshos gsol tshes bzang ston pa mdzad pa// dad pa skyes nas mi mchog bsnyen bkur byed// gos kyang thogs te rnam par 'dren la 'bul// sangs rgyas
134b4(mdo sde): byang chub mtshungs med mchog thob nas// stobs bcu ldan nga zhing g.yo ba med gyur la// byang chub sangs rgyas sdu dag bsngal skye bo 'grol// 'jig rten kun tu mtshungs med
134b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas shog/ de yi smon lam 'di 'dra 'di dang ni// sang / sa rgyas ye shes de sems dga' mkhyen nas// stong sa bcu 'dzum mdzad 'jig rten thams cad du// mtshungs med
134b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes lung ston to// skyes bu dam pa mchog gi gsung thos nas// bde gshegs mchog gsung gzhan du mi 'gyur te// bdag ni rgyal ba mchog 'gyur dogs med ces// dga' zhing
134b7(mdo sde): mgunas bar snang kun tu rgyu// 'jig rten lha yi lhar gyur sangs rgyas su// khyad 'phags mtshungs med sbyin gnas 'gyur ba dang / de sems spyod dang dga' bar gnas mkhyen nas// de la
134b8(mdo sde): stobs bcu mnga' bas bzhes par gyur// bde gshegs mchog gi gos ni bzhes rigs nas// de ni shugs skyes rab dga' sems mgu ste// mtshungs med 'jig rten mgon la bltas
135a1(mdo sde): nas ni// 'jig rten sangs rgyas bdag 'gyur mos bskyed// skye shi pha rol sems can bsgral bar bya// grol nas skye bo mang po 'dus byas dgrol// 'jig rten kun
135a2(mdo sde): na long ba'i med bdag gyur// snang ba thob nas mun pa rab rib bsal// de ltar phan yon dam pa 'di thos nas// me tog 'phreng ba rgyal mtshan gos mchog dang // rol mo sgra dang gdugs dang byug
135a3(mdo sde): bdug gis// mgon po mchog la sangs rgyas 'gyur bas gyis// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// dge slong de dag dang / blo gros rnam par dag pa la sogs pa/ byang chub sems
135a4(mdo sde): dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas dpa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa
135a5(mdo sde): spyan ras gzigs shes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'adz+ra na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes
135a6(mdo sde): sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya rang na lo ka nA ma d+ha ra Ni ma hA yA na sU tra// 'od
135a7(mdo sde): skad du/ 'phags pa dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs shes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// d-i
135a8(mdo sde): skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i bab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril dge slong stong du tshang ba thams cad kyang dkar po'i chos yongs su rdzogs pa/ seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ ye shes
135b1(mdo sde): kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa tshal ba la mkhas pa bcug gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
135b2(mdo sde): chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brtson dang / byang chub
135b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyis brgyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams mngon bsgrags dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
135b4(mdo sde): blo gros chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dang da' chen po yan tan bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i blo gros dang / byang chub
135b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / byangachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i mtshon cha dang / 
135b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs kyi blo gros
135b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don kun mthong dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems
135b8(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang
136a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan song spong dang / byang chub sems
136a2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
136a3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po mi len mi 'dor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tsan dan snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
136a4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po 'byung dka' dang / byang chub sems dpa' sernams dpa' chen po dga' 'byung dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub
136a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa brtsegs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mgyogs pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
136a6(mdo sde): byams pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis nges par byung
136a7(mdo sde): dbyangs smra thogs pa med pa sangs rgyas kyi shing dpag tu med pazil gyis gnon pa la mkhas pa/ mi 'jigs pa la gnas pa/ rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral / 
136a8(mdo sde): mi kyang ma byas dgasapa/ 'dal gsumasas cag pa tshigs ma byeng pa rdzun pa/ rnams da byen pa nyid sa sa pa byes pa/  ma dang / 
136b1(mdo sde): 'jug pa chad med pa dang ldan pa/ re ba thams cad yongs su sbyong ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnyogs par khong du chud pa/ yus dang ngag dang yi kyi las kyi mtha' den mod pa la mel pa
136b2(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par brtson pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang spyod pa tshad med pas byin gyis brlabs pa mi 'jigs pa thob pa/ stong pa nyid kyi srung yul ba// mtshan
136b3(mdo sde): ma med pa la gnas pa sha stag dang yang thabs gcig go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan
136b4(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ji ltar rtogs par bgyi/ bcom ldan
136b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni dngos po med par rtogs par bya'o// rig sa kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / spros
136b6(mdo sde): pa med pa dang / ma spros pa dang / blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / gnas pa med pa ste/ de ltar rtogs par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'
136b7(mdo sde): kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags chos kyi dbyings 'byung ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni
136b8(mdo sde): 'byung ba med pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni dngos po med par rtogs pa ste/ dngos po gang du yang brjod par bya ba
137a1(mdo sde): ma yin zhing bstan par bya ba ma yin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub la rnam pa du mchis/ 
137a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi rnam pa ni tshad med de// de ni tshad dang ldan par bstan par mi nus so// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ 
137a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par rtog par bgyid dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings ni rnam par mi rtog go// byang chub sems
137a4(mdo sde): dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par mi rtog pa lags na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ci'i slad du rtog par bgyid/ bcom
137a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byis pa so so na skye bo thams cad ni rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa las byung ba'o// byang chub sems
137a6(mdo sde): dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub 'di ni zab lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ ji
137a7(mdo sde): skad smras pa bzhin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos thams cad spros pa med pa ni byang chub ces bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bco
137a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol// bcom ldan
137b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dang 'akun tu babang po chos thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa la gnas pa 'di la dris shig dang / 'di khyod la ston par 'gyur ro// de nas 'das
137b2(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nu gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la mngon du phyogs te 'dug nas/ sor mo bcu thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// thams cad mkhyen cing thams
137b3(mdo sde): cad gzigs pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis ci'i slad du mi bshad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang na byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'di lta bu dang ldan pa dag 'khod pa
137b4(mdo sde): den de bzhin gshegs pa rnams btang snyoms su bzhugs so// / 'jam dpal gyis gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'ad/ das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni btang sbom su bzhugs pa ma
137b5(mdo sde): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nga ni sems can gyi khams yal bar 'dor pa ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa'
137b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi bstan pa ni bstan pa tshad med cing bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
137b7(mdo sde): kyis dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'di la dris shig dang / 'di khyod la
137b8(mdo sde): ston par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu skyes bu dam pa 'di ni ye shes kyi tshogs la gnas pa'o// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la
138a1(mdo sde): dgongs na/ bdag gis skyes bungs pa 'di la dri bar bci'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ting nge 'dzin rdul phra rab kyi rdul sbed rdzo
138a2(mdo sde): pa yin na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba gdab ci dgos// rigs kyi bu khyod ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la skal ba dang ldan pa yin no// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa// bcom
138a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos gang dag kun tu bsten pa dang / bsgoms pa dang / mang du bgyis pa de thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu'i mthur rig par bgyi'o// bcom
138a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu leg so lag das so// khyod kyi tshig 'di legs par smras te/ na kyang 'jam dpal nga khyod la gsol ba 'debs kyis/ khyod byang
138a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la dris shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skadaces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
138a6(mdo sde): bzang po 'di ni shin tu zab mo ston pa ste/ theg pa chen po rtogs par khong du chud pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyang chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal
138a7(mdo sde): po yin gyis bdag la ma srung shig/ yang rigs kyi bu khyod ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa/ ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dang / 
138a8(mdo sde): kun tu babang po la sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal te phyag 'tshal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras khyod kyis bdag la skabs byen// khyod la
138b1(mdo sde): bdags ni 'drug nyas shig drug// byang chub sems dpa kun tu babang pos smras pa/ rigs kyi dus la dpa' pa zhes dris shig/ de na pa 'dam dpa la gzhan nur gyur bas/ byang chu
138b2(mdo sde): sems dpa thasems dpa' chen bkun tu b.rang po la 'dis cis smras so// ce rtul ba'i sras sangs rgyas sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i gzhi'i din gang yin// byang chub sasems kun tubapa
138b3(mdo sde): bos smras pakye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas kyi gzhi don ni gzhi med pa'i don to// sangs rgyas kyi gni 'don ni dngos med pa'i don to// sangs rgyas kyi
138b4(mdo sde): gzhi'i don ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i don to// sangasargyas kyi gzhi don ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i don to// / sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni spros pa med pa'i don to// sa
138b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi gzhi 'don ni ma smos pa'i don to// sangs rgyas kyis/ zho don ni blang ba med pa'i dran to// sangs rgyas kyi mni'i'adin na dong ba med pa'i don no// sangs rgyas
138b6(mdo sde): kyi gzhi'i don ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i don to// sangs rgyas kyi gzhi'i don ni bsnyad du med pa'i don te/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi rang bzhin ni de lta bu yin no// 'jam
138b7(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras gal te chos thams cad spros pa med pa yin na/ 'o na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes ji skad bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' kun
138b8(mdo sde): tu bzang pos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bstan pa 'di ni bstan tu med pa'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bstan tu med na ci zhig bstan/ byang chub sems
139a1(mdo sde): par u bas smras pa/ 'angam dpal gags med pan gas te bstan / la ma dpal rgyal smras pa/ thetshul ba phras
139a2(mdo sde): pas ci zhig 'degs par byed/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdags pas ni dngos po yang mi 'dogs dngos po med pa yang mi 'dogs so// 
139a3(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ kye rgyal po'i bras gal te btags papa dnges pa yang mi 'degs/ dngos po med pa yang mi 'dogs na/ theg pa gsum po dag lta bstan// byang chub sems
139a4(mdo sde): dpa kun tu babang pos sbas pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ces kyi ts+tsha/ dngas chags pa med pa la chags par ma byed/ de ci'i phyi na// / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas/ chos thams cadan
139a5(mdo sde): dngos po med pa'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir te/ gang dngos po med pa'i phyir zhe na/ phung po lnga mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ byang chub spros pa dang bcas
139a6(mdo sde): pa yin nas/ 'on te spros pa med pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub ni smos pa dang bcas pa yang ma yin/ spros pa med pa yang ma yin te/ 'd-i
139a7(mdo sde): g+har byang chub dang spros pa dang bcas pa dang smos pa med pa de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
139a8(mdo sde): kun tu bzang po la/ rigs kyi bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa 'di/ legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no// gtam 'di brjod pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la rmongs par/ 
139b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos bstan pa 'di lta bu yi rnam par 'tshal bar mi rung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ 
139b2(mdo sde): ji skad smras pa bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad btags pa 'dis btags pa lags sam
139b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ dzaM skad smras pa bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces
139b4(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa'i sgo 'di ni mos par bgyi dka' ba lags so// pabacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ded
139b5(mdo sde): bzhin te ji skad smras pa bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'ad sa la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skadaces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub
139b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos// rnam par dag pa'i sgo bstan pa 'di legs par smras lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ ji skad
139b7(mdo sde): smras pa bzhin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di ni chos thams cad kyi rgyu 'thun pa yin no// 'di ni chos kyi char chen po yin no// de nas shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bram ze mnyam
139b8(mdo sde): banyid du gnas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub ni mnyam pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags te/ de la yi ge mi dmigs/ tshigs 'brum
140a1(mdo sde): dmig so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ chos kyi dbyings la tshig 'brumi snang don kyang mi snang ngo // de nas / 
140a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid kyi rgyu 'thun pa gang lags/ rnam pa gang lags/ rtags gang lags/ mtshan
140a3(mdo sde): ma gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid ni brjod du med pa/ bsnyad du med pa ste/ brjod du med pa'i chos nyid 'di la mos pa gang yin pa de stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 
140a4(mdo sde): stong pa nyid de ni yi ge med pa ste/ de'i phyir stong pa nyid ces bya'o// stong pa nyid de ni bsnyad du med pa ste/ de'i phyir stong pa nyid ce/ sa bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyis
140a5(mdo sde): stong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA/ rangadwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'ad/ sa byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos la gnas
140a6(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa ni mchog yin gyi/ dgra
140a7(mdo sde): bcom pa'i shes pa ni de lta ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dgra bcom pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las ring du gnas la/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su
140a8(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis
140b1(mdo sde): gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ nyan thos kyis ni nyan thos kyi chos rnams mthob pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nyan thos kyis nyan thos
140b2(mdo sde): kyi chos rnams ma thob ni ma yin te/ 'on kyang nyan thos la byang chub sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu dris pa lan gdab pa'am/ spyod pa'i byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i nus pa dang mthug la yod// de nas
140b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu
140b4(mdo sde): bstan pa lags na/ bstan pa 'di gang la bstan pa de lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ngas gang bstan pa 'di ni bstan pa med pa'o// 
140b5(mdo sde): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ gnas brta na shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// gnas brtan gyis nyan thos kyi chos rnams thob bam/ smras
140b6(mdo sde): pa de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'o na ci khyod so so'i skye bo'am/ smras pa de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'o na khyod ci slob
140b7(mdo sde): pa 'am/ smras pa de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'on khyod ci shes rab dang ldan pa'i mchog yin nam/ sbas pa/ de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis
140b8(mdo sde): sbas pa/ gal te btsun pa shA ra da ti'i bu so so'i skye bo yang ma yin/ slob pa yang ma yin/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i mchog kyang ma yin na/ de nyid khyod dmigs pa can du 'gyur ro// shA ra
141a1(mdo sde): / te'i bus spras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho ba na skyes budam pa rgya mtsho ltar gting dpag dka' ba khyod dang 'gyed par mi byed do// 'jas dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA
141a2(mdo sde): ra dwa ti'i bu khyod ni rga rabs thu bo mchog yin gyis/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de skad ma zer cig/ gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rgas pa'i dngos po ni ci yang thob par mi 'gyur// 
141a3(mdo sde): mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu don de nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dpe bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rdo rje ngan ngon gyis kyang brag chen po rnam
141a4(mdo sde): par 'jig go/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du khyod kyi spu'i khung bu gcig na shes rab 'dug pa gang yin pa de ni kho bo lta bu/ de'i sems can rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed rnams la med do// rigs
141a5(mdo sde): kyi bu don de nyid shes par bya ba'i phyir yang khyod la dang bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ bal glang glang po che she na tu mi zad pa chen po de yang / mi stobs dang ldan pas
141a6(mdo sde): lcags kyu chung ngus dul bar byed do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du khyod ni stobs dang ldan pa/ kho bo ni nyam chung ba ste/ glang po che chen po 'di lta bu dang kho bo 'gyed ga la nus/ de nas bcom
141a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das la gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ mi dmus long gis ni shul du mchi ba 'am/ grong khyer mthong bar/ 
141a8(mdo sde): yang rngo mi thog na/ khyim nas khyim du mchi bzhi rdo ltag la thog ste de ni gnas ma yin no// de bzhin du glang po che chen po 'di lta bu 'di dag gi mdun na bdag ni dmus long dang mtshungs
141b1(mdo sde): par mthong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di dag ni tsam du rgya che ba lags so// bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snong du ma gyu te/ daci bgyir mang ma mchis so// bcom ldan
141b2(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ shA radwa ti'i bu de ska dam zer cig/ shA rAr+yadwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dakyis sems can ji snyed cig la reg pa de dag thams cad sangs
141b3(mdo sde): rgyus kyi chos rnams thob pa yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du khyod ni ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas shing bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyisatsham
141b4(mdo sde): kyi nam grangs 'di bshad pa na lha dang mi'i skye dgul ngas sems can dgu khri nyis sdeng gis ches mngon par rtog dpa par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ches kyi
141b5(mdo sde): blo gros byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin dkon mchog tal la sbyor ba mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros
141b6(mdo sde): snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul snyed kyi pha rol nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas
141b7(mdo sde): kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phrag kyi rdul snyed kyis zhal mngon par bstan te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang mtshan rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya bar 'thun pa sha stag go/ 
141b8(mdo sde): phyogs gcig ji lta bar phyogs bcu rnams nas kyang de bzhin te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// chos kyi blo gros khyod de ltar byang chub sems
142a1(mdo sde): dpa' ting nge 'dzin sbyor ba mtha' yas pa la sems par zhugs pa leg so legs so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
142a2(mdo sde): rnam par snang mdzad 'di nyid kyi sngon gyi smon lam dang / sngon gyi byin gyi brlabs dang / khyod nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsabs nye bar brtan pas// 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad bstan par
142a3(mdo sde): bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnam par snang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnam pa 'phel bar bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings su 'jug par bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams
142a4(mdo sde): rnam par dkrol ba dang / chags pa med pa'i ye shes la 'jug cing chud par bya ba dang / kun tu sbyor bar bya ba dang / skad thams cad brjod par bya ba dang / thams
142a5(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'jug par bya ba dang / chos thams cad la sgrib pa med par bya ba dang / dus gsum thams da yongs su shes pa'i chos bstan pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ 
142a6(mdo sde): phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phrarab kyi rdul snyed thams cad kyang mtshan mthun par 'di dag thams cad byed la byin gyis rdzo gyis/ rigs kyi bu 'odas
142a7(mdo sde): ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa bcu las rtsom ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi chos bstan pa 'dri la spobs bskyed cig/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom
142a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das de dag gis byang chu sems dpa' tshas gyi kyi grol la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba dang / sgrib pa med pa dang / zod pa med pa dang / gan pa med pa'i chos nyid dang bdang
142b1(mdo sde): bamed pa'i ye shes dang / khan mo bded pa dang / malachil so non pa dang / shum bamed pa dang / 'dzugs pa med patshachas nyi dang / brjod papabang po nya par grub pa ma da// de/ 
142b2(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gres kyi
142b3(mdo sde): mgo la thug pa mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la reg ma thag tu/ de nas ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
142b4(mdo sde): de dag la sbas pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ byang chub se mas dpa' rnams kyi rigs 'di ni 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi
142b5(mdo sde): mtha' gtugs pas rgya che ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dang// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnams ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
142b6(mdo sde): rigs su skye ba yin/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba yin no// de nas
142b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras/ gang dag 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs
142b8(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs su skye ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni gang yin// gang las bsam te de skad smra/ kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub
143a1(mdo sde): / sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa bcu po de dag gang yin pa de shod cig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis/ byang chub sem
143a2(mdo sde): dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa ni bcu po 'di dag ste/ de dag ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / 
143a3(mdo sde): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so// gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par
143a4(mdo sde): gzhag pa dang / las dang po pa dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa dang / skye bar skyes pa dang / sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / bsam/ de ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / gzhon nur gyur
143a5(mdo sde): ba dang / rgyal 'tsha ba dang / dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'
143a6(mdo sde): rnam par gzhag pa ni bcu po de dag ste/ de dag ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsung so// gsung // gsung bar 'gyu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la sems dang
143a7(mdo sde): bo skyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ma thag tu gzugs
143a8(mdo sde): bzang ba 'am/ mdzes pa 'am/ kha dog bzang po rgyal po 'am/ rgya che ba 'am/ gzi brjid che ba 'am/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'am/ kun brjod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'am/ rjes
143b1(mdo sde): su bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngam/ sems can sdug bsngal ba dag mthong ngam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa rgya cher thos na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
143b2(mdo sde): 'dod cing / thog ma nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// sems bskyed ma thag tu de nyid kyis bsnyen par dka' ba'i gnas bcu yongs su bzung bar 'gyur te/ bcu gang
143b3(mdo sde): zhe na/ 'di lta ste gnas dang gnas ma yin pa shes pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las dang / chos yang dag par blangs pa shes pa dang / thams cad
143b4(mdo sde): du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa dang / khams du ma sna tshogs sha das pa dang / mos pa dang rnam par grol ba du ma shes pa dang / dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa dang / bsam
143b5(mdo sde): gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge'/ dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs/ pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / ldang thams
143b6(mdo sde): cad shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang / lha'i mig gi shes pa dang / zag pa zad pa'i shes pa ste/ bsnyen par dka' ba'i gnas bcu po de dag yongasu
143b7(mdo sde): bzung bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang
143b8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas mchod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba'i yo byad la sbyar bar bya'o// de la 'jig rten gyi bdag por 'gyur ba dang / mchog tu bya ba dang / 
144a1(mdo sde): zil gyis mi non pa dang / sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa dang / 'brang ba dang / rab tu zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la nal 'byor du bya ba dang / 'khor ba'i 'khor
144a2(mdo sde): lo rnam par bzlog pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / sems can sdug bsngal ba yongasu bskyab pa yang brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems
144a3(mdo sde): bskyed ma thag pa de nyid kyis/ shas cher sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sbyor zhing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal
144a4(mdo sde): ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sedams dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dang // de la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang
144a5(mdo sde): zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can rnams la thog ma nyid du sa mas rnam pa bcu bskyed de/ rnam pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di
144a6(mdo sde): lta ste/ phan par bya ba'i sems dang / bde bar bya ba'i sems dang snying brtse ba'i sems dang / mnyen pa'i sems dang / sdug pa'i sems dang / phan gdags pa'i sems dang / kun tu bsrung ba'i sem
144a7(mdo sde): dang / snyoms pa'i sems dang / slob dpon gyi sems dang / ston pa'i sems te sems rnam pa bcu po 'di dag skyed do// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye
144a8(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sras dag/ las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de lung gnod pa dang / kha ton la sbyar bar bya'o// mang du thos nas rab tu dben pa la sbyar bar bya'o// rab tu dben par gyur nas
144b1(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mngon par dga' ba la sbyar bar bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mngon par dga' nas bka' blo bde ba la sbyar bar bya'o// bka' blo bde bar gyur nas dus shes pa la
144b2(mdo sde): sbyar bar bya'o// dus shes par gyur nas mi 'jigs pa la sbyar bar bya'o// mi 'jigs par gyur nas don shes pa la sbyar bar bya'o// don shes par gyur nas/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba la/ 
144b3(mdo sde): sbyar bar bya'o// chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar gyur nas/ rjed pa med pa'i chos nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// rmongs pa med par gyur nas/ chos rnam par dgod pa la sbyar bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
144b4(mdo sde): 'di ltar sems bskyed ma thag pa de nyid kyis shas cher sangs rgya sa kyi chos thams cad la mngon par brtson par byed cing god du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid
144b5(mdo sde): sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/  rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras
144b6(mdo sde): dag/ de la rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni darigs pa rnam pa bcus chos rnams
144b7(mdo sde): rtogs par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la mi rtags par byed pa dang / chos thams cad la sdug bsngal ba nyid dang / bdag med pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / g.ye ba med pa nyid
144b8(mdo sde): dang / dbugs 'byin pa med pa nyid dang / gnas med pa nyid dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid dang / rtsol ba med pa nyid dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med du rtogs par byed de/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang
145a1(mdo sde): 'gyur 'byar rdzor ba lang sa byed/ mi myor bar yang mi byed de/ rtse rgyal ba'i smras pa/ 'di rnal 'byer gyud pa'i byang chub sems pa'o// kye rgyal / 
145a2(mdo sde): sras dag/ rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems can gyi khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o// chos kyi dbyings brtags pa la sbyar bar bya'o// 'jig rten gyi khams brtag pa la
145a3(mdo sde): sbyar bar bya'o// sa'i khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o// chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / na mkha'i khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / gzugs
145a4(mdo sde): kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams brtag pa la sbyar bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shas cher chos rnams la snang ba 'jug cing gong du gnas gang dag thes
145a5(mdo sde): pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag
145a6(mdo sde): pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yongs su sbyang ba byed pa bcus
145a7(mdo sde): gsung rab 'phags par skyes pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang / sangs rgyas la mi byed pa'i dad pa mthar thug par 'gyur ba yongs su grub pa dang / chos nges
145a8(mdo sde): par sems pa dang / sems can la rnam par dpyod pa dang / shing la rnam par dpyod pa dang / 'jig rten la rnam par dpyod pa dang / las la rnam par dpyod pa dang / rnam par smin pa la rnam par dpyod pa dang / 
145b1(mdo sde): 'khor ba la rnam par dpyod pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la rnam par dpyod pa ste/ yongs su skyong ba byed pa bcu po dag gis gsung rab 'phags par skyes pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni skye bar skyes
145b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ skye bar skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas
145b3(mdo sde): kye chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar
145b4(mdo sde): bya'o// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par 'a grub par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar
145b5(mdo sde): bya'o// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par 'grub pa rna// ma par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos yang dag par 'grub pa rnam par dpyad pa la sbyor bar bya'o// 
145b6(mdo sde): 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dbye da pa la sbyar bya'o// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// da
145b7(mdo sde): ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos yongs su 'grub pa mnyam pa nyid rnam par dpyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir
145b8(mdo sde): zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shas cher dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du rtog par byed cing / gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal
146a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i rnam par gzhag pa ga zhen/ the rgyal ba'i bras dang/ 'di la sbyor bkun su mchogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi dge ba'i las grang tsam yang de thams cad semasacan
146a2(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la bde bar sbyar bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse bar bya
146a3(mdo sde): ba dang / sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la gnod pa med par bya ba dang / desems can thams cad drang bar bya ba dang / sems can thams/ 
146a4(mdo sde): cad dad par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad gdul ba bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir rtsom ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 
146a5(mdo sde): ni sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la gnas bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'dis
146a6(mdo sde): ste/ sems can mtha' yas pa dang / sems can dpag tu med pa dang / sems can grangs med pa dang / sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sems can mtshungs pa med pa dang / sems
146a7(mdo sde): can gnal du med dang / sems can stong pa nyid dang / sems can g.yo ba med pa nyid dang / sems can med pa nyid dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa nyid do// de ci'i phyir nan/ 'di
146b1(mdo sde): ltar de shas cher mngon pa nan pa med pa la sems 'jog cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras drag/ 'don
146b2(mdo sde): sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang she na/ kye rgyal
146b3(mdo sde): ba'i sras dag/ 'di la bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos bcu thob pa na// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin te/ bcug zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sangs
146b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi bsngags pa 'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam 'anges ba yin/ chos kyi bsngags pa'am/ bsngags pa ma yin/ 
146b5(mdo sde): ba 'chad kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsngags pa 'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam banges pa yin/ byang
146b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i bsngags pa 'am/ bsngags pa ma yin pa 'chad kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam bo nges pa yin/ sems can gyi khams chung zhes 'chad pa'am/ 
146b7(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams rgya che zhe 'am/ sems can gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can zhe'am sems can gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin zhe 'am/ seMn gyi khams gdul bla zhel/ chen gyi kham pagatu
146b8(mdo sde): dka' zhe 'am/ chos kyi dbyings chung na'am/ ches kyi dbyings rgya che zhe 'am// 'jig rten gyi khams dag 'jig ce'am/ mi 'jig ce'am/ chos kyi dbyings yod ce'am/ chos
147a1(mdo sde): kyi dbyings med ces 'chad kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bsam pa nges pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni bsam pa phun sumachog
147a2(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la ches kyi rjes su 'jug pa bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di/ 
147a3(mdo sde): lta ste/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med du yang dag par brjod par bya ba dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa nyid dang / med pa nyid
147a4(mdo sde): dang / brdzun pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid med pa nyid dang / sgyu ma lta bu nyid dang / rmi lam ltarabu nyid dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid du yang dag par brjod
147a5(mdo sde): par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de mi 'phrog/ sa pa'i phyir shas cher lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par 'phel ba 'i chos can du gyur cing / gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas
147a6(mdo sde): de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal
147a7(mdo sde): pa'i sras dag/ de la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dmigs pa bcu thos na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
147a8(mdo sde): rnams las phyir mi ldog ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas yod do zhe 'am/ med do zhes thos kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog pa dang / chos yod do zhe'am/ med do zhes
147b1(mdo sde): bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yod de ge'am/ med de zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' smod pa yod dege'am/ med dezhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dang 'byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas
147b2(mdo sde): nges par 'byung de na 'am/ nges par mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag 'das so zhe'am/ ma 'das so zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la byin to zhe 'am/ ma byon pa
147b3(mdo sde): ma yin no zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag da ltar thung ba'o zhe 'am/ da ltar byung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes zad do zhe'am/ mi zad do zhes bya
147b4(mdo sde): ba 'am/ dus gsum po dag mtshan nyid gcig ce 'am/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ma yin no zhes thos kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
147b5(mdo sde): dag/ 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dang / 'di la chos kyi rgyun bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcu gang na
147b6(mdo sde): na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad gcig pa nyid dang / tha dad pa nyid du yang dag par brjod par bya'o// mang ba dang gang gcig pa nyid dang / yi ge la don sgro btags pa dang / don la yi ge sgro btags
147b7(mdo sde): pa dang / dngos pos dngos po med pa sgro btag pa dang / dngos po med pas dngos po sgro btags pa dang / mtshan mas mtshan ma med pa sgro btags pa dang / mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma sgro btags
147b8(mdo sde): pa dang / mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid med pa sgro btags pa dang / mtshan nyid med pas mtshan nyid smre btags pa yang dag par brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de shas cher chos
148a1(mdo sde): thams cad la mkhas pa yongs su smin pa'i tshul la nges par 'byung zhing gong du gnas gang dag thes pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi/ gzhan gyi
148a2(mdo sde): dring la 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub
148a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la gzhon nur gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rtogs pa bcu dang ldan pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi wa
148a4(mdo sde): 'bras bu yod pa dang ldan pa yin/ ngag gi las 'bras bu yo da pa dang ldan pa yin/ yid kyi las 'bras bu yod pa dang ldan pa yin/ sems bskyed pa tsam gyis skye ba mngon
148a5(mdo sde): bar sgrub pa yin/ sems can gzhan dang / gang zag ga/ zhan rnams kyi bsam pa shes par byed cing mos pa la rtog pa yin/ sems can gyi khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/ 
148a6(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/ gzugs kyi khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa yin/ dus ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i phyir mngon par shes
148a7(mdo sde): ba myur ba yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la chos mngon par bsgrub pa bcu yang
148a8(mdo sde): dag par brjod par bya ste/ bcug zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu g.yo bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
148b1(mdo sde): zhing rnam par dpyad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par 'gro ba dang / dri ba grangs med pa dri ba dang / yid kyi lus mngon par sgrub pa dang / sgra skad la
148b2(mdo sde): sbyor ba tshad med pa dang / sems bskyed pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa yongs su 'grub pa yang dag par brjed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shas cher mngon par sgrub pa mkhas
148b3(mdo sde): pa la sbyor zhing / gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la yang bdag nyid sbyor gyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems
148b4(mdo sde): dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de la rgyal 'tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang dazhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la rgyal 'tshab kyi byang
148b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ni chos rtogs par bya ba bcu la mkhas pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi skye ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ nyon mongs pa rgyu ba rtogs
148b6(mdo sde): bar bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ spyod yul la sbyor ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin// chos nyid rtogs par bya ba la
148b7(mdo sde): mkhas pa yin/ nye bar spyad pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dbye ba rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar
148b8(mdo sde): byung ba shes pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa la nges par rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/ don dam pa'i bden pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
149a1(mdo sde): dag/ 'di ni rgyal 'tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ rgyal 'tshab kyi byang chub sems dpa' de la gnas bcu yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ 
149a2(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor la mkhas pa yang dag par brjod par bya'o// rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du kun tu spyad pa dang / rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug pa/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du rnam par
149a3(mdo sde): dpyad pa dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i dbang bskur ba dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i byin gyi brlabs dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i pha rol gnon pa dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i gnas dang / chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' lung
149a4(mdo sde): yang dag par brjod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di da ltar de'i sems shas cher chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa ra sgrub pa la 'jug cing gong du gnas gang dag thos pa'i gnas de dag la
149a5(mdo sde): yang bdag nyid bsgrub kyi gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa thob pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni rgyal 'tshab kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// kye rgyal
149a6(mdo sde): ba'i sras dag/ 'di la dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di la dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ shes pa
149a7(mdo sde): mngon par sgrub pa bcu dang ldan pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rab tu g.yo bar byed pa mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa byin gyis rlob pa mang ba yin// 
149a8(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sems cig gis 'da' bar byed pa mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa yongs su sbyang ba byed pa mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa'i sems gcig gis rnam par
149b1(mdo sde): rig par byed pa mang ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa la rnam par lta ba mang ba yin/ sems can grangs med pa'i sems kyi spyod pa la sems gcig gis rnam par dpyod pa la mkhas pa yin
149b2(mdo sde): sems can grangs med pa'i dbang po sems gcig gis rdzogs par byed pa la mkhas pa yin/ sems can grangs med pa 'dul ba la mkhas pa yin/ sems can grangs med pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
149b3(mdo sde): sems la 'dzud pa la mkhas pa yin no// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ rgyal 'tshab kyis la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' man ca gang gis kyang dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de'i
149b4(mdo sde): lus kyi las shes par mi nus ngag gi las shes par mi nus/ yi dkyi las shes par mi nus/ rdzu 'phrul shes par mi nus/ rdzu 'phrul rnam par lta ba shes par mi nus/ 'das/ 
149b5(mdo sde): pa'i dus la rnam par lta ba shes mi nus/ zhing mngon par/ 'du byed pa shes par mi nusablos rnam par lta ba she/ sa par mi nus/ sems kyi yul shes par mi nus
149b6(mdo sde): ye shes kyi spyod yul shes par mi nus te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dang/ 'di ni dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ dbang bskur ba thob
149b7(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gnas bcu yang dag par brjod par mdzad de/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dus gsum shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos shes
149b8(mdo sde): pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa shes pa dang / chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dpung med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sdang
150a1(mdo sde): bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byin gyis brlab pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su shes pa dang / chos thams cad mngon par shes
150a2(mdo sde): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mtha' yas pa brjod pa mngad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni shas cher thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sems 'jug pa'i phyir te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di ni
150a3(mdo sde): dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems
150a4(mdo sde): dpa' rnam par gzhag pa bcu bshad ma thag tu/ de nas de tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi
150a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos// rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to// ldeg rab tu ldeg/ 
150a6(mdo sde): kun tu rab tu ldeg go/ bur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// chem chem/ rab tu chem chem mo// 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// 
150a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang chos nyid thob pas lha'i me tog gi sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab po// lha'i bdug pa'i sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab bo// lha'i spos kyi sprin gyi char yang mngon par
150a8(mdo sde): bab po// lha'i phye ma'i sprin gyi char dang / lha'i phreng ba'i sprin gyi char dang / lha'i gos kyi sprin gyi char dang / lha'i rin po che'i sprin gyi char dang / lha'i pad+ma'i sprin gyi char dang / lha'i
150b1(mdo sde): rgyan 'phreng gi sprin gyi char dang / lha'i rgyun gyi sprin gyi char yang mngon par bab bo// lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang ma dkrol bar sgra byung ngo // lha'i snang ba yang rab tu byung ngo // lha'i nga ro yang
150b2(mdo sde): grag go// gling bzhi pa 'dir ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po'i khang par ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang chos bstan pa 'di khyab par gyur nas byung ste lhag chad med do// tshig 'bru 'di dag
150b3(mdo sde): nyid kyis don nyid ston to// sangs rgyas kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kyi pha rol nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
150b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed lhags te/ phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang nas/ 'di skad ces 'dzer te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar khyed byang chub sems dpa'i chos
150b5(mdo sde): nyid 'di ston pa lags so// leg so// kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bdag cag kyang ming chos kyi blo gros shes bya ba sha stag ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi sprin ces bya ba dag nas/ de
150b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan chos kyi blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba sha stag gi thad nas 'dir phyin to// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis de dag thams cad du yang tshes bstan pa 'di byung ste/ 'khor
150b7(mdo sde): 'di lta bu dag gi nang du tshig 'bru 'di dag gis don 'di nyid ston te lhag chad med do// kye rgyal po'i sras bdag cag ni khyod kyi dbang du gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir/ 
150b8(mdo sde): byin to// bdag cag ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad du ri rab kyi rtse mor lha'i dbang po'i khang pa rnams su yang byang chub sems
151a1(mdo sde): das tsu dul tham 'i tshul me can pa // bam pa / mas
151a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / chos kyi dbyings la yang dag par bltas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag grus/ 
151a3(mdo sde): rang byung shi nam dag tho ma parab/ mangs shing gzugs kyi stobs dang ldan gyur pa// sred da/ 'a mtshan gyis brgyan pa mthong gyur nas/ byang chubaden du brtan pa
151a4(mdo sde): sems 'jog byed// do zla med pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs na ngams dang / kun brjod bzang dang rjes su bstan pa da dang / sdug bsngal bzang rlag 'jig rten 'gro mthong nas
151a5(mdo sde): byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'dog byed// len tan du/ rten gyi 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs/ kun tu b.rang kha yon tan thos gyur nas/ nam mapa'i dbyings 'dra 'gyur ba med
151a6(mdo sde): ba yi/ byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed// gnas rnams ji snyed gang dag yod gyur dang // rang bzhin gnas pa'i gnas rnams gzhan dag kyang // gzhan min dngos por rnam par rtog
151a7(mdo sde): bya'i phyir// byang chub den tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar dus dag na// dag dang ming ge las rnams gang yod pa/ de dag rgyu rnams rtogs par bya'i phyir/ byang
151a8(mdo sde): chu bden tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed// ting 'dzin bsam gtan rnam thar spyod pa dang // de bzhin snyoms 'jug rnam dag mthar thug pa// de dag gnas skabs rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub
151b1(mdo sde): do tu brtan pa sems padi 'dog/ 'ag rten brtson 'grus stobs dang dbang po rnams/ ci 'dra ci 'drede mi de dang de // rim bde dag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chu bdon tu ban pa sems 'dzin
151b2(mdo sde): byed/ 'jig rten kun gyis mos paci 'dra dang // lhag pa'i bsam pa tha dad nam gsum nas/ bstan bcos du ma rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed/ nas
151b3(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs rnam pa du ma'i khams/ gang dag 'jig rten gsum 'dir yod kun gyi// khams kyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems de 'jog/ chos 'dir kun tu 'gro
151b4(mdo sde): bar gang gyur cing / dge ba'i 'jug pa gang yang rabral dadrug pa// yang dag rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chubaden tu bstan pa sems 'jig byed/ shing rnams thams cad/ 
151b5(mdo sde): ji ltar 'byung ba dang // sems can ji ltar sa la 'byung 'gyur zhes// chags med mig ni rab tu dbye ba'i phyir// byang chubadon tu bstan pa sems 'di 'jog/ 'das pa'i dus dang da ltar byung dus
151b6(mdo sde): na/ sems can ris dngos mtshan nyid gang yod dang // sngon gyi gnas rnams rtog par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu bstan pa sems 'di 'jog/ ji ltar 'gro bar sems can 'ching byed pa// kun
151b7(mdo sde): tu sbyor ba 'jig rten gang yod pa'i// nyon mongs zad pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu bstan pa sems 'di 'jog/ 'jig rten gsum na tha snyad gang brtags dang // ngag
151b8(mdo sde): lam sngags tshul spyod pa gang yod pa// brda yi bden pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu bstan pa sems 'di 'jig/ chos rnams thams cad brjod du med pa ste/ stong pa mig yor rang bzhin ngo ba nyid// 
152a1(mdo sde): don dam bden pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu bstan pa sems 'jog byed// zhing rnams dag tu sa g.yo bstan pa dang // rgya mtsho dag kyang rnam
152a2(mdo sde): bar 'khrugs pa dang // de bzhin gshegs kyi rdzu 'phrul bstan pa'i phyir// byang chub don tu bstan pa sems 'di 'jog/ 'od zer rtse me re las 'od zer rnams// de bzhin phyogs bcu kun tu rab tu
152a3(mdo sde): 'gyed// de dag 'od gcig rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu bstan pa sems 'jog byed// zhing mang bsam gyis mi khyab gang yod pa// de dag rang gi lag tu mngon sprul te/ sgyu ma'i
152a4(mdo sde): tshul de rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu bstan pas/ mas 'jog byed// zhing rnams ji ltar de bzhin sems can kun// gnod pa med par lag pa'i mthil bzhag nas// chos rnams
152a5(mdo sde): sreg med rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu bstan pa sems 'di' jog/ rgya mtsho rnams ni ji snyed chu yod pa// skra rtswa 'i thigs pa'i nang du 'jug par byed// ma lus mthar thug rtog
152a6(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ zhing rnams kun na phra rab rdul gyi bag/ gang yod de dag ma lus bgrang byed cing // phra rab rdul grangs rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang
152a7(mdo sde): chu ba don tu brtan pa sems 'jig byed// 'jig rten 'din 'das pa de bzhin du// ma 'ongs sreg pa'i bskal pa 'jig pa rnams// bskal pa zad pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub den
152a8(mdo sde): du bstan pa sems 'di 'jog/ dus gsum dag gi de bzhin gshegs rnams dang // ston pa rang rgyal thos las byung rnams kyi// chos kyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub don tu brtan pa sems
152b1(mdo sde): 'di 'jog/ brjed du med pa'i 'jig rten khams kyi rnams// skra yis bcings nas ma lus spang la 'debs/ dngos po'i rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chubadon tu brtan pa sems
152b2(mdo sde): 'di 'jogakhor yug ri bo bsam gyis mi khyab pa// sgra yis bcings nas ma lus srang la 'debs// rags dang phra ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ lus
152b3(mdo sde): pa med pa'i 'jig rten khams rnams su// skad cig gcig la dbyangs kyis go bar byed// dbyangs kyi yan lag dag pa bstan pa'i phyir// byang chub den tu bstan pa sems 'di 'jog/ 'di rten
152b4(mdo sde): kun gyi sgra rnams ci 'dra ba/ skad cig gcig la skad cig brjod byed cing // zhi ba'i rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ 'jig
152b5(mdo sde): rten gsum po ma lus rtogs par byed// sems can kun gyi/ sa rab tu rnam par shes/ lce yangs rgya chen rtogs pa/ ra bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems
152b6(mdo sde): 'jog byed// zhing rnams kun tu brjod dang 'dra bar yang // skad cig gcig la lta gyur sel bar byed// rnam rtog chos rnams rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan
152b7(mdo sde): pa sems 'jog byed// 'dir ni zhing rnams thams cad ma lus par// de bzhin gshegs pas gang zhig rang byung gi/ chos rnam skad cig gcig la rtogs pa'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa
152b8(mdo sde): sems 'di 'jog/ rdul phran tha dad lta bur 'jig rten khams// rnam pa kun tu mngon par sprul byed cing // yid las byung ba de dag rtogs bya'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa
153a1(mdo sde): sems 'jog byed// 'das dang de bzhin ma byon sangs rgyas rnams/ ji snyed gang dag 'jig rten bzhugs so cog/ sems kyis skad cig
153a2(mdo sde): gcig la rtogs bya'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'jog byed// tshig cig brjod kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// bskal pa zad kyid la nyams pa med// tshig rab dbye ba rtogs/ 
153a3(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub don tu brtan pa sems 'di 'jog/ phyogs bcu rnams kyi 'jig rten thams cad kyi// 'gro ba ci 'dra ldog pa ci 'dra ba// sems kyi skad cig gcig
153a4(mdo sde): la rtogs bya'i phyir// byang chub don tu bstan pa sem sa 'jog byed// phyogs rnams kun tu 'gro yang lus kyis sam// ngag gam yid kyis gang dubang chags pa
153a5(mdo sde): med// dus gsum stong pa nyid du rtogs bya'i phyir// byang chub den tu brtan pa sems 'di 'dzeg/ byang chub sems ni ji ltar bskyed pa bzhin// gzhal yas bskal
153a6(mdo sde): bar phyogs su rgyu byed cing // sangs rgyas spyan sngar mched par bya'o zhes// 'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin// phyogs bcu dag ni 'jig rten tha dad par// 'jig rten bdag
153a7(mdo sde): por rgyal ba'i sras 'gyur ba// gang yang rung ba dam pa sgrogs par byed// 'di ni mi ldeg rnams kyi bstan pa yin// byang chub don tu srid par spyad spyod tshe// byang chub sems dpa'i
153a8(mdo sde): bde sbyar gang yin pa// de yi bsngags pa rtag tu brjed par byed// 'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin// chos mchog chos rab phul du byin pa dang // khyad par 'phags chos bla med
153b1(mdo sde): gang yod pa// de dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ston// 'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin// yon tan kun ldan de bzhin gshegs pa yi// tshe nyid 'din yod kyi gzhan med
153b2(mdo sde): pa// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sbyor bar byed// 'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin// tshad med gzhal las bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad 'gyur
153b3(mdo sde): ci 'dra ba// byang chub sems dpa' de la ston par byed// 'di ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin// ting 'dzin gang dag ji snyed yod pa dang // de bzhin ting 'dzin rgyud kyi rnam pa rnams// 
153b4(mdo sde): de dag bde gshegs sras la rjod par byed// 'di da ni mi ldog rnams kyi bstan pa yin// 'khor ba'i 'khoraralo rnam par zlog pa dang // dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lor ba
153b5(mdo sde): bskor ba/ 'jig rten kun gyis rtag tu ma pa skor ba// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bstan bya// shin tu sdug bsngal 'jig rten thams cad
153b6(mdo sde): dang // ngan songs rnams dag tu gnod gyur pa'i// gnas dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen 'gyur ba de// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bstan par bya// gang zhig byang chub den tu sems 'jog
153b7(mdo sde): pa// de ni dang po'i byang chub sems dpang bstan// bslabs pa'i gdams ngag ji bzhin nges byas pa// ji bzhin rnam par gzhag 'di de yi yin// nad bral rnams kyi bstan pa ji bzhin du// 'jig
153b8(mdo sde): rten kun la phan pa bya ba'i phyir// de ltar thog ma su zhig sems skyed pa// 'di ni gnyis te dang po'i las can no// phan pa thob byed sems dang rab dang bde// gnyen dang sdug
154a1(mdo sde): dang de bzhin sdud sems dang // kun tu srung ba'i sems dang snyoms pa'i sems// slob dpon sems dang snyoms par ston pa'i sems// de 'dra drag la sems
154a2(mdo sde): gnas gyur pade// lung nod kha ton byed par sbyar bar bya// mang du thos nas dgon par gnas su bzhugs// dben par gyur nas dge bshes sten tu gzhug/ dge bshes rnams la bka' blo bde
154a3(mdo sde): par bya// dus chod shes la shes bzhin ldan par bya// dus shes gyur nas shin tu 'jigs med bya// 'jigs med pa nas don la brtson par bya// don shes gyur nas de bzhin chos brjod bya// 
154a4(mdo sde): chos rnams kun lnga rmongs gyur med par bya// rmongs pa ma dad par gyur nas rgyal ba'i sras// legs par gsungs pa'i dachos la gnas par bya// 'di ni dang po'i las can brjod
154a5(mdo sde): pa ste// byang chub zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin/ 'di ni gdams pa 'di ni bstan pa ste/ 'di la su slob de ni sangs rgyas sras// byang chub sems dpa' gsum
154a6(mdo sde): pa gang yin pa// chos kyi rgyal po'i bstan pa rab tu sbyor// mi rtag nyid dang sdug bsngal stong nyid dang // bdag med pa dang g.yo ba med pa dang // de bzhin chos 'di thams cad bdag min dang / 
154a7(mdo sde): mngon par 'du byed med dang dben pa dang // 'di dag thams cad rtog pa med yin par// byang chub sems dang 'di ltar rtog par byed// sems can khams dang chos kyi dbyings la yang // rtag pa
154a8(mdo sde): bya phyir de ni gzeng yang bstod// 'jig rten khams ni mtha' yas su med ces// de ltar de ni dbyed du gtsug par ga/ 'di nas dang chu nga de bzhin ma// rlung dang rnam mkha' snyed yod pa dag phyonas/ 
154b1(mdo sde): na 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa// de dag rnams la deni pyod du gtsug/ rgya chen chos rnams kun dang khams rnams kyi// rang bzhin ma lus mthar thugs brtag bya ba// de ni sangs rgyas sras so
154b2(mdo sde): sbyor byed la// phan par bya phyir rjes su bstan pa yin// byang chub sems dpa' skye bar gang skyes pa// bstan la skyes shing rab tu 'byung bar byed// blo ldan de ni dngos med dngos po rtogs// dam chos
154b3(mdo sde): gnas su skyes te legs par skyes// da ni rang gis las yong mo ldog/ sangs rgyas mthar thug yin par 'dzin pa skye// rtag tu chos la nges par sems dang ldan// sems can rang bzhin ci 'drar
154b4(mdo sde): rnam par dpyod// las dang 'jig rten dag dang shing rnams dang // rnam par smin dang 'khor dang mya ngan 'das// rnam par dbya rab rgyal ba'i sras kyis shes// de thugs skyes pa'i byang chub sems
154b5(mdo sde): dpar brjod// thams cad mkhyen pa 'das dang byung rnams dang / ma byon dag kyang chos rnams rnam dpyad nas// grub da nga gang yang legs skyes mthar thug dang // rang byung rnams kyi
154b6(mdo sde): grub pa ci 'dra ba// sangs rgyas dam pa de dag gas sasu mnyam nyid rjes su zhugs pas shes/ nam yang mnyam nyid bye brag 'byed mi byed// de ni dus gsum tha dad med par 'jug/ gang gi phan yon rnam pa
154b7(mdo sde): 'di 'dra ba// da ni byang chub sems dpa' bzhi pa ste// 'di dag rab bsgrubs byang chub sems dpa' de// byang chub don tu nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ de lhag byang chub sems dpa' lnga pa ste/ sbyor
154b8(mdo sde): ba phun sum tshogs par brjod pa yin// thabs la mkhas pa'i rjes su zhugs pa ste// bsod nams las dag brtsams pas mthar phyin byed// de ltar bsod nams rab tu ci byed kyang // 'jig rten
155a1(mdo sde): kun gyin du bu rapa dang / banapa ded nga bde 'tho byed dang/ ming ce bdang bye zhal 'gyur byesa'angagarten ga na tu gdul ba
155a2(mdo sde): phyir// 'dren par byed cing rab tu dang bar byed/ sems can mang po thams cad gdul 'dod dang / mya ngan 'das pa'i sems kyis mthu yang che// 'jig rten thams cad mtha' ma med pa dang / 
155a3(mdo sde): de bzhin dpag tu med cing grangs med dang // mtshungs med bas ma las mnyam med gzhal yas dang // stong pa mi g.yo med pa'i rang bzhin shes// de ni byang chub sems dpa' lnga ba ste// myur baphun ci/ 
155a4(mdo sde): phan dang snying brtser ldan// de la rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra da ste// yon tan kun dang ldan pa rnams kyi bstan/ de ni sems can mtha' yas thams cad dang // chos kyi ngo bo nyid la
