155a5(mdo sde): rmongs pa med// shin tu blo ldan rtog bral rnam rtog med// 'jig rten lha dang bcas pas dbyer mi byed// sangs rgyu sa chos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang // spyod pa'i bsngags
155a6(mdo sde): dang bsngags pa ma yin dang // sems can chung ngam yang na che'o zhes// thos par gyur kyang bsam las nur ba med// sems can nyon mongs can nam rnam dag gam// gdul sla na 'am gdul bar dka' zhe 'am/ 
155a7(mdo sde): chos dbyings chung zhe 'am yAn rgya che zhe 'am// 'jig par 'gyur zhe 'am chags par 'gyur zhe 'am// chos dbyings yod ce 'am med ces thos gyur kyang // dus gsum rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de// 
155a8(mdo sde): nges par sems shing thams cad rnam dpyod de// sangs rgyas chos 'dir bsam pa shin tu nges// mtshan ma med dang mtshan nyid med pa dang / dngos med rang bzhin brdzun zhing dben pa dang // sgyu ma'i rang
155b1(mdo sde): bzhin mig mor 'dra ba yi// chos mtshon na pa 'di 'dranyan par byed/ de ltar mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / spyod pa yod ngam med ces nges
155b2(mdo sde): par dpyod/ byung ngam mi 'byung zhena'adaphyir mi ldog/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'das zhes 'am ma 'das zhe'am// ma byon ce'am ma byon ma yin zhe 'am// byung ngam ma byung bad ngas mi zad dam/ 
155b3(mdo sde): de bzhin mtshan nyid gcig gas mtshan nyid med/ gcig dang tha dad rnam pa mang po dang / den dang tshig 'bru ngas dang nges med pa/ thams cad sgo btags rnam pa gzhan nyid du// 
155b4(mdo sde): ldeg byang chub sems dpa' yid ces byed// mtshan ma med dang mtshan ma yod pa dang // mtshan nyid med dang mtshan gyis mtshon rab dang // rnam par phye ba phan tshun sbyar ba rnams// thos nas 'di/ 
155b5(mdo sde): la mthar thug 'jug par byed// gzhon nur gyur pa'i byangachub sems dpa' ni/ lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kyis kyang // 'bras bu yod pa'i las rnams byed
155b6(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing // ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'dir ni skye ba ston// pha rol rnams kyi bsam pa rtogs byed cing // de dag rnams kyi mos pa dpyod par byed// sems can spyod dang rjes su 'thun chos dang // zhing
155b7(mdo sde): rnams 'jig dang 'chags pa rnams kyang shes// ji ltar 'dod bzhin myur du mngon shes thob// phyogs rnams kun tu yid ni 'jug par byed// bde gshegs bsngags pa'i chos rnams thos nas kyang
155b8(mdo sde): de la de nur bar 'gyur ba med// yongs su shes dang zhing g.yo byed pa dang // de bzhin byin gyis brlab dang rnam dpyod dang // ji ltar skad cig grangs med 'gro 'gyur ba// zhing du 'gro bar bya ba brjod par/ 
156a1(mdo sde): mtha me pa/ rgya chub semam nga rnam gang na sa/ sems nam 'dun pa mi cig/ de gnam rdzu pa nga// grung dum ga na bya ba
156a2(mdo sde): drang / thad kyi sa dang d+ha drang // 'a rternam par byedang sngon mapa dang // 'jam bde dang das bde padang/ mamras rtogs par byal ma khas pa yin/ po brang bakhor la ma tham pa ca na
156a3(mdo sde): te/ de yang ji sar kun tu smad pa dang // gnas dang de bzhin la dag par bya ba dang // pho brang 'khor ni ci 'dra dpyad pa dang / dadam ches rgyal po'i dbang bsgyur ci 'dra dang // byin gyi brlabs dang / 
156a4(mdo sde): gzhan gnad ci 'dra dang // chos la 'jug dang bka' lung / brjod pa ste/ 'di ni rgyal 'chabs la 'jug pa yin// de tsam gyis na de'i mthar thug ste// ji skad bstan bzhin
156a5(mdo sde): gzhan du 'gyur ba med// tshe yi 'du byed nam zhig 'dor ban// tshul ldan rgyal 'tshab rgyal bar mngon du phyogs// dbang bskur gang yon bde gshegs sras gcig ste// thu bo khyad 'phags mthar byin
156a6(mdo sde): bdag nyid can// skra 'i phra gcig gis chu tshad gzung du rung // 'drin bsam pa bgrang ba rtogs ma yin// rgyal sras rnams kyi spyod pa 'di 'dra ste// 'di ni sems can la las zhing rnams kun/ 
156a7(mdo sde): phra rab rdul du chags nam ma lus bgrang // grangs med padi snyed cig ces gcod byed pa// de kun 'dir ni byang chub sems dpas shes// 'das dang de bzhin ma byon sangs rgyas dang // gang dag byedas/ 
156b1(mdo sde): bcu dag na bzhugs pa dang // rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin nyan thos kyi// sa bon gyur pa byang chub sems de mye// thog mar byang chub sems shes gang brjod pa// de ni ji lta'i tshul du'ang grangs med de// 'jig rten
156b2(mdo sde): khams 'di kun kyang khyab gyur na// de las gong du brjod du ci zhig yod// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// 
156b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs bshad pa legs par smras so// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming
156b4(mdo sde): thos pa'i sems can de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du de nye bar gyur pa yin na// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / de bzhin
156b5(mdo sde): du sgrub par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de dag nges par sang sa rgyas su 'gyur ro// chos kyi blo gre kyi smras pa// kye rgya la ba'i sras de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ shes rab
156b6(mdo sde): zab mo dang ldan pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas dbang bskur ba yin par rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos smras pa// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gal la zhig gi rna lam du
156b7(mdo sde): 'di lta bu'i chos 'di dag grag par gyur pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la lung bstan par rig par bya ba yin na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gis lag tu thob pa lta smos kyang ci
156b8(mdo sde): dgos// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzigs su gsol// bdag gis 'di
157a1(mdo sde): lta bu'i chos 'di dag ma 'tshal bas/ bdag ni dmus long dang 'dra lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gcig pu dmus long lta bur gyur pa yang ma bas kyi// bcom ldan
157a2(mdo sde): 'das sems can gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thos pa de dag thams cad kyang dmus long lta bur gyur pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas brtan de de bzhin te/ ji skad
157a3(mdo sde): smras pa bzhin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu song la/ 
157a4(mdo sde): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad skul cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang sgrogs shig/ chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa dkon mchog tal la zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di
157a5(mdo sde): yang 'khor der sgrogs shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i/ bus de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' thos nas/ dkon ma chog ta la li'i gzungs 'di'i don gyi phyir yongs su skom pas
157a6(mdo sde): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag la don 'di skabs brjod de chos nyan pa thams cad 'du bar gyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'chad cing bsam gyis
157a7(mdo sde): mi khyab pa nyid kyang ston par 'gyur gyis 'du bar gyis shig/ khyed phyis 'gyod par gyur ta re/ kye grogs po dag mdo sde rin po che 'di lta bu dag 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni shin tu rnyed par dka'o// de nas skad
157a8(mdo sde): cig de nyid la brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas/ thal mo
157b1(mdo sde): sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ba mdzad do// bcu
157b2(mdo sde): byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab na yang / bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA
157b3(mdo sde): ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol// bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dor che/ 
157b4(mdo sde): zhal nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste/ rigs kyi bu gang la la ngag dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di'i don gyi phyir// de bzhin da gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa de dag thams cad ni blan med pa
157b5(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro zhes stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sudabyangs kyis go bar mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
157b6(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bul 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu khyod song la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la gsol ba thob shig/ de'i tshe 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa/ 
157b7(mdo sde): shing blag sha dang sA la'i drung gzhan zhig na skyil mo krung bcas shing lus mi g.yo bar 'dug ste/ nyi ma bye ba khwa khrig brgya stong pas lhag pa'i kha dog bkod pa chen po ldan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa na
157b8(mdo sde): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas 'dug par gyur te/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i lus dpal gyis lham me lhan ne lhang nger 'dug go// 
158a1(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon gyur pa ga la bder song ste phyin nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras sa so// rigs kyi/ 
158a2(mdo sde): bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni khyod la chos bshad par gsol ba 'debs so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA rang
158a3(mdo sde): ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzhi'i don 'di gang yin/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod ni shes rab zab pa ste/ kho bo ni khyod dang 'gyed mi nus so// 'jam
158a4(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ khyod snying las chu ngur 'dug shig dang / khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du bstan par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bo nyan gyis khyod
158a5(mdo sde): kyis shod cig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ stong gsum gyi stong rgyan po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar byas so// de
158a6(mdo sde): nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad 'dus par gyur to// rgyal po chen po
158a7(mdo sde): bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa yang gnod sbyin bye ba du ma dang lhan cig 'dus par gyur to// brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyang 'dus par gyur to// chos
158a8(mdo sde): 'dod pa rnams dang / chos 'dod pa ma yin pa'i gang zag rnams kyang 'dus par gyur to// lha'i bu mo mang po yang 'dus par gyur to// dge slong gi 'khor dang / dge slong ma'i 'khor dang / dge bsnyen
158b1(mdo sde): gyi 'khor dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor dang / de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bar gyi 'khor dang / 'thab bral gyi 'khor dang / dga' ldan gyi 'khor dang / 'phrul dga'i 'khor dang / gzhan 'phrul
158b2(mdo sde): dbang byed kyi lha'i 'khor dang / tshangs pa'i 'khor dang / de bzhin du 'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i 'khor rnams 'dus par gyur to// de bzhin du nyan thos kyi tshogs kyang 'dus par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ 
158b3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya yi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa
158b4(mdo sde): ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang / tshe dang ldan pa lam phran brta na dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang / tshe dang ldan pa chu klung 'od
158b5(mdo sde): srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas dang / tshe dang ldan pa byam/ sa ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang // tshe dang ldan pa bzang skyong dang / tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang / tshe dang
158b6(mdo sde): ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / de dag dang nyan thos chen po gzhan dag dang / grags 'dzin la sogs pa dge slong ma lnga brgya yang 'dus par gyur to// khams kyi rgyal po dang / stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba dag kyang
158b7(mdo sde): 'dus par gyur to// rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag gi 'khor dag kyang 'dus par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
158b8(mdo sde): bskor ba byas te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dang 'di ltar 'khor chen po 'dus pa 'di su'i mthu lags// de ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
159a1(mdo sde): ba/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs kyi mthu yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog tal
159a2(mdo sde): la'i gzungs mnyan par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu song la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la gso
159a3(mdo sde): ba thob shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin rino mo bstan pa dkon mchog ta la/ 
159a4(mdo sde): la 'di shod cig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa btsun pa shAr dwa ti'i bu dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di nyan par 'gyur ba su yin// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ 'khor ba ni 'dus pa
159a5(mdo sde): 'di dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / rje/ garten skyong ba rnams 'dus pa 'di dag ste/ kho bo yang nyan pa'i phyir 'ongs so// de nas 'jam dpal gnon
159a6(mdo sde): nur gyur pas/ gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos nyan pa 'di dag ni smra ma byung ba sha stag na kho bos su la chos bshad/ nyan pa ni su yin/ 'chad pa ni
159a7(mdo sde): su yin/ gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis shod cig/ kho bos mnyan to// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bshad ces bya ba de gang gi tshig pa
159a8(mdo sde): dgas yin/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal bshad pa zhes bya ba de ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// smras pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu stong pa nyid gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid
159b1(mdo sde): ni tshig med pa yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te stong pa nyid tshig med pa yin na/ ci zhig bshad par bya// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni bstan tu med pa/ 
159b2(mdo sde): yin te/ de dag ni bstan tu med cing mnyan du med do// gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ji lta bu bstan pa de thams cad ni stong pa nyid bstan pa/ mtshan ma med pa bstan pa/ smon pa med pa bstan
159b3(mdo sde): pa blang ba med pa bstan pa/ dor ba med pa bstan pa/ spros pa med pa bstan pa ste/ ma spros pa bstan pa yin no// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khor de dang / brgya
159b4(mdo sde): byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag kyang rab tu dga' nas/ mgrin gcig tu 'jam dpal ga zhon nur gyur pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus dkon mchog
159b5(mdo sde): ta la la'i gzungs 'di legs par bshad do// zhes legs so// zhes bya ba byin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
159b6(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpas dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs ji ltar gzungs par bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ gzhan dag la yang
159b7(mdo sde): rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rab 'byor gzungs 'di ni skye ba med par yid la bya'o// dngos po med pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / spros pa med pa
159b8(mdo sde): dang / dor ba med par yid la bya'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyis dpa' bar
160a1(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// lha dang mi drug cu rtsa gnyis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu/ 
160a2(mdo sde): bzang po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
160a3(mdo sde): bo rnams kyi snying rje chen po ji 'dra ba zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi snying rje chen po ni gang khams
160a4(mdo sde): gsum pa yongs su mi gtong ba ste/ 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no// gang sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu ston pa 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no// gang sems
160a5(mdo sde): can tshul khrims 'chal pa yongs su 'dzin pa 'di ni snying rje chen pe yin no// gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'a// dor ba 'di ni snying rje chen po yin no// gang sems can thams
160a6(mdo sde): cad kyi don gyi phyir lus dang srog yongs su gtong ba 'di ni snying rje rjen po yin no// gang 'dod chags spyod pa'i sems can rnams la byams pa yang dag par rjed pa 'di na snying rje chen po yin no// gang
160a7(mdo sde): sems can stobs dang ldan pa rnams la byams pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi snying rje chen po yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems
160a8(mdo sde): can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems su bya'o// 'dre ba med pa mang du bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// skye bo mang
160b1(mdo sde): po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
160b2(mdo sde): dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsel ba/ sems can thams cad la sman pa dang / thugs brtse ba mnga' ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
160b3(mdo sde): kyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyed kyi nang na phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus kyi tshe chos kyi rnam grangs
160b4(mdo sde): 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par spro ba su yod// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub semadas dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems
160b5(mdo sde): dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong ba dang / byang chub sems / 
160b6(mdo sde): sman gyi rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyis mngon 'phags rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi bzad pa dang / byang chub
160b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen ze ba ldan dang / byang chub sems dpa' nor bu 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na nor bu can dang / byang chub sems dpa'
160b8(mdo sde): rnam par lta dang / byang chub sems dpa' bltar mi mthong dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lta dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen phung po dang / 
161a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' tog dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa'
161a2(mdo sde): nor dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' tsan dan dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdud
161a3(mdo sde): rtsi blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsam yas blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyis brgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyis brgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis
161a4(mdo sde): brgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu dgod cing dbang po tha thams cad rab tu dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri'i rtse mo rdol ba'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa
161a5(mdo sde): mkhas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag brkyang dang / byang / chub sems dpa' sa 'dzin dang / byang chub sems da/ pa'i spobs pa myur dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i
161a6(mdo sde): snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' gnyi gdugs snying
161a7(mdo sde): po dang / byang chub sems dpa' mngon 'phags rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lhun po chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' slob
161a8(mdo sde): bdapa' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis mgrin gcig tu tshig tu smras
161b1(mdo sde): pa/ bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe srad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la/ dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus kyi tshe/ bdag cag thams cad 'dus shing tshogs te/ dkon mchog ta la la zhes bgyi ba'i
161b2(mdo sde): gzungs yang dag par bshad pa spro lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag legs so lags so// rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni bya dka' ba ste/ go cha 'di
161b3(mdo sde): 'dra ba 'di ni shin tu bya dka' ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po bde bar
161b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs nyen cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bkod pa chen po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs ta sngags bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
161b5(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal to// tad ya thA/ oM maM/ b+ha ra Te b+ha ra Te/ b+ha ra/ b+ha ran te swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis a la la
161b6(mdo sde): rlormo.a la la cho a la la chos shes lan gnyis lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
161b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das chos chos shes bgyi ba 'di'i don gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i don to// chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i
161b8(mdo sde): don ni dngos po med pa'i gzhi'i don to// chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni nam mkha'i gzhi'i don to// chos thams cad kyi gzhi'i don ni blang ba med pa'i gzhi'i don to// chos thams
162a1(mdo sde): cad kyi gzhi'i don ni dong ba med pa'i gzhi'i don to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'on ci'i slad du chos thams
162a2(mdo sde): cad ces bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ces bya ba ni/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / de bzhin du khams
162a3(mdo sde): rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos thams cad ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos thams cad ni bzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir stong
162a4(mdo sde): pa'o// de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras dkon mchog tal la'i
162a5(mdo sde): gzungs 'di ji ltar gzung bar bya/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos// 'dra ma dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// de bzhin
162a6(mdo sde): nyid bstan pa dang / skye ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'byung ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / mtshan nyid med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / nam mkha'i de bzhin nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / 
162a7(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid de bzhin nyid dang / dngos med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin nyid du gzungs 'di gzung bar bya ste/ rigs kyi bu dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs 'di gzung bzung ba dang / kun tu gzung ba dang / 
162a8(mdo sde): bsgom pa dang / rnam par dpyad pa dang / gdags pa dang / rab tu gzhag pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par dbye ba dang / gsal bar bya ba ni 'di 'dra ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni
162b1(mdo sde): dkon mchog ta la 'i gzungs bsgom pa dang / rnam par brtag pa'i don to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal
162b2(mdo sde): khyod chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang dag par zhugs nas yun ji srid cig yon/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'dod chags dang na sdang dang / gti mug rnams yun ji srid cig
162b3(mdo sde): nas zhugs pa srid do// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// shA ra ti'i
162b4(mdo sde): bu sau'i khams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do// da shA radwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu si'i khams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ shA rang
162b5(mdo sde): ti'i bu rig pa dang ma rig pa yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rig pa dang ma rig ba yun ji srid cig nas zhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa
162b6(mdo sde): shA ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha'i khams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do// shA radwa ti'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal nam mkha'i khams yun ji srid cig nas zhugs/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ shA
162b7(mdo sde): radwa ti'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos thams cad yun ji srid cig nas zhugs pa srid do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// kho bo
162b8(mdo sde): skyes bungs pa 'di lta bu dag dang gtam bya ba'i nus pa gal yod/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ khyi dang byil thams cad dam/ wa thams cad kyis kyang ri'i rgyal po ri rab gzhig par mi nu'o// 
163a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de bzhin du shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'dra ba'i nyan thos thams cad kyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i bstan pa gcig gi mtha' yang rtogs par mi nus na/ 'jam dpa
163a2(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa'i bstan pa lta ci smos// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal bzhud la phyi mi tshe phyi
163a3(mdo sde): mi'i dus na/ mdo sde'i rgyal po 'dzin pa chos smra ba de dag la kun tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba mdzad par/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba thob shig/ de nas 'jam dpal
163a4(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pas rang rang gis chos kyi bstan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun
163a5(mdo sde): chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag/ par ston par bgyid pa/ chos smra ba de dag gi yon tan/ gyi khyad par rnams bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das
163a6(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal dge slong mdo sde'i rgyal po 'dzin pa chos smra ba de dag ni nga'i chos kyi sku la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// 
163a7(mdo sde): de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la nye bar 'gyur ro// de dag la bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu glags lta ba rnams kyis glags mi rnyed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gang su dag ches sgra
163a8(mdo sde): pa'i dge slong de la se gol gtogs pa gcig tsam srid cig mi byams pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag ni mir 'gyur ba las kyang ring du gyur pa yin na/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las lta smos kyang ci dgos// 
163b1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhan yang gang dag mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams la ma dad pa'i sems skyed pa de dag ni so thags ngan par 'gyur// lce dang sna med par 'gyur/ rka lag phyi
163b2(mdo sde): phyogs su 'gyur/ lus nad bu can du 'gyur/ mig med par 'gyur/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur/ brtson 'grus chung bar 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal 'di
163b3(mdo sde): dag ni mi gti mug pa de dag gi skyon du 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpal mdor bshad na/ de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ de dag gi spu'i khu re rar yang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa 'jug go/ 
163b4(mdo sde): gal te mir skyes na yang rtag tu dmus long du 'gyur/ da lce med par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong ba de dag ni/ tshe 'di nyid la
163b5(mdo sde): lus mdze can du 'gyur/ mchu 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug bar 'gyur lus zhom par 'gyur/ lus gcer bur 'a gyur ro// lus skam por 'gyur/ yi dgas 'dra bar
163b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang mi gti mug pa de dag gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dag gi gnas ni/ ngas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pas mkhyen to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
163b7(mdo sde): pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bstan tu gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal kha rog de skad ma 'dri shig
163b8(mdo sde): 'di la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mos par 'gyur te/ skrag par 'gyur/ dang ba 'gyur/ rab tu dngang bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ sems can 'di dag gis 'di lta bu thos nas/ slan cad nam yang dam
164a1(mdo sde): dbacos spong bar ma 'gyur bar ba gyi pa'i slang du thugs brtse bar gos te/ bcom ldan 'das kyim pa shad du gsol// bcom ldan 'ad kyis bka'astsal pa/ 
164a2(mdo sde): dpal sa'i 'og na sems can dmyal ba yod pa'i ming la 'di lta ste/ tsha ba dang / rab tu cha ba dang / thig nag dang / kun tu 'bar dang / reg dka' dang / drag po dang / mchu rnon dang / lcags kyi thu lus dang / lcags
164a3(mdo sde): kyi be con dang / mun khung dang / mgo bskyed dang / spri'u tshugs dang / spre'u gdeng dang / rtag tu rab 'bar dang / rul ba dang / rtag tu dring dang / rab 'jom dang / nges 'dzem dang / shin tu/ 
164a4(mdo sde): gnod 'byung rnams te/ 'jam dpal mi gti mug pa de gang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i sems can dmyal ba ni 'di dag go// de nas dbacom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos 'di
164a5(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba de 'di na sa shi 'phes nas gang du skye bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'ad sa kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu bzang po khyed kyis zhu bde lenas
164a6(mdo sde): par zhus so// kun tu bzang po rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi bu mo ches smra ba de 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa slebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing / 
164a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu brgyan par skye bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' kun nas mdzes pa sha stag go// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rigs kyi bu de la sangs rgyas bye ba phrag
164a8(mdo sde): bcu gnyis mngon du 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu mder na rig kyi bu de'i phan yon ni grangs med/ dpag tu med de/ de dag ni bskal pa stong dag gis kyang brjod par mi nus so// byang chub sems/ 
164b1(mdo sde): dab 'a dun tu yang bas gsal / mam ldan das spa ma dus nagang dgu chos kyi nam grangs 'di spong bar 'gyur ba'i sems sana'i sgra bu ga 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ kun
164b2(mdo sde): tu bzang po 'dis bu chos 'di dag slong bar 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni bal che rab tu byung ba dag 'thubyung ste/ 'di skad du 'di ga ni sran dngags sbar ba yin gyi/ 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas/ 
164b3(mdo sde): gsungs pa ma yin no// 'di dag na rang bapor byas pa yin te/ de dag chos spangs pas 'chi ba'i tshe sems can dpral ba kun tu 'bar ba mi bzad par skye bar 'gyur ro// skyes mtha tu
164b4(mdo sde): sngags kyi ning 'chags par mi 'gyur te/ de dag chos spangs dpas 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sems can dmyal ba kun tu 'bar bami / dedabar skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ma thag tu lpags kyi 'khor
164b5(mdo sde): los mi gti mug pa de dag gi mgo bcad nas sa la ltung bar 'gyur/ ro// de ltar gyur nas kyang bskal pa mang po bskal pa brgya phrag mang po dang / bskal pa stong phrag mang por dmus long du
164b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// gal te bskal pa brgya dag 'das nas mir skye bar gyur na yang tshe rabs thams cad du dasus long du skye bar 'gyur zhing lce med pa dang / gdong phyin phyog su 'dug pa dang / ltag skur dang 'dzing ba
164b7(mdo sde): nub pa dang / rkang gyol dang / nga ro khyi skad lta bu dang / rtag tu bkres shing skom pas nyen pa dang / lus skams pa dang / kha mnam pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis mthong ngam/ thos na yang yid
164b8(mdo sde): du mi 'ong bar skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'tshal ba bdag cag gis mdo sde 'di lta bu dag spangs pa dang / chos smra ba de dag la
165a1(mdo sde): khros pa'i sems kyis bltas par gyur pa rnams nongs pa la nongs par chags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ji ltar byis par gyur pa dang / ji ltar rmongs par gyur
165a2(mdo sde): ba dang / ji ltar shes rab 'chal bar gyur pa dang / jis blo chung bar gyur pa rnams 'chags shing mchis na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs su gsol// de nas nyan thos chen po
165a3(mdo sde): de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag sngangs nas/ bcom ldan
165a4(mdo sde): 'das bdag cag ni bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di thos nas rab tu sdang / des lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ grogs po dag de de bzhin no// ji skad spa/ sa
165a5(mdo sde): ba bzhin te/ khyed kyis skrag par bya ba'i rigs so// grogs po dgang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa yin na/ nga nyid kyang skrag na/ gang dag nga'i sleb ma
165a6(mdo sde): rnams lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu dag ches 'di ni zab pa ste/ de ni mi 'am mi ma yin pa'am/ lha'am klu'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za 'am/ sus kyang rnam par dkrug par mi nus na/ dge sbyong / 
165a7(mdo sde): ngam/ bram ze gzhan dag gis ltag la nus te ci sdes/ rigs kyi bu das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten du gyur pa ste/ rigs kyi bu dag dper na/ degen mchog pa ma tog ji
165a8(mdo sde): lta bang mde lnga'i rgyal po 'di yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la'ang ma dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni legs pa/ 
165b1(mdo sde): gsungs pa legs so// bcom ldan 'das dge slong de lta bu de dag gi dad pas stsal pa ji ltar yongs su 'ju bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gang dag chos kyi
165b2(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di spong ba dang / chos smra ba de dag la mi byams pa'i sems skyed pa de dag ni nyi ma gcig gam/ se gol gtogs pa gcig srid tsam zhig dad pas byin pa yongs su spyad pa 'am/ tha na
165b3(mdo sde): dge 'dun la bul ba'i sa la mchil ma thal cig 'dor du yang ngas ma gnang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
165b4(mdo sde): mtshams ma mchis pa lnga po dag 'di dang nye ba lags sam ring dpa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu kha rog de skad ma 'dri shig/ de ci'i
165b5(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu mtshams med pa lnga po dag ni bla'i/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spangs pa ni nam yang de lta ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu mtshams med pa lnga byed pa ni mtshams med pa/ lnga
165b6(mdo sde): po dag myur du zad par byas nas mir skye bar 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos spong ba'i gang zag de ni nam yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par mi 'gyur te/ de ni bdag kyang phung la gzhan yang phung bar byed par
165b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngan du zhing 'di skad ces smras so// e ma'odam pa'i chos spong ba'i sems can rnams ni sdug bsngal lo// las kyi
165b8(mdo sde): sgrib pa 'di lta bu dag ni bdag gi rmi lam na yang mngon par ma gyur cig/ bam po gsum pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa NI
166a1(mdo sde): thu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA radwa ti'i bu de snyam du ma sems shig/ ngas chos bstan pa ni 'byung ba dang bcas pa yin na/ 'jig rten ni las bdag
166a2(mdo sde): gir bya ba/ rang gi las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa rang gi las bstan par bya ba ste/ sems can dag rang rang gi las rnams kyis sdug bsngal gyi tsher ba myong gi/ de la de bzhin gshegs
166a3(mdo sde): pas ni ma lan no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu ngas ni dge leg su 'gro ba'i lam bshad de/ bde bar 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pa med par 'gro ba dang / mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba dang / 'chib
166a4(mdo sde): med par 'gro ba'i lam bshad na/ 'on kyang sems cana'// de dag ni lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag gis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang
166a5(mdo sde): ldan zhing 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa dang / leg pa ra lta ste/ log par lta ba'i las dang chos yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas/ shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan
166a6(mdo sde): 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ste/ de la de bzhin gshin gshegs pas ni ma lan no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems can thams cad la nga'i snying rje 'di lta bu skye ste/ ngas sems
166a7(mdo sde): can gcig gi don tu yang bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag pa sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rnams myong bar bya'i// sems can gcig po ni yongs su gtang bar mi bya'o snyam ste/ shA radwa
166a8(mdo sde): ti'i bud de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po ni de 'dra'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ mi zhig la bu gcig pa gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa lta na sdug pa kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan
166b1(mdo sde): bathag mod la/ derkyen 'ag gag dang bradas/ chi ba'i dus byas par gyur na/ mi dbul sems pas sdug bsngal zhing mngami bde bar gyur te du shing ste sngags 'don to// shA dwa'i bu ban
166b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sems can sdug bsngal bdag la bu cig pa bzhin du dgengs pa mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag nyon mongs pa rnams dang ldan
166b3(mdo sde): cig gnas pa ni ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig mig/ sa so// shA rA nga? ti'i bu bzhin gshegs pa dag thang chen mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig gas
166b4(mdo sde): ba ni ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyum su khan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pas lam po che'i ra bzhi mdor skye bo'i tshogs chen po mngon par sprul te/ bya ba dag
166b5(mdo sde): ston kyang bya ba de dag ni yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas/ ma skyes ma 'gags 'gags par mi 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
166b6(mdo sde): kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par mdzad cing / 'dod chags kyi spyod pa yang sten te mdzad pa ston kyang spyod pa de dag ni yod pa ma yin no// dper na nam mkha'i khams ni rnam par rtog pa med cing spros
166b7(mdo sde): pa med pa'o// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la yang rnam par rtog pa med cing spros pa med pa'o// 'on kyang sems can rnams dang mthun par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'thun par
166b8(mdo sde): mdzad de/ sems can ji ltar 'dul bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'thun par 'jug go// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la
167a1(mdo sde): mi byen pa 'o// de ban gshegs pa sa babrel bamam so// shA shAnas dang ma pa nga rten po da/ natse dang / rang nga/ 
167a2(mdo sde): dang / rdul dang / tham dang / blan med pa dang / gongan med pa ma mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin te/ shA ra r+ya ti'i butshig smras pa 'dini de cig/ rab tu byung ba 'am/ khyim pa la rung ste/ semasas/ 
167a3(mdo sde): gang dag chas kyi rnam grangs 'di spong ba de dag thams cad ni sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal 'di lta bu dag rnyed par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan
167a4(mdo sde): pa 'di thos nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'a 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sem ngas can de dag gis ni rnyed pa nongs par rnyed do// gang dag
167a5(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar 'gyur ba de dag gi lce ci 'drang zhig tu 'gyur ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa/ la ba rab 'byor de dag gi lce ni dpag tshad 'bru/ 
167a6(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/ de la lcags kyi thong gshol 'bar ba rab tu 'bar ba/ kun tu rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba/ me lce gcig tu gyur pa bye ba phrag
167a7(mdo sde): lnga brgyas rmo bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des ngag ma srungs pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor mi gti mug pa de dag gi las kyi sgrib pa ni de lta bur 'gyur ro// de nas sangs
167a8(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthus thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa ni rmad du 'byung ba chen po lags so zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po
167b1(mdo sde): bcu byin gyis 'diskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos smra ba'i dge slong de dag phrag pa la bkur bar 'gyi'o// me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / thug
167b2(mdo sde): pa rnams kyis mchod par bgyi'o// gdugs lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du phyag bgyi'o// bsnyen bkur bgyi'o// sti stang bgyi'o// tha mar bgyi'o// ri mor bgyi'o// 
167b3(mdo sde): mchod par bgyi'o// rjed pa bgyi'o// gsol ba bgyi'o// sti stang bgyi ba dang / bla mar bgyi ba dang / gus pas bsrung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de dag ni bcom ldan
167b4(mdo sde): 'das kyi sras te chos kyi sku las nges par 'byung ba'i slad du'o// / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i bur gyur pa/ gzugs bzang ba
167b5(mdo sde): mdzes pa blta na sdug pa de ni 'og ma thams cad kyi mchod pa'i/ 'os dang phyag bgyi ba'i 'os lags so// de bzhin du rgyos smra bdag kyang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod pa'i 'os
167b6(mdo sde): dang phyag bgyi ba'i 'os lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis chos sba
167b7(mdo sde): ba'i dge slong de dag snying las chung ngur bya ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / kun tu bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa'i phyir tshig 'di legs par smras so// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ 
167b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// dpag
168a1(mdo sde): nad cu 'tho drug tu yongs su 'azung bar gyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' dun tu b.rang po la rigs kyi butshag 'di legs par smras pa legs
168a2(mdo sde): leg so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to// gzhanal pan dang bde ba byed pa bsags papo/ rnam pa sna chags rab mdzes mcheg ra
168a3(mdo sde): tshig ldan pa// shin tu dri med bzhin ldan khyod kyi bsam pa mchog/ yon tan rin chen mi mnyam mnyam pa'i tshig legs sbas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos
168a4(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos du dang ldan na/ dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
168a5(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems/ dpa' chen po dag chos gcig dang ldan na/ dkon mtsho gta la la'i gzungs thob bo// chos gcig po gang zhe na/ 
168a6(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ son thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'o// kun tu bzang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gi chos gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phra drog med pa dang / rlom sems
168a7(mdo sde): med pa ste/ kun tu bzang po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis chos gnyis so// kun tu bzang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems
168a8(mdo sde): can thams cad la dbang po gnod par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la thams cad kyi thams cad du rnam par 'tshe ba bskyed par mi bya'o// byang
168b1(mdo sde): chub sems dul yon na da pa padang shad pa dang / do ma gtus la gzus kyi byung bar sa na yongs su 'arjod pa pashad pan/ lpang nga pa'i skye dgul sa sems can da ga med pas gsas
168b2(mdo sde): thob 'gyur to// de/ namaci gtam la gzus kyi rgyad pa sa yon tan yongs su brjed pa'i le / denas tshe dang ldan pa ban dga' ba stan la/ 
168b3(mdo sde): langs te/ thugs phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ bus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba log su thal mo skur ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la
168b4(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni zab lags so// bcom lda na 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/ gzus
168b5(mdo sde): zab pa'i phyir zab bo// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir zab bo// stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir zab bo// nam mkha' tha phyir tha
168b6(mdo sde): bo// kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong de bzhin gshegs pa las mngon du thos nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu ni nam yang ma
168b7(mdo sde): thos so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni shin tu thos par bya dka' ba yin no// kun dga' bos gsol pa/ slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i
168b8(mdo sde): dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus kyi tshe/ sems can mang po dag sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis rab tu gsol// 
169a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bongs chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs zin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ngas chos smra bdeng/ 
169a2(mdo sde): kyang byin gyis brlabs so// kun dga' bo gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi gar 'dri ba de ni migan par mi 'gyur/ len par mi 'gyur/ ldan par mi 'gyur/ son par mi 'gyur/ lag pa
169a3(mdo sde): dang nang pan par mi 'gyur// grad pan par mi 'gyur/ na ban par mi 'gyur/ lus dman par mi 'gyur/ lus dri mi zhim par mi 'gyur/ pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi nga'i dus byed par ma
169a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// da la mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad srung dbar 'gyur ro// 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang de smos/ da pa thams cad yongs su spangs nas bde 'gro mtho ros kyi 'jig rten
169a5(mdo sde): du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ bdud par chad mi bgyid pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ 
169a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo bdud thams cad chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bar chad byed mi nus te/ kun dga' bo gang gi tshe/ bdud sdig can 'di snyam du bdag dkon mchog tal
169a7(mdo sde): la'i gzungs 'chad pa la bar chad byed du 'gro'o snyam pa'i sems bskyed pa de'i tshe/ bdud sdig can gyis rang gi khyim kun tu 'bar bar mthong ste/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di da ltar zab po// kun
169a8(mdo sde): dga' bos phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du 'gyur// phyag bya 'gyur/ phyag bya ba'i 'os su yang 'gyur ro// kun dga' bos gsol pa/ gal te de
169b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas phyogs gang na bzhugs pa'i sa phyogs de nyid na chos kyi rnams grangs 'di yang gnas par gyur la/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba'i slad du mdzin kyang / sngar de bzhin gshegs
169b2(mdo sde): ba la phyag bgyis nas slad kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la phyag bgyis na nongs pa ci mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bos gang gi tshe khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu
169b3(mdo sde): bkol te ngal phyag 'tshal ba de'i tshe khyod nyes pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzhan yang nga lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi thu bo dang / gtso bo dang / mchog dang / 
169b4(mdo sde): dam pa yin mod kyi kun dga' bo ngas sngar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas phyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// kun dga' bos
169b5(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs/ pas gang las ting nge 'dzin rin po che dkon mchogata la la bstan pa 'di gsan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
169b6(mdo sde): gong na su mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo mi'i 'jig rten dang / lha'i 'jig rten dang / dri za'i 'jig rten na nga'i gong na su yang med de/ 'on kyang byang chub
169b7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ ngas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes thogs pa brtsegs pa'i snying po gsar bzang po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od zer du ma'i lta ba rgyas pa las mngon du
169b8(mdo sde): thos te/ kun dga' bo bya dka' ba chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dum myong nas/ ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos te/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa des nga lung bstan to// kun dga' bo de lta ngam
170a1(mdo sde): na khyod kyis sngar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la phyag gyis la phyis ngal phyag 'tshal cig/ de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad kyi grin
170a2(mdo sde): gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces smras so// a la la chos/ a la la chos chos rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul pa a la la'o// sems can gang dag chos kyi rnams 'di'i ming thos pa de dag
170a3(mdo sde): kyang phyag bya ba'i 'os yin na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa lta ci smos kyang ci dgos te/ de dag ni de
170a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas bcom da ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig / dan sbreng bde dgal kye grogs po dag khyed kyis tshig 'di legs par
170a5(mdo sde): spras pa lagaso legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'ad sa kyis zhal nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste/ stong gsu ma gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ljags kyi dbang pos snang
170a6(mdo sde): bar byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi thos pa de dag ni ji ltar mi dmus long gis nyi ma'i snang mi mthong ba
170a7(mdo sde): dang / ji ltar tshong ba thabs mi shes pa dang ji ltar mi dbul pa gzhan gyi ngor lta ba dang 'dra ste/ de dag gi den du ngas dpe 'di dag byas na ci nas sems can rnams chos rin po che'i phung po 'di 'dra ba las ring du
170a8(mdo sde): mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ched dang / sems can thams cad kyi don tung khyod la gsol ba 'debs na rigs kyi bu khyod spro 'am/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' dun
170b1(mdo sde): tu bzang po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ ngu zhing byang chub
170b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rang gi chos kyi stan las langs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la stong gsum gyi
170b3(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yoso// 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to// ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu
170b4(mdo sde): tu ldeg go/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur ro// / che mchem rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu
170b5(mdo sde): 'khrugs so// 'jig rten du snang ba chen po yang byung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/ sor mo bcu thal mo sbyar te ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das la
170b6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag spro lags so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag spro lags so// bcom ldan 'das khyod ni thams cad mkhyen pa/ sems can thams
170b7(mdo sde): cad la phan par bzhed pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa lags kyi steng du/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa las skyes pa lags na/ ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ltar mi bgyid/ bcom ldan
170b8(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ni bdud rtsi'i bka' lags na/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang 'gal bar bgyid pa'i mthu bdag lag la mchis bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni byas pa gzo bar
171a1(mdo sde): bgyi ba lags kyi/ byas pa mi gzo bar bgyi ba ma lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la legs
171a2(mdo sde): so zhes bya ba byin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so// khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sras thu bo dang / gtso bo dang / mchog dang / dam pa dang / phul yin te/ chos
171a3(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod la yongs su gtad do// 'di ni nga'i ston pa yinate de'i phyir khyod kyis bsrung bar bya'o// dus dus su sti stang gyis shig/ rin po che'i snod du chug la phrag la thogs
171a4(mdo sde): shig/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na dge slong sdig pa can de dag la yid dam rton cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni khyod la rjes su bstan da pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gsol
171a5(mdo sde): pa/ bcom ldan 'das rab tu byung ba ci 'dra ba de dag 'byung bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rig sa kyi bu kha rog de skad ma 'dri shig/ byang chub sems dpa'
171a6(mdo sde): kun tu bzang pos gsol pa/ sems can mang po la sman par bgyid par 'gyur lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan
171a7(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu bzang po bshad kyis nyon cig/ 'khor rgya mtsho lnga bu 'di lta bu dang / 'jam dpal dang spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
171a8(mdo sde): dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa thams cad yid la byed pa gzhan thong la phyi ma'i rje sri dus narab tu byung bci 'dra ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag nyen cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
171b1(mdo sde): chub sems dang 'a kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun tu bzang po rab tu byung ba/ dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa/ khyim la chags pa/ rnyed pa la chags pa/ gtsug lag khang la
171b2(mdo sde): chags pa/ gnas la chags pa/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos la chags pa/ khyim sun par byed pa/ sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa/ de dag 'byung ste/ kun tu bzang po mi ga ti/ 
171b3(mdo sde): mug pa de lta bu dag gi don tu ngas mdo 'di yongs su gtad kyis mdo 'di nub par gyur ta re// de nas phyogs bcu nas lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za thams cad lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das
171b4(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das pa dag cag kyang thams cad 'dus shing tshegs te/ ji srid 'tshe ba'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos ji srid gnas
171b5(mdo sde): kyi bar du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// ches smra ba'i dge slong de la yang yongs su bskyang bar ba gyi'o// sti stang du bgyi'o// btsun par bgyi'o// rim
171b6(mdo sde): gro bgyi'o// mchod pa bgyi'o// rjed par bgyi'o// gsol ba bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag
171b7(mdo sde): dgu bcu rtsa gnyis pa de dag la yang dag par bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// yon tan pha rol phyin pa de dag gi// yon tan kun bshad thams cad sanyon// nga rgyal
171b8(mdo sde): rgyags dang bag med spang byos la// dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid kyis mnyan par gyis// ma ga d+ha 'dir shing dbang byang chub drung // rang byung mi yi seng ge bzhugs shes grag/ ting 'dzin rnam
172a1(mdo sde): bas pa na lags/ shung rgyus chen pa des ldan 'azugs/ rdzos btsun rdul snyed de bas gcig/ skyes bungs pa rnams kyis da/ 
172a2(mdo sde): bo bskor// sangs rgyas pal chen zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin// ting 'dzin de la mi dbang po gnas/ mi dbang de ni snyems par zhugs rtogs nas/ 'jam dpal gnon nu shar
172a3(mdo sde): phyogs logs nas// sangs rgyas zhing bcu'i rdul snyed lhan cig tu// skyes bu dam pa rnams dang rgyal drung 'ongs/ de bzhin sbyar de phyogs bcu'i zhing kun nas/ sangs
172a4(mdo sde): rgyas sbas pa dpal zhes bya ba kun// phyogs bcu dashing rdul snyed dang ldan cig tu// skyes bu dam pan dmas dang lhags par gyur/ der 'dus gyur nas
172a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten pan 'dod pa/ 'jam dpal grags phra mtha' yas ldan rnams la/ sems can dam pa zang po'i dpal gyis dris// sangs rgyas sras kyi spyod gang
172a6(mdo sde): yon tan ci// de nas sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba// rnyog pa med pas byang chub yon tan dang // bden yangs yon tan ldan gyi skyed yul gtsang // sems can dam pa bzang
172a7(mdo sde): po'i dpal la dris// sangs rgyas sras po rnams kyi spyod yul gtsang // rgyal bas bsten pa bdag gis 'dir spras kyis// khyod kyang sangs rgyas sras kyi yon tan dang / 
172a8(mdo sde): spyod pa gang dag yin pa brjod par gyis/ bzang po'i dpal gyis spras pa rgyal sras nyon// yon tan mtha' yas ldan de'i yon tan las// dab tshul cung zad tsam nig
172b1(mdo sde): brjod par bya// rgya mtsho'i thigs pa bzhin du shin tu chung // byang chub gzhir 'gyur ba yi rang byung sems// thog ma nyid du bskyed pa gang yin pa// de yi yon tan bsngags pa
172b2(mdo sde): mtha' yas te// mtshungs med kyis kyang yongs su brjod mi spyod// pha rol phyin dang sa yi yon tan rnams// bskal pa mang por spyad pa ci smos te// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun gyis de dag gi/ 
172b3(mdo sde): yon tan chu ba zad par mdzad mi spyod// yon tan mtha' yas rnams kyi yon tan las// dpe tshul cung zad tsam zhig brjod bya ste// mkha' la bya rjes 'dra bar chung ba dang // sa
172b4(mdo sde): chen rnams las rdul phran gcig dang mtshungs// byang chub yon tan gnas kyi sems skye ba// rgyu med ma yin gyi nam de yin gyi// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i chos dang dge 'dun la// dad dang
172b5(mdo sde): dang bskyed nas sems skye ste// de ni 'dod dang leng sa spyod rgyal srid dang // bdag la bde dang snyan dang grag sa phyir min// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus zhi ba'i phyir// / 
172b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten phan pa byed pa'i sems skye'o// rtag tu sems can phan pa bya phyir dang // zhing rnams sbyang dang sangs rgyas mchod pa dang // chos yongs gzung dang sangs rgyas byang chub dang // ye shes
172b7(mdo sde): rnam par sbyang phyir sems de skye// rgyal ba kun dang chos dang de bzhin du// 'phags pa'i tshogs la rtag tu dad pa dang // dang zhing mos dang gus pa rab bskyed nas// bla ma gus par mchod
172b8(mdo sde): phyir sems de skye// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i chos la dad gyur cing // sangs rgyas sras kyi spyod la dad byed la// byang chub bla na med la dad gyur nas// skyes bu chen po rnams kyi sems
173a1(mdo sde): skye'o dang pa'i stobs kyis mi bdag gyur pa rnams/ bas ma yas rgya chen mchod byas shing // chos dang de bzhin mi byed dge 'dun la// bsam yas mdzod/ 
173a2(mdo sde): bas mchod nas sems skye'o// dad bsten 'dren ma lhur skyed pa ste// yon tan thams cad srung zhing 'phel bar byed// dogs pa sel cing chu bo rnams las sgrol// dad pa bde ba'i grong khyer
173a3(mdo sde): mtshon pa yin// dad pa rnyog pa med cing sems dang byed// nga rgyal spong zhing gus pa'i rtsa ba yin// dad pa gter dang ner dang rkang pa'i mchog/ lag pa bzhin du dge sdud rtsa ba yin// dad pa
173a4(mdo sde): yongs su gtong la dga' bar byed// dad pa rgyal ba'i chos la rab dga' skyed// dad pa yon tan ye shes khyad par byed// sangs rgyas go 'phang ston cing thob par byed// dbang po rno zhing rab
173a5(mdo sde): tu gsal bar byed// dad pa'i stobs la gzhan gyis mi rdzi zhing // / nyon mongs rnam par sel ba'i gzhi rten yin// dad pa/ rang 'byung yon tan rnams kyang tshel// dad pa chags pa'i sgo la
173a6(mdo sde): chags pa med// mi dal spangs shing dal ba'i mchog cig yin// dod pa bdud kyi dam las 'da' byed cing // thar pa'i lam mchog ston par byed pa yin// yon tan zhing gi sa bon ma rul ba// dad
173a7(mdo sde): pa byang chub zhing ni rnam par skyed// ye shes khyad par yon tan 'phel bar byed// dad pa rgyal ba thams cad ston pa yin// dad pas mos pa'i khyad par dga' rnams kyi// de la spyod pa rim gyis brjod par
173a8(mdo sde): 'di 'dra'i chos ni 'jig rten rab dkon te// rgya mtsho'i nang ni rin chen rgyal po bzhin// gang dag rtag tu sangs rgyas dang gus pa// de dag tshul khrims bslab pa yongs mi 'dor// 
173b1(mdo sde): gang dag tshul khrims bslab ba'i 'dod ga/ son tan ldan de yon dan ldan pas bzod// tshul khrims byang chub sem pa stod byed pa ste/ rlob pa'i sa ma yon tan rnams la myor// nu ladzin/ 
173b2(mdo sde): bslab pa 'dor bar mi byed pa/ de dag rgyal bas bsngags pa'i 'os su 'gyur/ nga dag rtag tu sangs rgyas dang gus pa/ de dag rgyal la mchod pa rgya chen byed// gang dag rgyal la
173b3(mdo sde): mchid pa rje byed ga/ de dag sangs rgyas dad pa bsam mi khyag/ gang dag rtag tu ches la dadagus pa/ de dag rgyal ba'i ches nyan ngoms pa med// gang dag rgyal po'i chos nyan mi ngams
173b4(mdo sde): pa// de dag chos la mos pa bsam mi khyab// gang dag rta gtu dge 'dun dang gus pa// de dag mi ldog dge 'dun dang / da ba yin// gang dag mi ldog dge 'dun rab dad pa// de dag dad pa'i
173b5(mdo sde): stobs kyis mi ldog 'gyur// gang dag dad pa'i stobs kyis mi ldog pa// de dag dbang po rno zhing rab tu gsal/ gang dag dbang po rno ning rab gsal ba/ de dag sdig pa'i grogs/ 
173b6(mdo sde): po rnam par spangs// gang dag sdig pa'i grogs po rnam spangs pa// de dag chos ldan grogs kyis yongs su bzung // gang dag chos ldan grogs kyi yongs bzung ba// de dag dge ba rgya chen sogs par
173b7(mdo sde): byed// gang dag dag ba rgya chen sogs byed pa// bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyu stobs ldan// bdag nyid chen po rgyu stobs gang ldan pa// de dag mos pa'i khyad par rgya chen 'gyur// gang dag mos pa'i khyad
173b8(mdo sde): par rgya che ba// de dag rgyal ba kun gyis rtag byin brlabs// gang dag rgyal ba kun gyis byin brlabs pa/ de dag byang chub don tu sems kyang skye// gang dag byang chub don tu sems skye ba// de dag drang srong chen/ 
174a1(mdo sde): po'i yon tan brtson// drang srong chen po'i yon tan gang brtson pa// de dag rigs mtho sangs rgyas rigs su ste// gang dag rigs mtho sangs rgyas rigs skyes pa// de dag/ 
174a2(mdo sde): mnyam zhing sbyor dang mi sbyor spangs// mnyam zhing sbyor dang mi sbyor gang spangs pa// de dag dad dang bsam pa rnam par dag/ gang dag dad dang bsam pa rnam dag pa// de dag lhag pa'i bsam pa dam pa mchog/ gang dag lhag
174a3(mdo sde): bsam dam pa mchog ldan pa// de dag rtag tu pha rol phyin pa spyod// gang dag rtag tu pha rol phyin spyod pa// de dag theg pa chen po 'di la zhugs// gang dag thag pa chen po 'dir zhugs pa// de dag sangs rgyas
174a4(mdo sde): rnams la sgrub pas mchod// gang dag sgrub pas sangs rgyas mchod byed pa// de dag sangs rgyas rjes su dran mi byed/ gang dag sangs rgyas rjes dran mi phyed pa// de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas
174a5(mdo sde): bsam yas mthong // gang dag sangs rgyas bsam yas rtagamathe ba// de la nam yang sangs rgyas mi bzhugs min// gang dag nam yang sangs rgyas mi bzhugs min// de dag par skabs ches
174a6(mdo sde): las nyams mi 'gyur// gang dag par skabs chos las mi nyams pa// de dag spobs pa sgrib pa med par 'gyur// gang dag spobs pa sgrib pa med gyur pa// de dag chos rab ston pa mtha' yas 'gyur// 
174a7(mdo sde): gang dag chos rab ston pa mtha' yas pa// de dag 'gro la byams shing phan par 'dod// gang dag 'gro la byams shing phan 'dod pa// de dag snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba brtan// 
174a8(mdo sde): gang dag snying rje chen po'i rtsa brtan pa// de dag chos dag 'a dga' ba'i dbang por 'gyur/ gang dag chos dag dga' ba'i dbang po can// de dag 'dus byas skyon gyis yal bar bor// gang dag 'dus byas skyon gyis
174b1(mdo sde): mam thongag/ de ga cus rgyags med pa med na/ 'ang ga rgya rmugs med pa me dzin/ deganag ga nga gzhan chon/ gang ga rta sa pa ldan pades
174b2(mdo sde): 'kho bar mongs su rgya bamed/ grang dga' bang ba yongs su mi sgrog degatun 'das pa cheg dang ldan/ ga nga rgyun padas pa mchog ldan pa// de dag na / 
174b3(mdo sde): rnam pa dag paskyes// gang dug mngon shes rnam par dag skyes pa// de dag 'gro chab byung ba mang po rtags/ gang dag 'gro ba'i spyod pa mang rtogs pa/ de dag 'gro ba mangs su srin bye
174b4(mdo sde): mkhas// 'gro ba yongs su srin byed gang mkhas pa// de dag 'gro bsdung shes chog sa pas// 'gro bsdud she/ sa cho ga su mkhas pa// de dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la brtson
174b5(mdo sde): gang dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhir brtson pa/ de dag 'gro rje/ don ni mtha' yas byed/ gang dag 'gre don mthara'/ yas byed myur pa// de dag shes rab thabs la rten pa yin// gang
174b6(mdo sde): dag shes rab thabs la rten gyur pa// dpa' bo de dag bla med lam la gnas// dpa' bo gang dag bla med lam gnas pa// de dag bdud dpung rnams kyis yongs mi tshugs// gang dag bdud dpung rnams/ 
174b7(mdo sde): kyis mi tshugs pa// de dag bdud kyi lam las rab tu 'das/ gang dag bdud kyi lam las rab 'das pa// de dag mi ldogs ni rjes su thob// gang da rdzogs ni thob gyur bar// de dag mi skye bzod/ 
174b8(mdo sde): bathob pa yin// gang dag mi skye bzed pa the 'gyur ba// 'jig rten smon te rgyal bas lung bstan te// 'jig rten smen sa rgyal bas lung bstan pa// de dag rgyal ba kun dang mngon sum gnas// 
175a1(mdo sde): rgyal kun dang mngon du su gnas pa/ de dag rgyal gsang rnam 'phrul chog mkhas// rgyal da rnam 'phrul tshe gsum bas pa// de dag rgyal bkun gyis/ 
175a2(mdo sde): dgongs pa yin// gang dag rgyal ba kun gyis dgongs gyur pa// de dag yon tan kun gyis legs par brgyan// gang dag yon tan kun gyis legs brgyan pa// de dag bsod nams
175a3(mdo sde): dam pas lus kyang sbyangs/ bsod nams mchog stobs rnams kyis lus sbyangs pa/ de dag gser gyi ri bo 'dra bar
175a4(mdo sde): 'bar// gser gyi ri bo 'dra bar su 'bar ba// de dag sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams rdzogs// gang dag da sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rdzogs pa// de dag lus rnams
175a5(mdo sde): dpe byad bzang pos spras// gang dag lus rnams da pa byad bzang spras pa/ de dag lus kyi 'od ni mtha' yas so// gang dag lu kyi 'od ni mtha' yas pa// de dag
175a6(mdo sde): 'od zer bkod pa bsam mi khyab// gang dag 'od bkod bsam gyis mi khyab pa// de dag 'od las pad ma rnams kyang 'byung // gang dag 'od las pad+ma rnams byung ba// de dag rgyal gzugs pad+ma'i gdan
175a7(mdo sde): 'khod par// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag tu ston byed cing // don yod gnas pa sems can 'dul bar byed// gang dag rgyal gzugs pad+ma'i bdan 'khod par// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag tu ston byed cing // don yod
175a8(mdo sde): gnas pa sems can 'dul byed pa// de dag mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yas so// gang dag mngon shes rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pa// de dag bsam gyis mi khya zhing rgyu zhing // bsam gyis mi khyab ches rnams mi khyab/ 
175b1(mdo sde): chos ston par byed// sems can bsam gyis mi khyad tshim par byed// gang dag bsam gyis mi khyab chos ston cing // sems can bsam gyis mi khyab tshim byed pa/ de dag sos rigs shes stobs nams
175b2(mdo sde): kyis/ bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul// gang dag sa so rig shes stobs rnams kyis// bsam pa'i bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul// de dag rtag tu lub dang ngag dang yid// ye she
175b3(mdo sde): sngon du 'gro zhing rjes su 'brang // gang dag rtag tu lus dang ngag dang yid/ ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing rjes 'brang ba// de dag smon lam stobs kyis ci 'dod par// sems can rgyud na gzugs ni ston par byed// gang
175b4(mdo sde): dag smon lam stobs kyis ci 'dod par// sems can rgyud na gzugs ni sten byed pa// de dag tshig rnams brjod par byed dnga'i tshe// dbyangs kyi yan lag bsam yas sgra 'byung ngo // gang
175b5(mdo sde): dag tshig rnams brjod par byed pa'i tshe// dpyad kyi yan lag bsam yas sgra 'byung ba// de dag 'gro ba ma lus kun gyi sems// skad cig gcig la sems kyis rnam par shes// gang dag 'gre
175b6(mdo sde): ba ma lus kun gyi sems// skad cig gcig la sems kyis rnam shes pa// de dag nam yang mi 'chi skye mi 'gyur// nyon mongs rgyu ba'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ma yin// gang dag nam yA mi 'chi mi
175b7(mdo sde): skye zhing // nyon mongs rgyu ba 'thung bar mi 'gyur ba/ de dag yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus// chos kyis rab tu phye bas 'jig rten rgyu// gang dag yon tan chos nyid ye shes lus// chos kyi
175b8(mdo sde): rab phye 'jig rten rgyu byed pa/ de dgas bcu rnams dang dbang bcu dang / pha rol phyin dang rnam thar mchog la gnas// gang dgas cu rnams dang dbang bcu dang // pha rol phyin dang rnam thar
176a1(mdo sde): mchog gnas pa// de dag dbang bskur bkod dang nam 'phrul dang / ting 'dzin mchog la gnas pa rjes su thog/ gang dag dbang bskur bkod dang rnam 'phrul
176a2(mdo sde): dang ting 'dzin mchog la gnas pa rjes thob pa// de dag phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad las dbang bskur thams cad ma lus nod par byed// gang dag phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba
176a3(mdo sde): thams cad las// dbang bskur thams cad ma lus nod byed dag/ de dag spyi bor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis// phyags zil bdud rtsi can gyis dbang bsru to// gang dag spyi ba phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyal
176a4(mdo sde): phyag mthil bdud rtsi can gyis dbang bskur ba// mthu brtan da dag nam mkha' lta bu rini// ma lus khyab byas phyogs rnam ngas kun na gnas// mthu brtan gang dag nam mkha' lta bur ni// ma
176a5(mdo sde): lus khyab phyogs rnams kun gnas pa// mtshungs med de/ dag spyod yul lhar bcas kyi// 'jig rten rnams kyis shes par yang mi nus// mtshungs med gang dag skyed yul lhar ba
176a6(mdo sde): kyi 'jig rten rnams kyis shes par mi nus pa/ de dag rkun bkun dang mthong ba dang // ming thos pa dang spobs pa don yod do// gang dag rten pa gan dang mthong ba dang // ming ces
176a7(mdo sde): pa dang slobs bden yod pa/ skyes chen de dag sprin basbyin byed kyi// sbyin pathams cad don yod 'gyur ba yin// skyes bu dam pa de dag rnams kyi mthus// chos kyang gnas shing byams
176a8(mdo sde): banyam sa mi 'gyur// dge ba'i lal lam ra tu myod 'gyu te// don ma tshig mthul dadam pa mchog tu gyur// rdo rje grags pa'i na chen mcheg yod ga/ de yi mthu li rgya tshor ni can rnams/ 
176b1(mdo sde): ma ma la pa ma chu tse/ de tshan yon nam tha' las yon tanan// gnas sa rgyas med pa'i ning gyur pa// de ni byang chung rnam pa ngas rgyas chon/ phyo
176b2(mdo sde): ga na chos kyang med gyur ga// phyogs de chos kyi gter ni ston par byed// de dag rtogs med rnam par mi rtog cing // de dag lhun gyis grub par phyogs kun tu// zla ba lta bur snang ba
176b3(mdo sde): rab ston cing // thabs stong dag gis sems can 'dul bar byed// de dag skad cig la phyogs bcu yi// 'jig rten kun tu byang chub sangs rgyas ston// 'khor lo sker dang mya ngan dasani
176b4(mdo sde): dang ring brel rab rgyas pab dpa' bo ston// ma'i ngas bde dag nyan thos rang rgyalas/ sangs rgyas bkod pa danam 'bral mtha' yas pa// bskal babasam mi khyab par rten byed cing
176b5(mdo sde): thegagasas rlonas sems can 'dul bar byed// mas la/ na gyi bsgrub pa shes pa rnams// rjen bu ma bud med lus ma/ pa dang / lha mi lha mi dang can sbyin dang // la
176b6(mdo sde): bum lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs rnams ston// rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya ting nge 'dzin gyi sgos// dpa' bo de dag 'gro ba'i gzugs spyod dang // rtags dang spyod dang sgra skad 'jug pa/ ji snyed thams cad ma
176b7(mdo sde): lus sten par byed/ de dag ning bkod bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun la mchod pa byed// gang dag zhing bkod pasam gyis mi khyab pas// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba
176b8(mdo sde): kun la mchod byed pa// de dag 'od zer bkod pa bsam yas shing // sems can 'grel pa'i ye shes mtha' las so// gang dag 'od zer bkod pa bsam yas shing // sems can 'grel ba'i ye shwe
177a1(mdo sde): mtha' yas pa/ de dag lus dang ngag gi rnam 'phrul dang / yid kyis rnam par 'phrul ba bsam mi khyag/ gang dag lus dang ngag gi rnam 'phrul dang / 
177a2(mdo sde): yid kyi nam 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ de dag sbyin dang tshul khrims rnam 'phrul dang / bdod dang 'artson 'grus rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ gang dag sbyin dang tshul khrims nas 'phrul dang // 
177a3(mdo sde): len nam 'phrul bsas kyis mi khyab ba// de dgas sa rgyas pa la chen ting 'dzin skyes// bsar gtan rnam par 'phrul dang shes rab dang / thabs dang mngon shis rnas 'phrul bsam mi byug/ na
177a4(mdo sde): tan kun gyis rnam 'phrul mtha' yang yas// de dag phrar ba rdul du gting 'dzin// rdul rnams kun la mngon par sgrub byed pa/ dang // rdul cig steng na zhing rnams bsas mi khyab// ston par
177a5(mdo sde): byed kyang rdul la 'phel ba med// rdul do'i steng du sangs r+b+ba/ sa bcas zhing dang // sangs rgyas med pa'i zhing ya / cig ston/ nyon mongs nas dag dog ga cig
177a6(mdo sde): dang yangs shing phradang che'i zhing yang ston// zhing rnams la la 'jig dang 'chags pa dang // la la steng g.yogs med dang 'thun pa dang // la la tshol pa smig rgyu lta bu dang / 
177a7(mdo sde): la la mig 'phrul lta bur gyur pa rnams/ ji ltar rdul gcig steng du ston byed pa/ de bzhin rdul rnams ma lus kun la ston// drang srong ting 'dzin nam 'phrul 'di 'dra ste// grags
177a8(mdo sde): ba mtha' yas rnam thar 'di 'dra'o// de dag rgyal mchod rnam 'phrul ting nge 'dzin// rgyal ba kun la mngon par sgrub byed cing / lag pa'i mthil du stong gsum rgyas bkang ste// skyes pa
177b1(mdo sde): chen po rnams la mchod pa byed// phyogs bcu drag na me tog 'phreng ba dang // spos byug rin chen rin chen ji snyed pa// de dag byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa yi// rgyal rnams mchod byir
177b2(mdo sde): lag pa'i mthil nas 'byin// gos dang phye ma rin chen ji skad dang / rgyal mtshan ba dan gdugs mchog sna tshogs dang // gser gyis brgyan pa'i rin chen blar rnams// de dag lag pa'i mthil/ 
177b3(mdo sde): nas char du 'bebs// phyogs bcu dag na yo byad mtha' yas gang // drang srong chen po rnams la mchod 'os pa// de dag lag pa'i mthil nas char 'bebs shing // byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa'i
177b4(mdo sde): rgyal ba mchod// phyogs rnams dag na rol mo ji snyed pa// dang rdza rnga sgra snyan pi wang dang // sil snyan sgra dang sgra chen gling bu rnams// de dag lag pa'i mthil nas rab tu
177b5(mdo sde): sgrogs// phyogs bcu kun gyi dpe zla med rnams kyi// yang dag yon tan bsngags pa sna tshogs dang // bste/ dpa'i tshigs bcad bsgrub pa sna tshogs pa// de dag lag
177b6(mdo sde): ba'i mthil nas rab tu sgrogs// 'od zer gang dag las dges yongs bsags pa// lag pa g.yas nas yongs su 'gyed byed cing // spos chus rgyal ba'i zhing rnams thams cad du// 
177b7(mdo sde): 'debs shing 'jig rten sgron ma rnams la mchod// 'od zer bkod dang ldan pa mdzes pa'i 'od// pad+ma'i rgyan 'phreng bsam yas rab 'chang ba// pad+ma mtshan rab gzugs can du ma dag/ 
177b8(mdo sde): laganas rgyal ba rnams la mchod pa byed// me tog phal chen me teg bla dang // me tog bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bskye ste// me tog sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing // bdag nyid chen
178a1(mdo sde): po de dag rgyal ba mchod// bdug pa pal chen bdug pa'i tha re dang // bdug pa bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ bdug pa sna tshogs kun tu
178a2(mdo sde): bkram byas shing / bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ ngal chen thos dang thos kyi bu dang / blos kyi bkod pa'i 'od zer rab ba kyi ste/ sna tshogs spos rnams kun tu bkram byas
178a3(mdo sde): shing bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// phreng ba pa la chen phreng ba'i thar dang / phreng ba bkod pa'i 'od zer rab kyi ste// phreng ba sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing / 
178a4(mdo sde): bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// phye ma phal chen phye ma'i bla re dang // phye ma bkod pa'i 'od zerarab bak+She ste// phye ma sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas
178a5(mdo sde): shing / bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/ na batha' bal chen na pa pa'i tha dang // na bza' nga/ kod pa'i 'odaper rab ba kye ste// na bza sna tshigs kun
178a6(mdo sde): tu bkram byas shing // bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// phan chen gdugs dang gdugs kyi brer dang / gdugs kyi bkod pa'i 'od zer rab ba kye ste// sna tshogs gdugs rnams kun
178a7(mdo sde): tu bkram byas shing // bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod// rin chen phal chen rin chen blar dang // rin chen bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste// rin chen sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas
178a8(mdo sde): shing / bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mched// pad+ma phal chen pad+ma'i bla re dang // pad+ma bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/ pad+ma sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing // bdag nyid chen po deng/ 
178b1(mdo sde): rgyal ba mchod// rgyan 'phreng phal chen rgyan 'phreng bla re dang // rgyan 'phreng bged pa'i 'od zer rab kyi ste// rgyan 'phreng sna tshogs kun tu bkram byas shing // bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba
178b2(mdo sde): mchod// rgyal mtshan mchog bkod 'od zer rab bkye ste// de dag rgyal mtshan dkar dmar ser po dang // sngo dang rgyal mtshan bkod pa sna tshogs pa// du mas rgyal ba'i zhing rnams brgyan par byed// 
178b3(mdo sde): nor bu'i dra ba sna tshogs bkod pa'i bdugs// dar gyi lnga ldi pa dan rab sbyangs shing // dril g.yer dra ba rgyal ba'i gsung sgrogs pa// de bzhin gshegs kyi dbul de dag 'dzin// lag pa'i mthis
178b4(mdo sde): nas mchod pa bsam yas rnams// rgyal ba gcig la dede dag byed pa ltar// rgyal ba ma lus kun la de bzhin te/ da drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o// de dag 'gro bsdud pa'i/ 
178b5(mdo sde): ye shes kyis// rnam par 'phrul dang ting 'dzin mchog/ sbubs shing // bya ba dag dang bsnyen bkur kun gyi sgo/ thabs stong dag gis sems can 'dul bar byed// kha cig/ 
178b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa mched sgo dang / sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab gtong sgo dang // spungs pa'i yon tan tshul khrims kun sgo dang // bzod pa mi zad mi 'khrugs sgo dag dang // kha cig brtul zhugs dka'
178b7(mdo sde): thub brtson sgo dang // bsam gtan rab tu zhi bar gnas sgo dang // don la rnam nges shes rab sgo rnams dang // spyod pa kun ldan thabs kyi sgo dag dang // tshangs pa'i gnas pa
178b8(mdo sde): dag dang mngon shes so// bsdu ba'i dngos po phan par 'dod sgo dang / bsod nams bsags dang ye shes sgo dag dang / bden dang brtan dang rnam par thar sgo dang / 
179a1(mdo sde): cig stobs dang dbang po lam sgo dang / nyan thos theg pas rnam par sgrol sgo dang // rkyen gyi theg pas rnam par dag sgo dang / theg pa mchog gi rnam par
179a2(mdo sde): 'phrul sgo dang // / kha cig mi rtag nyid dang sdug bsngal sgo// kha cig bdag med srog med sgo dag dang // mi sdug 'du shes 'dod chags bral sgo dang // zhi 'gog ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo yis 'dul// 
179a3(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i spyod pa'i sgo rnams ji snyed pa// de snyed chos kyi sgo la rab zhugs te// de dag kun tu rnam thar sgo dag nas// bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul// gang dag kun tu rnam
179a4(mdo sde): thar sgo dag nas// bsams bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul byed pa// de dag sus kyang mtshan mar gzung mi nus// ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa de 'dra'o// de dag dga' ba bkod pa'i
179a5(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin mchog/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs smin mthun byed pa// dga' bde spro ba rab dga' kun ldan pas/ bsams pa bstan nas sems can 'dul bar byed// gang du lo/ 
179a6(mdo sde): nyes 'jig rten yo byad gang // bde byed thams cad rab tu dkon gyur pa// der ni kun gyi bsams bzhin bya ba yis// sbyin pa sbyin zhing 'gro ba'i don rnams byed// de dag zas skem mchog dang ro
179a7(mdo sde): mchog dang // gos dang bgo ba rin chen sna tshogs dang // rgyal srid nor dang bdag phangs yongs gtong bas// sbyin la mos pa'i 'gro ba 'dul bar byed// brtan pa de dag mtshan mchog lus spras shing // 
179a8(mdo sde): gos dang rgyan mchog bges shing brgyan byas te// phreng bas skud cing spos kyis bskus pa yi// gzugs rnams bstan pas sems can 'dul bar byed// mthong na dga' tshim rab tu dga' rnams la// 
179b1(mdo sde): blo mchog de dag gzugs mchog gzugs bzang ba// gzugs kyi dam pa yongs su ston byed cing // gzugs la mos pa'i sems can 'dul bar byed// de dag ka la bing ka'i sgra stan dang // khu
179b2(mdo sde): byug kun la ngang pa'i sgra skad dang // rnga dang tshangs dang mi 'am ci'i sgras// mes pa kun la de bzhin chos kyang ston// stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gang yin pas// rgyal ba gang dag 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i/ 
179b3(mdo sde): ches kyi bye brag sgo mo de dag gis// bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul// de dag bde dang sdug bsngal grogs kyang byed// don dang gnod pa'i grogs kyang de bzhin byed// bya ba kun la grogs su 'gyur/ 
179b4(mdo sde): byas shing // grogs kyi sgo nas sems can 'dul bar byed// sdug bsngal gnod pa 'dus byas sbyin gyi rnams // grogs kyi don tu de dag bzod byed cing // 'gro ba
179b5(mdo sde): kun la phan don bde don tu// de dag grogs don gnod pa dang du/ len// gang na mngon 'byung med cing chos med de// dgon par 'gro dang thar pa mi dmigs pa// der ni rgyal srid 'byor/ 
179b6(mdo sde): pa rab spangs te// zhi ba'i yid kyis gnas med mngon par 'byung // de dag khyim dang 'ching dang sred pa'i gnas// 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir// 'dod pa'i dga' ba kun la
179b7(mdo sde): mi gnas par// mngon par byung zhing thar pa rab tu brjod// de dag spyod pa bcu rnams brjod byed cing // skyes chen rnams kyi chos spyod gang yin dang // drang srong rnams kyi spyod kun ma lus par/ 
179b8(mdo sde): yongs su brjod cing 'gro ba'i don rnams byed// gang na sems can dpag med tshe ldan zhing // bde dang ldan la nyon mongs chung yod pa// der ni rga bas nyen cing nad bu can// bdag la dbang
180a1(mdo sde): med 'chi ba'i dbang gyur ston// 'dod chags 'bar zhing zhe sdang rab 'bar la// 'jig rten gti mug me chen rab 'bar zhing // rga dang na dang 'chi ba ba
180a2(mdo sde): 'bar ba'i// 'jig rten bstan nas sems can 'dul bar byed// de dag sangs rgyas stobs bcu brtson pazhi dang // chos kyi khyad par bco brgyad rnams kyis kyang // sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag nyid brjod
180a3(mdo sde): byed cing // sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyis 'gro don byed// de dag kun brjod rdzu 'phrul rjes bstan pas// gzugs kyi byin rlabs stobs kyis thams cad du// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed cing / 
180a4(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pas sems can 'dul// de dag \u0f7fdbas tshul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// 'jig rten rgyu zhing 'gro da ba'i don rnams byed// 'jig rten mi chags chu la pad+ma bzhin/ 
180a5(mdo sde): dga' zhing dad par byed la rnam par rgyu// de dag snyan dngags mkhan rgyal snyan dang gas sbyor// gar mkhan rnga mkhan gyad dang rol mo khan// bzhags mdzes rgyan 'phreng thogs
180a6(mdo sde): shing gar byed dang // sbrum mkhan po gzugs mang kun tu ston// grong pa grong dpon kha lo sgyur ba 'gyur/ de bzhin de da dpon tshong dpon khyim bdag 'gyur// rgyal po blon po mdun
180a7(mdo sde): 'don po nya dang // sman pa 'jigs med bstan bcos cho ga mkhas// de dag dgen par sngoni shing chen por 'gyur// sman dang rin chen mi bdag ter rnams dang // yid bzhin nor bu 'dod 'byin sdong
180a8(mdo sde): bo dang // lam ge la dong ba rnams la las sngon 'gyur// 'jig rten byung nas mi ring shes gyur cing // sems can las kyi tshul rnams ni shes pa/ de dag kun la rmos chos tshong thabs
180b1(mdo sde): dang // sna tshogs bzo rnams 'jig rten brjod par byed// 'tshe med gnod pa med pa'i sbyor ba gang // sems can bde byed mkhas pas rab bsngags dang // rig stobs sman dang bstan bcos sna tshogs
