310b6(mdo sde): 'bum phrag brgya snyed yod par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig cing yang rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad+mo brgya stong snyed kyis rnam par bkod do// pad+mo'i de'i steng na yang byang chub sems
310b7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po brgya stong snyed bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag kun gyi sku lta ba'i mtshan yang byang chub sems dpa' snga ma bzhin no// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi kha
310b8(mdo sde): dog mang po'i 'od zer rnams 'dus pa las 'od kyi gcig tu gyur nas/ ri de mtho la gsal ba ni gser btso ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa lta bu'o// khang pa brtsegs pa de'i grwa bzhin tshangs pa'i
311a1(mdo sde): / rgyal mtshan chen po bzhi yod de/ rgyal mtshan de'i thog ma la sangs rgyas kyi zhing khri drug bzhi pa'i yod do// zhing de re ren yang mchod rten chen po 'a
311a2(mdo sde): phrag stong snyed yod de/ mchod rten de nang gi chung ngun yang 'dzam bu'i gling nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la thug ste/ rin po che'i dbyig dam pa thams cad kyis yongs su brgyan te// rin
311a3(mdo sde): be che'i mchod rten rnams dang / sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kun kyang snying rje dang / byams pa dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi chos rnams bstod/ 
311a4(mdo sde): cing bsngags pa sgrogs so// sems can gang dag dper 'di mthong shing rtogs na/ shA ri'i bu dang dadra bar blo gros chen por 'gyur zhing / dga' ba dang 'drab
311a5(mdo sde): thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dag bo la bka' stsal pa sangs rgyas ma/ sa su mya ngan las 'das nas/ sangs rgyas kyi
311a6(mdo sde): gnas su gyur pa dag/ mtshan 'di mthong bar 'dod na/ byams pa'i sems skyed do// srog mi gcod pa'i khrims yongs su srung zhing phyogs
311a7(mdo sde): bcu'i skye bo thams cad kyi phyir/ spyad pa 'di spyod pa ni bsam gtan ma byas kyang / rtag tu rmi lam na yang gong du bshad pa'i 'od zer dang / sprul pa mang po dag mthong ba
311a8(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ gang dag tshig 'di gzungasu 'dzin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi thugs yong su 'dzin pa'i// gang gis 'di ltar rje su dran
311b1(mdo sde): par byed pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi thugs rjes su dran par byed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ni// byams pa dang snying rje'i bdag nyid chen po'o// sku ni tshul khrims dang / ting / 
311b2(mdo sde): 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes chen po sten pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
311b3(mdo sde): dang / snying rje chen po dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum gyis yongs su brgyan te/ gang de ltar rjes su dran par byed pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi thugs yang dag par rjes su dran par byed cing
311b4(mdo sde): 'dzin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal dab rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i dalte ba'i mtshan phyogs gcig tsam bshad pa yin te/ thugs kyi spyod
311b5(mdo sde): yul ni gzhan las rgyas par 'chad do// de la de ltar blta bar bya'o// gang gis de lta bur mthong ba de ni yang dag par mthong ba'o// gang gis de lta ma yin par mthong ba de ni log par/ 
311b6(mdo sde): mthong ba'o// sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ sangs rgyas kyi nye gnas su gyur pa gang gis/ chos 'di yid la byed dam/ chos 'di 'dzin cing rjes su dran par byed na/ tshe 'di
311b7(mdo sde): nyid la sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyis bsgribs pa kun yongasu byang zhing dag par 'gyur ro// 'od 'bum phrag gcig gis ni shar lce'i phyogs mtshams snang bar byas te/ shar lce'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
311b8(mdo sde): rten gyi khams par mtshams med par gser gyi 'khor ler gyur to// gser gyi 'khor lo de dag las 'khor lo grangs med par gyur rin po che sna bdun dang bcas so// gser gyi 'khor lo de
312a1(mdo sde): / gcig cing yang 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po khri phrag brgya snyed do// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po de re re la yang bu stong stong dang dmag rnams bzhi dang bcas so// 
312a2(mdo sde): rin po che sna bdun de las 'od zer chen po 'byung ba ni/ dud pa'am sprin lta bu ste/ 'od de re re la yang pad+mo chen po re re yod do// pad+me de yang gcig la gcig mtshams 'brel to// pad+mos
312a3(mdo sde): mtshams dang bar kun nas nyi ma lta bu'i 'od chen po 'byung ste/ nyi ma lta bu'i 'od ra ra la yang gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i bal glang rer yod de/ de la sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' re re bcibs so// 
312a4(mdo sde): bal glang de dag la bcibs pa'i tshan brjod kyis mi rdzogs pa'i mtshan dang / dpe byad mang po 'byung ngo // byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'od zer 'dus pa las
312a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi sku gcig tu gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i kha dog kyang gser bcom lta bu sku'i tshad kyang dpag tu med gzhal du med pa'o// de dag kyang sku'i lte ba'i mtshan ston
312a6(mdo sde): te/ de'i 'od zer dang mtshan bzang po yang gong du bshad pa bzhin no// 'od kyi nang nas snang bar gyur pa thams cad kyang / khrims lnga dang dge ba bcu bstod pa dang / chos dang
312a7(mdo sde): 'dul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rjes su dran pa la bsngags pa brjod pa dang / 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnams kyang lag na gsar gyi 'khor lo thogs te/ dge
312a8(mdo sde): ba bcu'i chos sgrogs so// bcom ldan 'das kyi dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de la de ltar blta bar bya'o// gang gis de lta bur mthong ba de ni yang dag par mthong ba'o// gang
312b1(mdo sde): gis de lta ma yin par mthong bden log par mthong ba'o// sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ sangs rgyas kyi nyi gnas su gyur pa dag 'di ltar sems shi du shes pa'am/ yid/ 
312b2(mdo sde): la byed cing chos 'di rjes su dran par byed na/ bskal pa khri phrag nyi shu'i 'khor ba'i nyes pa 'byang zhing rtag tu mtho ris su skyes te/ dge ba bcu'i chos thos par 'gyur ro// 'od 'bum phrag
312b3(mdo sde): gcig gis ni lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten snang bar byas te/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa snyed/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs su gyur to// 
312b4(mdo sde): nor bu de re re yang 'od zer stong stong 'bar ro// 'od dazer de dag 'dus pa las rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa dpag tu med par gyur to// khang pa brtsegs pa de'i grang ni
312b5(mdo sde): na yang rin po che'i ri rab gling bzhi pa la gnyi zla gza' skar dang btu sa pa gling phran bcu gnyis kyis bskor ba 'od zer mang po bcas pa re re yod do// ri rab lhun po de re re la yang
312b6(mdo sde): rin po che'i brag phug 'od 'bar bgrangs med bsnyed do// brag phug der ro'i nang na yang sprul pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pasnyed bzhugs so// sprul pa'i sangs rgyas de re re la yang / 
312b7(mdo sde): 'khor byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa grangs med pa snyed do// sprul pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'adi dag kun kyang dge ba bcu'i chos ston cing bsngags so// 
312b8(mdo sde): de la de ltar blta bar bya'o// gang gis de lta bur mthong bdi ni yang dag par mthong ba'o// gang gis de lta ma yin par mthong ba de ni log par mthong ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
313a1(mdo sde): dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ sangs rgyas kyi nye gnas su gyur pa dag/ 'di ltar sems shing
313a2(mdo sde): 'du shes pa dang / yid la byed pa 'am/ chos 'di rjes su dran par byas na/ bskal pa khri phrag bcu gnyis snyed kyi 'khor ba'i nyes pa yongs su spong bar 'gyur zhing yongs su dag pa'i 'jig
313a3(mdo sde): rten du bsams pa bzhin du skye bar 'gyur ro// 'od 'bum phrag gcig gis ni nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten snang bar byas nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten
313a4(mdo sde): gyi khams tshad med pasnyed de dag 'od des shel sna tshogs kyi kha dadog du gyur te/ shel leb rgan dang dkar po da dang / ljang khul gser dang bai DUR+Ya dang pad+ma rags kyang mdzas
313a5(mdo sde): par brgyan cing spras so// shel dang rin po ched ngag gi 'od zer las rin po che'i shing rta khri phrag du ma snyed byung ngo rin po che'i shing rta rnams kyi kha dog ji lta ba de
313a6(mdo sde): bzhin du 'bar ro// shing rta de dag gi srog shing ni gser btse ma'i kha dog go// de lta bu'i shing rta de dag gi steng na rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten dang / rgyal mtshan chen po yod de/ 
313a7(mdo sde): mchod rten dang rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la rin po che'i gdugs chen po yod do// gdugs de yang rim pa bcu snyed do// gdugs de las 'od zer stong stong snyed 'bar ro// rin po che'i
313a8(mdo sde): 'phreng ba mang pos kyang shin tu mdzes par brgyan te/ 'od zer kyang de'i rjes su 'jug go// de nas yang phyir byung ba dang / de las sprul pa'i sangs rgyas mang po byung ste/ sangs rgyas de dag
313b1(mdo sde): gi sku'i tshad kyang dpag tshad 'bum phrag khri snyed do// sangs rgyas de dag re re'i sku'i lte ba nas kyang 'od grangs med pa zung ste/ 'od des kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams dang / sprul/ 
313b2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad snang bar byas so// sems can gang zhig la 'od zer 'dis reg par gyur pa de yang ngan song gsum las yongasu thar te/ ngan song gsum gyi nyes pas mi 'tshe
313b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// 'od zer de dag 'khyil cing 'dus pa las 'od kyi khang pa brtsegs pa lta bur gyur te/ sprin ltar steng gi bar snang la 'phags te 'od de'i nang nas sprul pa'i sangs rgyas brgya
313b4(mdo sde): stong du ma skyed snang ngo // sprul pa'i sangs rgyas de re re la yang nyeganas kyi 'khor khri phrag brgya snyed de/ 'od srungs chen po lhur sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis la dka' thub tu skyed cing
313b5(mdo sde): sems ci la yang ma chags te/ 'jig rten las ye/ ngas su 'da' ba sha dag go/ de la de ltar blta b.rabya'o// gang gis de lta bur mthong ba de ni yang dag
313b6(mdo sde): par mthong ba'o// gang gis de lta ma yin par mthong ba de ni log par mthong ba'o// sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ sangs rgyas kyi nye gnas su gyur pa dag
313b7(mdo sde): 'di ltar 'du shes pa'am/ sems shing yid la byed pa'am/ chos 'di rjes su dran par byas na/ gang zag des rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams mthong zhing myur du theg pa chen po'i chos kyi don
313b8(mdo sde): rdzogs pa dang / bskal pa khri phrag bcu snye kyi 'khor ba'i nyes pa yongs su spong bar rig par bya'o// 'od 'bum phrag gcig gis ni byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams snang bar byas te/ bya
314a1(mdo sde): shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa snyed 'od kyis yongasu dag cing rnyeg pa 'am/ dri ma med pa ni shel gyi sgo nga'i me long ltar phyi nang kun/ 
314a2(mdo sde): gsal bar byas so// 'od de dag gi nang nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kun kyang sku lte ba'i mtshan ston par snang ngo // sangs rgyas de dag re re'i sku lte ba'i 'od zer gyis kyang phyogs
314a3(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa snyed snang bar byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer yang sprul pa'i sangs rgyas rdul phra rab kyi grangs snyed bzhugs par gyur to// sangs rgyas de re ra
314a4(mdo sde): la yang rdul phra rab snyed kyang byang chub sems dpa' dag na bas 'bring 'khor du gyur te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang lte ba'i mtshan ston te// 'od
314a5(mdo sde): zer las gser gyi ka ba dang / rin po che'i gdung ma rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa lta bur bres te/ de las/ rin po che'i yang thog dang spros ma dang sgrom bu dang / rin po che
314a6(mdo sde): rgyan 'phreng tshad brjod du med pa snyed/ sprin ltar steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags te/ 'od rab tu 'bar ro// rin po che'i tshe rkyen de dag kun las 'od rje mi nam 'bru brag bri khri yod pa gyur // 'od sde bcu la la/ 
314a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi sku de snyed gcig tu gyur te snang ngo // sangs rgyas de re re'i sku la yang sprul pa'i 'od zer rdul phra rab snyed 'byung zhing / 'od de'i thog ma la yang sprul pa'i sangs rgyas sku yungs/ 
314a8(mdo sde): kar gyi 'bras bu tsam sha stag yod par gyur to// sangs rgyas su phra mo de dag gi lci ba'i mtshan ston pa yang gong du bshad pa bzhin no// de ltar sku lte ba'i 'od zer rnams phyogs bcu kun tu snang bar
314b1(mdo sde): byas nas/ phyir yangasangs rgyas kyi lte bar thugs so// sangs rgyas rnams kyi lte ba nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snyi gar zhugs so// byang chub sems/ 
314b2(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi snying kha nas phyir byung nas nyan thos rnams kyi spyi bor zhugs so// nyan thos rnams kyi spyi bo nas phyir byung nas 'od kyi sprin chen po tshad med par gyur te/ de gser gyi kha dog rin po
314b3(mdo sde): che rnam pa sna tshogs pas sbas shing brgyan te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs kyi mthil du zhugs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhabs kyi mthil tu zhugs nas/ zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo
314b4(mdo sde): brtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i mtshan las kyang 'od zer chen po byung ba/ ra gyur to// 'od zer de yang pad+mo chen po lta bu ste/ pad+mo de 'dab chags su gyur te/ sangs rgyas la lan stong phrag
314b5(mdo sde): bcu bskor nas zangs kyi kha dog lta bu'i zhabs kyi sen mo dang / zhabs kyi sor mo'i gong nas dbu'i gtsug tor la thug gi bar du yongs su brgyan te/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i ba spu'i bu ga'i
314b6(mdo sde): mtshan rnams pad+mo kha bye ba lta bur gyur nas/ ba spu'i bu ga gcig gi nang na yang pad+mo brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed yod par gyur to// pad+mo de gcig gi steng na yang sprul pa'i sangs rgyas brgyad khri bzhi
314b7(mdo sde): stong snyed bzhugs so// sprul pa'i sangs rgyas de re re'i zhabs 'bring na yang 'khor byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed do// byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re'i smin mtsham
314b8(mdo sde): kyi 'od zer gyi rnam pa las sgra dbyangs sna tshogs byung ste/ de yang sangs rgyas kyi sku'i yon tan dang mtshan dang / dpe byad bstod cing bsngags pa'i sgra'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas
315a1(mdo sde): 'od zer dang / sprul pa de dag bstan nas/ rgyal po yab la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku dang mtshan gyi khyad
315a2(mdo sde): pAr ni 'di dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi thugs ni ma gtogs kyi/ spyod yul gzhan ni gong du bshad pa dag go bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs pa dang / de'i tshe rgyal po yab 'dug pa las
315a3(mdo sde): langs te gos tshags bcos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te lan bdun bskor ba byas nas pus mo sa la gtsugs te thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
315a4(mdo sde): to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku dang / mtshan ni thams cad du khyab par bstan na/ btso dam ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi mtshan dang / spyod yul ji lta ba dang / 
315a5(mdo sde): mtshan ci 'dra ba dang / nan tan ci mdzad pa dang / sangs/ rgyas kyi thugs kyi dgongs pa ji lta bu dang / thugs kyi 'od zer ji lta bu lags pa bstan du gsol zhes gsol pa
315a6(mdo sde): dang / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad de/ ljags kyi mtshan gyi 'od zer yang sngar bshad pa bzhin du sangs rgyas la lan bdun bskor nas sangs rgyas kyi gtsug tu nub
315a7(mdo sde): // de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rgyal po yab kyis 'di lta bur mthong bar byas so// bai DUR+Ya'i sbubs su
315a8(mdo sde): gser bcom gzugs mdzes pa bzhag pa ltar shin tu mdzes par snang bar byas te/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdzes pa gsar bcom lta bu'i thugs kha nas mgur du bai DU rma
315b1(mdo sde): srubs nas ri la dang kyai ro dang 'od bar rgyu zhing 'bab te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs pa d+mol ba rgan lta bu la gser gyi badres shin tu brgyan par mthong ngo // thugs pad+mo la brtan la du
315b2(mdo sde): de pad+mo kha bye ba yang ma yin pa ma bye ba yang ma yin te/ dpal gyi be'u la rtsa brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed yod de rtswa de'i ri mo yang lha'i ri mo lta bu dang g.yung drung khyil pa lta bustu/ 
315b3(mdo sde): me'i bar mtshams kun na 'od zer brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed yod do// 'od zer de re re la yang kha dog brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed dang ldan no// kha dog gi rnam pa de re re la
315b4(mdo sde): yang sprul pa'i sangs rgyas sku tshad med pa rdul phra rab kyi grangs skyed bzhugs so// sprul pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kun kyang rdo rje'i khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs par snang
315b5(mdo sde): ngo// rdo rje'i khang pa brtsegs pagrangs med pa de dag las/ kyang gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'ad grangs med pa snyed 'byung ste/ rgyas par bshad du bde bar mi nus
315b6(mdo sde): so// 'od de dag re re'i nang na yang sprul pa'i sangs rgyas grangs gong du smos pa bzhin du bzhugs so// sprul pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis kyang ljags che zhing ring ba'i mtshan byung nas
315b7(mdo sde): dbu 'dab la thug gi bar du yog ste/ 'od rab tu 'gyed do// sangs rgyas kyi ljags de re ra la yang 'od zer khri phrag bcu snyed do// 'od zer de dag kyang spyir tshem bu rnam
315b8(mdo sde): ba stong phrag bcur gyur nas/ 'od zer de re re la yang sprul pa'i sangs rgyas 'bum phrag brgya snyed skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs nas/ sku kun khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
316a1(mdo sde): par zhugs so// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku'i gzugs dam pa yang ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya mtsho 'dir sdang bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das
316a2(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyems par zhugs pa'i tshen/ grong khyer ser skya dang / n+ya gronga'i gzhal med khang dang 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rin po che'i pad+mo lta bur gyur to// pad+mo khang pa brtsegs par
316a3(mdo sde): gyur pa'i steng na shel gyi rgyal mtshan chen po yod do// shel gyi rgyal mtshan gyi dbu rtse la shel gyi me long yod de/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
316a4(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa thams cad kyang der snang bar gyur to// de'itshe 'khor mang po thams cad kyis sangs rgyas rnams ma dathong bar gyur te/ la las ni sangs rgyas kyi sku na mkha'
316a5(mdo sde): tshad dang mnyam pa gser gyi kha dog can du mthong ngo // la la sa ni sku ri rab lhun po dang 'dra ba rin po che sna bzhi las byas par mthong ngo // la las ni sangs rgyas kyi sku
316a6(mdo sde): bai DUR+Ya'i kha dog lta bu la tshad kyang mthe brgya par mthong ngo // la las ni sangs rgyas kyi sku dngul gyi kha dog lta bu la khru brgyad stong snyed du ring bar mthong ngo // la las ni sku dung gi mdog gam zla ba dri ma
316a7(mdo sde): med pa lta bu la sku chags bzhi bcu rtsa dgu par mthong ngo // sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i sku ni tshad bzhin du mthe bcu drug par mthong ngo // la las ni mtho bdun par mthong ngo // la las
316a8(mdo sde): ni mtho gsum pas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la thug gi bar du yongs su gang bar mthong ngo // lA las ni sor bdun pas 'jig rten gang bar mthong ngo // de dag kun kyang 'od zer dang / mtshan dang / 
316b1(mdo sde): dpe byad kyis yongs su brgyan pa'o// la las ni yungs kar gyi 'brum bu tsam du mthong ngo // la las ni gser gyi khri'i 'bras bu tsam du mthong ngo // yi dgas rnams kyis ni rdul phra mo tsam
316b2(mdo sde): du mthong ste/ yi dgas rnams kyis de lta bur mthong ba dang / yi dgas lus chung ngun mi'i rnams rab tu dga' bar gyur to// mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rjes su dran pa rdzogs pa'i le'u ste/ 
316b3(mdo sde): bzhi pa'o// // sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i mdo// / bam po lnga pa// de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi
316b4(mdo sde): thugs pad+mo leb rgan lta bu las/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i bar dang / mtshams kun nas 'od zer kha dog dkar po brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed byung ste/ 'od des rgyud lnga'i sems can
316b5(mdo sde): kun mtha' yas par thams cad snang bar byas so// 'od ze ra 'di dag byung ba'i tshe na/ sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa sems can mang po mngon du snang bar gyur pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ mnar
316b6(mdo sde): med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po dang / sems can dmyal ba chung ngun bco brgyad dang / rab tu grangs pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po bco brgyad dang / mun pa nag po'i sems can dmyal chen po bco
316b7(mdo sde): brgyad dang / rab tu tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba chen po bco brgyad dang / mtshon gyi 'khor lo'i sems can dmyal ba chen po bco brgyad dang / ral gri'i tshal gyi sems can dmyal ba chen po bco brgyad dang / 
316b8(mdo sde): me'i shing rta'i sems can dmyal ba chen po bco brgyad dang / shin tu dri mi zhim pa'i lcags khu khol ba'i sems can dmyal ba chen po bco brgyad dang / chu tshan khol ba'i sems can dmyal ba chen po bco brgya dang / 
317a1(mdo sde): thal chu'i sems can dmyal ba chen po bco brgyad dang / mtshon gyi nags tshal gyi sems can dmyal ba khri phrag lnga brgya dang / ral gri'i sdong po'i sems can dmyal bakhri
317a2(mdo sde): phrag lnga brgya dang / tsher ma'i tshal gyi sems can dmyal ba khri phrag lnga brgya dang / lcags kyi sdong po'i sems can dmyal ba khri phrag lnga brgya dang / lcags kyi thags zangs kyi sems can dmyal
317a3(mdo sde): ba khri phrag lnga brgya dang / lcags kyi dra ba'i sems can dmyal ba khri phrag lnga brgya dang / lcags kyi khang pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po bco brgyad dang / lcags kyi thu lum gyi sems can dmyal
317a4(mdo sde): ba chen po bco brgyad dang / rdo zur mong gi sems can dmyal da ba chen po bco brgyad dang / lcags khu 'thung ba'i semadas can dmyal ba chen po bco brgyad dang / de dag la sogs pa
317a5(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba mang po dag yod par gyur to// bcu ma ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de la rdzi ltar na mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba zhe na/ mnar med pa'i
317a6(mdo sde): tsha grangs gis gdungs pa dang mgon dang / skyabs med pa'i sgra skad du ni/ a byi zhes 'don te/ a zhes bya ba bya ni med pa'o// byi ni mtshams so// a zhes bya ba ni med pa'o// byi ni skyab so// a zhes bya ba/ 
317a7(mdo sde): ni mtshams med pa'o// byi ni mi g.yo ba'o// a zhes bya ba ni rab tu tsha ba'o// byi ni rab tu gdung ba'o// a zhes bya ba ni rab tu grang ba'o// byi ni rab tu gdung ba'o// a zhes pa ni mi dal ba'o// byi ni mi sdong pa'i
317a8(mdo sde): sdug bsngal chen po las mi dal mi sdod pa'i phyir na mnar med pa zhes bya'o// a zhes pa ni mchen po'o// byi ni rab tu tsha ba'o// rab tu tsha ba'i me 'bar bas snying la gdugs pas
317b1(mdo sde): mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ mnur med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po na// chu zheng gab par dpag chad
317b2(mdo sde): brgya steng snyed de/ mtha' ma yang ljags kyi mkhar me 'bar ba rim pa bdun gyi bskor to// 'og kyang lcags kyi dra ba ma 'bar ba rim pa bdun no// 'og na bar chad 'bar ba bco brgyad
317b3(mdo sde): yod de/ kho ra khor yug tu ral gri'i tshal rim pa bdun yod do// mkhar rim pa bdun gyi bar na yang ral gri'i nags tshal rim pa bdun yod do// 'og gi bar chad rim pa bcwo brgyad la/ bar chad
317b4(mdo sde): de gcig yang dra mig dang rim pa brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de// de'i grwa bzhin yang zangs kyi khyi re re yod do// khyi dede bzhi'i lus kyi tshad kyang dpag tshad bzhi bcu snyed do// mig
317b5(mdo sde): ni glog ltar 'bar mche ba ni ral gri ltar rno'o// so rnam sa ni mtshon gyi ri ltar 'dug la/ lce ni lcags kyi zem ltar rtsub la lus kyi spu thams cad las kyang ma rab tu 'bar te/ 
317b6(mdo sde): de las dud pa rab tu dri mi zhim pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi dri mi zhim pa gang gis kyang dper mi bzod pa dag 'khrigs so// sems can dmyal ba'i bsrungs ma bco brgyad yod de/ mgo yang srin por
317b7(mdo sde): mgo lta bu la/ kha yang srin po'i kha 'dra ba ste/ mgo la mig drug cu rtsa bzhi snyed yod do// mi ga nas lcags kyi thu lum dpag tshad phyed pa dag 'beb so// khyi'i mche ba de ring khyad kyang dpag
317b8(mdo sde): tshad bzhi ste/ mche ba de'i thog ma me rab tu 'bar zhing / lcags kyi shing rta yang 'bar bar byed do// lcags kyi shing rta yang 'khor lo re ra la yang da ltar 'bar ba'i mtshon gyi 'khor lo dang / ral gri'i 'khor/ 
318a1(mdo sde): lo rab tu rno bdag 'byung ngo // me de snyed kyis mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba bsregs te/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba yongs su gdungs so// 
318a2(mdo sde): dmyal ba'i srungs ma'i mge la grang gi mgo brgyad yod de/ glang gi mgo gcig la yang rwa bco brgyad yod do// rwa'i rtse mo de re ra la yang me'i phung po re re 'byung ngo // me'i phung po de re re la yang
318a3(mdo sde): me'i dra ba chad bco brgyad du gyur nas/ shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam gyi me'i ral gri 'khor lor gyur to// 'khor lo de 'dab chags su mAM 'bar ba'i nang nas dkrigs te/ mnar med pa'i sems can
318a4(mdo sde): dmyal ba gshegs cing sreg go/ lcags kyi khyi rnams kha gdangs shing lce lcags kyi gza ma dang 'dra ba phyung nas das la phab pa'i tshe/ gdugs pa'i lce me 'bar bgrangs med par/ 
318a5(mdo sde): gyur nas/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba yongs su gang ngo // lcags kyi mkhar rim pa bdun gyi ran lcags kyi rgyal mtshan 'bar ba grangs med pa yod de/ rgyal
318a6(mdo sde): mtshan gyi rtse mo nas lcags tshan gyi khu ba lud cing / chu mig drag po ltar 'bab ste/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba la yongs su gang ngo // mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba la sgo bzhi yod/ 
318a7(mdo sde): de/ sgo'i them pa na zangs tshan 'bar ba brgyad cu snyed yod do// zangs kyi nang nas lcags tshan gyi khu ba lud cing 'bo ste/ man dra med pa'i sems can dmyal ba la yongs su grang ngo // mnar bcad de/ 
318a8(mdo sde): re ren yang lcags kyi sbrul chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed yod de/ kha nas gdugs pa dang me 'byin to// sbrul gdug pa can des sems can dmyal ba'i lus la yongasu gang ste/ skad 'byin pa na
318b1(mdo sde): 'brug ltar skad rab tu che ba sgrogs shing lcags kyi thu lum yang char bzhin du 'bebs pas/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar yongasu gang ngo // sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal 'di ni sdug
318b2(mdo sde): bsngal 'bum phrag brgyad khri snyed kun 'di na tshang bar med do// sems can dmyal ba'i gnas den lcags kyi srin bu khri phrag lnga brgya snyed yod de/ srin bu gcig la yang kha brgyad khri ba ni stong snyed de// 
318b3(mdo sde): de'i kha nas me char bzhin du 'bebs pas/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar yongs su gang ngo // srin bu chen po de char bzhin du bab pa'i tshe na/ mnar med pa'i sems can
318b4(mdo sde): dmyal ba'i me yang rab tu cher 'bar te/ me'i 'od kyis da dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed khor khor yug kun snang bar byed do// ma das mnar med pa'i sems can
318b5(mdo sde): dmyal ba nas/ rgya mtsho dang ri rab tu gdungs pa zhes bya ba la thug go/ rgya mtsho'i gting nas kyang shing rta'i srogashing tsam gyi lcags kyi skud du gyur nas/ mnar med pa'i sems can
318b6(mdo sde): dmyal bar yongasu gang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sems can gang slob dpon dang / pha ma bsad pa dang / gnyen gyi drug rgyud la skyo zhing smod pa dang / gshe zhing
318b7(mdo sde): brgyad pa dang / sems can nyon mongs pa rnams la snying mi brtse ba dang / g.yo sgyus log par 'tshe ba dang / sems can mang po'i srog bcad pa dang / mi dge pa bcu dang / mtshams med pa'i
318b8(mdo sde): las byas pa dag/ 'chi 'pho'i dus byed pa na lcags kyi khyi rnams kha gdangs pa gser lta bu'i shing rta bco brgyad du sprul pa la/ steng yang rin po che'i gdugs bres pa ltar sprul te/ me lce thams
319a1(mdo sde): cad kyang bu mo gzhon nur sprul nas/ spro ba bskyed par gyur to// sdig pa can des rgyang nas mthong ba dang rab tu ba'i sems skyed de/ bdag der 'gro na re
319a2(mdo sde): dga' snyam nas/ bdag der 'gro'o zhes smras pa dang / de ma thag tu rlung gi mthus rab tu grang bar gyur te/ skad chen po phyung nas me tsha ba zhig dang phrad na ci ma rung snyam bsams te brjod/ 
319a3(mdo sde): nas/ shing rta de'i steng na 'dug cing / ma tsha ba zhig dang phrad na re dga' snyam bsams pa dang / de ma thag tu nyam thag nas tshe 'phos te/ gser gyi shing rta rta 'bar ba'i steng na
319a4(mdo sde): 'dug cing / bu mo gzhon nu rnams kyang lag na sta/ ra rnon po re re thogs shing lus la gcod cing gshegs dpa/ shing rta'i 'og na ma rab tu 'bar te/ dper na// stobs po che
319a5(mdo sde): zhig lag ngar brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyi srid du/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal chen por lhung ngo // bar chad lhag ma nas me mgal bskor ba'i 'khor lo bzhin bar chad
319a6(mdo sde): nang gi 'og mar byin te/ bar chad kun tu lus kyis yongs su gang ngo // zangs kyi khyis skad chen po phyung nas/ rus pa 'cha' zhing rkang 'jib bo// srungs ma srin pos ni lag
319a7(mdo sde): na mdung rtse kha brag pa thogs nas mgo la btsugs te phyir bslang ngo // de nyid du lus kun nas me 'bar/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar yongs su gang ngo // lcags kyi dra ba
319a8(mdo sde): las ral gri 'bar ba char bzhin du 'bab ste/ lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga kun tu zug go/ de'i tshe sprul pa'i gshin rje 'ongs nas skad chen pos 'di skad ces smra'o// glen pa gti mug can
319b1(mdo sde): dmyal ba'i sa bon khyod sangs rgyas dang chos dang slob dpon dang pa ma la sri zhu ma byas te/ nga rgyal gyis chos log pa spyad pas khyod kyis skye ba'i gnas 'di ni/ mnar med sems can
319b2(mdo sde): dmyal ba chen po zhes bya'o// khyod byas pa mi shes shing drin du mi gze bas/ ngo tsha ba dang khrel dang gzhung med pas 'di ltar sdug bsngal gyis gdungs par gyur pa 'di la dbade ba ci yod ces
319b3(mdo sde): smras nas mi snang bar gyur to// de'i tshe na dmyal ba'i srungs mas sdig pa can de bar chad 'og ma nas bar chad lhag ma'i bar du bar cad brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed kun tu 'das nas/ kun la lus kyis
319b4(mdo sde): 'gro zhing 'gro ste/ lcags kyi dra ba'i mthar phyin to// / nyin zhag gcig gis lan re 'khor ro// mnar med pa nga'i nyin zhag gcig la ni/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi lo dang zla ba dang / zhag
319b5(mdo sde): dang nyi mas bgrang ba'i bskal pa chung ngu drug cu skad de// / de'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa chen po gcig go// mtshams ma da pa lnga byas pa'i gang zag sdig pa can de dag 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed
319b6(mdo sde): pa na/ rlung gi mtshon cha 'bar ba lcags kyi shing rta dang 'dra ba bco brgyad kyis lus gtubs gshegs ste/ me rab tu tsha bas snying la gdungs pas 'di snyam du bdag me tog sna tshogs dang
319b7(mdo sde): ldan pa'i bsil grib can gyi shing chen po zhig gi 'og na rtse na ra dga' snyam bsams pa dang / de ma thag tu mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i mtshon gyi nags tshal thams cad rin po
319b8(mdo sde): tshe'i nags tshal lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rgyas pa lta bur sprul pa rab tu dkrigs par gyur te/ me lce thams cad ni shing rtsa ba nas pad+mo lta bur sprul te sgo/ 
320a1(mdo sde): ba bskyed pa dang / sdig pa can des mthong ba dang bdag gi yid la 'dod pa dang phrad do snyams bsam nas/ bu yug drag po bas kyang mgyogs par me'i pad+mo
320a2(mdo sde): stang du 'dug par gyur pa dang / de ma thag tu lcags kyi srin bu rnams kyang me'i nang nas byung ste/ rus pa dang / rkang gi nang du thal byung du song nas/ snying dang glad ma'i nang du yang thal byung
320a3(mdo sde): du seng ngo // 'phongs nas shing la 'jug te 'dzegs pa dang / thams cad ral gri 'bar bar gyur te yan lag dang rus pa kun dum bur chad de/ ral gri'i 'khor lo grangs med pa snyed
320a4(mdo sde): kyang steng nas bab po// me'i shing rta dang / lha gas tshan 'bar ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi dngos po bco ba rgyad kyang dus gcig tu 'dus na su'o// de ltar gyur pa dang
320a5(mdo sde): sa la 'gyel to// bar chad 'og mar lus pad+mo kha/ bye dang 'dra bar ral zhing gas pas yongs su gang ngo // bar chad 'og ma nas bar chad gong mar rims bzhin du 'phar te/ 
320a6(mdo sde): me rab tu 'bar bas bsregs pas bar chad kun tu lus kyis gang ste/ tsha bas yongs su gdungs pas mig dgrang kha gdangs te lce 'byin to// sdig pa can de la sdig pa'i las kyis
320a7(mdo sde): lcags tshan gyi khu ba khri phrag brgyad stong dang / mtshon gyi 'khor lo brgyad stong snyed 'bab cing 'bo ste/ spyi bor phog nas rkang mthil du thal byung du byung ngo // sdug bsngal gyi dngos
320a8(mdo sde): po rnams ni bshad pa bas kyang brgya stong gis lhag par mi bzod do// mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i sdig pa can de ni bskal pa yang lnga tshang bar sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// sems can/ 
320b1(mdo sde): gang tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba bzhi zhig pa dang / sbyin bdag dad pa'i sbyin pa chud gsan pa dang / ngan par lta ba'i sems kyis chos la skur pa 'debs pa dang / las legs nyes
320b2(mdo sde): kyi 'bras bu mi shes pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston cing 'chad pa dang slob pa'i bar chad byed pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas la dbang bzas pa dang / dge gyi dkor
320b3(mdo sde): sru nga la brlabs pa dang / mi rigs pa la mi tshangs par spyod pa dang / dge slong ma dang / ma srid du gyur pa'i gnyen pa la mi tshangs par spyod pa dang / khrel ba dang / ngo tsha med pa dang / gnyen
320b4(mdo sde): gyi drug rgyud la skyo zhing brgyad de mi rig pa'i las bya/ smras pa'i sdig pa can de 'chi bo'i dus na yang rlung gi mtshon chas lus gshegs cing bde bar nyal du yang med de/ lcags mes
320b5(mdo sde): bzhu ba bzhin du nyam thag nas sems kyang myos par gyur / mig lam na bdag gi 'khor yul dang / khyim dang gnas dang / nor rdzas dang / zaskom la sogs pa thams cad mi
320b6(mdo sde): gtsang ba dang / ngan sngags kyis gang bar mthong ste/ de'i tshe sdig pa can de'i skad du ci'i phyir gnas 'di dag na gnas bzang po ri dang tshal du ldan pa med dam/ ci ste 'di lta bu'i mi gtsang bas
320b7(mdo sde): gang ba'i gnas 'dir bzhag ces smra'o// de skad smras ma thag tu srung ma srin pos mdudang rtsi kha brag pa'i kha nas/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba dang / ral gri'i tshal dang / ma
320b8(mdo sde): mur dang lcags tshan la sogs pa rnams rin po che'i shing dang / bsil ba'i rdzing bur sprul te khyer nas/ me lce rnams kyang gser gyi pad+mor sprul te/ srin bu lcags kyi mchu can rnams kyang bya
321a1(mdo sde): ngur bar sprul nas/ dmyal ba'i skad a byi zhes bya ba'i sgra ni glu dbyangs su sprul te/ spro bskyed do// sdig pa can des de lta bu dag mthong zhing thos/ 
321a2(mdo sde): pa dang / 'di skad du 'di lta bu'i gnas bzang por ci'i phyir bdag der mi 'dug snyam bsams pa dang / de ma thag tu me'i pad+ma'i stengs du 'dug par gyur to// lcags kyi srin bu
321a3(mdo sde): rnams kyang ba spu'i bu ga kun tu zhugs te/ lus kun nas 'bugs shing za'o// lcags kyi 'khor lo 'bar ba brgya stong snyed kyang mgo'i steng nas char bzhin du bab nas mdung
321a4(mdo sde): kha brag pa grangs med pa mig du 'dzugs shing mig gi 'bras dbu 'byin to// sems can dmyal ba'i zangs kyi khyi dang / lcags kyi khyi brgya stong mang po yang 'dus te/ de'i lus
321a5(mdo sde): khams tshad du gshegs cing snying la za ba'o// sdig pa can de'i lus de ma thag tu lcags kyi pad+mo lta bur gyur te bar chad bco brgyad po kun tu yongasu gang ngo // lus pad+mo
321a6(mdo sde): lta bur gyur pa de re re la yang lus kyi yan lag pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed yod do// yan lag de re res kyang bar cha derare re yongs su gang bar gyur te/ bar chad rnams
321a7(mdo sde): kyang chen por ma gyur la/ sems can dmyal ba'i lus kyang chung ngur ma song ste/ de lta bu'i dmyal bar yongs su gang bar gyur to// sdig pa can des de lta bu'i dmyal ba chen por lo
321a8(mdo sde): brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du sdug bsngal chen po blangs te/ de'i gnas nas shi ste yang dmyal ba'i shar phyogs kyi bar chad bco brgyad po kun gyi nang du sdug bsngal chen po snga ma bzhin du len to// 
321b1(mdo sde): de bzhin du mnar med pa'i lho phyogs na yang bar cad bco brgyad nub phyogs na yang bar chad bco brgyad byang phyogs na yang bar chad bco brgyad yod do// de dag kun tu gang shin tu rgyas
321b2(mdo sde): pa'i mdo la bskur pa btab pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa byas pa dang / mthun pa'i bar du dbyen byed pa dang / dge slong ma la mi tshangs par spyad pa dang / dge
321b3(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bcad pa dang / de la sogs pa'i sdig byas pa dag mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar lus kyis yongs su gang ste/ lus kyi yan lag bzhis kyang bar chad
321b4(mdo sde): bco brgyad kun tu gang ngo // mnar med pa'i sems/ dmyal ba 'di dag rtag tu de ltar 'bar ro// sem ngas can dmyal bar sa ben btab pa'i gang zag de bskal ba zang
321b5(mdo sde): du nye ba na dmyal ba'i shar phyogs kyi sgo bya nasasgo'i phyi rol na chu mig dang 'bab chu dang bsil ba'i dz+dza dbu dang / me tog dang 'bras bu'i tshal mang po snang bar
321b6(mdo sde): gyur to// sdig pa can des de lta bur de dag mthong ba dang / mig nas me 'bar ba chung zad cigazhi nas bar chad 'og ma nas 'phye zhing gog ste bar chad lhag mar phyin nas/ ral gri'i 'khor lo la
321b7(mdo sde): 'ju ste bzung ba dang / na mkha' las lcags kyi thu lum 'bar ba char bzhin du bab ste/ shar phyogs kyi sgor rgyugs so// sgo'i tham par phyin nas srung ma srin po rag sha dang yag
321b8(mdo sde): sha mdung rtsi kha brag pas mig du btsugs te phyir phul lo// lcags kyi khyi rnams kyis kyang bzung nas de nyid du 'gyel te shi'o// shi ma thag tu phyir yang sos te dmyal ba'i
322a1(mdo sde): lho sgo bye ba yang snga ma bzhin no// de bzhin du nub sgo dang byang sgor yang snga ma bzhin te/ de lta bur yang bskul pa phyed kyi bar du sdug bsngal myong bar
322a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba de nas shing ste rab tu grangs pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes so// rab tu drang ba'i sems can dmyal ba de nas yang shi nas/ 
322a3(mdo sde): mun nag gi sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes ste/ lo khri brag brgyad steng gi bar du ji ji yang mi mthong bar gyur te// de nas yang tshe 'phos nas srin bu chen po zhig gi skye ba blangs te lto bas
322a4(mdo sde): 'phyi zhing 'gro ste/ dbang po rnams yongs su mi gsal da ba dang / shes pa med par gyur te/ sbyang ki brgya da steng mang pos za bar gyur to// de nas yang tshe 'phos nas
322a5(mdo sde): byol seng gi khams su skye ba brgyud cing skyes te/ skye ba khri brag lnga brgya'i bar du byol song gi lus len par 'gyur ro// de nas thar nas bzod kyis mir skyes na yang 'on pa dang / 
322a6(mdo sde): rkugs pa dang / zha ba dang / long ba dang / mdze dang / shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang / shu chen gyi gzir te/ dbul zhing phongs pa dang / rigs ngan par skye ba dang / gang ngan dgu thams cad tshegs
322a7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// de ltar shin tu dman pa'i lusu skye ba lnga brgya'i bar du skyes te/ de nas yang phyir yi dgas kyi khams su skyes te gnas pa las/ de nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub sems
322a8(mdo sde): dpa' chen po dang phrad de/ tshig 'di skad ces sgo bar gyur to// khyod sngon skye ba grangs med pa'i sngon rol na kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa/ dkon mchog gsum la skur pa btab pa dang / ma dad
322b1(mdo sde): ba dang / ma mos pa dang / mgyogs pas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung ngo // dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi dngos po yong su gdungs pa ni bshad kyis kyang mi rdzogs so// khyod
322b2(mdo sde): byams pa dang snying rje chen po'i sems skyed cig ces bsgo ba nas sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// nas slar bcug/ de nas sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod pa'i bsod nas
322b3(mdo sde): kyi mthus/ de nas tshe 'phos nas rgyal chen bzhi'i lhar skyes so// lha der skyes nas rab tu 'gyod de byang chub mchog tu sems skyed do// sangs rgyas kyi thugs rje'i 'od zer gyis de dag mi
322b4(mdo sde): gtong zhing yongs su 'dzin to// sras sgra gcan 'dzin dang 'dra bar de dag byams shing thugs brtse ste/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal las byol cig ces
322b5(mdo sde): rjes su bstan pa mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po che/ na po la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas kyi thugs kyi 'od zer chen po snang bar mdzad pa'i don rnams shes
322b6(mdo sde): par 'dod na/ de ni gang zag mtshams med cing skyabs med pa'i skye bo rnams la rtag tu snang bar mdzad par shes par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi thugs kyi dgongs pa ni rtag tu sdug bsngal ba'i gang
322b7(mdo sde): zag sdig pa can rnams la dgongs te/ sangs rgyas kyi thugs rje'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ gang zag sdig pa can sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba rnams kyang bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das nas/ byang
322b8(mdo sde): chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de la ji ltar na rab tu grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba bco brgyad ce na/ rab tu grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba ni/ 
323a1(mdo sde): chab brem gyi ri chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed yod de/ ri de gcig la yang bar chad bco brgyad dang / ri chung ngu bco brgyad yod de shel gyi kha dog ltabu/ 
323a2(mdo sde): la rab tu grang ba'o// rab tu grang ba'i sems can dmyal bas ri de dag gi bar na yongs su gang nas/ gyo mo'i pad+ma lta bu la mtho khyad dpag tshad bco brgyad dang / chab brom gyi 'khor lo cha zheng gab par dpag
323a3(mdo sde): tshad bcu gnyis pa steng gi na mkha' las ser ba de bzhin du bab po// de dag 'jig rten na gang snying rje'i sems med cing rku zhing 'phrog pa dang / sgyus 'phrog pa dang / sems can gyi sreg gcod cing sdig pa
323a4(mdo sde): mang po byas pa'i gang zag de 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na gnas dang // 'du byed kyi dngos po thams cad me rab tu tsha ba dang / mtshon char gyur te/ sdig pa can de 'di snyam du bdag me rab tu
323a5(mdo sde): tsha ba dang mtshon chas nyen par gyur pa dang / bdag chab brom gyi klong chen po zhig na nyal na ji ma rung snyam bsams pa dang / de ma thag tu dmyal ba'i srungs ma srin pos lag na chab brem gyi
323a6(mdo sde): 'khor lo chen po thogs te bya dkar po 'phur ba ltar nam mkha' las gom pa 'dor zhing 'ongs te spro ba skyed pa dang / sdig pa can des mthong ba dang tsha bzhi zhing bsil bar gyur to// de la sems kyis
323a7(mdo sde): 'dod cing chags pa las tshe 'phos te chab brom gyi ri la skyes so// der skye ba dang chab brem gyi ri chen po rnams bsil g.yab kyis g.yabs pa bzhin du grang ba dang sdug bsngal ba thams cad pa
323a8(mdo sde): spu'i bug kun tu song ngo // bar chad bco brgyad po kun tu lus kyis gang nas lus dang yan lag kun gas shing ral te bye nas pad+mo dmar po lta bur gyur to// chab brom gyi 'khor lo
323b1(mdo sde): chen pos lus la yongasu khebs te/ phyogs mtshams brgyad kyi cha brom gyi ri rnams kyang dus gcig tu 'dus nas byol ba dang bzur ba'i sa med de/ tshig tu a byi dang a la la zhes bya ba/ 
323b2(mdo sde): 'bod do// de tshe sdig pa can de 'di snyam du bdag nam zhig gi dus na rab tu grang ba 'di las thar te/ phyir yang me'i nang du skye grangs snyam bsam pa dang / de'i dmyal ba'i ljags kyi bya
323b3(mdo sde): rnams kyis kha nas me phyung ste/ phyogs mtshams dang steng 'og kun nas chab brom bzhu ste/ sdig pa can gyi glad pa brtol nas glad pa bzhibs pa dang / de nyid du dmyal ba'i srungs mas
323b4(mdo sde): mdung rtse khra brag pas la brdabs te yang sos shig ces dbos pa dang / de ma thag tu yang sos nas phyir yang ma rab tu tshabs gdungs pa dang / 'di ltar bdag gi lus la mes rab tu
323b5(mdo sde): gdungs par gyur na/ cha 'a brom snga ma des me 'di sadan ji ma rung snyam bsam pa dang / dmyal/ ba'i srung sems cha 'a brom gyi 'khor les sdig pa san de thangs
323b6(mdo sde): nus par chad gcig nasu byung ste/ bar chad gzhan gyi nang du bcug nas bar chad bco brgyad po kun tu ma phyin pa'i sa med de/ kun tu sdug bsngal 'drar spyod do// rab tu grang ba'i/ 
323b7(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba'i tshe'i tshad ni rgyal chen bzhi'i gnas kyi nyim dang / zlabs bgrang ba'i lo khri brag brgyad stong snyed kyi bar du gnas so// de las thar nas kyang rigs ngan par
323b8(mdo sde): skyes te/ dbul zhing 'ongs pa dang / byad gzugs ngan pa dang / skye ba lnga brgya'i bar du gzhan gyi bran khol du skyes te/ gos kyis lus mi log pa dang / zas kyis lho ma khe/ 
324a1(mdo sde): pa dang / tshe thung zhing nad mang bar 'gyur ro// de nas sdig sgrib kyi rnam smin bri nas gzod dge ba'i gshes gnyen chen po dang drad de/ byang chub tu sems
324a2(mdo sde): bskyed par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de la ji ltar na mun nag gi sems can dmyal ba zhe na/ mun nag gi sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba ni ri nag po rim
324a3(mdo sde): pa bco brgyad dang / mun dra ba nag po rim pa bco brgyad dang / lcags kyi tshal rim pa bco brgyad dang / lcags kyi bla re rim pa bco brgyad mun pa'i 'jig rten dang bcas pa yod do// mun pa'i
324a4(mdo sde): ri de dag kun kyang mtho khyad dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi steng snyed yod do// bla re rim pa gcig la yang sdug khyad dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de/ bla re'i rim pa re re'i bar na
324a5(mdo sde): yang kho ra khor yug tu ri nag po bco brgyad kyis grib mar bsgri bas so// 'di ni 'jig rten na skye bo dang / gang / zag glen zhing gti mug can dag sangs rgyas dang / chos dang
324a6(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dang / mchod rten chen po brgyad dang / ma hA bo de la sogs pa la bsngos pa'i me mar dang snang ba'i sgron ma brkus pa dang / pha ma dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma'i
324a7(mdo sde): snang ba brkus pa dang / chos dang chos kyi mkhan po la skur pa btab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi gtsug lag la mkhas pa yang brnyas smod byed pa dang / legs nyes kyi ngo ma shes pa dang / 
324a8(mdo sde): sdig pa mang po byas pas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa'i tshe na mig na glog lta bur 'gyur zhing 'bar ba rgyun mi 'chad pa gyur pa dang / 'di snyam du bdag nyes pa ci byas nas 'di ltar rtag
324b1(mdo sde): rtag tu mig mi mthong bar gyur pa yin snyam bsams nas/ nyi zla'i 'od kyang mthong bar mi 'dod do// mtha' ma 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na/ dmyal srungs srin pos ljags kyi khril
324b2(mdo sde): lcags kyi bla re bres pa khyer te/ sprin 'du ba bzhin du nam mkha' las babase// de'i tshe nam mkha' las gzugs mi snang bar sgra 'di skad du grags so// rigs kyi bu gnas
324b3(mdo sde): 'di rab tu mun pa gnag na/ khyod 'gro 'dod dam zhes grags pa dang / sdig pa can des thos pa dang / gnas der 'gro bar dga' ba'i sems skyes te/ de ma thag tu 'phos nas lcags
324b4(mdo sde): kyi khri la 'dug par gyur nas/ bya ngang pa'i rgyal po 'phur blta/ dar chas te/ mun nag gi sems can dmyal bar lhung ngo // / der phyin nas ral gri'i 'khor lo mang po ltag 'og
324b5(mdo sde): gnyis nas 'phen te/ lus gtub cing gsheg go/ lcags kyi bya chen po mchu ne zhing ring ba dag kyang / nag po do las babs nas mchu rnon pos thal byung du zug cing
324b6(mdo sde): thug go/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal chen po lo 'bum phrag lnga brgya'i bar du myong bar gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi nyi ma rab tu med pa dang / phan tshun du rgyug cing snang ba tshel lo// de'i tshe rkang pa'i 'og
324b7(mdo sde): nas lcags kyi smyung chen po dang / gze ma rnon pas rus pa dang rkang la thal byung du zug cing phug go/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal chen po le 'bum phrag lnga brgya'i bar du myong bar gyur te/ 'jig
324b8(mdo sde): rten gyi nyi ma dang zla bas bgrang ba'i lo dang skal pa'i tshad ni rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha dang mnyam mo// sdig pa can de mun nag gi khams dar ni nag po kun la phan tshun du mgo bo thug pas glad pa
325a1(mdo sde): drugs te lcags kyi kyi rnams 'ongs te logs so// mig 'bras bu sangs la lhung ste/ dmyal pa'i srungs masmin pas mdung rtse 'dras
325a2(mdo sde): bzegs te mig gi 'bras bu blangs nas phyir mig du 'dzud de// sdug bsngal chen po de la bu dag myong nas tsi swa thar na yang dbul zhing 'phongs pa dang / dbang po lnga ma gsal bdang
325a3(mdo sde): shes pa med pa dang dus la na mang ba dang / kun gyis mi 'dod par 'gyur ro// de lta bu rnam par smin pa yang skye ba lnga brgya' bar du phreng bar 'gyur ro// de nas gzod dge ba'i
325a4(mdo sde): gnyen chen po dang phrad nas byang chub tusems bskyed pang 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bol bu/ snru 'o/ de mangs nganab tu dza sems can
325a5(mdo sde): dmyal ba chen po bco brgyad cen/ rab tu cha ba'i sems can dmyal ba bco brgyad ces bya ba ni/ mnar medapa/ 'damyal ba chen po bzhin du lcags kyi mkhar me ra
325a6(mdo sde): tu bar bas pa dang/ lpags kyi ba sa pa btsun // ga'adus drug pasngal kya sa pom lus pa cad med bdag med/ gang gamal ba nan nag lal
325a7(mdo sde): mams med pa rje'i rdzogags pa dang / sre ba ben la chu dang / we ba dzin gyi zas lagacang thum byas dang / rjeb na tu thaM na la 'dun pa dang / ma dzin la brnas shi
325a8(mdo sde): sred pa dang / gre ba na la nam sku byed pa dang / mi 'di na la sur pa 'das padang / sri den sa rdeg 'ang / blo dzin ma dmeng padang / rlom na nam dun du pa / 
325b1(mdo sde): pa'i sdig pa byas pa dang / gzhan yang gang zag slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / pha mas bstan pa bzhin du mi byed cing log pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / byams pa mi shes pas drin du mi
325b2(mdo sde): gzo ba dang / gzhan yang mchod rten dang lha gang dang / sku gzugs gshig pa dang / dkon mchog gi dkar spang brkus pa dang / pha ma dang / punu dang / ming sring dang gnyen
325b3(mdo sde): 'dun du gyur pa la sogs pa la 'tshe zhing gsod pa dang / ches ma yin pa rnam pa mang po byas pa'i sdig pa can da 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i bsrungs ma pa
325b4(mdo sde): brgyad kyis so so nas mdung rtse kha drag pa'i kha la bar chad/ re re khyer te 'ongs pa las sems can dmyal bde dag gis bar chad de/ rin po che'i gdugs la
325b5(mdo sde): bdud rtsi char spel ma 'bab pa lta bu la/ char gyi thig pa me tog dang 'dra bar mthong ba dang / sdig pa con da sdig pa'i rnam par smin pas rab tu tsha ba'i sems snying la
325b6(mdo sde): gdungs pa'i tshabs nyen pa las 'di snyam du bdag gdugs kyis bkab pa'i 'og na 'dug cing char gyi thig pa 'dis pheg na ci ma rung snyam bsams pa dang / de ma thag tu tshe 'phos nas rdo'aphangs
325b7(mdo sde): pa tsam gyi srid du ral gri'i khri la 'dug par gyur te// ral gri rnon po la ma rab tu 'bar ba grangs brjod du med pa skad dkrigs shing bsdams te/ rin po che'i gdugs de yang
325b8(mdo sde): mtshon sna tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang gdugs su myur te// steng na bab te spyi ba nas thal byung du phyed tshal du gshegs shing dral te dum bu brgyadate dum bu brgyas so// char gyi theg pa me tog
326a1(mdo sde): dumathong bde yang steng ga phyogs nas lugs kyi bu lum 'bar bachar bzhin du bab ste/ baspu'i bug ku tu spong ba dang / lus tshe'i phung po babar po// 
326a2(mdo sde): srungs ma srin po bco brgyad kyis kyang mdung rtse kha brag pa thogs te sdig pa can gyi mig tu 'dzugs shing / snying la mtshon gyis 'debs pas de nyid du 'gyel te shi'o// de ma thag tu
326a3(mdo sde): phyir yang sos nas ral gri'i khri dang 'khor lo'i steng du 'dug cing rlung drag po mas mgyogs par sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung ngo // de'i tshe dmyal ba'i srungs ma srin pos
326a4(mdo sde): gshin rje'i gnas dang bcas te steng gi nam mkha' la 'dugadenas 'di skad ces smra'o// sems can dmyal dpa'i sa bon khyod// sangs rgyas dang chos dang 'phags
326a5(mdo sde): pa'i dge 'dun dang / pha ma dang sleb dpon dang gnyen dudu na du gyur pa las mtshams med pa lnga dang / de dang nye ba lnga dang mi dge ba bcu'i sdig byas pa dang / chos ma yin
326a6(mdo sde): pa'i sdig pa mang po byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pas khyed kyi skye ba'i gnas 'di ni lce 'byin pa'i sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ste/ khyed bskal pa gsum gyi bar du sems can dmyal ba'i
326a7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur ro zhes smras so// sdig pa can de'i sdug bsngal gyis rab tu gdungs pa'i tshad ni sngar bshad pa bzhin no// gral te de las thar na yang
326a8(mdo sde): ngan song gsum gyi nang du skye ba brgyud de// de las thar te phyir mir skyes na yang ngan dgu tshogs par 'gyur ro// de nas gzod dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen pos byang chub tu
326b1(mdo sde): sems bskyed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de la ji ltar na mtshon gyi 'khor lo'i sems can dmyal ba bco brgyad zhe na/ mtshon gyi 'khor lo
326b2(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba ni/ phyogs bzhi na ral gri dang mtshon cha'i ri yod de/ ri de dag kun gyi bar na ral gri dang / spu gri ka ma la dang / mdung dang shag ti la sogs pa nags tshal bzhin
326b3(mdo sde): du dkrigs te/ steng gi nam mkha' las kyang ral gri dang / spu gri'i 'khor lo chen po khri phrag brgyad brgya'i rnam mthar gyis rang bzhin du 'bab bo// sems can gang gzhan la
326b4(mdo sde): 'chi bar dga' zhing sems can gyi srog gcod par 'dod pad dang / sdig pa mang po byas pa dag 'chi ba'i dus byed/ pa'i tshe na/ grang nad kyis shin tu nyon mongs nas khong par
326b5(mdo sde): skran chen por zhugs te rdo bzhin du sra zhing rab tu gang ba dang / 'di snyam du bdag gi lto ba 'di gri 'am/ ral gri'am/ spu gri rnon po zhig gis dral te nad 'di thang la phyung
326b6(mdo sde): na ji ma rung snyam bsams pa dang / de ma thag tu dmyal srungs srin pos spyi bo la ral gri dang / spu gri'i 'khor lo thogs te/ sdig pa can gyi drung du 'ongs nas spro ba bskyed de tshig
326b7(mdo sde): 'jam pos 'di skad du/ bdag la 'di lta bu'i spyad rnon po dag yod na/ khyod kyi lus la nad yod pa 'di ngas gcad cing dbyung na rung ngam zhes smras pa dang / sdig pa can des tshig de
326b8(mdo sde): thos nas 'khor lo rnon po de dag mthong ba dang / rab tu dga' ste 'di snyam du bdag ni rab tu tshim par gyur to// snyam bsams pa dang / de nyid du tshe 'phos te mtshon gyi 'khor
327a1(mdo sde): le'i ril skyes nas/ ban glang rmis pargyug pa bzhin du mtshon gyi ril 'grel bar gyur to// de nas phyogs bzhi'i ri yang phan tshun 'dus nas/ 
327a2(mdo sde): mtshon gyi nags tshal gyis gtub cing dmyal te de nyid du yang shi'o// dmyal srungs srin pos sdig pa can de mtshon gyi ri la bdas pa dang / ri'i rtse mor ma byin par lus kyi yan lag
327a3(mdo sde): kun dum bur chod kyang / dmyal srungs kyis 'jigs pas tshen gyi ri la gog cing 'gro'o// ri'i rtse mor phyin pa dang dmyal ba'i srungs ma srin pos mtshon gyi sdeng po bteg ste sdig pa
327a4(mdo sde): can de la rdeg go/ de'i tshe lcags kyi khyi dang lcags kyi da srin bu rnams kyis kyang snying dang / klad pa dang / rkang la 'jib cing za ste/ phung po zhig nas sha kun zad
327a5(mdo sde): pa dang phyir yang sos so// de nas yan lag bzhi la ral gri'i 'khor los thugs bzhin du ri'i rtse mo nas phyir 'babs so// de ltar nyin zhag gcig la lan khri
327a6(mdo sde): phrag drug bcu ni 'chi lan khri phrag drug cu 'tshe'o// de ltar sdug bsngal rnam pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su gtug pa ni rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha'i tshe tshad bzhin du gnas so// gal te de las
327a7(mdo sde): thar na byol seng gi khams su smras te/ skye ba lnga brgya'i bar du zas su rtsa dang shing za bar 'gyur ro// de las thar na yang skye ba lnga brgya'i bar du rigs ngan par skye ba brgyud cing skye bar 'gyur ro// 
327a8(mdo sde): de nas gzod dge ba'i gshes gnyen chen po dang phrad nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de la ji ltar na ral gri'i tshal gyi sems
327b1(mdo sde): can dmyal ba zhes na/ ral gri'i tshal sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba ni/ khor khor yug tu dpag tshad lnga bcu snyed la/ bar mtshams med par ral gri gtams pa'i nang na ral gri sdong / 
327b2(mdo sde): yod pa'i grangs ni 'bras kyi zhing ngam/ 'od ma 'am/ 'dam bu'i tshal bzhin no// ral gri'i sdong po de gcig cing yang mtho khyad dpag tshad bzhi bcu yod do// ral gri'i 'khor
327b3(mdo sde): lo brgyad khri bzhi stong snyad ni/ lo ma ltar 'phyang / ral gri'i 'khor lo brgyad khri bzhi stong snyad ni me tog ltar rgyas so// ral gri'i 'khor lo brgyad khri bzhi stong ni 'bras bu ltar gyur la/ lcag
327b4(mdo sde): can 'bar ba brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed ni sdong po'i yal ga lta ra gyur to// de yang sems can gang 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum gyi dbang du song ba sems can gyi srog gcod pa
327b5(mdo sde): la dga' zhing mos pa'i sdig pa can de 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na/ lus la tsha grang rnam pa gnyis kyi nad kyis btab nas rA di snyam du/ bdag gi lus dang yan lag kun par bar na ni
327b6(mdo sde): shin tu tsha/ bar bar na ni shin tu grang nas lus kun 'dar shing rengs te rdo'am shing ltar gyur pa 'di la rdo'i mtshon cha lta bu zhig gis gtugs te/ cha grang gi nad 'di bcad na brjod kyis mi lang
327b7(mdo sde): bar shin tu dga' zhing tshim par 'gyur ro// snyam sems so// de'i tshe dmyal srungs srin po glang gi mgo can gyis lus bsgyur te/ sdig pa can gyi pha ma 'am/ gnyen bshes lta bur
327b8(mdo sde): sprul nas 'ongs te/ 'di skad du khyod kyi yid la sems pa ltar bdag la cho ga gsang bzhig yod na/ khyed nyan nam mi nyan zhes smras pa dang / sdig pa can de rab tu dga' nas mos par
328a1(mdo sde): / gyur te/ la gor myur du sgrub par 'dod do// de ltar bsam ma thag tu lhubs chad de tshe 'phos nas dpag chen gyi mda' 'phangs pa bzhin dur la gri'i ma
328a2(mdo sde): tog gi nang du skyes te lus gtub cing dmyal te dum bu sran ma tsam du gyur pa dang / lcags kyi bya rnams kyang lcags kyi sdong po'i kha nas babs te/ mig gi 'bras bu dang / snying 'byin cing
328a3(mdo sde): glad pa yang 'jib bo// gzhan yang dmyal srungs srin pos lag na ste rare chen po thogs te/ mgo bcom nas glad pa la lcags kyi khyi rnams 'ongs te ldag go// de ltar shi nas yang
328a4(mdo sde): sos te nges pa dang / phyir yang sos te lcags kyi shal dam ri'i sdeng po la 'dzeg tu bcug no/ sdong po'i rtse dmor ma phyin par lus dang yan lag rdul bzhin du lpags so// 
328a5(mdo sde): de bzhin du sdong po de nyid la nyin yang lan re/ mtshan la yang lan re 'dzag ste/ nyin zhag gcig la mu/ sa rdul bzhin du gyur pa'i grangs ni brjod par bslab ma yin no// 
328a6(mdo sde): gyi rgyal po mi gas pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa can de la de ltar rnam par smin par gyur te/ de nas thar na yang lo 'bum phrag brgyad kyi bar du byol song gi khams skye ba brgyud cing skyes te/ rtag tu
328a7(mdo sde): khal lci gakhur zhing shi nas kyang bags pa 'a buzhing sha khrug za bar 'gyur ro// de nas mir skyes na skye ba lnga bcu'i bar du rigs ngan pa dang / nad mang ba dang / mthung ba dang / shin tu dbul zhing / 
328a8(mdo sde): phongs par gyur ro// de nas dge ba'i ga shes gnyen chen po dang phrad nas paded byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur / bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bol bka' stsal ba/ de la dzis
328b1(mdo sde): na me'i sems can dmyal ba bco brgyad ce na/ me'i shing rta'i sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba ni/ zangs re re yang che khyad dpag tshad bzhi bcu ste/ de'i phyi nang na me rab tu 'bar te/ 'og na yang
328b2(mdo sde): lcags tshan 'bar ba'i 'brang lo chen po bco brgyad yod de/ steng na yang me'i 'khor lo chen po dgu bcu rtsa bzhi snyed 'bar ro// sems can gang sangs rgyas kyi nye gnas su gyur pa'i gang
328b3(mdo sde): zag gam/ tshangs pa la rjed pa 'am/ khyim nas rab tu byung ba dag bcu drug po 'am/ khyim yang rung ste leg pa 'tsho zhing g.yo sgyu dang sdig pa mang po byas pa'i gang zag de 'chi 'pho ba'i dus
328b4(mdo sde): byed pa na/ rlung gi khams g.yos nas ba sru'i bu ga kun tu song ste/ lus chab brem ltar rab tu grang b.ragyur pa dang / 'di snyam du bdag nam zhig gis dus na rab
328b5(mdo sde): tu 'bar ba'i mo'i phung po'i nang na 'dug cing grang ba'i nada'adi rab tu zhi bar gyur na ji ma ru snyam bsam pa dang dmyal ba'i srungs ma srin po rag shas me'i shing rta gser gyi
328b6(mdo sde): pad+mor sprul te/ srin po nyid kyang khye'u gzhon nu lta bur sprul nas/ lam na me'i shing rta pad+mor sprul pa dang / spang yab dkar po thogs te/ lus bsgyur zhing gar thabs dang sdig pa can
328b7(mdo sde): gyi drung du 'ongs nas 'dug pa dang / sdig pa can de rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te/ gser gyi pad+mo lta bu de la 'dug par dga' ba dang / de ma thag tu tshe 'phos nas skad cig ma
328b8(mdo sde): dang po la me'i shing rta'i steng du phyin te/ lus dang yan lag kun nas kyang me rab tu 'bar nas/ me'i phung por lhung ste tshig cing thal bar gyur to// srungs ma srin pos sos shes bos pa dang phyir
329a1(mdo sde): yang sos so// de nas me'i shing rtas lus bsregs cing gshegs pa ni nyin zhag gcig la lan bco brgyad ste/ lus rdul bzhin du bye mar gyur pa la lcags
329a2(mdo sde): tshan gyi khu ba char bzhin du bab pa dang / phyir yang sos so// de nas zangs tshan na lcagasu khol ba'i nang du yang gting nas khi'i bar du mar 'byung zhing me'i shing rtas gshag ste nyin zhag gcig la lan
329a3(mdo sde): khri phrag drug cu ni 'chi/ lan khri phrag drug cu ni 'tshe ste/ de las thar nas kyang shin tu dman pa'i rigs su skyes te dbul zhing 'phongs pa dang / gzhan gyis bkol ba dang / gzhan gyi dbang du
329a4(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing bdag la dbang med par 'gyur ro// de las dathar nas sngon khyim nas byung ba'i dge ba'i bsod nams kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad de/ gzed byang chub
329a5(mdo sde): tu sems bskyed nas chos bstan pa dang / de dag sems kyis chud cing yid kyis rtogs te dgra bcom par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de la
329a6(mdo sde): ji ltar na shin tu dri mi zhim pa'i lcags khu khol ba'i sems can dmyal ba bco brgyad ce na/ dri mi zhim pa'i lcags khu khol ba'i sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba ni tshe khyad dang / dpag tshad brgyad
329a7(mdo sde): cu ste/ lcags kyi mkhar me 'bar ba rim pa bco brgyad yod de/ mkhar de gcig cing yang bar chad bco brgyad yod do// bar chad de gcig cing yang ngos bzhin ral gri'i nags
329a8(mdo sde): tshal 'bar ba yod la/ steng 'og dang phyogs mtshams kun nas kyang ral gri'i so rab tu bstams te/ ral gri'i so'i steng na yang lcags kyi gzem 'bar ba bstams te/ gzam
329b1(mdo sde): dang ral gri'i bar dang mtshams na lcags tshan gyi srin bu grangs med pa yod do// srin bu de gcig la yang mgo brgya stong snyed yod de/ mgo de gcig la yang mchu brgya stong snyed yod do// 
329b2(mdo sde): mchu'i theg ma la yang lcags kyi srin bu rtsangs pa brgya stong snyed yod de/ rtsangs pa de dag gi kha nas shin tu dri mi zhim zhing khel ba'i lcags khu 'byin te/ lcags mkhar 'bar ba'i nang
329b3(mdo sde): yongs su gang ngo // steng nas kyang lcags tshun 'bar ba'i dra ba dang bla rer bres te/ de'i sdeng na yang lcags kyi bya chen po yod do// de dag 'jig rten na gang zag dus khrims
329b4(mdo sde): brgyad bshig pa dang / dge tshul pho mo dang / dge slongadama'i khrims bshig pa dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bste/ na ma dang / dge slong ma dang / dge slong ma la sogs pa'i 'khor bdun
329b5(mdo sde): po'i tshul khrims bshig pa/ gzhan yang dge 'dun dang / ma dang / slob dpon gyi zas la mi bzang ba'i lag gis raM ga pa dang / gtsang sbra ma byas shing phyi gzhod byed pa dang / 'khor
329b6(mdo sde): rnam pa bzhi las gang zhig mi gtsang ba'i lus kyis dge 'dun gyi stan la 'dug pa dang / mi dge ba'i las byas nas 'gyod tshangs ma byas par/ dge 'dun dang / lhan cig tu stan gcig la
329b7(mdo sde): 'dug pa dang / kha zas lhan cig tu za ba dang / dge 'dun dang lhan cig tu gso sbyin byed pa dang / de la sogs pa'i mi dge ba'i las ngan pa mang po byas pa dag tshe 'phos pa'i dus byed pa na/ lus gla ci
329b8(mdo sde): ltar shin tu dri ma nim zhing mi bzod de/ 'di snyam du bdag nam zhig gi dus na gnas gang na dri gsung ngan pa 'di mi bro bar 'gyur zhing / sras kyi dring ba zhim po zhig bdag gi lus la rlung chen po phog na tsam
330a1(mdo sde): rung mas pasas pa dang / dris thag tu spangs ma smin pas lagan rnam pa ma can gyi nang blos kyis pa/  ba ng+gA sbrul bathogs te/ sdig
330a2(mdo sde): gyi drung du 'ongs nas 'dug pa dang / de la shin tu 'dod cing chags pa sres pa dang / de nas lhubs chad de chi 'phros nas rlung posas bus pa bzhin du mi nom pa'i lpabras bukhol ba'i
330a3(mdo sde): sems can dmyal bar lhung ngo // rab tu dri ma zhim pa'i lcags kyi srin bu ma rungs pa rnams kyis kyang lce'i rtsa ba dang srog rtsab la 'jib cing za'o// de lta bur nyin nas
330a4(mdo sde): gcig la lan khri phrag brgya dgu bcu ni 'chi/ lan khri bra dag brgya gu bcu ni 'tshe'o// de las thar nas kyang / dengan la dbul zhing phongs pa'i rig su skyes te/ gzhan gyi dbang
330a5(mdo sde): du 'gyur ba dang / skye ba blangs pa'i tshe na yang rgyal po rje na bar lta ba can gyi khams su skye zhing sdug bsnga la sna tshogs lu'amanar bar gyur te/ 'brum bu sna tshogs dang / 
330a6(mdo sde): shu chen gyi lus la gos gyon pa bzhin du 'gyur ro// de yang 'jig rten gyi mi chos bcu drug spyad pa'i dge pa'i rgyu tsam gyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad de 'azod rab tu byung nas spyod pas
330a7(mdo sde): zhugs te/ dgra bcom par 'gyur shing rigs pa gsum dang mngon par shes pa drug dang / rnam par grol ba brgyad thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' be la bka'
330a8(mdo sde): stsal pa/ de la ji ltar na chu chan khel ba'i sems can dmyal bzhe na/ chu tshan khol ba'i sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba ni/ zangs chen po bco brgyad yod de/ zangs de gcig cing yang
330b1(mdo sde): che khyad dpag tshad bzhi bcu yod do// de na ljags kyi dra ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor cing bla rer bres te me rab tu 'bar ba'o// zangs chen po de dag kun gyi nang na/ chu tshan khol ma lcags khu 'bar ba lta
330b2(mdo sde): bus yongs su gang ngo // de'i 'og na srin po lnga brgyas ni rdo thal gyi me 'bud de/ zangs de dag kun sreg go/ rdo ba'i me lha rgyun mi chad par 'bar ba ni lan cig 'bar nas/ nyin zhag drug bcu
330b3(mdo sde): bar du mi 'chi ste/ dmyal ba'i nyin zhag drug cu de 'dzam bu grung gi nyi ma dang zla bas bgrang ba'i lo khri phrag bcu gnyis so// de ltar zangs tshan 'bar ba'i nang nas chu tshan khol ma lcags khu 'bar ba
330b4(mdo sde): lta bu skar mda' ltar gnam du yar te/ me'i 'khor lor gyur/ denas phyir yang zangs kyi nang du lhung ngo // gang za dag la la sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims bshig cing ltar rjed pa dang / 
330b5(mdo sde): sems can gyi srog gcod cing sha khrag za ba dang / ri dang 'gro ga la me btang nas sems can sems can mang po bsra gas pa dang / gson por me ri bcug nas bsregs pa dang / 
330b6(mdo sde): sdig pa mang po byas pa dag 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na lus dang sems myos te dbang po kun 'gags nas/ lus bar bar ni me'i phung po ltar tsha/ bar bar ni chab brom gyi phung po ltar grang ste/ 'di
330b7(mdo sde): snyam du lus chu dron zhig gi nang du zhugs te bkrus na ci ma rung skams bsams pa dang / de ma thag du dmyal ba'i srungs ma srin pos g.yog 'khor lta bu zhig du sprul nas/ chu dron gyi snod chen po
330b8(mdo sde): thogs te/ sdig pa can gyi drung du 'ongs pa dang / chu dron de'i nang du 'jug par dga' zhing chags pa'i sems skyes so// de nas tshe 'phos pa'i nang du skyes te/ de ma thag tu tshogs
331a1(mdo sde): shing mugs nas rus pa las ma lus so// de nas mdung rtse kha brag pas blangs te/ phyir thung ba dang lcags kyi khyi rnams kyis rus pa
331a2(mdo sde): 'chos pa dang / de ma thag tu phyir skyugs nas yang sos te snga ma bzhin no// srungs ma srin pos phyir yang zangs kyi nang du ded pa dang / zangs khel ma des 'jigs nas ral gri'i
331a3(mdo sde): sdong po la 'jus pa dang / sha dang rus pa kun dum bur chad de zangs khol ba'i nang du lhung ngo // srog bcad pa'i dbang gis nyin zhag gcig la lan gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni
331a4(mdo sde): 'chi/ lan gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni 'tshe'o// de las thar nas byel song gi khams su skyes te/ dal song gi nang na yang gang tshe thung ba'i gan su skye ba khrag brgya
331a5(mdo sde): stong gi bar du brgyud cing len no// de nas yang phyir/ mir skyes nas rnam par smin pa rnam pa gnyis pa yongasu smin par gyur te/ nad rab tu mang ba dang tshe shin tu thung bar
331a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// de'i 'khor du gyur pa rnams kyang tshe thung nad mang bar 'gyur ro// de nas kyang bskal pa brtsi ba dang bgrang ba las 'das nas/ gzod dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad de khrims lnga 'dzin/ 
331a7(mdo sde): cing pha rol tu phyin pa drug skyed par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de la ji ltar na thal chu'i sems can dmyal ba zhe na/ thal chu'i sems can dmyal ba zhes
331a8(mdo sde): bya ba ni/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya zhing du dpag tshad bcu gnyis snyad de/ 'og nas kyang ral gri'i so rab tu bstams la 'gram yang ral gri'i sdong pos yongasu bstams te/ 'og gi ting nas
331b1(mdo sde): kyang me mur zabs su 'dom nyi shus bkang ba'i steng thal bas g.yogs te/ 'jig rten na gang zag gti mug can pa dang ma la brku 'phrog byed pa dang / bskyed pa'i drin ngo mi shes shing lan blon
331b2(mdo sde): pa'i sems med pa dang / bla ma dang / slob dpon dang pu nu dang gnyen bshes la rku 'breg pa slob dpon dang pa ma dang / mi bla mas bstan pa bzhin du mi byed cing 'dod chags kyi dbang du gyur nas/ 
331b3(mdo sde): khrel ba dang ngo tsha ba med pa dag/ 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na lus rab tu brtse zhing grang ba'i nad kyis khong pa lhubs kyis gang ba dang / tshangs shing rab tu mi bde bar gyur pa las 'di snyam
331b4(mdo sde): du bdag gis lus 'di 'di ltar rab tu brtse zhing lhubs kyis datshangs pa 'di la thal chu 'jam po zhig gis bkrus sam bshal na ci ma rung snyam sems pa dang / de ma thag tu srungs
331b5(mdo sde): ma srin po 'bar bas bdag gi bu dang / chung mar sprul te/ lag na me mur gyi snod thal bas bkang ba thogs te/ drung du 'ongs pa dang / sdig pa can des de mthong ba dang / 
331b6(mdo sde): rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te/ de ma thag tu tshe 'phos pa dang thal chu'i sems can dmyal bar lhung ngo // de nas ral gri sdong po'i bar kun na srin po lag ral gri'i so la me 'bar
331b7(mdo sde): brnon po thegs pa mang po yod de// srin po de dag kun gyis ral gri gzangs pa dang / 'jigs shing skrag nas thal ba'i nang du bros so// der yang gom pa por ma thag tu thal ba'i nang nas
331b8(mdo sde): ral gri'i so bsnams pas rkang pa kun dum bur sran ma tsam du chad de/ ral gri'i sdong po las kyang ral gri char bzhin du bab nas/ ba spu'i bu ga kun tu zug go// dmyal srungs srin pos mdung
332a1(mdo sde): rtse kha brag pa thogs te de'i snying dang glad pa byung nas shi ma thag tu phyir yang sos so// de ltar sdig pa can des sdig pa mang po byas pa'i las kyi
332a2(mdo sde): dbang des da lta bu'i nyin zhag gcig la lan khri phrag lnga brgya ni 'chi/ lan khri phrag lnga brgya 'tsho'o// bkres shing skom pas yongasu gdungs te kha gdangs pa dang / 
332a3(mdo sde): ral gri'i sdong po las ral gri char bzhin du bab ste/ kha dang spyi bor zug pas lto ba dang / rus pa yang thal byung du bshags te shi nas tshe 'phos so// sngon sangs rgyas dang / chos
332a4(mdo sde): dang / dge 'dun gyi mtshan thos pa tsam gyis/ de la das thar nas phyir yang mir skyes te/ rigs ngan pa da dang dbul zhing phongs par 'gyur ro// de nas 'jig rten mi
332a5(mdo sde): rtag par shes nas gzod rab tu byung bar gyur te/ mdo na par shes pa drug dang / rnam par grol ba brgyad thob par gyur te/ gal te sangs rgyas mi bzhugs na yang
332a6(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyasu 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de la ji ltar na mtshon gyi tshal gyi sems can dmyal ba khri phrag lnga brgya zhe na/ mtshon gyi tshal gyi sems can dmyal
332a7(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba ni// 'khor yug du che khyad dpag tshad brgya stong skad yod de/ de'i nang ral gri'i sdong pos yongs su gang ste/ de'i lo ma ni spu gri dang / 'khor lo'o// 'bras bu ni lcags kyi thu lum
332a8(mdo sde): ste/ ral gri'i sdong po mtho khyad kyang dpag tshad nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o// sems can gang pa ma la sri zhu mi byed pa dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma la sri zhu mi byed cing gnyen btsun du mi lta ba dang / ngan du smra ba dang / 
332b1(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum la skur pa btab pa dang / sems can mang po la 'tshe zhing gnod pa byed cing snying rje'i sems med pa'i sdig pa can de dag 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na rnyeg cing yid kyis gnas kun chags pa
332b2(mdo sde): dang / 'di snyam du bdag gi rnam shes 'di thams cad kun la chags shing / lus rab tu na yang snying gis chags shing mi gtong na/ gri rnon po zhig gis chags pa'i snying 'di bcad na ci ma rung snyam
332b3(mdo sde): bsams pa dang / dmyal ba'i srungs ma srin pos de ma thag du g.yog bran gyi lus su sprul nas drung du 'ongs te// lag na me long thogs te sdig pa can de la 'di skad du/ khyod kyi snying la yang chag
332b4(mdo sde): pade me long 'di la ltos shes smras pa dang / sdig pa can de/ des bltas pa dang / me long de'i nang na ral gri dang spu gri nen dpe yod par mthong nas 'di snyam dung ni mtshon ne po 'dis bdag gi snying
332b5(mdo sde): dngos kun la chags pa 'di bcad do snyam nas rab tu dga' ba dang / tshe 'phos te yid dgas kyi lus blangs nas ral gri dang / sU gri nags tshal gyi nang du skye so// skyes ma thag tu lcags tshan gyi thu chu
332b6(mdo sde): gyis spyi bor po gnas thal byung du rkang pa'i mthil du phyung ngo // des khong pa nas glo snying dang rgyu long dang / nang grol kun tshig cing rul nas sa la 'gyel to// dmyal ba'i srungs mas mdung rtse kha brag
332b7(mdo sde): pa sa la brdabs te/ sdong po la 'dzeg du bcug go/ mtshon gyi sdong po de'i khar phyin ma thag tu lcags mtshan gyi srin bu mang pos btogs shing zos pa dang / shin tu skrag cing sngangs nas sdong po
332b8(mdo sde): gcig nas gcig tu mchongs te/ lus rdul bzhin du lhag so// de bzhin du mthar gyis sdong po kun la mchongs zhing nyin zhag gcig la lan khri phrag brgyad ni 'tshe'o// de las
333a1(mdo sde): thar nas kyang yul mu ge can dang / bskal pa zad du nye ba'i 'jig rten du bran khol gyi rigasu skyes te/ kha dang lcags kyi dri ma mi zhim pa dang / kun gyis mi 'dod par 'gyur
333a2(mdo sde): ro// de ltar bskal pa brtsi ba dang bgrang ba las 'das nas/ gzed dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad de byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// 
333a3(mdo sde): de la ji ltar na tshar ma'i tshal gyi sems can dmyal ba khri phrag lnga brgya zhe na/ tsher ma'i tshal gyi sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba ni/ dpag tshad brgyad stong gi nang lcags kyi tshe rams yongs su
333a4(mdo sde): gang ste/ lcags kyi tsher ma de gcig gi rtsa ba nas yang lcags kyi tho ba dang / ti tsa dang skam pa grangs me da pa yod de// de dag 'jig rten na so so'i skye bo dang / gang
333a5(mdo sde): zag gti mug can dgra zhi gcod pa'i tshig smra ba dang / 'phra/ ma smra ba dang / dkon mchog gsum la 'khyal pa smra ba dang / ngan tu brjod pa dang / mdo sde zab mo dang
333a6(mdo sde): bka' yang dag pa'i bden pa ma yin par smra ba dang / mi khyad par can la ngan tu snad pa'i sdig pa can de 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na lha dang kha skams shing lkugs thung ba dang / 'di snyam du tsher ma non/ 
333a7(mdo sde): po zhig gis bdag gis lce dang / rtsa dang / yan lag kun nas khrag dang / chu ser phyung na ji ma rung snyam bsam pa dang / srungs ma srin po des sdig pa can gyi pha ma'i lus su sprul te/ 
333a8(mdo sde): lag na nor bum pa zhes bya ba la tsher ma nan po yod par sprul nas/ sdig pa can dol bar bzhug par gabs pa dang / nor bu la chu 'baba'abab cing 'dag par/ sdig pa can des mame nas/ 
333b1(mdo sde): rab tu dga' ste/ bdag ga nyil la 'dod pa dang phrad de snyam nas draga' ste/ dbugs chad nas che 'phos so// de yang srog g.yud tsam gyis tsher ma'i tshal gyi sems can dmyal bar skyes so// 
333b2(mdo sde): dwer skyes nas dmyal srungs srin pos lag na skam pa 'bar ba thogs te/ lce drangs nas byung ngo // de yang kyi glang chen po la lcags kyi theng chen po bshal te lce kun dral te// de nyid du
333b3(mdo sde): tsher ma'i tshal dang / tsher ma'i sdeng po rnams kyang dmyal ba'i rlung chen pos bskyod nas/ de'i lus la 'jug cing rdeg ste/ gshegs cing 'dral lo// nyin zhag gcig la lan drug brgyan
333b4(mdo sde): 'chi/ lan drug brgya ni 'tshe'o// de las bskal pa dazad nas mir skyes na yang gzugs byang ngan pa dang / bzhi na mdog mi sdug pa dang / dbang po mi gsal zhi dag lkug su
333b5(mdo sde): smra ba dang / lus la mdza dang shu ba la sogs bI nad rnam pa mang pos gzir cing rnag khrag mang po lus la 'dzag pa dang nga / skye ba lnga brgya'i bar du kun gyis mthong mi 'dod par
333b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// de las tshe 'phos nas phyir skye ba mi'i lus thob na yang smra ba'i tshig dang ngag sus kyang mi nyan par 'gyur ro// de nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po dang phrad nas gzong byang chub tu
333b7(mdo sde): sems skyed par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de la ji ltar na lcags kyi sdong po'i sems can dmyal ba chen po khri phrag lnga brgya zhe na/ lcags kyi
333b8(mdo sde): sdong po'i sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba ni/ lcags kyi sdong po'i dbyibs kyang me'i ri lta bu ste/ mtho khyad kyang dpag tshad drug brgya srid do// 'og na ma rab tu 'bar te/ ma da'i nang na lcag
334a1(mdo sde): chan 'bar ba'i khri yod do// de'i steng na mtshon gyi 'khor la yod do// mtshon gyi 'khor mo'i bar na lcags chan 'bar 'bar ba'i srin bu dang / lcags
334a2(mdo sde): tshan 'bar ba'i bya yod do// 'jig rten na gang zag glen zhing gti mug can dag/ 'dod chags kyi bag chags che ba 'dod pas log par spyod pa la dga' ba/ dus dang gnas ma yin pa
334a3(mdo sde): la mi tshangs par spyod pa'i las byas pa dang / gzhan yang dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyen nam/ dag snyan ma 'am/ bram ze 'am/ de la sogs pa tshangs par
334a4(mdo sde): spyod pa dag/ gal te dus dang gnas ma yin pa la mi tshangs par spyad pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yam pa'i las ngan pa spyad pa'i sdig pa can de 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na/ gzhu
334a5(mdo sde): ltar rengs te rab tu 'dar zhing btso nas mi bzod par gyur pa/ dang / 'di snyam du bdag gi lus 'di lcags kyi sdong / po chen po zhig la drang por mi 'gul bar bsdams na ci ma rung
334a6(mdo sde): snyam bsams pa dang / da ma thag tu dmyal srungs srin pos g.yog bran gyi lus su sprul te/ lag na lcags kyi khar ba thogs nas sdig pa can de la 'di skad du/ khyod kyi lus sra zhing
334a7(mdo sde): rengs par gyur pa de ngas mnyan par bya yis/ khyod khar ba 'di la 'jus shig ces smras nas spro ba bskyed pa dang / sdig pa can de rab tu dga' bar gyur nas lhubs chad de tshe 'phos so// lcag
334a8(mdo sde): g.yabs pa tsam gyi chod na lcags kyi sdong po'i thog ma la skyes so// de la me rab tu 'bar bas gdungs shing bsregs pa dang / shin tu 'jigs shing sbags nas 'og tu bltas pa na/ 
334b1(mdo sde): skugs kyi tho zhing na skyes pas bum sdug gu 'dug par mamed bdang / bud medakyis skyes bu'abang ba shin tu ming du 'ong bzhig dus pa sa blang sa thong ste/ chags pa'i sems skyes nas sngag / 
334b2(mdo sde): ljong ba gra nas papas sras skye mtshangs bad/ lcags kyi sdeng bas lus rdul byung du phraganas/ lcags can gyi drabs kyang cag gas so// lpags kyi sngon ldan mam
334b3(mdo sde): 'dzi bcing ba'o// de nas lus dum bu mang por cha lcags khri 'bar ba de'i steng du lhung ba dang // yan lag kun nas me rab tu 'ab pe/ lcags kyi srin bu rnams kyang mig gi nang dang
334b4(mdo sde): dang po kun gyinang dang / pho spos kyim can ma kun gyin du 'jug cing ze/ srin bu de dag la khri prag dgu brgya yod gcig gi mgo la yang chu bcu gnyim yod de/ 
334b5(mdo sde): mchud nyid las kyang mi rab tu 'bar zhing de'i lus la ldan 'jib bo// gang bag la la zhig/ gis 'dod pas log par g.yem pa'i las kyis gang dag tshul
334b6(mdo sde): khrims can gyi tshul khrims bshig pa dang / mi dge baspyad pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pas de lta bur nyin zhag gcig la lan khri phrag dgu brgyani 'chi/ lan khri phrag dgu btsun 'che'o// 6
334b7(mdo sde): ste de las thar nas yang skye ba lnga brgya'i bar du bya thi ba dang / bug ron gyi lus su skyes te/ de las thar nas kyang skye ba lnga brgya'i bar du klu dbul po'i lus su skye'o// de nas mir skyes
334b8(mdo sde): na yang skye ba lnga bcu'i bar dum ning dang mtshan med dang mtshan gnyis dang / mtshan 'gyur du skyes te/ ji ste dbang po dang ldan yang 'khor ngan pa'i ngang tshul can rtod pa dang bcas pa'i bu smad dang ba
335a1(mdo sde): tsha/ srig zhu med cing blo rman pa dang / bran g.yog bka' blo mi bde ba'i 'khor bar 'gyur ro// de nas gzod dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad nas
335a2(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de la ji lcags kyi thugs zangs kyi sems can dmyal ba khri phrag lnga brgyan na/ lcags
335a3(mdo sde): kyi thag zangs kyi sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba ni/ lcags kyi khri ma rab tu 'bar ba chu zheng du dpag tshad bzhi pa gcig yod de/ de'i steng na lcags kyi 'khrul 'khor 'bar ba grangs med pa las
335a4(mdo sde): lcags kyi mda' gzhu khri phrag steng snyed yod par gyur te/ mda' de nyid las ma rab tu 'bar ro// 'jig rten ngan gang zag glan zhing gti mug can 'dod chags kyi dbang gis 'dod
335a5(mdo sde): pas log par spyod pa dang / pa smi zhu mi byed pa dang / sle dpon dang bla ma la bkur sti mi byed pa dang / legs pa ra ston pa la mi gzhol ba dang / sems can gyi srog bcad pa dang / 
335a6(mdo sde): bcod pa la dga' bdag rnam par smin pas 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na/ lus kun 'dar shing 'gul te btse nas mi bzod debug drug nas zag pa rnams zag pa dang / sdig pa can das 'di snyam du
335a7(mdo sde): bdag gi nyal ma la 'di rab tu snyi zhing mugs te/ tsha bar gyur na/ bdag shin tu sra zhing grang ba'i mal la bde bar nyal te/ gnyid cig log na ji ma rung snyam pasams pa dang / dmam
335a8(mdo sde): srungs srin pos mdung rtsi kha brag pa'i kha nas lcags kyi khril lcags kyi bar tang bting ba khyer te 'ongs pa dang / sdig pa can des de mthong ba dang rab dga' ba'i sems skyes te/ lcags kyi khril
335b1(mdo sde): bar tang bting ba de la nyal bar dga' ba dang de ma thag tu dbugs chad nas tshe 'phos so// de nas lcags kyi thag bzangs kyi sems can dmyal bar skyes te lcags 'khrul 'khor 'bar ba khri ngas
335b2(mdo sde): brgya steng skad lta 'og nas 'phen zhing dus gcig tu 'khrul zhig yes so// de las lcags kyi gzhu grangs med pa las lcags tshan gyi mda' grangs med pa zhig sdig pa can gyi snying la
335b3(mdo sde): pheg nas rab tu sdug bsngal bar gyur te// de lta bur nyin zhag gcig la lan khri phrag drug brgya ni 'chi/ lan khri phrag drug brgya ni 'tshe'o// de las thar nas kyang skye ba lnga brgya'i bar du byol
335b4(mdo sde): song gi khams su skye'o// de las thar te mir skyes na yang dbul zhing phongs pa dang / rigs ngan par skye sa te/ rtag tu gzhan gyis bkol ba dang / dgra sdang bas zin
335b5(mdo sde): cing btson chas dam por 'dzud pa dang rtag tu rdeg cing tshegs par 'gyur ro// de nas gzo dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// bcom
335b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ de la ji ltar na lcogs kyi dra ba'i sems can dmyal bzhe na/ lcags kyi dra ba'i sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba ni/ dmyal ba chen po'i gnas de nyid
335b7(mdo sde): na/ lcags tshan 'bar ba'i dra ba'i rim pa brgyad cu rtsa dgu snyed yod do// dra ba de re re'i bar dang mig na khab dpal ma khri phrag brgya stong snyed yod de/ khab de dag kun gyi rtse mo lcags
335b8(mdo sde): kyi khrul 'khor 'bar ba grangs med pa 'khrul zhing rab tu 'bar ro// de dag 'jig rten na sems can gang dkon mchog gsum la sbed cing log par lta ba dang / brdzun du smra zhing g.yo dang sgyus leg par
336a1(mdo sde): 'tsho gang pa rol 'brid par byed pa dang rtag tu mi dge ba'i las byed par sems pa'i sdig pa can de 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'i chen/ lus dang yan la gsun rab tug ya zhing gtso/
