361a5(mdo sde): bstan to// da lhar mngon par sangs rgyas nas shAkya thub pa/ zhes bgyi ba/ sku'i tshad ni mtho bcu drug la mtshan sum/ cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cur ldan zhing / zhabs ni
361a6(mdo sde): pad+ma la 'dor zhing gshegs pa/ mgur dang sku kun nas 'od nyi ma lta bur gsal zhing mdzes te/ gser gyi ri dang 'dra ba zhig bzhugs so// zhes gsol to// rgyal pos de skad ces smras pa thos
361a7(mdo sde): nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das gzhugs pa'i sa phyogs su phyag 'tshal nas skyabs su gsol to// gal te kun tu rgyu 'dis smras pa bden te shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba'i de
361a8(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du gshegs lta srid dam/ bdag cag gi gtsug lag bshad pa las kyang bskal pa dgu 'das nas gdod sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba zhig 'jig rten du byung ngo ngo
361b1(mdo sde): zhan/ ji da ltar sangs rgyas 'jig rten na ji srid bzhugs sam/ ji ste bzhugs na ji'i slad du yul 'di'i phyogs su thugs brtse ba'i gnas su ma gyur snyam mo// de'i tshe steng gi nam mkha' las
361b2(mdo sde): 'di skad du rigs kyi bu the tshom ma byed cig/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa shin tu brtun pa'i brtson 'grus kyis bskal pa dgu las 'das so zhes smra ba'i sgra grag so// smra ba'i tshig thos nas pus mo sa la
361b3(mdo sde): gtsugs te/ bdug pos bsregs shing thal mo sbyar nas bsngags shing bstod de/ 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das mngon par mkhyen pa dang ldan pa bdag gi sems pa 'di mkhyen na/ byams pa dang thugs
361b4(mdo sde): rjes yul 'dir gshegs par smon to// de'i tshe spos kyi du dadapas sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i gzhal med khang du phyin te/ bai DUR+Ya dkar po'i sprin du gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
361b5(mdo sde): lan bdun bskor te/ gser gyi gdugs su gyur to// ga dugs kyi dril bu las 'di skad kyi sgra snyan pas/ sangs rgyas spyan 'dren pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun yang gshegs
361b6(mdo sde): par gsel ba'i sgra skad byung bar gyur to// de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis gzigs nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams las mngon par shes pa drug po thob
361b7(mdo sde): pa dag zham 'bring du chos shig/ nag ha la'i rgyal po phur pa phud de 'bed pa'i yul der 'dong zhes bka' stsal nas/ 'od srung chen po 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas te bai DUR+Ya'i ri sprul nas/ rid la
361b8(mdo sde): 'bab chu dang chu mig dang / khrus kyi rdzing bu dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi shing dang / shing gi 'og na gser gyi khri btsugs pa la dngul gyi 'od 'bar te/ 'od las phug tu gyur pa'i nang na/ 
362a1(mdo sde): 'od srungs chen po don rtag tu mi nyal bar 'dug go// slob ma rnams kyang sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis la gnas so// ri de sprin mgyogs pa'am/ 
362a2(mdo sde): rlung drag po ltar drang srong snying gi ril byin par gyur to// mo'u 'gal yan chen po yang 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas te/ klu 'khyil pa brgya stong sprul nas/ de la 'dug cing klu'i kha nas me byung ste/ 
362a3(mdo sde): gser gyi khang pa brtsegs pa dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi khri dang / rin po che'i bla ra dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan tshad med par sprul pa'i nang na me'u dag la ya na be DU rli'i mi
362a4(mdo sde): lta bur phyi nang gsal bar 'dug pa dag drang srong rnying gi ri la lga dgas so// shA ri'i bu yang mngon par shes pa'i mthu das gangs ri lta bu'i shel gyi ri sprul te/ shel gyi phug gi
362a5(mdo sde): nang na dge tshul gyun te la sogs pa dge tshul lnga brgya dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi phug tu bcas te/ gangs lta bu'ishel gyi ris bskor nas/ shA ri'i bu shal dkar po'i phug gi
362a6(mdo sde): nang nas gser gyi mi lta bur sprul te/ gser gyi kha dog gi 'od btang nas/ 'od rnam pa sna tshogs kyis thams cad zil gyis mnan te/ chos kyi sgra chen po yongs su sgrog cing dge tshul rnam
362a7(mdo sde): nyan bzhin du yul der lhags so// ka t+ya ya na chen po yang 'khor dge slong lnga brgya dang / pad+mo gser gyi khang pa brtsegs pa lta bu mang po dag sprul te/ dge slong rnams de la 'dug nas lus
362a8(mdo sde): kyi spad nas ni 'od zer chu lta bu byung ste/ chu mig lta bu'i 'od zer padre'i bar kun na 'bab kyang sa la mi zag go// steng nas kyang yang gser gyi blor bres te/ dge slong rnams de'i nang na
362b1(mdo sde): 'dug ste/ yul der lhags so// de ltar dgra bcom pa chen po brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum rnams kyang so nas 'khor dge slong lnga brgya dang bcas te/ mngon par shes pa yang shA ri'i bu dang mo'u dgal
362b2(mdo sde): ya na dang 'dra bar byas nas stang gi nam mkha' las 'phags nas/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ldings pa bzhin du yul der lhags so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das chos gos bsnams lhung bzed bsnam
362b3(mdo sde): nas/ chos gos bting ba yang dga' bo lag tu bskur te/ bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' la gom pas gshegs so// bcom ldan 'das gom pas gshegs pa na/ rgyal chen ris bzhi'i
362b4(mdo sde): rgyal po dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang / gzhan yang lha'i bu grangs med pa dang / lha'i bu mo brgya stong snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor te phyag 'tshal nas na
362b5(mdo sde): 'bring du chas so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mgur/ nas gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od zer btang nas/ 'od/ zer de las sprul pa'i sangs rgyas khri phrag brgya stong sprul te// 
362b6(mdo sde): sprul pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang so so nas de bzhin du mgur gyi 'od zer btang ste/ de bzhin du sprul pa'i sangs rgyas khri phrag brgyad stong sprul te/ sprul pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'dab chags
362b7(mdo sde): su nam mkha'i khams yongs su brkang ste/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ldings pa bzhin du yul der gshegs so// yul der gshegs nas/ rgyal pos sangs rgyas bsus te/ sangs rgyas
362b8(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo// de'i tshe klu'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas te gshegs pa mthong nas/ klu chen po bcu drug gis nam mkha' la sprin chen po brgyad nas 'brug sgra chen po
363a1(mdo sde): bsgrags te ser ba bab bo// mig nas kyang glog dang me 'byin cing / kha nas kyang ma phyung ste/ sder mo dang / lus kyi ba spu'i khung bu kun
363a2(mdo sde): nas dud pa 'thul zhing me rab tu 'bar ro// srin mo lnga yang mi sdug pa'i gzugs bstan te mig gleg dang 'dra bar 'bar bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan ngar 'greng nge de'i tshe klu'i bu zhig gis bltas
363a3(mdo sde): na/ steng gi nam mkha' la sprul pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yongs su gang bar mthong ngo // pha ma la 'di skad ces sbaso// 'di ltar me dang gdugs pas/ sangs rgyas gcig la gnod pa bya bar chas
363a4(mdo sde): na/ da ltar bar snang la sangs rgyas grangs med pa zhig pa zhugs na zhes smras so// de nas klu gdugs pa can gdugs pa'i sems lhag par yang skyes te/ bu la skyo ba byas nas/ 
363a5(mdo sde): da ltar sangs rgyas gcig las med na mang po ga la yod ces smras so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rjes rdo rjeHgas pa grangs med pa'i lus sprul nas/ rdo rje mgo la ma mgal bskor
363a6(mdo sde): ba bzhin du ma 'bar te/ ma'i 'khor lo 'dab chagasu stang gi nam mkha' las babs nas me rab tu 'bar ba lcags khu dang 'dra bas klu ma rungs pa'i lus bsreg so// klu'i rgyal po des 'jigs shing skrag ste/ 'bros
363a7(mdo sde): khung med nas sangs rgyas kyi grib ma'i nang du zhug so// sangs rgyas kyi grib ma rab tu bsil bas zil dngar gyi chus phog pa bzhin du/ klu'i cha bzhi par gyur nas nam mkha' la bstas na steng gi bar snang la sangs rgyas kyis
363a8(mdo sde): yongasu gang bar mthong ngo // sprul pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang se se nas 'od zer grangs med pa steng ste/ nged gcig gi nang na yang sprul pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med pa dag bzhug so// sprul pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang so// 
363b1(mdo sde): nas/ 'od grangs med pa brgya stong sbed gtong / 'od de dag gi nang na lagan rdorje rdo rje gsor bas yong su gang bar mthong ngo // klu rnams kyis sangs rgyas mthong nas rab tu dag 'a ba'i sems skye'o// lab rdo rje mngon
363b2(mdo sde): nas rab tu 'jigs shing skrag ste// thal me sbyar nas sti stang du bcas te/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal to// srin mo lnga yang de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal te// de'i tshe lha'i bu rnams kyis me tog
363b3(mdo sde): man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dang / man 'dzu sha ka chen po char bzhin du phab ste/ mchod pa byas nas lha'i rnga yang rang rdung zhing / lha rnams thal mo sbyar nas steng gi nam mkha' la sdod do// de'i
363b4(mdo sde): tshe rgyal po de 'khor lnga steng dang bcas te/ bdug pos sna tshe/ gras bsregs nas spyi bos sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la phyag 'a tshul to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mgon dang skyabs mdzad cing lag
363b5(mdo sde): na rdo rje 'di dag gis lus la mi gtse bar rin po che sna bdu/ na gyi khri phyung ste/ sangs rgyas la lag gis dar te/ phul na/ sa kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mgon
363b6(mdo sde): dang skyabs mdzad cing lag na rdo rje 'di dag gis bdag gis lus la mi gtse bar mdzad par cig nang zhes gsol to// de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pas tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis mas bu la smra ba bzhin du klu'i
363b7(mdo sde): rgyal po la spro ba skyed do// klu'i rgyal po dang srin mo yang chos kyi rgyal por btul te// de'i tshe rgyal pos khri mthon po btsugs te/ bdan rab tu 'jam po bting na ras dkar po'i yol bas bskor cing / mu tig
363b8(mdo sde): gi dra bas bla rer bres nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdan de la bzhugs par gsol to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das zhabs btegs nas gshegs pa na/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po'i byin pa lta bu'i zhabs kyi phyin pa las/ 
364a1(mdo sde): 'od kha dog rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa byung ste/ sangs rgyas la lan bdun bskor nas/ lha'i me tog dam pa'i bla rer gyur te/ me tog gi 'dab ma'i bar na sprul
364a2(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa snyed thal mo sbyar te/ dbyangs du mas tshigs su bcad nas bstod do// steng gi nam mkha' la sprul pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i rnams kyi nabs kyi
364a3(mdo sde): byin pa las 'ad bkye ba yang snga ma bzhin no// klu pra mo bcu drug lag na ri dang pha bong dang / gnam lcags thogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar lhags nas/ 'khor mang pos 'jigs skrag ste/ 
364a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi nang du zhug so// de'i tshe bcom ldan la/ dadas kyis gser gtse ma lta bu'i phyag brkyang nas/ bya dag ser 'brel pa'i dra bi'i bar na rin po che chen po'i pad+mo char bzhin du
364a5(mdo sde): phab ste/ 'khor mang po rnams kyis ni sprul pa'i sangs rgyasu mthong ngo // klu rnams kyis ni nam mkha' lding gi rgyal pes 'tshig cing za ba lta bur mthong ste/ klu rnams nam mkha' lding
364a6(mdo sde): gis 'jigs skrags nas sangs rgyas kyi grib ma'i bag tu zhugs te/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas srog gi skyabs mdzad du gsol zhes smras so// bcom ldan 'das yol ba dang / nye bar
364a7(mdo sde): gshegs nas dga' bo la gding ba thing shig ces bka' stsal to// dga' bos yol ba'i nang du song ste/ lag pa g.yas pa bteg nas 'phrag pa g.yen pa nas gding ba blang
364a8(mdo sde): pa'i tshe/ gding ba las gser gyi khang pa btsigs pa rin po che sna bdun gyis sbas pa/ khri phrag lnga brgyar gyur te// gding ba gting ba'i tshe gser gyi pad+mo la rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan
364b1(mdo sde): pa'i khri brag lnga brgyar gyur to// grwa bzhis la brkyang ba'i tshe grwa gcig la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+mo khri brag lnga brgyar gyur te/ pad+mos 'dab chags su yol ba'i nang gang bar gyur to// 
364b2(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das rin po che sna bdun gyi khril skyil mo krung bcas nas bzhugs so// pad+ma rnams kyi steng na yang sangs rgyas dag bzhugs par gyur te// dge slong rnams kyis/ 
364b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bzhugs par mthong nas/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor nas/ so so nas gding ba bting nas 'dug go// dge slong rnams gding ba ni
364b4(mdo sde): bting ba thams cad bai DUr+ya'i stan tu gyur to// dge slong de rnams bai DUr+ya'i stan la 'dug nas/ bai DUR+Ya'i stan nas/ baiDUR+Ya'i stan las 'od byung ste/ baiDUH
364b5(mdo sde): brag phug du gyur to// dge slong rnams me'i 'od/ kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas/ dag slong dag gi lus gser gyi kha dog lta bur gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal
364b6(mdo sde): po ngas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / cho 'phrul de lta bu dag mthong nas/ ngo mtshar rmad kyi dag bskyes te/ thal mo sbyar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lan bdun bskor ba
364b7(mdo sde): byas te phyag 'tshal nas/ sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul mang po mthong nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// gzhan yang 'khor mang po
364b8(mdo sde): rnams kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug go// / rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya ba ra mAr+tha d+harma bi dza ya nA ma ma hAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa don dam pa'i ches
365a1(mdo sde): kyis rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di
365a2(mdo sde): skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ring por ma len par ga ya'i ri la dge slong mngon par zhugs pa mngon par zhugs pa rnams
365a3(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu cu rtsa dgu dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ lha bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge
365a4(mdo sde): bsnyen ma brgyad khri drug stong dang / gyad drug khri dang / gcer bu pa bye ba phrag bcu gnyis dang / drang srong chen po mngon da par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ gdungs pa lngas yan lag
365a5(mdo sde): chog pa lnga brgya/ yan lag dkar ba/ sha med cing rus mgo lpags kyis yogs pa/ lto zhar zhing sgra'i khur khyer ba/ lus dgu pa/ g.yang bzhi dang shing shun gyon
365a6(mdo sde): pa/ lag na ril ba thogs pa/ brgyad khri bzhi stong dang yang thabs gcig go/ rgal bar 'dun pa rnams dang yang thabs gcig go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ri nag po rnams kyi nang na/ ri'i rgyal po
365a7(mdo sde): ri rab ltar drang srong rnams kyi nang na/ lham ma lhan ne/ lhang nge ste/ lug rnams kyi nang na/ glang po che'i rgyal po mche ba drug pa 'dra la/ srin bu mi khyer gyi drung na/ gnyi zla dang mtshu
365a8(mdo sde): shing / rtsa ka sha'i me tog gi nang na man dar ba'i yal ga dang 'dra la/ nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po bya rog gis bskor ba dang 'dra bar/ bcom ldan 'das drang srong rnams kyi nang na gnyis gyur du mdzes so// 
365b1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das rin po che gtong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dpag tu med par mdzad cing / glo g.yas g.yon gnyis nas 'od zer phyung ste/ 
365b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba dpag tu med pa phyung / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba dpag tu med pa dang brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dpag tu med pa byung / dgra bcom
365b3(mdo sde): pa brgya stong dpag tu med pa phyung / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma brgya stong dpag tu med pa phyung / 'khor los sgyur ba dang / stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba
365b4(mdo sde): dang / khams kyi rgyal po dang / rigs sngags 'chang dpag tu med pa phyung / rgyal dang ri brag pa dang / 'gro lding ba da dang / lho phyogs dang / nag khrod pa dpag tu med pa
365b5(mdo sde): phyung / rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu dang / mi gzugs dang cha byad dang / mdog dang / smra ba'i skad sna tshogs pa ji
365b6(mdo sde): snyed pa dang / lha'i ris ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las phyung ngo // de nas 'khor chen po de the tshom du gyur nas/ phan tshun gdong du lta'o// byang chub sems
365b7(mdo sde): dpa' rnams rab tu dga' ste/ rin po che'i char 'bebs pa nas/ rgyan thams cad kyi bar gyi char 'bebs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rin po che gtong ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te/ seng ga
365b8(mdo sde): bsgyings pas phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcur gzigs ma thag tu/ de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
366a1(mdo sde): ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi spyan la snang ba de dag thams cad lag mthil du bzhag pa bzhin du/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su kun tu snang ngo // de bzhin gshegs
366a2(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas ji ltar byung ba de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul phyung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sprul pa phyung ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad
366a3(mdo sde): kyang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba da leg su song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi nang du 'dus par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag kyang dge slong dang / dge slong ma
366a4(mdo sde): dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang ga'i bye ma snyed dgad dang lhan cig tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa chen po dpe med pa thogs te 'dir lhags so// de bzhin du lha dang / 
366a5(mdo sde): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa du ma de dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi
366a6(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dar dong ngo // de nas gang dag phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis mchod pa bla na med pas/ bcom ldan
366a7(mdo sde): 'das la bsnyen bkur byas te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis yongs su bsgrubs pa'i stan dag la 'khod do// mi dang mi ma yin paSh+Ti bar du yang ci rigs pa'i stan dag la 'khod do// gang dag bcom
366a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis sbrul 'phyung ba de dag kyang mnar med pa yan chad/ 'og min gyi gnas man chad du mngon par phyung ste slar log go// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa phyung ba ji snyed pa de dag
366b1(mdo sde): thams cad ni/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku'i khung bu thams cad du nub go// gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sprul pa byung ba de dag ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rnams su nub bo// / 
366b2(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i phung po zhes bya ba stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom/ 
366b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// kye ma mi rnams kyis ni 'dren pa yis/ sngon chad
366b4(mdo sde): ma byung mdzad pa sna tshogs 'di// skye dgu kun la myur du kun bstan pa// de yis bdud sde thams cad mog mog 'gyi sa// phan tshun dag tu tshig tu smra bgyid pa// kye ma'o shin tu
366b5(mdo sde): mtshar che zhes mchi// bdag cag ci zhig phyir ni 'dir lhags/ ke/ bdag cag bcom mo bdag cag bcom zhes mchi// da ka' thub can bdag dka' thub can min gyur// nyam chung lus
366b6(mdo sde): la lpags tsam zhig las// bdag 'khogs bdag skams bde ba rnams las nyams// bdag cag rdzu 'phrul thob par gyur ma yin// yi ge ma mchis rdzu 'phrul gsum rnams kyis// bstan pa'i/ 
366b7(mdo sde): dgra rnams mog mog gyur pa mdzad// snyan pa'i 'dren pa khyod kyis de ring ni// sangs rgyas sras la dus ston chen po mdzad// 'khor 'di thams cad the tsom 'tshal bar 'gyur// dga' ba
366b8(mdo sde): skyes shing sems kyang rab dga' ste// gang zhig gnas nas lha tshogs bdag cag kyang // 'jig rten mgon po sangs rgyas gyur cig mchi// 'jam dbyangs sangs rgyas mang po bsnyen bkur
367a1(mdo sde): bgyis/ sangs rgyas chum mtha' yas rnams kyis bkor// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni 'khor gyi nang na mchis/ cho 'phrul rnam par phye ste bstan du gsol// 'di
367a2(mdo sde): dag chos ni gang gi ltas shig lags// thub pa chos ni gang zhig gsungs par bzhed// 'khor 'di thams cad 'gyod cing mchis lags na// sems can thugs brtse 'i slad du bdag
367a3(mdo sde): la gsungs// de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ 'khor de'i nang nas/ drang srong chen po me sgron zhes bya ba gcig gis// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i phung po la 'di skad
367a4(mdo sde): ces smras so// kye gzhon nu re shig kha reg shig/ dpe 'dri badri bar bya'o// gal te khe bo 'dri ba khong du chud dbar byed na ni/ de thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i ming
367a5(mdo sde): dang yang 'thun no// 'on te sred med kyi bu dang / dbang phyugachen pos phyung ba'i 'gro lding ba rnams kyis sprul pa byed/ du zad na ni/ 'dir ngo mtshar yang ci che ste/ skyes bu
367a6(mdo sde): ngan pa dang / sgyu ma mkhan rnams kyis ni 'di grub bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa'i zhal gyis// drang srong gi tshogs la kun tu gzigs nas/ drang srong chen po me sgren la
367a7(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshe dang ldan pa drang srong chen po tso nus kyis dri ba dris shig drang / rnam par byang bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po me sgron gyis 'di skad
367a8(mdo sde): ces gsol to// kye go'u ta ma sems can gyi skye ba gang nas byung / ci'i slad du bskal pas sreg par 'gyur/ sems can rnams gnas gang du 'du bar 'gyur// nang na sems
367b1(mdo sde): can phra ba khrugang tsam 'am/ mtho gang tsam 'am/ mdzub mo tsam 'am/ mthe bo tsam 'am/ nas dang / gro dang / mon sran sde'u dang / mon sran gre'u dang / til dang / yungs 'bru tsam 'am/ 
367b2(mdo sde): sems can ji tsam zhig nang na mchis bka' stsol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po ma smon la/ drang srong chen po lags so lagaso zhes/ legs so zhes bya ba byin no// 
367b3(mdo sde): drang srong chen po che bskal pa drug cu pa'i dri ba 'dri ba 'di ni mthun pa'o// den drang srong chen po rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te/ drang srong chen po me sgron gyi tshe'i tshad ni ma brjod par bdag cag ldan
367b4(mdo sde): cig gnas gnas pa rnams kyis kyang ma shes na 'dis ji ltarashes snyam mo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa ral ba/ drang srong chen po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la
367b5(mdo sde): yid la zung shig dang bshad do// drang srong chen po gang / nga la sems can gyi skye ba gang nas byung zhes smras pa de ni/ yi ges brjod pa ma yin pa'o// sems can zhes bya ba ni
367b6(mdo sde): ma rig pa'i rkyen las skye ba dang / rga shi'i bar du 'byung ba'o// drang srong chen po yang rgyu rkyen las sems can skye ste/ rgyu rkyen ni pha ma'o// drang srong chen po yang pha ma 'grogs pa ni de'i rgyu'o// gang
367b7(mdo sde): gi tshe yongs su rtogs pas kun nas bslang ba'i las kyi rlung rnams kyis bud med kyi 'gred du 'jug pa de ni de'i rkyen to// drang srong chen po yang sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / sdug
367b8(mdo sde): bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa ni sems can no// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga dang / khams
368a1(mdo sde): bco brgyad ni sems can no// drang srong chen po sems can yang gzhan la/ las kyang gzhan ma yin/ las kyang gzhan la sems can
368a2(mdo sde): yang gzhan ma yin no// drang srong chen po sems can ni 'grib pa ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin no// drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ kye go'u ta ma gal te sems can la 'grib pa ma mchis
368a3(mdo sde): 'phel ba ma mchis na/ ci'i slad du sems can khyi'i skye gnas shi 'phos te dbang ba sgyur du 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po de ni ji skad smras pa de bzhin du
368a4(mdo sde): ma yin no// gal te dbang sgyur dbang sgyur yin du zin na ni / dbang med par 'chi ba'i mi rigs so// drang srong chen po gang rang gi lus kyi gtse bo ma yin pa de ji ltar dbang sgyur
368a5(mdo sde): du 'gyur// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ srin bu mi khyer 'di snyam du bdag gis 'dzam bu'i gling snang bar bya'o snyam du sems pa'i rkyen gyis/ srin bu mi khyer gyis 'dzam
368a6(mdo sde): bu'i gling snang bar byed dam/ sems ma dul ba ni dbang sgyur yang dag pa ma yin no// drang srong chen po yang gal te dbang sgyur nyon mongs pa 'bri bar gyur na ni/ khyi la nyon mongs pa shas che bar
368a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe dbang sgyur dang nyon mongs pa dag khyi la yang yod cing / dbang sgyur la yang yod pa de'i tshe/ sems can la 'grib pa yang mi dmigs 'phel ba yang mi dmigaso// drang srong chen po
368a8(mdo sde): gsol pa/ go'u tams nyon mongs pa 'grib par mdzad dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen pongs phyin ci log dag bzlog pa yang med/ 'grib par byas pa yang med do// drang srong
368b1(mdo sde): chen pos gsel ba/ gal te de ltar na khyod kyang dbang sgyur ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po de de bzhin te/ ma byung ba'i phyir nga yang dbang sgyur ma yin no// drang srong
368b2(mdo sde): chen pos gsol pa/ go'u tam bka' mchid 'dir shig zhog/ go'u ta ma'i sras kyis pha ma 'grogs pa las sems can skye'o zhes gsungs na/ sems can mang du 'grogs pa las sems can skye ba
368b3(mdo sde): nyung bar gyur pa 'di ji lta bu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod la dpe bstan par bya'o// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ sa bon gcig las shing skye bar 'gyur te/ 'bras bu gcig
368b4(mdo sde): las kyang 'bras bu mtha' yas par 'gyur ro// de las res dga' ni gtsigs 'on gyi 'os su 'gyur gyi lhag ma sa bon gyi 'os su mi 'gyur ba de ji lta bu/ drang srong chen pos gsol ba
368b5(mdo sde): kye go'u ta ma rlung dang nyi mas shing rtog rnams ma rungs par bgyis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong / chen po de de bzhin te/ las kyi rlung gis kyang sems can gyi 'bras
368b6(mdo sde): bu rnams ma rungs par byas so// drang srong chen po kha ni mngal na gnas pa nyid kyi tshe/ srin bu rnams kyis zos so// kha cig ni las kyi rlung rnams kyis phye mar byas so// drang srong chen po shing gis nyes pa ni
368b7(mdo sde): nyung ngo // sems can gyi nyes pa ni mang ngo // drang srong chen po yang sems can gyi khams ni yongs su rtog pas kun nas/ bslang ba ste/ drang srong chen po sems can rnams kyi sems dang sems las
368b8(mdo sde): byung ba'i 'jug pa ji snyed pa de snyed du srid pa la dmigs te/ drang srong chen po de'i phyir sems can gyi khams ni yongs su rtog pas kun nas bslang ba'o// zhes nga smra'o// drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ 
369a1(mdo sde): kye go'u ta ma de de bzhin te/ zhu ba brjod pa 'di ni rnam par dag go/ ci'i slad du bskal pas sreg par 'gyur ba bka' stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
369a2(mdo sde): bka' sngal ba/ drang srong chen po ches kyi dbyings 'dus ma byas pa'i byir bskul pas sregs par 'gyur ro// drang sro chen po gas te bskam pas sreg par mi 'gyur na/ chos kyi dbyings gnyis
369a3(mdo sde): su 'gyur te/ la la mi rtag la/ la la rtag par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa bden par smra bar mi 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po gang gi phyir 'di thams cad rtag pa ma yin/ brtan
369a4(mdo sde): pa ma yin/ dbugs phyin pa ma yin pa de'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba de'i ming thob po// drang srong chen pos bram ze'i khye'u la smras pa/ 'di thams cad
369a5(mdo sde): mkhyen par mtshan gsol ba ni mthun no// bcom ldan 'ad sa kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po gal te bska/ la pas bsregs par ma gyur na/ 'di ni dus bzang po'o// 'di ni
369a6(mdo sde): dus ngan pa'o zhes bya bar dus tha dad pa med par 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po gal te yang bskal pas bsregs par ma gyur na/ legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa'i las rnams kyi rnam par
369a7(mdo sde): smin pa tha dad pa med par 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po yang 'di lta ste/ bskal pas sreg pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa ste/ drang srong chen po sems can ji snyed bskal pas sreg
369a8(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba thos nas/ dad par 'gyur ba'i sems can de snyed de bzhin gshegs pas bsdu ba'i dngos pos sdud par 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na/ kha chu ldag pa'i
369b1(mdo sde): sbrul ni mig gis kyang rngub/ na ba dang / sna dang / kha'i sgo nas kyang rngub bo// drang srong chen po de bzhin gshegs pa la yang de ltar blta ste/ sbyin pas kyang sdud/ snyan par skabs kyang sdud/ den spod
369b2(mdo sde): bas kyang sdud/ don mthun pas kyang sdud// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ gser la gnod par bya ba'i phyir/ mer 'jug pa ma yin gyi/ gsar dul ma yin pa 'di ji ltar na dul mar
369b3(mdo sde): 'gyur snyam nas/ de'i phyir mer 'jug ste/ shin tu bsregs pa'i phyir rin po che'i 'os su 'gyur ro// rin po chos sbas pa de'i rin thang med par 'gyur te/ drang srong chen po de'i phyir gser
369b4(mdo sde): brdung ba dang / bsreg pas rnam par sbyong ngo // drang srong chen po/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang rgyu me dad par sreg pa'i bskal pa mi 'byin te/ 'dir sems can gang
369b5(mdo sde): la yang gnod par mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po me sgron gyis 'di skad ces ga sol to// bcom ldan 'das bskal pas sreg pa'i me phyung yang / 
369b6(mdo sde): sems can gang la yang gnod par mi 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar te// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni/ sems can gang la yang gnod par mi
369b7(mdo sde): mdzad do// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ phyogs bcu rnams su char phra me'i rgyun 'bab pa de bas ni/ drang srong chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang
369b8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams nye bar gnas te/ rang gi lag gis sems can thar par byed pa ches mang ngo // drang srong chen po de'i tshe sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub
370a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' de dag gi gzugs kyang mthong / kha dog mdzes pa yang mthong / bskal pas bsreg pa'i 'jigs pa las bdag nyid sgrol bar yang mthong
370a2(mdo sde): nas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/ 'di skad ces bdag cag kyang 'di ltar sgrol ba por gyur cig/ bdag cag kyang 'di ltar gzugs mdzes par gyur cig/ bdag cag kyang
370a3(mdo sde): 'di ltar kha dog mdzes par gyur cig ces 'dzer to// kha cig ni yid byung nas sems rnam par grol te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed/ kha cig ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
370a4(mdo sde): 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed/ kha cig ni dgra bcom pa nyid// cig ni byang chug sa shinam skye / chos la bzod pa rab tu thob/ kha cig ni phyir mi ldeg pa'i sa
370a5(mdo sde): gnon/ kha cig ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi na du skye/ kha cig ni sum cu rtsa gsum du/ kha cig ni mtshe mar/ kha cig ni dga' ldan du/ kha cig ni 'phrul dag
370a6(mdo sde): kha cig ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nang na skye'o// drang srong chen po rnam grangs 'di lta bur/ reg min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye'o// de bzhin du 'khor los sgyur ba rnams dang / 
370a7(mdo sde): stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rnams dang / khams kyi rgyal po rnams su gyur te/ drang srong chen po rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyi bar du yang 'gyur ro// drang sro nga chen po rnam
370a8(mdo sde): / grangs 'di lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku mthong zhing / bdag nyid kyang 'jigs pa chen po las sgrol bar mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa gze zhing / byas pa shes pa/ 
370b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa la ches nyid thos nas bslab pa'i gnas rnams la bag byed par 'gyur ro// thabs 'dis nangan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po yangs bcul
370b2(mdo sde): gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mig la/ sa'i khams ji snyed snang bar 'gyur ba de bas ni/ sems can gyi khams gang 'khor ba la chags skyon chags par shes nas/ phung po
370b3(mdo sde): ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa ches mang ste/ drang srong chen po de'i phyir bskal pas sregs par 'gyur ro// de nas drang srong chen po ma sgron gyis/ 
370b4(mdo sde): rang gi yid kyis rnam par dpyad nas/ tshig tu smras pa/ kya ma'o gang bdag la drang srong chen po zhes 'bod pa/ shAkya'i sras 'di'i che ba nyid ni rgya che'o// bdag gis 'di la bag gam/ 
370b5(mdo sde): pas kyang chog ste/ 'di ni thams cad mkhyen par mngon gyi/ sa/ bdag gis kyang 'di la yang dag pa'i ming gi/ sa 'bod par bya'o zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
370b6(mdo sde): drang srong chen po ma sgron gyis/ 'di skad ces gsol to// yon tan gyi 'byung gnas su gyur cing mkhyen pa dpag tu ma mchis pas thams cad mkhyen pa zhes mtshan gsol pa/ sems can
370b7(mdo sde): gnas gang du 'du bar 'gyur ba bdag la bka' stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po gnas med pa la sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro// mnyam pa nyid la
370b8(mdo sde): sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po theg pa gcig gis 'byung ba la sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po
371a1(mdo sde): phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po 'di lnga ste dper na/ chu klung chen po tha dad pa dang / krung / 
371a2(mdo sde): dang / klung chen po dag rgya mtsho chen por bab nas/ ro gcig tu 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po de bzhin du sems can gyi khams ji snyed zag pa zad pa byed pa de dag thams cad rnam par grol ba'i ngang du
371a3(mdo sde): gyur pas 'du bar 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po 'khor bar 'du bas sems can 'du bar 'gyur ba ni 'du ba ma yin pa'o zhes nga smra'o// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung gis bdas nas phya ma
371a4(mdo sde): leb phyi phyin la 'du bar 'gyur te/ rlung med na so sor 'gyes so// drang srong chen po de bzhin du sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur bas phan tshun las 'brel ba'i
371a5(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams de dag kyang der 'du bar 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po lnga rnam grangs 'di lta bu phan tshun las kyis 'brel pa dag yi dgas su skye bar 'gyur ro// dud 'gror
371a6(mdo sde): skye bar 'gyur te/ dar de dag tu 'du bar 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po lha dang mi rnams su de dag 'du bar 'gyur ro// drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ thams cad zil gyis gnon/ 
371a7(mdo sde): pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa mir skyes pa 'di sems can che ga mo zhes bgyi ba zhig dang 'dus par gyur to// dud 'gror skyes pa 'di zhes bgyi ba nas/ yi dgas su skyes pa 'di 'dus par gyur to// zhes
371a8(mdo sde): bgyi ba'i bar du ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi bka' stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po sems can gang zhig sems can gang dang lhan cig tu/ sems can dmyal
371b1(mdo sde): bar skyes nas 'dus par gyur pa des de mthong na yid mi bde bar 'gyur/ dege sdang bar yang 'gyur/ des de mthong nas/ gal rkyen de grang ban par yang 'gyur/ bshang ba dang / gcig
371b2(mdo sde): 'byung bar yang 'gyur te/ drang srong chen po 'di ni sems can dmyal bar skyes pa rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan nyid do// gang la la de ltar gyur pa des kyang / bdag dang 'di lhan cig tu
371b3(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba rnams na gnas gnas par mngon ne zhes de ltar khong du chud par bya'o// drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ rigs gsal bar mdzad pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa dud 'gro dang / 
371b4(mdo sde): lhan cig gnas gnas pa rnams kyi mtshan mar 'gyur ba ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mir skyes pa'i sems can rnams gang gi tshephan tshun mthong
371b5(mdo sde): pa na 'khon du mdud par 'dzin cing 'di las bdag gis skyen ji ltar rnyed snyam du skyon tshol ba 'di ni/ drang srong chen po/ dud 'gror skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan nyid de/ 
371b6(mdo sde): bdag dang 'di lhan cig dud 'gro'i nang na gnas gnas par mngon no zhes de ltar shes par bya'o// drang srong chen po yid gas su skyes pa rnams ni dri nga ba 'dod cing kha zas la shin tu sred
371b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// pha rol la sbyin par bsams kyang chags pa skye bar 'gyur ro// gang dag de yi dgas su skyes nas lhan cig 'dus par gyur pa de'i dbang phyug mthong nas phrag dag skye
371b8(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ gzhan gyi nor la 'dod pa 'gyur te/ 'di ni yi dgas su skyes pa rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan nyid de// de la bdag dang 'di lhan cig tu yi dgas kyi nang na gnas par mngon
372a1(mdo sde): ne zhes de ltar shes par bya'o// drang srong chen po mer skyes pa gangal la zhig tshe rabs gzhan dag la 'dus par gyur pa de ni des de mthong na/ 'dod chags
372a2(mdo sde): kyi sems skye bar 'gyur te/ drang srong chen po 'di ni mir skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan nyid do// de la bdag dang 'di mi rnams kyi nang na gnas gnas par mngon no zhes de ltar shes par
372a3(mdo sde): bya'o drang srong chen pos gsol ba bcom ldan 'das gang dag lngar skyes te 'dus par gyur pa las mir skyes pa de dag gi ji lta bu lags bcom ldan 'das
372a4(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po gang dgra skur skyes te 'dus par gyur pa de dag ni phan tshun mthong na lta ba la 'jug par 'gyur te/ de nas bdag dang 'di lhan cig 'dus
372a5(mdo sde): par gyur to zhes shes par bya'o// drang srong chen po/ rnam pa de lta bu dag tu sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro// de nas drang srong chen po me smon dga' mgu yid rangs
372a6(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsel to// bcom ldan 'das gang dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon par mi bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni bslus pa'o// 
372a7(mdo sde): zhes bdag 'chad do// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po ma smon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// drang srong chen po nang na sems can
372a8(mdo sde): zhes bya ba phra 'ji tsam zhig yod ces pa la de gad ces zer ba ni/ drang srong chen po gang sems can du dmigs pa de sems can phra mor rnam par 'byed do// drang phreng chen po
372b1(mdo sde): lha ste dper na/ la la zhig gis dmus long zhig la 'di skad du/ kye skyes bu kha dog dkar po zhes bya ba ci 'dra zhes spyan/ drang srong chen po 'di snyam du sems/ ma mthong ban/ 
372b2(mdo sde): phyir kha deg dkar po 'di 'dra'o zhes de sla bar nus sam/ drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ 'brel pa ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong
372b3(mdo sde): chen po de bzhin du ngas kyang dmus long ltar ma mthong ba'i phyir/ sems can zhes bya ba ni phra mo 'di lta bu zhig go zhes sems can brjod par mi nus so// drang srong chen po yang
372b4(mdo sde): mig la sems can zhes bya ba mi rnyed do// rnab da dang / sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid la sems can zhes bya ba mi rnyed do// drang srong chen po nye bar len pa'i phung
372b5(mdo sde): po lnga po dag la sems can zhes bya ba mi rnyed do// drang srong chen po khams bco brgyad dang / rten cing 'brel pa/ ra 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la
372b6(mdo sde): sems can zhes bya ba mi snyad/ phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la sems can zhes bya ba mi rnyed do// drang srong chen po mig ni ngan pa'o// 'jig pa'o// skad cig kyang mi
372b7(mdo sde): gnas pa'o// de bzhin du na pa dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang ngan pa'o// 'jig pa'o// skad cig kyang mi gnas pa'o// drang srong chen po nye bar len pa'i phung po
372b8(mdo sde): lnga yang ngan pa'o// 'jig pa'o// skad cig kyang mi gnas pa'o// drang srong chen po mi gtsang ba'i rdzas sum cu rtsa drug kyang ngan pa'o// 'jig pa'o// skad cig kyang mi
373a1(mdo sde): gnas pa'o// sems can zhes bya ba yang med gzugs kyang med de/ drang srong chen po rdzas 'dus pa ni sems can zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gre'o// 
373a2(mdo sde): yongs su rtog pa gang dag rdzas rnams rnam par 'byed pa de dag ni srog dang / gso ba dang / skye bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu mi dmigs so// drang srong chen po gal
373a3(mdo sde): te sems can yod du zin na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag gis shin tu chos ston par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ drang srong chen po gang gi phyir/ sems can
373a4(mdo sde): med pa de'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid 'thob ste/ de'i phyir /  yang dag par sgrub par byed pa de lta de ltar yang dag par 'grub po// de nas bcom ldan 'das
373a5(mdo sde): la drang srong chen po ma sgren gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad drang srong chen po ma sgron/ bdag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon par bgyid do// 
373a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag bskal pa mu ma mchis par sems can dmyal ba'i zhugs kyi 'obs su gnas par 'gyur ba'am/ ri rab 'og min gyi gnas tsam du gyur pa
373a7(mdo sde): mthon po'i kha de nas/ bdag gis bdag 'dor bar 'gyur ba'am/ gdung ba lnga bskal pas sreg pa lta bur 'gyur ba 'am/ nyi ma bskal par gnas par
373a8(mdo sde): 'gyur ba 'am/ bskal pa sum cu'i zla ba gcig tu sbyang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dka' ba spyad par ni bcom ldan 'das bdag sgo ste 'dun gyi/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
373b1(mdo sde): kyi srang du ni brtson 'grus nyams par mi bgyi dpa'o/ drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i snyed/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du lpags bde dag kyang stan las yangs te/ ba
373b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang deng slan chad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon par bgyi'o// rje ci thog gis brtson
373b3(mdo sde): 'grus brtsam par bgyi'o// drang srong rnams kyis tshig de skad smras ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis smin mtshams nas 'dul ba can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung / phyogs
373b4(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang smin mtshams nas 'dul ba can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ste/ 'od rang dag gi mthus sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos rab tu
373b5(mdo sde): g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg ste/ shar phyogs mthon/ lho phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs dma' na/ byang phyogs mthe/ 
373b6(mdo sde): shar phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/ nub phyogs mthon byang phyogs dma'o// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i steng du me tog gi char
373b7(mdo sde): phab/ rnga bo che rnams brdungs so// dri za'i bdag po yid du 'ong rnams kyis kyang yan lag lnga'i sil snyan gyis// bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod
373b8(mdo sde): lha'i bu bdug pa dri rab tu zhim po dag kyang rlung gis ngad bslang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du ngang ldang bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu dga'
374a1(mdo sde): ste/ mchog tu bde ba'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i steng du do shal dang / se mo do nams 'thor zhing rin po che'i char
374a2(mdo sde): yang 'bebs/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / sdes dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan
374a3(mdo sde): ngag gis kyang mchod pa byed do// lha'i tshogs rnams kyang rab tu dga' nas/ me tog man da ra ba dang / man dar ba chen po'i char 'bebs so// thams cad dang ldan
374a4(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor de yang dga' mgu yid rangs te/ ji da ltar gyon gyon pa'i gos rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de la gsol to// de nas 'dul ba can zhes bya'o/ 
374a5(mdo sde): 'od zer des 'og min gyi gnas man chad sem sa can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa yan chad snang bar bya sa te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la
374a6(mdo sde): bskor ba byas nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol
374a7(mdo sde): to// rgyu ma mchis par shAkya thub de ring 'dir// phyogs bcu dag tu 'od zer mi gtong ste/ 'khor 'di thams cad the tsom gyur lags na// thub pas
374a8(mdo sde): rgyu dang byed de bdag lung ston// mi yi 'dren pa'i rnam par 'phrul mthong nas// dga' bar gyur cing spro ba cha gyur te// rab tu dga' bas lag pa bstod bgyis nas/ 
374b1(mdo sde): kha cig 'di na bcom ldan legs shes mchi// brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten skyong ba rnams// namakhar gnas nas 'byung po'i tshogs dang stod// mkha' las lA ma me
374b2(mdo sde): tog char du 'babs// rnga brdung rnga chen dag ni sgra yang 'byin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor khyod kyis
374b3(mdo sde): drang srong ma sgron mthong ngam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor drang srong chen po ma sgron 'di/ 
374b4(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ sangs rgyas stong 'das pa'i 'o dag tu bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la zla ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
374b5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs shes bya ba ra 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyi ming yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu rnam par dag
374b6(mdo sde): pa'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor drang srong chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma thag tu phyir mi ldog pa'i rjes su thob ste/ rab 'byor de
374b7(mdo sde): dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i gsung rab la sa bcu la gnas par 'gyur ro// bskal pa sum brgya'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
374b8(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdag bka' blo bde ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa dag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma
375a1(mdo sde): tha rjud pa byang grong ting nge 'dzin thob ste/ skad dadu na dam yin pa shes pa 'od la dang / rdul bas dpang bsrur ba de du dang/ 
375a2(mdo sde): sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / khams rnam par 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / blo gros rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgya mtsho'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mnyen pa'i sa'i ting nge 'dzin/ 
375a3(mdo sde): dang / bsam pa'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo// rab 'byor lha bye ba phrag gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// 
375a4(mdo sde): dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma stong phrag tshad med bdag gis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// rab 'byor lnga
375a5(mdo sde): dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha/ ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi/ 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi
375a6(mdo sde): ma yin pa gang ga'i bye ma snyed dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de mthong nas 'dul ba can zhes
375a7(mdo sde): bya ba'i 'od zer rnams phyung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi ljags kyi dbang pos zhal khebs par mdzad de/ ljags kyi dbang po de las kha dog dum/ kha dog tha dad pa'i 'od zes
375a8(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / lebargan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag zung ste/ de dag 'jig rten gyi
375b1(mdo sde): khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu mngon par byung nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis su nub bo// 
375b2(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi bzad pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa cig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom
375b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu ma mchis par
375b4(mdo sde): 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzadad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
375b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi bzad pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu ma dad pa'i rnams kyi don tu ljags 'di lta bu ni brdzun mi gsung
375b6(mdo sde): ngo snyam du bya ba'i phyir// ljags kyi dbang po 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi bzad pas 'di skad ces gsol to// 
375b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam lung 'bog na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam snyed
375b8(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan la snang bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag la yongs su
376a1(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du gang zhig gis bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang rin po che sna
376a2(mdo sde): bdun gyi mchod rten byed pa de bas/ gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshig su bcad pa gcig tsam lung 'beg na/ 'di ches bsod nams mang du skyed do// rigs kyi bu chos
376a3(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa na/ gang zhig dang ba'i sems kyis legs so zhes bya ba sbyin pa de la/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod par 'gyur ro// gang gis 'di la rim gro byas pa
376a4(mdo sde): des nga la rim gro byas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom nga ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la rnam rapar gzigs nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu
376a5(mdo sde): dag nga ni bden pa smra ba ste/ sa phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grags pa'i sa phyogs de la/ sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dag chos kyi rnam
376a6(mdo sde): grangs 'di ni 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can rnams kyi sman du gyur par 'gyur ro// gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lan gsum brjod dam/ brjod du bcug na/ des ston pa la chos kyi 'khor lo
376a7(mdo sde): rab tu bskor bar bskul bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug pa de bde ba dang bcas shing yid bde ba dang bcas bzhin du/ byang chub
376a8(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// des sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzod kyang bzung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'i sems
376b1(mdo sde): can rnams kyi na lam du grags par mi 'gyur ro// gang dag mi'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos te yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye ba de dag gi rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag
376b2(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gang gis sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de'i rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grags par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang
376b3(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ dad dam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ba de'i lag tu byang chub song ngo zhes bshad
376b4(mdo sde): do// des mig lnga thob par 'gyur/ dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur/ dran pa brjed pa med par 'chi ba'i// dus byed par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas thams cad sgrub pa'i ting nge
376b5(mdo sde): 'dzin thob par 'gyur/ rnam par snang mdzad rnam par sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi snying po'i ting nge'idzi na dang / gtsug gi nor bu'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang bskur ba'i
376b6(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob par 'gyur/ yi ge med pa'i za ma rtog gi gzungs thob par 'gyur/ chos thams cad la rnam par rgyal ba thob pa'i gzungs
376b7(mdo sde): dang / the tsom rnam par sbyong ba'i gzungs dang / don dam pa rnam par nges pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur te/ de la sogs pa'i gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong mtha' yas pa thob
376b8(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bsams bzhin du 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpa
377a1(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa khyod la/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gtad kyis
377a2(mdo sde): yang dang yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu shed cig/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig la sti stang byas pa dang / btsun par byas pa dang / rim gro byas pa dang / mchod/ 
377a3(mdo sde): pa byas pa de ji snyam du sems/ 'jam dpal dge ba'i rtsa ba de la mtha' 'am mu yed dam/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dpag par nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsel ba bcom
377a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das ma lags so// bde bar gshegs pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gang gis snyigs ma lnga'i dus nu/ chos kyi
377a5(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad 'dir rgyas par/ byed par 'gyur ba de dag de las dge ba'i rtsa ba chen por/ 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gal te khyod de bzhin gshegs
377a6(mdo sde): pa mang po de snyed cig la na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gses sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sten par mi byed na/ 
377a7(mdo sde): khyod da dung du yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la nyes pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gal te khyod de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la'ang phyag mi byed kyi/ chos kyi rnam
377a8(mdo sde): grangs 'di rgyas par byed na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la khyed kyis mchod pa'i bar du byas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam
377b1(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / drang srong chen po me spen dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
377b2(mdo sde): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa don dam pa'i chos kyi rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin
377b3(mdo sde): mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+d+ha ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad ga sar chad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsa tur d+ha ma nir de shan
377b4(mdo sde): nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa che ngas bzhi bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sa das rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 
377b5(mdo sde): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum lnga'i nang na/ lha'i bdun sa sa bzangs na/ dge slong lnga brgya tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun
377b6(mdo sde): chen po dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
377b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches bzhi dang ldan na/ sdig pa byas shing bsags pa zil gyis non par 'gyur ro// bzhi
377b8(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par sun 'byin pa kun tu spyod pa dang / gnyen po kun tu spyod pa dang / sor chud par byed pa'i stobs dang / rten gyi stobs so// de la rnam par sun 'byin pa kun
378a1(mdo sde): tu spyod pa ni/ mi dge ba'i las spyad na/ de la gnyen pa mang ba yin no// de la gnyen po kun tu spyod pa ni mi dag pa'i las byas nas kyang dge ba'i las
378a2(mdo sde): la shin tu brtson pa'o// de la sor chud par byed pa'i stobs ni/ sdom pa yang dag par blangs pas mi byed pa'i sdom pa thob pa'o// de la rten gyi stobs ni sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la
378a3(mdo sde): skyabs su 'gro ba dang / byang chub tu sems mi gtong ba ste/ de stobs dang ldan pa la rten pas sdig pas zil gyi gnon par mi nus so// byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
378a4(mdo sde): chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ sdig pa byas shing ba sogs pa zil gyis non par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mdo 'di rtag tu klag par
378a5(mdo sde): bya'o// kha thon du bya'o// bsam par bya'o// sgom par bya'o// mang du bya'o// des na nyes par spyad pa 'bras bu 'byin mi nus par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das
378a6(mdo sde): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag/ brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams dang / 
378a7(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa chos bzhi bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'o mdo rdzogs s+ho// 
378a8(mdo sde): rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo sde dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+ha ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsa tur d+ha ma kan nA ma ma hA/ 
378b1(mdo sde): yAn su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa chos bzhi pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag
378b2(mdo sde): gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge
378b3(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshegs chen po dang yang thabs gcig go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la
378b4(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos bzhi po 'di dag ji srid 'a tshe'i bar du srog gi phyir yang yongs su mi gtong ngo // bzhi gang
378b5(mdo sde): zhe na/ dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' sems/ dpa' chen pos ji srid 'tshe'i bar du/ byang chubab kyi sems srog gi phyir yang yongs su mi gtang ba dang / 
378b6(mdo sde): dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dge ba'i bshes gnyen srog gi phyir yang yongs su mi gtang ba dang / dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa'
378b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen pos ji srid 'tshe' bar du/ bzod pa dang des pa srog gi phyir yang yongs su mi gtang ba dang / dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji srid
378b8(mdo sde): 'tshe'i bar du/ dgon pa la gnas pa sreg gi phyir yang yongs su mi btang ste/ dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji srid 'tsho'i bar du/ chos bzhi po 'di
